la mtshan mchog ni/ /a ra pa tsa na zhes pa/ /mdog dang phyag mtshan so sor bsam/ /mngon rtogs la ni tshigs bcad gsum/ /tshigs bcad dngos gcig sngags la gnyis/ /de ltar shes rab 'khor lo ni/ /gzhung tshad bcas pa legs bstan nas/ /da ni pho brang lha

'khor lo/ /de yi dbye ba bstan par bya/ /rnam par snang mdzad che zhes pa/ /byang chub sems kyi rdo rje ni/ /lnga yi rang bzhin drug pa ste/ /rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor lha dang mtshan/ /gtso bo'i thugs ka'i ye shes sems/ /'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /mtshan

rnams rnam pa gnyis su bzhed/ /de yi thugs ka'i zla dkyil na/ /mtshan ni rnam pa gnyis yin te/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas dang a las byung / /de steng a la rnam gsum ste/ /a ni yig 'bru kun mchog dang / /don chen zhes ni 'byung ba dang / /yi ge dam pa zhes pa gsum/ /de ltar de

dag gsum po ni/ /mtshan mchog rnam pa bdun du bzhed/ /gsang ba'i yum bzhi'i rnams la ni/ /khong nas byung dang skye med gnyis/ /satwa badzri ma yi mtshan/ /tshig tu brjod pa spangs gcig pu/ /rat+Na badzri ma yi mtshan/ /brjod pa kun gyi rgyu mchog nyid/ /d+harma badzri ma yi mtshan/

tshig kun shes ni 'byung ba dang / /rab tu gsal byed ma dang gnyis/ /karma badzri ma yi mtshan/ /de dag la ni mtshan drug ste/ /dang po tha ma gnyis gnyis so/ /rgyal ba lnga la tshan gsum gsum/ /tshig rkang dang po gnyis gnyis so/ /gong ma gong ma la gnyis gnyis/ /'og ma

'og ma re re la/ /mchod pa chen po chags chen nas/ /khro ba chen po dgra che'i mthar/ /rgyal rnams bco lnga yum bzhi drug /nyi shu rtsa gcig dag tu bshad/ /'dod pa che dang bde ba che/ /rdo rje sems dang rgyal po gnyis/ /dga' ba che dang mgu che gnyis/ /chags pa dang ni

legs pa'i mtshan/ /tshig rkang gnyis la bzhir bzhed de/ /byang chub sems kyi mtshan rnams so/ /gzugs che lus kyang che ba nas/ /dkyil 'khor chen po yangs pa yin/ /tshigs su bcad pa gcig la ni/ /sems dpa' bzhi ste mtshan rnams lnga/ /gzi brjid mchog che lus che gnyis/ /de dag

dbang bskur sems dpa' bzhi/ /shes rab mtshon chen 'chang ba nas/ /snang ba chen po gsal che'i mthar/ /tshigs su bcad pa gcig la ni/ /sems dpa' bzhi ste mtshan mchog bdun/ /rkang pa dang po rdo rje chos/ /mtshan mchog gcig tu shes par bya/ /rnon po la ni

gnyis yin te/ /nyon mongs lcags kyu che dang mchog /rgyu la grags chen snyan grags gnyis/ /smra la snang che gsal che gnyis/ /ye shes sems dpar grags pa yin/ /mkhas pa sgyu 'phrul che 'chang nas/ /sgyu 'phrul chen po mig 'phrul mthar/ /tshigs bcad gcig

la sems dpa' bzhi/ /mtshan rnams drug tu bzhed pa yin/ /mkhas pa sgyu 'phrul che 'chang gnyis/ /rdo rje las su shes par bya/ /sgyu 'phrul che dang don grub pa/ /rdo rje bsrung ba'i mtshan yin no/ /lhag ma gnyis la re re'o/ /sems dpa' de dag bzhi po ni/ /las

kyi sems dpa' rnams yin no/ /sems dpa' bcu drug rnams la ni/ /tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang bzhi/ /mtshan rnams nyi shu rtsa gnyis te/ /sems dpa'i bsdus don de yin no/ /sbyin bdag chen po zhes pa nas/ /smon lam ye shes rgya mtsho'i bar/ /pha rol phyin bcu'i

tshigs bcad gnyis/ /lha mo brgyad dang sgo mar bzhed/ /sbyin bdag chen dang gtso bo gnyis/ /sgeg mo yi ni mtshan yin no/ /tshul khrims chen dang 'chang mchog ni/ /phreng ba ma la gnyis su bzhed/ /bzod chen 'chang dang brtan pa gnyis/ /glu ma yi ni mtshan yin no/ /brtson 'grus

che dang brtul ba gnyis/ /gar mkhan ma yi mtshan yin no/ /me tog ma la mtshan gcig ste/ /bsam gtan chen po'i ting 'dzin gnas/ /shes rab che dang lus 'chang gnyis/ /bdug pa ma yi mtshan yin no/ /bsam gtan zhes pa mar me ma/ /thabs chen zhes pa dri

chab ma/ /stobs ni dad sogs rnam pa lnga/ /ye shes rgya mtsho mthong sgom gnyis/ /yan lag bdun dang 'phags lam brgyad/ /stobs dang ye shes sgom par bzhed/ /gsang mchod la brgyad phyi la lnga/ /sgo ba la gnyis spyir bco lnga/ /byams chen rang bzhin zhes pa nas/ /

mkhas pa chen po thabs che'i bar/ /tshig rkang bzhi la rim bzhin du/ /shar phyogs gnas pa'i skal bzangs bzhi/ /tshig rkang dang po byams pa yin/ /snying rje dang ni blo mchog gnyis/ /'jam dpal gyi ni mtshan yin no/ /spos glang shes rab blo chen gnyis/ /mkhas pa

che dang thabs che gnyis/ /ye shes tog gi mtshan yin no/ /lho yi sems dpa' rnam bzhi ni/ /rdzu 'phrul stobs ldan bzang skyong gi/ /shugs chen mgyogs pa chen po ni/ /blo gros rgya mtsho'i mtshan yin no/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po cher grags pa/ /blo gros mi bzad pa yi mtshan/ /

spobs pa brtsegs pa zhes bya ba/ /stobs chen pha rol gnon gcig pu/ /nub kyi phyogs kyi sems dpa' bzhi/ /srid pa'i ri bo che 'joms nas/ /'jigs chen 'jigs par byed pa'i mthar/ /mthu chen thob dang ngan song 'dren/ /mya ngan 'joms dang dra ba can/ /go rims bzhin

du tshig re la/ /mtshan yang re re dag tu 'dod/ /byang phyogs kyi yang sems dpa' bzhi/ /mgon po rigs mchog chen po nas/ /theg pa chen po tshul mchog mthar/ /go rims bzhin du legs sbyar te/ /mgon po rigs dang mchog chen gnyis/ /zla 'od gzhon nu'i mtshan

yin no/ /'od dpag med dang nam mkha' mdzod/ /sgrib pa rnam par sel dang gsum/ /tshig gsum mtshan gsum go rims bzhin/ /tshigs bcad dag ni bcu bzhi ste/ /mtshan don brgyad cu rtsa drug bzhed/ /rigs bsdus tshe na dbus dkyil 'khor/ /bde gshegs

dkyil 'khor lha rnams ni/ /seng ge dang ni rab gsal byed/ /thub pa dang ni me tog dang / /me tog mdzes dang spyan bzang po/ /kun ded dpon dang phyag rgya che/ /stobs po che dang rgyu skar rgyal/ /sman pa dang ni grags pa dang / /rgyal mtshan dang ni 'od zer che/ /grol phung dang ni rnam snang

mdzad/ /nyi bzang po dang zla ba bzang / /'od zer can dang 'od 'phro bzang / /mya ngan med dang de bzhin skar/ /'od 'phro 'dzin dang yon tan 'od/ /don ston pa dang mar me ldan/ /rab bzang dang ni sman bzang po/ /dpa' bo dang ni mdzod spu dang / /brtan po dang ni dpal gyi lha/ /

mthong bar dka' dang yon tan 'od/ /skra can dang ni grangs can dang / /tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang brtan pa'i mtshams/ /rig pa ldan dang 'od mdzad pa/ /ri bo che dang rdo rje che/ /rgyal min dang ni 'jigs med pa/ /rin po che dang pad+ma dang / /stobs sde can dang me tog 'od/ /ye shes

'od dang lha chen po/ /tshig gi bdag dang snang mtha' yas/ /klus sbyin dang ni bstan pa'i rim/ /don yod mthong dang dbang po sbyin/ /mi lhung ba dang seng rgyal mtshan/ /rgyal ba dang ni tshogs pa po/ /dga' ba'i rgyal dang don 'dod pa/ /dga' bar mdzad dang chu yi lha/ /yon tan

lag dang spos glang po/ /don yod dbyangs dang thugs bzang po/ /zla ba dang ni ri bong can/ /grags chen pa dang gtsug nor bu/ /drug po dang ni seng ge 'gros/ /ngang pa dang ni rnam rgyal don/ /shes rab brtsegs dang legs gnas pa/ /blo gros dang ni yan lag skyes/ /

bdud rtsi bu dang gzugs bzang po/ /ye shes can dang 'od zer can/ /dka' thub brtan dang bkra shis ldan/ /bde ba'i tog dang pad+ma dang / /mi yi theg dang bde ba'i phyag /ye shes mdzad blo dang 'od bral/ /tshangs pas byin dang rin chen mdzod/ /me tog lha dang legs pa'i don/ /

chos dbang phyug dang blo gros grags/ /rdo rje tog dang pad+ma sgrub/ /rnam par rol dang du ma'i lha/ /ri yi tog dang 'od kyi tshogs/ /mi zad pa dang rin chen snying / /bzod chen pa dang chos kyi blo/ /yid kyi yul dang yon tan grags/ /zla ba'i 'od dang gsal ba'i ro/ /seng ge tog dang

lus las bzlog /snying po'i dpal dang nges pa'i tog /glog gi 'od dang gser sbyin cha/ /gzhan gyis mi thub tog gi rgyal/ /rab tu grags dang brtson 'grus brtan/ /dpe bral grags dang gshin 'jigs 'gyur/ /dgra bcom lha dang mar me che/ /'jig rten 'od dang dri

dang po/ /yon tan 'dzin dang mun bral 'gyur/ /seng ge spro dang rin chen grags/ /skye rang bzhin dang yid skyes zla/ /legs par ston dang gzugs brnyan brgyan/ /nor bu bzang dang rin chen tog /chos 'byung gnas dang rnam nges don/ /chos ster ba dang rin chen gnas/ /

rgyal dbang po dang rin chen mnan/ /gnas pa'i blo dang bskal bral gdugs/ /rnam snang dpal dang seng ge sgra/ /rnam par rol dang klu yi 'od/ /me tog ro dang klu dbang can/ /ri dbang phyug dang shin tu bsam/ /stobs kyi lha dang yon tan phreng / /klu yi phyag dang gzugs brnyan

brgyan/ /rgyal ba'i blo dang ye shes khyab/ /bdud rtsi sgra dang bden par smra/ /rab zhi blo dang mtha' yas gzugs/ /rnam snang mdzad dang rin chen tog /'dod pa bral dang legs gzhibs pa/ /don yod sangs rgyas rtogs pa 'chang / /me tog dang ni rdor dbang rgyal/ /gzi brjid

can dang don ston pa/ /tshe dpag med dang khro dbang phyug /don gnas can dang mi shigs grags/ /mya ngan med dang dri ma bral/ /tshangs pa'i lha zhes bya ba'o/ /'di yi gzhung gi tshad dag kyang / /tshigs bcad nyi shu rtsa lngar ni/ /tshig rkang gcig gis ma tshang ba/ /rgyal ba lnga la rim bzhin du/

sum cu rtsa drug rtsa drug mtshan/ /bsdoms pas brgya dang brgyad cu gcig /mi bskyod dkyil 'khor lha rnams ni/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed rgyud las gnyis/ /khro bo rnam rgyal sgyu 'phrul dra/ /phyag rdor dbang bskur rgyud las gnyis/ /rdo rje brgyan dang rig pa mchog /bde mchog rgyan

dang rdo rje 'dus/ /don yod zhags dang rdo rje thod/ /gsang ba 'dus dang rnam snang dra/ /dam tshig che nang zla gsang thig /gnyis med mnyam dang zla gsang thig /rgyu de rnams las mtshan re re/ /sgyu 'phrul drug stong pa las gnyis/ /'byung po phyag rdor sa 'og rgyud/ /sgyu 'phrul dra

dang bde mchog rgyud/ /khro bo bde mchog sad dang ni/ /rgyud de rnams la mtshan re 'byung / /khro bo rnam rgyal rgyud gnyis las/ /khro zla dang ni rta mchog rgyud/ /mtshan ni re re shes par bya/ /mi mnyam mnyam dang gsang rgyud de/ /rgyud de las ni bzhi 'byung ngo / /dpal mchog dang po gsang ba

'dus/ /gsang ba mdzod dang gsang ba 'dus/ /rdo rje gsang rgyan nor bu gsal/ /de nyid 'dus pa'i rgyud dang ni/ /rgyud de rnams las mtshan re re/ /dam tshig chen po'i rgyud las gnyis/ /rnam snang mngon byang chub las gnyis/ /gnyis med mnyam dang khams gsum rgyal/ /rgyud de

las ni re re'o/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed rgyud las gnyis/ /phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i/ /rgyud las khro bo bzhi 'byung ngo / /rdo rje snying po'i rgyud las gnyis/ /rdo rje thod phreng rgyud las gnyis/ /khro bo rnam rgyal rgyud las gnyis/ /dpung bzangs rgyud dang legs par grub/ /yi ge drug

dang 'bum pa dang / /'jam dpal rgyud dang mngon dam rgyan/ /de bzhin khams gsum rnam rgyal dang / /rgyud de rnams las re re'o/ /'jam dpal rgyud las gnyis 'byung ngo / /'di yi gzhung tshad bstan pa ni/ /tshigs bcad bcu dang rkang pa gcig /mtshan rnams bdun cu rtsa gcig ste/ /

rgyal ba lnga la bcu bzhi re/ /rgyud sde so sor lha dbye byas/ /pad+ma gar dbang dkyil 'khor gyi/ /lha rnams nges par brjod pa ni/ /ye shes grags dang de bzhin rgyal/ /yon tan 'od dang khyad par che/ /zla ba rgyal dang pad+ma'i 'od/ /dka' thub rgyal dang mar me bzang / /

glog gi tog dang 'od kyi rgyal/ /gsal ba pa dang dpe bral grags/ /pad+ma grags dang me tog mtshan/ /spyan bzang mchog dang grangs med don/ /drag po sde dang bsod nams 'od/ /khyad par can dang thogs med blo/ /rA hu la dang ye shes 'od/ /grags dbang dang ni ye shes dbang / /

skar ma'i tog dang rA hu la/ /sman pa che dang sman pa'i rgyal/ /bsod nams dbang dang rgyu ba po/ /skar ma'i rgyal dang rgyal ba pa/ /nyi 'od 'char dang chos kyi mdzod/ /blo gros legs dang rgyal dbang po/ /rdo rje sde dang rdo rje brtsegs/ /legs par gnas dang rgyal ba'i blo/ /tshangs pa'i

dbyangs dang klu dbang po/ /yon gsal dbang dang mngon shes tog /'od kyi tog dang dga' tshangs pa/ /sgra mi snyan dang rol pa'i gar/ /klu sbyin dang ni bde ba'i tog /mkhas dang gzhan gyis mi thub dbyangs/ /rin chen 'od dang gsung dbyangs sbyin/ /seng ge dang ni nyi sna tshogs/ /ye

shes dpal dang pad phung po/ /me tog dang ni rnam mnan 'gro/ /bsod nams dpung dang mchog gyur blo/ /gsal ba dang ni zla mar me/ /mi bzad pa dang blo bzangs spyan/ /yan lag gtsug dang shes rab yul/ /mchog tu gyur dang rab 'joms zer/ /shes rab sbyin dang 'jam

pa'i dbyangs/ /tshig med spyod dang thu bo sbyin/ /dag pa dang ni ye shes gnam/ /bde gshegs 'od dang dbang po'o/ /thub pa 'chang dang lha zhes pa/ /'od zer bzang dang gzugs bzang po/ /rgyal po dang ni don grub mdzad/ /seng ge dang ni dri ldan dang / /grags pa zhes dang rgyal

ba'o/ /mchog snying dang ni bsod nams zer/ /mdog bzangs dang ni nyan 'dod pa/ /mar me dang ni rin chen brtsegs/ /tshogs med lha dang sa yi bdag /grol bar 'gro dang gser gtsug phud/ /sgra gcan bzang dang mi thub pa/ /rang bzhin thub dang zla ba'i 'od/ /gser

mdog bzang po dang dge ba/ /yon dbang lha dang chos kyi gdugs/ /yon tan legs dang grol zhes pa/ /ye shes rdzogs dang zhib mo'i blo/ /'od rab 'bar dang skyabs kyi sman/ /rnam grol tog dang shes rab mchog /ye shes rgyal dang 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /glo bur

'joms dang thogs med grags/ /bden par gsung dang ngag snyan pa/ /ri dbang grags dang chos brtsegs la/ /'gro ba'i 'od dang legs par brgyan/ /rang gi lus dang ye shes dag /seng mche rno dang sel ba po/ /'gro ba mchod dang seng ge grags/ /chos kyi mtshan dang

skal ba bzang / /mi bskyod mdog dang 'bar ba'i rgyal/ /rtogs pa dang ni spyan bzang po/ /don rig blo dang 'jigs med gser/ /dri yi 'od dang dga' ba'o/ /don yod 'gro dang khro thal mdog /mchog gi gzugs dang nyan pa po/ /gtso bo grags dang drag po sbyin/ /nyi ma'i

lha dang gshin 'joms lhag /shing rta'i 'gros dang blo gros bzang / /gser 'od bcom dang skal ldan gtsug /dbang phyug dang ni dga' ba bstan/ /mos pa 'joms dang ye shes mdzod/ /tshangs pa'i 'gros dang tsan+dan dang / /mya ngan med dang seng ge'o/ /rtog gi yul dang

pad+ma'i snying / /'od mtha' yas dang lha yi yul/ /bsod nams me tog rig pa'i lha/ /ye shes dbang dang tshangs pa gsal/ /rin chen phyag dang dbang po ldan/ /dpe bral 'gros dang the tshom ldan/ /mchod pa dang ni 'bar ba dang / /sangs rgyas gdugs dang 'dam gyi mchog /

yid 'ong ldan dang bya grub pa/ /rma bya dang ni chos ldan dang / /phan ldan gzugs dang ye shes dang / /grags pa dang ni 'od zer 'bar/ /ma lus phan dang bai DUr snying / /rgyu skar dang ni lha nyid ldan/ /ri bong can dang dra ba'i 'od/ /dge ba'i 'od dang yon tan zer/ /yid lags

pa dang rigs kyi 'od/ /spyod pa po dang rigs kyi mtsho/ /chos dbang phyug dang sku yi lha/ /yon tan stobs dang 'khor lo dbang / /legs pa'i dbyangs dang legs par reg /don grub pa dang gzi brjid dpal/ /kun mnyam nyid dang bdud rtsi dbyangs/ /bde bar snang dang

legs pa'i blo/ /rnam grol don dang khyad dbang phyug /rol pa'i mchog dang lhag mthong nas/ /nyes pa spangs dang nyi ma'i 'od/ /bkra rgyal blo dang pad+ma'i mchog /nyi ma'i 'od dang so sor gsungs/ /legs pa dang ni tshogs dbang po/ /'jigs pa bral dang ye shes srid/ /spobs pa'i mtshan nyid dang blo mchog /ri bong can dang

rin chen zla/ /mi 'jigs pa dang me long che/ /tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang snyan pa'i gsung / /shes rab 'od dang kun mnyam blo/ /rdo rje dang ni blo dang ldan/ /nam mkha'i dbang dang ngag dbang phyug /yon tan dpal dang gnas kyi dpal/ /'phags pa'i 'od dang gsal ba'i shugs/ /gsal ba'i ro dang dri dbang phyug /'dod can gdong

dang ye shes gsung / /zhi gnas dang ni ye shes legs/ /rab tu 'dug dang chos rgyal mtshan/ /dri ma bral dang chos dbang phyug /skal bral sgra dang gzi brjid 'od/ /drang srong dbang dang blo gros ngan/ /spobs pa'i 'khor lo dang zla zhal/ /nyi zla'i 'od dang yon tan mtsho/ /yon tan gsung pad bla med rtog /bsod nams rtog dang spobs

pa'i yul/ /rigs pa bskyed dang rgyal rigs dang / /rnam grol bsam dang dbang phyug go/ /mchog ces pa dang ye shes dbyangs/ /nam mkha'i mtha' dang mchod pa dang / /dpung tshogs dpal dang yon tan zla/ /rA hu la dang bdud rtsi 'od/ /rin chen 'od dang zla ba'i 'od/ /seng ge stobs dang ye shes sku/ /'di yi gzhung tshad bstan pa ni/ /tshigs

bcad bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis so/ /mtshan ni nyis brgya bdun cu lnga/ /ye shes lnga po re re la/ /lnga bcu rtsa ni lnga lnga'o/ /rin chen 'byung ldan dkyil 'khor gyi/ /lha rnams ma lus bstan pa ni/ /don grub dpal dang yes nyi ma/ /don yod grub dang ri dbang brtsegs/ /dgras sbyin dang ni pad+ma dang / /dgra bcom grags dang ye shes tog /nyon mongs

'joms dang me zhes pa/ /bde ba dri dang dpe bral 'od/ /ri bo grags dang srid mtha' ston/ /zla ba dang ni rin chen zla/ /seng ge rgyal dang bsam gtan 'dod/ /dpe dang bral dang rnam par rol/ /yon tan rin chen dang don grub/ /dgra bcom grags pa rin chen 'od/ /srid pa bcings dang spyod lam 'phrul/ /mdzod spu dang ni spobs

pa grags/ /rdor nor bu dang tshe dpag med/ /nor bu bkod dang dbang chen po/ /yon tan 'od dang ri bo grags/ /'od zer bcu dang gnyis dang bral/ /klu yi stobs dang yid du 'ong / /rin chen zla dang shugs can dang / /gsal ba dang ni dga' dbang phyug /gtsug phud 'od dang 'jigs bral dang / /yon snying po dri med grags/ /

gzi brjid zhing dang gdang ba grags/ /lha mang po dang legs par grags/ /sangs rgyas lnga 'dod rin chen gzugs/ /sangs rgyas stobs dang seng ge gshog /grong chen mtho dang blo gros legs/ /'jig rten 'od dang rin chen lha/ /skal ldan shing rta yang dag rgyal/ dga' ba bkod dang 'od kyi mu/ /dka' thub che dang zla ba

dang / /chos bstan pa dang mi thub zla/ ri bo 'od dang tshangs pa'i dbyangs/ /bden pa'i lha dang yon tan brtsegs/ /seng ge zla dang nor go cha/ /zla ba dang ni skra dang mtshungs/ /grags chen dang ni gzi brjid shugs/ /chos kyi grags dang dga' ba ldan/ /dri bzang po dang ri rgyal mtshan/ /dga' ba'i 'od dang mchod yon

can/ /srid mtha'i nor bu dang bden mtshungs/ /rnam snang mdzad dang rnam par nges/ /grags pa'i mtha' dang glog 'chang ba/ /seng ge 'od zer srog dang ldan/ /'gro ba'i theg dang thun tshod dang / /grags pa mchog dang blo bzang chub/ /nor lha 'od srungs thub mi bzang / /skar rgyal don byed dang nor 'khor/ /seng ge glang

des yon tan brgyan/ /rin chen 'od sa bya ba ste/ /mnyam nyid ye shes 'khor lo la/ /gzhung ni tshigs bcad nyi shu bzhi/ /mtshan ni brgya dang rtsa bzhi'o/ /rigs re nyi shu nyi shu ste/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig grangs lhag pa/ /bzhi phrag bzhi dang lnga phrag gcig /rigs rnams bzhi dang gtso bo la/ /go rims bzhin du brtag

par bya/ /de phyir brgya dang rtsa bzhir nges/ /don yod grub pa'i dkyil 'khor lha/ /nges par sbyar bar bya ba ni/ /dbang byed rgyal dang bdud rab zhi/ /sangs rgyas mnyam dang rtog bral dang / /dri rab zhi dang rmongs la ston/ /rol pa dang ni dge bzang po/ /ye shes thugs dang smra ba'i dbang / /lha chen po dang blo gros bzang / /tshe

dpag med dang chos kyi stobs/ /'jig rten mchog dang sgra gcan nyi/ /rgyal mtshan grol dang sman pa mchog /me tog dang ni dge gtsug phud/ /bdud rtsi 'od dang byang sems rdor/ /rgya mtsho brtan dang rin chen dpung / /rol pa'i stobs dang nyi ma'i dpung / /dga' ba'i 'od dang rin chen dang / /rjes mthun dpal dang

seng ge 'gros/ /gsungs pa po dang me tog sbyin/ /grol ba'i 'od dang pad+ma dang / /ye shes 'od dang rol pa'i bkod/ /don yod gnas dang brten pa'i 'od/ /rgyal mtshan tog dang bde ba'i bsam/ /rnam grol rgyal dang sems tshul shes/ /rgya mtsho dga' dang rin chen 'dzin/ /mi thub pa dang 'gro ba mnyes/ /sgra

chen po dang dul ba dang / /dkyil 'khor sngar gsungs kun lha dang / /srid dri spong dang mchog gi mu/ /lha mang sgra dang rin chen stobs/ /pad+ma'i phyag dang dgra las rgyal/ /rtogs grub dang ni yul bzang po/ /me tog 'od dang seng ge sgra/ /zla ba smra dang rdul spangs ba/ /mi g.yo ba dang blo gros dang / /bsod nams mar me

dang rtogs sgra/ /gau ta ma gza' yi tog /gzi brjid stobs dang blo gnas gzugs/ /zla ba gsang dang byang yon tan/ /ston pa dang ni gzi brjid bzang / /ye shes gzi stobs dang dge'o/ /brten pa'i stobs dang lha yi bu/ /rab zhi ba dang nyi ma'i zhal/ /grol ba'i 'od dang tshul khrims 'od/ /dka' thub dang ni rdul med dad/ /rgya

mtsho'i gsung dang mig sman dang / /kun las rgyal dang sems can 'od/ /dri med 'od dang dran pa po/ /zhal ras sdug dang rgyal mtha' yas/ /blo yi mchog dang dpung rab zhi/ /rin chen 'od dang chos dbang phyug /sna tshogs lha zhes bya ba'o/ /bya grub ye shes 'khor lo la/ /tshigs bcad bco lnga gzhung tshad yin/ /mtshan ni

dgu bcu rtsa lnga ste/ /rigs re re la bcu dgu dgu'o/ /sgyu 'phrul mngon par byang chub pa/ /tshig gi bdag pos tshigs bcad nas/ /ya te na ma'i mthar tshig gsum/ /ma lus pa dang de bzhin du/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyi/ /'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan nas/ /tshig kun gsal bar byed pa'i mthar/ /gnyis te

lnga yis spyi gtsug 'khor/ /byams chen rang bzhin zhes pa nas/ /theg pa chen po'i tshul mchog mthar/ /tshigs bcad bzhi dang bde gshegs kyi/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga 'chang ba dang / /me long rdo rje 'jigs byed nas/ /glang chen ko rlon zhes pa'i mthar/ /tshigs bcad gsum dang rkang gcig ste/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis dbral 'khor lo/ /

rdo rje dbyings kyi dum bu yi/ /mchod pa chen po chags che nas/ /smon lam ye shes rgya mtsho'i mthar/ /tshigs bcad brgyad kyis snying 'khor lo/ /me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi/ /grags chen ha ha zhes sbrogs nas/ /sgra dang ldan mthar tshigs bcad bdun/ /lte ba'i 'khor lo'i tshig tu 'gyur/ /so sor rtog pa'i ye shes

kyi/ /bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'chang ba dang / /mnyam nyid ye shes dkyil 'khor gyi/ /'dod pa'i don grub dam pa nas/ /rnam pa kun rig sangs rgyas par/ /tshigs su bcad pa bco lnga ste/ /spyi sdom drug cu rtsa bzhi yis/ /lte ba'i 'khor lor rab tu grags/ /mnyam nyid ye shes dgu lus pa'i/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sprul

sku nas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin mthar/ /brgyad ni mgrin pa'i 'khor lor bzhed/ /bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi/ /tshigs bcad bco lnga tshang ba la/ /mnyam nyid tha ma'i tshig bsnan pas/ /bcu drug gsung ba'i 'khor lo'o/ /sgyu 'phrul mngon par byang chub dang / /rdo rje dbyings dang de bzhin gshegs/ /rdo rje'i

rigs dang pad+ma'i rigs/ /rin po che dang las rigs bdun/ /tshigs bcad brgya dang sum cu gsum/ /nang gi 'khor lo drug pa'o/ /'dab grangs tshigs bcad grangs kyang mnyam/ /tshig gcig lhag pa lte bar brtags/ /kun gyi lte bar de 'gyur brtags/ /gnas lugs gong du bstan pa yin/ /las su bya

ba'i 'khrul 'khor yang / /nang gi 'khor lo ji bzhin du/ /'khor lo zlum po rim pa drug /dang po 'dab bde gnyis pa brgyad/ /rim pa gsum la bcu drug ste/ /bzhi pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po/ /lnga pa drug cu rtsa bzhi'o/ /drug pa yang ni sum cu gnyis/ /shri kha d+ha sogs kyi ni bris/ /dbus su bsgrub bya'i ming

bzhag la/ /shar du aHdang byang du AH/ /nub tu aHdang lho ru AH/ /de yi phyi rol 'dab brgyad la/ /shar du i dang shar lhor I/ /lho ru r-i dang lho nub r-I/ /nub tu l-i dang nub byang l-I/ /byang du u dang byang shar U/ de yi phyi rol 'khor lo ni/ /gsum pa'i 'dab ma bcu drug la/ /shar du e ai shar lhor yang / /yaM yaM

de bzhin lho ru ni/ /ar Ar ra rA bden bral gnyis/ /nub kyi gnyis la a A la lA/ /nub byang la lA byang du o o/ /byang shar rtsibs gnyis waM waM'o/ /rim pa bzhi pa sum cu gnyis/ /shar gyi rtsibs la tsa sde lnga/ /lho'i rtsibs la Ta sde lnga/ /nub kyi 'dab ma ta sde lnga/ /byang gi 'dab mar pa sde lnga/ /

byang shar mtshams kyi 'dab gsum la/ /ka kha ga nga legs par dgod/ /shar lho mtshams su g+ha da k+Sha/ /lho nub mtshams na na thASh+Ta/ /nub byang mtshams na sha thA ha/ /de yi phyi rol 'dab ma ni/ /drug cu rtsa bzhi pa de la/ /phyogs bzhir bsgrub bya'i ming bzhi bri/ /shar gyi 'dab ma bcu gnyis la/ /ya yA

yi yI y+r-i y+r-i drug /yu yU y+l-i y+l-I yaM yaM drug /de ltar bcu gnyis dgod par bya/ /de nas lho yi bcu gnyis la/ /ra rA ri rI r-i r-I drug /ru rU rl-i rl-I raM ra ste/ /de ltar bcu gnyis dgod par bya/ /nub kyi 'dab ma bcu gnyis la/ /la lA li lI l-I l+l-I dang / /lu lU l+l-i l+l-I laM la drug /de ltar bcu gnyis dgod par bya/ /byang gi

'dab ma bcu gnyis la/ /wa wA wi wI w+r-i w+r-I dang / /wu wU w+l-i w+l-i waM wa drug /de ltar bcu gnyis legs par bris/ /phyogs kyi bsgrub bya'i ming bzhi dang / /lhan cig shar du ha bri ste/ /nub tu'ang ha ste byang du hAM/ /lho ru hAHni tsheg drag can/ /hi hI shar stod g.yon skor du/ /

hr-i hr-I lho stod me mtshams su/ /h+l-i h+l-I nub stod bden bral drug /hu hU byang stod rlung mtshams su/ /hUM ni shar du AHni lhor/ /ho ni nub ste oM ni byang / /de ltar yi ge bzhi po yang / /bsgrub bya'i ming dang lhan cig tu'o/ /dbus kyi ming dang lhan cig tu/ /hUM gcig legs par bri bar bya/ /de yi

phyi rol rim drug pa/ /'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis la/ /shar nas brtsams nas g.yon skor du/ /phyogs mtshams brgyad kyi bzhi bzhi la/ /badzra tik+Sh+Na zhes pa nas/ /ya ten maHzhes pa'i mthar/ /rim pa bzhin du g.yas skor du/ /yi ge bzhi bzhi dgod par bya/ /de yi phyi rol las

kyi ni/ /dbye bas 'byung ba bzhi rnams kyi/ /yi ge yar waM la yis/ /bskor ba 'khrul 'khor 'khor lo ste/ /zhus nas bya grub 'khor lo'i mthar/ /spyi don bcu bzhi'i tshig grangs dang / /brgya dang lnga bcu rtsa bdun mnyam/ /tshig gcig lhag pa lte bar brtag /bstod pa'i rim par phye ba la/ /

tshig rkang nyi shu tshigs bcad lnga/ /me long chos dbyings so sor rtog /mnyam nyid bya grub go rims bzhin/ /byang sems rdo rje'i 'khor lo la/ /tshigs bcad lnga po kun gyis bstod/ /lhag ma 'khor lo lnga la ni/ /sngar smos ye shes lnga dang ni/ /'dud kyi tshigs bcad re re dang / /sbyar zhing

so sor bstod par bya/ /rigs kun bsdus pa'i 'khor lo la/ /dang po'i sgo nas kun gyis bstod/ /lhag ma sgo rnams so so la/ /tshigs bcad ye shes bstun zhing bstod/ /gsang ba lus kyi 'khor lo la/ /bstod pa dag dang ye shes su/ /sbyar te dang po 'dud bzhi'o/ /mchog gi

dga' bzhi me long ngo / /lhag ma bzhi tshig bcu drug go/ /dga' ba bcu drug rim pa bzhin/ /chos dbyings kun rtog mnyam nyid dang / /bya grub rim gzhin 'dud bzhi bzhi/ /nang gi rgyas bshad 'dir ma byas/ /gsang ba'i phyir dang mdor bsdus phyir/ /phan yon brjod pa'i

gzhung tshad ni/ /brgya dang lnga bcur shes par bya/ /lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang / /zhes pa pos nas gsungs bdun la/ /dang po gnyis kyi 'khor lo ni/ /dang po yi ni phan yon bstan/ /lhag ma bzhi ni 'khor lo bzhi'i/ /rim pa bzhin du phan yon yin/ /zhes pa rang la bsdus phan yon/ /yang na

klog sems la sogs so/ /gsang sngags rim par dbye ba yis/ /gzhung tshad tshigs bcad byed dang bzhi/ /de la dbye na rnam gnyis te/ /oM zhes pa nas aM aH'i mthar/ /rtsa ba'i sngags su shes par bya/ /pra kr-i ti nas a yi mthar/ /phreng ba'i sngags zhes bya ba yin/ /snying po la sogs sngags kun la/ /thun mong ming

ni rnam bzhi ste/ /mgo med mtha' med bsdus pa sprul/ /'di ni mtha' med ces bya yin/ /sku kun bskyed pa'i sngon du ni/ /bzlas dang rgyun du bzlas pa dang / /'khor lo dgod par bya ba dang / /bya ba thams cad 'dis byed de/ /sangs rgyas mdzad pa kun byed phyir/ /bsdus pa'i tshigs su bcad pa la/ /tshig rkang nyi shu tshigs bcad lnga/ /

bde gshegs rnams kyi dri med shes rab sku/ /'jam dbyangs mtshan gsol zab cing rgya che ba/ /des lung mi 'gal bla mas man ngag rgyud/ /de la brten nas bdag don tsam brtsams te/ /bshad mdzad dgongs 'grel ba dag gis 'gal ba med/ /nyes pa ci mthong bdag blo dpyad pa'i rigs/ /bdag pas dman la phan pa 'ga'

srid na/ /dge des 'gro kun mtshan mchog rtogs gyur cig/ //'jam dpal sgyu 'phrul dra ba khri drug stong pa ting nge 'dzin dra ba'i le'u las/ 'phags pa mtshan yang dag par brjod pa phan yon dang bcas pa'i bshad pa/ /nor bu'i gling du sku 'khrungs pa dpal ldan byang chub mchog gi skal ba can/ /dpal sna tshogs

gzugs kyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa/ /sngags don rnam par gzigs pa dang / /de'i rjes su 'brangs pa'i slob dpon chen po gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa/ nye bar bsdus pa'i rnam par rtog ge dang sbyar ba'i bsdus don mtshan gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //pradz+nyA gu rus mdzad do// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya dz+nyA nas twa many+dzu shrI no pi ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mes po ni/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /'jam

dpal ye shes sems dpa' ni/ /rgyal ba kun gyi yab gyur te/ /'khor los sgyur bcas thams cad kyis/ /rang gi rigs la bstod byas te/ /bskyed pa'i rim las rdzogs 'gyur ba'i/ /brjod dang des brjod bshad par bya/ /thog mar bsam gtan pas dben zhing nyams

dga' ba'i sa phyogs su cung zhig blo bde bar gnas te sems bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas rang gi snying gar sa bon gyi yi ge gzi brjid dang ldan pas 'gro ba ma lus pa sbyangs shing dag par yid kyis bltas te/ dbyangs kyi yi ges bstod la rjes su bya ba nyid kyis gzhug cing rnam par bsgom par bya'o/ /

de nas 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' 'gro ba'i bla ma dang ldan pa spyan drangs te/ 'dud nyi shus bstod par bya'o/ /de nas sngags kyi phreng ba lan bdun du blangs te/ me tog gi mchod pas sangs rgyas kyi dbang bskur ba mi bzad pa gnang bas byin gyis brlabs pa'i sems mi g.yo bar bya'o/ /

de nas yang A lis sbyangs te/ 'od zer rnon po can dang ldan pa'i bsrung ba'i 'khor lo bya'o/ /de'i dkyil du sna tshogs pa'i pad+ma shes rab dang thabs yang dag par 'dus pa'i blo gros chen po ye shes kyis mtshan pa'i sa bon las sngar gyi bde bar gshegs pa bla ma dang ldan pa'i tshogs ji snyed pa bcug

ste/ /de dag las skyes pa'i 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' ni zhal gsum pa phyag drug pa/ /rdo rje skyil mo krung las cung zhig 'gying ba/ dkar ba dang sngo zhing dmar ba dang / dmar zhing dkar ba'i mdog can nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / ut+pal blo gros chen pos mtshan pa dang / zla ba dang /

gzhu dang / ut+pal rtsa ba dang ldan pa ye shes chen pos mtshan pa'i phyag rgya can/ khro ba dang zhi ba mnyam pa'i nyams mnga' ba/ rin po che'i rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs pas spras pa/ zla ba rgyas pa lta bu bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas rang gi snying gi'i sa bon gyis 'jam dpal ye shes sems

dpa' 'am/ dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo chen po spyan drangs te/ yang bstod nas rab tu gnas pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang / byin gyis brlabs pa ni de nyid las yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /de nas yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snang ba thob nas/ mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i bstod pa bya'o/ /de dag

ni brjod pa'o/ /yang skad cig gis 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpar dmigs te/ rang gi sa bon las spyan drangs nas/ a dang re pha las gyur pa'i shes rab dang thabs 'dus byas pa'i dbus su yi ge mu dmar ser gyis 'gro ba sbyangs nas/ gcig tu gyur pa'i bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i khams su bzhugs su gsol te/

stegs bu dri zhim pa rin po che'am/ me tog gis gcal bkram pa'i steng du glegs bam bzhag la/ sardza rardza la sogs pa btul te/ lkog ma sbyang ba byas nas/ mtshan yang dag par brjod pa bklag par bya'o/ /de nas yan lag bdun pa byas la/ yang sngar bzhin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba rin po che thob

nas/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i rnal 'byor la gnas par bya'o/ /'di dag gi rnal 'byor ni zhal gsum dkar zhing zhi ba dang / phyag bzhi pa nyi ma dang zla ba yangs pa'o/ /yid la mi byed pa'i rnal 'byor glegs bam gyi go 'phang dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni brag ca lta bu'i kha ton bya ste/ nges par brjod pa'o/ /bdag

gis mngon par rtogs pa 'dis/ blun po rnams ni blo 'phel zhing / /blo gros can rnams bde rnyed nas/ /ye shes sems dpa'i gnas 'gyur shog /rin chen rgyud rgyal 'di ni sa phyogs gang na gnas pa dang / /'don cing klog par byed pa'i skyes bu de nyid ni/ /yid bzhin nor bu brgya byin gtsug na gnas pa

bzhin/ /bdud rnams zil gnon 'jigs pa thams cad bde bar 'gyur/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal ldan gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa/ rnal 'byor pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na kIrtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ dz+nyA na satwa many+dzu shrI na bi ma la rat+na mu dra bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i rin po che'i phyag rgya dri ma med pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag blo yangs ldan cho ga rdzogs pa dang / /drin ldan

mnyes gshin byang chub sems dpa' des/ /rtsod dus rkyen dbang shes rab nyam chung la/ /rgyud kyi rin chen phyag rgya btud de bshad/ /snying rje che dang chen por ldan/ /brtse bas don byed skyo ba med/ /spobs pa che zhing phan blor ldan/ /ngang tshul bzang zhing skyo bar bzod/ /shes rab che zhing nus pa yod/ /rtsod

dang tshig gi sbyor sdeb mkhas/ /dpa' zhing rtul phod brtson 'grus che/ /bkas bsgo ba la dring mi 'jog /dad dang shes rab gtso bor gnas/ /bla ma'i brgyud thabs srog bzhin srung / /yid la mi byed don bstan na/ /pad+ma'i mdangs 'phro gnas las ldog /dam tshig gsum ni mig bzhin

du/ /srung byed rin chen phyag rgya'i snod/ /de la 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i mtshan thos pa tsam gyis yid la mos par 'gyur ba'i skyes bu des ni grub pa'i tshegs chung ngus bdag gis byed par 'gyur ro/ /de yang bsam gtan gyi khang par yid du 'ong ba'i ras ris kyi mdun du glegs

bam rab tu gnas par byas te bzhag la/ de dang nye bar tsan+dan dkar pos byugs pa'i maN+Dal khru gang ba gru bzhi pa'i steng du me tog gi tshom bus mchod la/ tsan+dan gyi bdar bu dang / me tog dkar po snyim pa gang thogs te/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

ye shes sems dpa' chen po mchog nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtshan gyi 'khor lo thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag gi rnam par shes pa'i tshogs thams cad dang yang dag pa'i don gyi rnal 'byor du mdzad du gsol zhes lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu brjod la/ me tog dkar po'i phreng ba mgo

la bcings te/ tsan+dan sen rtse dang / til mar la bdar ba'i chu mig la byugs la/ rmi lam brtag pa'i ltas kyang shes par bya'o/ /de nas tho rangs ci rigs pa'i rnal 'byor du gnas te/ slob ma rtags dang rmi lam gyis shes par yo byad kyis spras nas nye ba dang lha'i maN+Dal dang / sems bskyed pa rin po

che'i phyag rgya'i yon phul te/ tshul dang mthun pa'i gnas la/ oM kye kye kye ye shes sems dang zhi ba rab mdzes sku/ /khyod thugs bskyed pa 'gro la sman pa'i gtso/ /'khor lo'i phyag rgyas gti mug dral mdzad cing / /me long lta bu'i mtshan bstod thugs chud ltar/ /sems bskyed la mos

bde gshegs rigs 'gyur dag /'gro ba rnams kyi sku yi gdul bya'i phyir/ /bde gshegs rigs kyi sems bskyed gzung bar bgyi/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo bdag byin brlab tu gsol/ /zhes lan gsum dang gsum gsum du brjod pa ni dbang po dang shes pa'i bye brag gis shes

par bya'o/ /phyag rgya'i bye brag ni man ngag gis so/ /de nas tshes gcig nas nye bar bzung ste/ rnal 'byor bas rang gi spyod pa bcu la zhugs nas/ lha'i bsgrub pa ldan pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i bsnyen pa ji srid spro'i bar bya'o/ /thun mtshams dang glo bur gyi las

ni mkhas pa dag gis ci rigs par sbyar ro/ /paN+Di ta dang / rgyal po dang / blon po chen po dang / dmag dpon dang / bram ze sgo ba dang grong du 'jug pa dang / don gnyer ba la sogs pa'i tshogs na gnas pa rnams kyis ni dran pa gcig pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa tsam la ci

rigs pas bstod de/ bdag dang 'gro ba sbyang tsam bya'o/ /tshe la sogs pa'i sbyor ba 'phel ba dang / /'dir gsungs yon tan rnams ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /lha dang mi yi mchog gyur gtso bo bzhin/ /lo ka dag las lhag pa'i gnas su 'gro/ /mun nag mthug po

dag gis dkris pa rnams/ /zad 'gyur dri ma med pa'i 'od zer spung / /pad+ma'i rtsa bar rtsi yis mchog gnas gang / /g+ha tra shing gi 'dab mas len bzhin du/ /bskal pa'i grangs la rag las mi 'gyur bar/ /mi yi tshe 'di nyid kyis 'dod bzhin thob/ /yang dag

mtshan 'di'i sgo la dad pa gang / /de yi mtshams med lnga yang skad cig des/ /dag na 'don dang klog pa smos ci dgos/ /ri khrod mgon po las thob pa'i/ /rgyud kyi rin chen phyag rgya 'di/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i ting nge 'dzin/ /skye ba'i rim 'byung byams pas byas/ /

rigs gang rigs kyi lha las ni/ /dngos grub thogs med thob gyur cig /nam mkhas gar khyab lo ka 'gro ba rnams/ /ma rig phyag rgyas rab tu bcings gyur pa/ /blo gros chen po'i phyag rgyas bcad nas kyang / /'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i zhabs grub shog /'phags pa

'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' rin po che'i phyag rgya dri ma med pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal ldan gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rnal 'byor pa bsod snyoms pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na kI rtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o// //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma saM gI ti TI kA sA ra no pi ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'grel pa snying po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

gzugs sogs dbang po'i yul las 'das pa yi/ /rnam dag 'dus ma byas pa'i chos kyi sku/ /dbang po'i gzhu 'dras sa lam rab grol zhing / /gzhon nu'i 'o mas bu ltar gso mdzad lha/ /dam pa'i skyes mchog nges ston mdzad pa yi/ /zhabs kyi mtsho skyes gnas der spyis btud

nas/ /tshig rgyas pa yi las rab bsdus pa'i don/ /dpag med 'byung gnas thabs mang ston pa'o/ /blo ni rmongs 'gyur rig pa'i gnas med kyang / /rje btsun drin gyis rgyud rnams kun gyi bcud/ /rtogs shing gsung rab la sogs gzhung gzhan yang / /mthong bas snying po'i mngon

rtogs bshad par bya/ /rgyud gzhan rim pa ma yin pa'i/ /'jam dpal sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ /thig le bzhir 'gyur dgur bcas pa/ /mda' gnyis rab tu phye ba la/ /rim gnyis rab tu sbyor ba ste/ /rgyud kyi rgyud nyid bshad kyis nyon/ /de la rgyud 'di ni rin po che lta bu yin te/ dbang po bzhi

dang shin tu sbyor ba'i phyir ro/ /la la dag ni bya ba dang / spyod pa dang / rnal 'byor dang / /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi thabs dang shes rab kyi rgyud kho na'o zhes zer te/ /de dag ni snying po la spyod pa'i gang zag ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin spros pa thams cad kyis

dben zhing brtags pa'i rtog pa gang gis kyang ma gos par gcig pas du ma mi gnas kyis kyang gdul bya'i blo'i khyad par gyis du mar snang zhing rang rang gi rtog pa la bden par 'dzin pa'i phyir ro/ /de'i phyir/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'ga' zhig tu/ /yi ge gcig kyang ma gsungs par/ /

chos kyi char gyis tshim mdzad pa/ /sems can gzhug pa'i ched du gnas/ /zhes gsungs pas so/ /de bas na kho bo ni 'og nas 'byung ba'i 'bras bu ni gtso bor ston to/ /gzhan gyi rig pa ma yin pa'ang / /chos kyi dbyings la dbyer med phyir/ /gtso bos theg dbye ma mchis kyang / /

gang gis theg pa gsum bstan pa/ /nga ni thabs la mkhas pa'i dngos/ /zhes gsungs pas na/ dman pa dang 'bring dang rab kyi khyad par gyis nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / theg pa chen po bstan pa yin no/ /rgyud du ston pa nyid du yang rigs te/ sngon du byung bas yang rgyud gcig nyid

la du mar gzhag pa nyid de/ de ltar yang rgyud gcig nyid la du mar go ba'o/ /de yang mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje dra ba'i gur las/ skyes bu bsdu bar bya ba'i phyir/ /rnal 'byor pa yi rgyud bshad do/ /btsun mo bsdu bar bya ba'i phyir/ /rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud bshad do/ /dman pa las ni las kyi rgyud/ /

las kyi rnal 'byor de ltag la/ /sems can mchog la lhag rnal 'byor/ /bla med rnal 'byor de ltag la/ /zhes gsungs pas na/ rten la sogs pa'i khyad par du shes par bya'o/ /gling gzhi bstan pa nyid kyis chog pa ma yin te/ /sngar bzhin no/ /dbang po rab dang yang rab tu gyur ba la/ e

waM ma ya shru ta sa ma ya e ka /zhes gsungs pa nyid kyis snying po la 'gro ba brtson par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad kyang ldan pa yin te/ /chos kyi phung po brgyad khri dang / /bzhi stong gi ni grangs snyed kyi/ /kun gyi gzhi dang pha ma ni/ /yi ge gnyis su yang dag bstan/ /yi ge e ni mar gyur la/ /

waM ni pha zhes bya bar grags/ /thig le de gnyis sbyor ba ste/ /sbyor de shin tu rmad du 'byung / /zhes gsungs pas so/ /thams cad du mi 'gyur ba ma yin te/ thabs dang shes rab 'dus byas pa'i sbyor ba las nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos gsungs par gyur to/ /de bas na

skyes pa dang bud med gnyis sbyor ba ni ma ning ste/ de 'jug pa'i khyad par gcig pu pa lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin phyag rgya chen po brjod pa ni nges pa ste/ de bas na/ /gcig pu thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ /kun du 'gro ba shin tu phra/ /zhes gsungs pa dang / gzhung gzhan gyis kyang shes

par bya'o/ /de ltar don gyi rang bzhin gtan la phab nas/ /tshig gi tshogs blo la rab tu sbyor ba'i dgos pas don bsdus nas bstan par bya ste/ /de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang / /zhes pa nas/ /yang dang yang du gsor byed pa/ /zhes bya ba'i par gyis thun mong ma yin pa'i 'khor bstan

to/ /khro gnyer rim par ldan la sogs/ /zhes pa nas/ lus btud rnams dang lhan cig tu/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis thun mong gi 'khor bstan to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das/ /zhes pa nas/ /spyan sngar 'dug ste 'di skad gsol/ /zhes pa'i bar

gyis mchod par brjod pa bstan to/ /khyab bdag bdag la sman pa dang / /zhes pa nas/ byang chub ci nas bdag thob mdzad/ /ces pa'i bar gyis bdag gi don du gsol ba bstan to/ /nyon mongs pas ni sems dkrugs shing / /zhes pa nas/ bla med 'bras bu thob bya'i bar gyis gzhan

gyi don du gsol ba bstan to/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /zhes pa nas/ dbang po'i bsam pa mkhyen mchog gis/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis spangs pa dang ye shes phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas bstan to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes sku/ /zhes pa nas/ glur blangs gang

lags bshad du gsol/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gyis yang dag pa'i mtshan gyi don gsol ba bstan to/ /mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas kun gyi/ /zhes pa nas/ sems can rnams la bshad par 'tshal/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i don gyi gsol ba'o/ /

de dag ni gleng gzhi'i don gleng bslang ba dang 'brel bar bstan pa ste 'khor phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /gsang dbang lag na rdo rje yis/ /zhes pa nas/ /lus btud nas ni spyan sngar 'dug /ces pa rgyud nyan pa la gus pa'i sbyor ba bstan to/ /de nas bcom ldan shAkya

thub/ /ces pa nas/ /sbyong bar byed pa'i 'dzum bstan nas/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis ljags byin gyis brlabs pa bdud mthar byed pa'i sbyor ba bstan to/ /tshangs pa'i gsung ni snyan pa yis/ /zhes pa nas/ legs so dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang / /zhes pa'i bar gyis tshangs pa'i

gsung gi 'khor la ched du brjod pa bstan to/ /lag na rdo rje khyod legs so/ /zhes pa nas/ /khyod ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis nyan pa po thos pa dang sbyar bar bstan to/ /rkang pa ya gcig gis mtshams sbyar bar bstan to/ /'di dag ni sbyor ba phun

sum tshogs pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan shAkya thub/ /ces pa nas/ rigs chen gtsug tor cher gzigs nas/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis rigs la gzigs pa bstan to/ /tshig gi bdag pos tshigs su bcad/ /ces pa nas/ sde tshan bzhi pa dang lnga pa'i mthas byang chub kyi sems

rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin bstan cing bshad do/ /'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /zhes pa nas/ /tshig kun rab tu gsal bar byed/ /ces pa'i bar gyis chos thams cad yi ge gcig gi lus la gnas par bstan to/ /mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che/ /zhes pa nas/ chags pa thams cad sel bar byed/ /

ces pa'i bar gyis nyon mongs pa dang rigs rnam par dag pa'i mchod pa bstan to/ /'dod pa chen po bde ba che/ /zhes pa nas/ /sgyu 'phrul chen po mig 'phrul che/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis khams dang che ba bcu drug gi rnam dag bstan to/ /sbyin bdag chen po gtso bo che/ /zhes pa nas/ bsam pa'i ye shes

rgya mtsho ste/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis rnam shes tshogs dang lha mo'i rnam dag bstan to/ /byams chen rang bzhin dpag tu med/ /ces pa nas/ theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog /ces pa'i bar gyis sa dang bskal bzang bcu drug gi rnam dag bstan to/ /de dag ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor

chen po'i rnam dag de kho na nyid kyi snying po bstan pa'o/ /sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che/ /zhes pa nas/ gsang sngags tshul chen bdag nyid can/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin bstan to/ /pha rol phyin bcu thob pa ste/ /zhes pa nas/ rnam bcu dbang ldan che ba

po/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis lam gyi yon tan rdzogs par bstod pa bstan to/ /thog ma med pa spros med bdag /ces pa nas/ yang dag mtha' la rnam par gnas/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis thugs kyi byin rlabs la bstod pa bstan to/ /bdag med seng ge'i sgra dang ldan/ /zhes pa nas/

'khor los sgyur ba stobs po che/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis gsung gi byin rlabs la bstod pa bstan to/ /tshogs kyi slob dpon tshogs kyi bdag /ces pa nas/ /tshul chen gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /ces pa'i bar gyis sku'i byin rlabs la bstod pa bstan to/ /tshig rje tshig bdag

smra mkhas pa/ /zhes pa nas/ bden pa bzhi ni ston pa po/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis 'gro ba'i 'dren ston du gyur pa bstan to/ /phyir mi ldog pa phyir mi 'ong / /zhes pa nas/ /bde gshegs 'jig rten rig pa'i mchog /ces pa'i bar gyis theg pa gsum gyi lus ye shes

su bstan to/ /bdag gir mi 'dzin ngar mi 'dzin/ /zhes pa nas/ /'jig rten snang bar byed pa'i mchog /ces pa'i bar gyis 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i ye shes bstan to/ /chos kyi dbang phyug chos kyi rgyal/ /zhes pa nas/ /bsam gtan bsam bya blo ldan bdag /ces pa'i bar

gyis de thams cad rnal 'byor gyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid du bstan to/ /so so rang rig mi g.yo ba/ /zhes pa nas/ sangs rgyas sras po dam pa'i mchog /ces pa'i bar gyis rang rig tu gzhi gcig par bstan to/ /shes pa srid 'byung skye gnas med/ /ces pa nas/ /gzi brjid chen po 'od

gsal ba/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis de nyid la rnyog pa bcus ma gos par bstan to/ /sngags mchog mnga' bdag rig sngags rgyal/ /zhes pa nas/ /drang srong che dgus mchod cing rjed/ /ces pa'i bar gyis sku'i 'khor lo bstan to/ /rigs gsum 'chang ba gsang sngags 'chang / /zhes pa nas/

theg pa mchog gsum ston pa po/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis ye shes kyi 'khor lo bstan to/ /don yod zhags pa rnam par rgyal/ /zhes pa nas/ /rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis rigs kyi 'khor lo bstan to/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed/ /ces pa nas/

sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog /ces pa'i bar gyis me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo bstan to/ /yang dag bdag med la sogs pa'i rkang pa gnyis kyis don gyi rgyud la bstod pa bston to/ /stong nyid smra ba'i khyung mchog ste/ /zhes pa nas/ /chos kyi gaN+DI sgra bo che/ /zhes pa'i

bar gyis tshig gi rgyud bstan to/ /mi gnas pa la sogs pa rkang pa gnyis kyis rab tu byed pa'i rgyud bstan to/ /gzugs med gzugs bzang dam pa ste/ /zhes pa nas/ /gzugs rnams ma lus 'chang ba po/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis bde ba chen po'i rgyud bstan to/ /mtshungs

pa med cing che bar grags/ /zhes pa nas/ dar ba chen po chos kyi tog /ces pa'i bar gyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyud bstan to/ /'jig rten gsum na gzhon lus gcig /ces pa nas/ sdu gu 'jig rten gsum na mdzes/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis 'bras bu'i rgyud bstan

to/ /'jig rten shes legs slob dpon te/ /zhes pa nas/ /skyabs dang skyob pa bla na med/ /ces pa'i bar gyis thabs kyi rgyud bstan to/ /nam mkha'i mtha' la longs spyod pa/ /zhes pa nas/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho pha rol phyin/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis thabs ye shes sems

dpa'i rgyud bstan to/ /ye shes dbang bskur cod pan can/ /zhes pa nas/ gsum sel mtha' yas grol gsum thob/ /ces pa'i bar gyis dri ma rnam par dag pa'i rgyud bstan to/ /sgrib pa kun las nges par grol/ /zhes pa nas/ /lus kun las ni rnam par gnas/ /zhes pa'i bar

gyis bya ba dang bral ba'i rgyud bstan to/ /nam mkha'i mtha' la rab gnas pa/ /zhes pa nas/ yon tan ldan zhing yon tan shes/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa bstan to/ /chos shes bkra shis bkra shis 'byung / /zhes pa nas/ /bkur sti rim gro phun sum

tshogs/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gyis rang don bkra shis rgyud las skye bar bstan to/ /mchog tu dga' ba grags bdag dpal/ /zhes pa nas/ 'jig rten sgra ste rab kyi mchog /ces bya ba'i bar gyis rang bzhin brtags pas dben pa bstan to/ /'jigs pa ma lus sel ba po/ /zhes pa

nas/ /gdong lnga gtsug phud lnga dang ldan/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis tha mar dge ba phyag rgya chen por bstan to/ /zur phud lnga pa me tog thod/ /ces pa nas/ /dka' thub mthar phyin dka' thub che/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis bar du dge ba chos kyi phyag rgya bstan to/ /gtsang gnas dam pa gau ta ma/ /

zhes pa nas/ /grol ba thar pa rnam grol lus/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis tha mar dge ba las kyi phyag rgya bstan to/ /rnam grol zhi ba zhi ba nyid/ /ces pa nas/ /ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gyis bde ba chen po'i lus lhan cig skyes pa bstan to/ /tshig gi dbang phyug

smra ba che/ /zhes pa nas/ smra ba'i seng ge tshugs pa med/ /ces bya ba'i bar gyis tshig la mi gnas pa'i tshig gi gnas su bstan to/ /kun du dga' ba mchog tu dga'/ /zhes pa nas/ lag na 'od 'bar snang ba bo/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis sku dang ye shes la sogs pa'i snang ba bstan

to/ /sman pa che mchog gtso bo ste/ /zhes pa nas/ nad do cog gi dgra che ba/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis 'gro ba la sman par snang ba bstan to/ /sdu gu 'jig rten gsum gyi mchog /ces pa nas/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis chos kyi rgyal mtshan du snang ba bstan to/ /'gro na

gdugs gcig yangs pa ste/ /zhes pa nas/ sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa gcig /ces pa'i bar gyis rim pa gnyis su snang ba bstan to/ /rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal/ /zhes pa nas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung yang yin/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis rigs su snang ba bstan to/ /rdo rje'i

nyi ma nas rkang pa gnyis kyis bklag pa'i thabs dang mi gnas pa bstan to/ /chags bral la sogs chags pa che/ /zhes pa nas/ yi ge mchog ste rnam par dag /ces pa'i bar gyis lam gyi ye shes lhun gyis grub pa bstan to/ /theg pa chen po sdug bsngal gcod/ /ces pa nas/

rgyud kun gyi ni bdag po mchog /ces pa'i bar gyis ye shes lhun gyis grub pa bstan to/ /rdo rje gdan ni ma lus ldan/ /zhes pa nas/ sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang / /zhes pa'i bar gyis gsang don lhun gyis grub pa bstan to/ /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin mchog /ces pa

nas/ /ye shes me lce 'od rab gsal/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis ye shes lhun gyis grub pa bstan to/ /'dod pa'i don grub dam pa ste/ /zhes pa nas/ /sems can thams cad rab grol byed/ /ces pa'i bar gyis mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes mdor bstan to/ /nyon mongs g.yul du gcig

dpa' ba/ /zhes pa nas/ /tshangs pa'i g.yul sa rtse nas gnon/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis las kyi phyag rgya bstan to/ /don gcig gnyis med chos kyi don/ /zhes pa nas/ nyi ma 'char ka'i dkyil ltar mdzes/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis dpe don gyi 'brel ba bstan to/ /sen mo'i

'od ni shas cher dmar/ /zhes pa nas/ sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyud dang ldan/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis mtshan dpe bstan to/ /'jig rten khams brgya kun bskyod pa/ /zhes pa nas/ nges par 'byung ba kun ston pa/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis thun mong gi lam rdzogs par bstan to/ /yan lag bcu gnyis

srid rtsa bton/ /zhes pa nas/ /bye ba dpag med 'gyed pa po/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa bstan to/ /skad cig thams cad mngon par rtogs/ /zhes pa nas/ theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis skad cig gi ye shes bstan to/ /nyon mongs

khams rnams dag pa'i bdag /ces pa nas/ sbyor ba'i dgon pa las byung ba/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gsang sngags mtha'i don du bstan to/ /nyon mongs pa la sogs pa rkang pa gnyis kyis 'khor ba'i sa bon dang bral bar bstan to/ /snying rje chen po shes rab thabs/ /zhes pa nas/ /

nor ba thams cad rnam par spangs/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis gzhan don mdzad pa bstan to/ /don gsum the tshom med pa'i blo/ /zhes pa nas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'chang / /zhes pa'i bar gyis de nyid kyi 'thad pa bstan to/ /lus med lus te lus kyi mchog /ces pa nas/ /nor

bu chen po rin chen tog /ces pa'i bar gyis ye shes kyi lus kyi mdzad pa bstan to/ /sangs rgyas la sogs pa rkang pa gnyis kyis bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes mdor bstan to/ /gsang sngags las byung yi ge med/ /ces pa nas/ thig le stong pa yi ge brgya/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis yi ge thams cad tshogs

gcig pa'i stong par bstan to/ /rnam pa kun ldan rnam pa med/ /ces pa nas/ /bsam gtan bzhi yi rtse mo can/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis e waM gyis dbugs dbyung ba bstan to/ /bsam gtan yan lag kun shes shing / /zhes pa nas/ /phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed/ /ces pa'i

bar gyis sku gsum du bstan to/ /de bzhin 'gro ba'i don byed pa/ /zhes pa nas/ /srid pa'i dgon pa las brgal ba/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis 'gro ba gsum gyi gtso bor snang ba bstan to/ /ston pa gcig pu 'gro ba'i bla/ /zhes pa nas/ /bdud kyi dpung rnams pham byed pa/ /zhes pa'i bar

gyis bdud pham par byed pa bstan to/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'dren/ /zhes pa nas/ /phyag byar 'os pa bla ma'i rab/ /ces pa'i bar gyis bsnyen bkur gyi gnas su bstan to/ /'jig rten gsum po gom gcig bgrod/ /ces pa nas/ /shes dang shes

bya'i bdag po mchog /ces pa'i bar gyis 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sprul pa mnga' bar bstan to/ /gtso bo chos kyi sbyin bdag ste/ /zhes pa nas/ /'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog /ces pa'i bar gyis mjug bsdu ba bstan te/ de dag gis ni byang chub kyi sems rdo

rje zhes bya ba'i snang ba ye shes lngar bstod pa'o/ /mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud/ /ces pa nas/ /yi ge re re zhing chos kyi dbyings la sogs pa la bstod pa bstan to/ /rigs kyi bdag po nas bzung ste/ an+tas+tha dang / ush+ma Sha'i gnyis pa dang / bzhi pa'i bar gyis ye shes sngags kyi rang

bzhin du bstan to/ /rigs kyi bdag po nas bcu drug pa'i bar gyis de yang 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i sngags kyi rang bzhin du bstan te/ de dag ni don gyi snying po yon tan bsdus pa'i don gyi bstod pa'o/ /de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang / /zhes pa nas/ rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal

nas/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis 'khor gyi mchod pa brjod par bstan to/ /de ni mgon po gsang ba'i bdag /ces pa nas/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis bshad/ /ces pa'i bar gyis ched du brjod pa'i bstod pa bstan to/ /de dag ni ye shes kyi rjes su mthun pa'o/ /mtshan nas rjod pa'i

yon tan gyi sgo nas bstod pa ni sgo lnga'i khyad par shes par bya'o/ /de ltar bsdus pa'i don yongs su shes shing / don lhag par rnyed pa'i gang zag gis rgyud kyi rab tu byed pa'i don 'di nyid kyang bde blag tu rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /da ni tshig gi don gsal bar dbye bar bya ste/ /de nas dpal ldan rdo rje

'chang / /zhes bya ba la sogs pa la mchog dang thun mong gi dngos grub thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas mtshon pa la gang nas she na/ man+t+ra'i rang bzhin shes shing skyob pa'o/ /des spangs pa dang ye shes phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang ngo / /gdul dka' ba ni theg pa

gsum ste/ sprul pa dang / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor los skyar ba dang / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'dul ba rnams so/ /kyi zhes pa ni drug pa'i don gyi gnyis pa'o/ /'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug rnam par dag pa ni theg pa'i yang rnam par dag pa ste/ bde ba dang / stong pa dang /

gnyis su med pas na mchog go/ /dpa' bo ni 'jigs shing thub pa med pa ste sku dang / gsung dang thugs kyi khyad par gyis sa 'og dang sa steng dang / /sa bla las rgyal ba'o/ /rdo rje ni stong pa nyid bde ba chen po'i snying po can te/ gang la yod pa ni dbang phyug go/ /de lnga'i gsang ba las thob pa ni rgyal

po'o/ /pad+ma dkar po ni dkar ba la sogs pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan pa ste/ /'dir rnam par rtog pa bzhi pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa'o/ /ye shes la ched du brjod pa ni rang las te/ 'gro ba 'dzin pa'i don gyis na yang zhes sbyar ro/ /khro gnyer dang sku dang / og spu ser la brdzes pa dang / mig

dmar dang / lce 'dril zhing ya sos ma mchu mnan pa dang / thung zhing gel ba dang / gsus pa che ba dang / yan lag rab tu bgrad pa dang / nying lag rdo rje rtse mo lta bu dang / dur khrod dang / gdug pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / /mtshon cha 'bar zhing 'phro ba dang / mgo bo'i do shal dang / me 'bar ba'i

gnas ni rim par ldan pa la sogs pa ste/ lag na rdo rje dang mtshungs par mtha' yas pa la yod pa ni ma rig pa la sogs pa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bcu gnyis zad pa'i don to/ /de snyed kyi ba spu'i khung nas 'phro ba yang rdo rje rtse mo ste khro bo'i gzugs so/ /rang gi lag gis gsor bar byed

pa ni snga ma bzhin te/ /de'i don kyang snying rje chen po dang shes rab dang zhes pa'o/ /thabs ni sngon rang gi don du gyur pa ji ltar de nyid kyis gzhan don du 'gyur ba'o/ /de ltar sprul pa dang yang sprul gyi gzugs thams cad bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi rang bzhin lus ngag yid gsum gyis

mchod pa'i phyir/ dga' mgu rangs pa'i bsam pa can no/ /khro bo 'ba' zhig mi rigs pa ma yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi phrin las sems can gyi mgon du gyur pas so/ /de dang lhan cig pa ni phyag na rdo rje'o/ /thams cad bsam pa mthun par zhes pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni de

bzhin nyid snang ba med pa'i ye shes thugs su chud nas 'gro ba'i don la gshegs pas so/ /shes rab kyis bcom pa nyid kyi phyir dang / dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pas mi gnas pa brnyes pas na bcom ldan 'das so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i

sgra ni byang chub sems dpa' la yang gsungs shing bshad pa ste/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i yon tan ni bde ba chen po thob pa 'ba' zhig la'o/ /khyab bdag ni yongs su dag pa'i ye shes thams cad la khyab pa'i bdag nyid do/ /yang na sems can thams cad kyi snying

por gnas pa dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin du gnas pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'i byed pa po nyid kyis 'gro ba bzhi'i dbang po la khyab pa'i bdag nyid do/ /bdag ni bdag nyid kho na'o/ /sman pa ni tshig dang / don dang spobs pa'i gzungs kyis so/ /bdag don

ni mthar thug pa'i don to/ /phyir ni dgos pa'o/ /thabs khyad par can gyi sgyu ma dang 'phrul gyi rnam pa lta bu ste/ nang gi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i sbyor bar bde ba chen po'i dra bas kun la g.yogs par bya ba nyid kyis rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur bar ro/ /ci nas zhes pa ni/ nan tan du

bya ba'i tha tshig go/ /theg pa chen por 'gyur ba nyid yin te/ dper na sa bon gyi ma gtogs par myu gu la sogs pa'i yon tan 'byin par ga la nus/ de bas na/ /ma rdzogs rdzogs byed mda' yin no/ /zhes gsungs pas/ rgyu'i gnas skabs kyi thabs kyi sbyor ba la yang bkag na/

phun sum tshogs pa'i 'bras bu'i phyir lta smos kyang ci dgos/ dang por nang gi bdag nyid la bzhag cing sbyar bar bya ba'i phyir/ /sems can mos pa sna tshogs pa/ /rgyal bas kyang ni ma gsungs na/ /bdag 'dra ngan pa smos ci dgos/ /de bas 'jig rten bsam pa btang / /zhes gsungs pa'i

don kyang de'o/ /rgyu 'bras rjes su mi mthun pa ma yin te/ byams pa dang snying rje sngon du song ba'i byang chub kyi sems smon pa dang 'jug pa dang / shin tu 'jug pa la sogs pas sems can gyi don gyi phyir nang du gzhag pa'o/ /de bas na rnam par rtog pa gang gang gis/ gang gang blo ni bsgoms

pa dang / /bsgoms pa'i stobs ni rdzogs pa dang / /bde gsal mi rtog blo 'bras can/ /zhes pas kyang shes par bya'o/ /nyon mongs pa ni thams cad rang bzhin dngos po dang / dngos po med pa dang / btang snyoms kyi rnyog bas sems dkrugs pa'o/ /mi shes pa ni brgyud pa'i gzhung lugs dang

bral bas don ma phrad de smig rgyu la chur bzung bas ngal zhing gdungs pa bzhin/ 'dir yang brtags pa'i rnyog pa'i 'dam du bying bar gyur pa rnams so/ /sman pa ni gzhan shes rab gsum la sbyar ro/ /nang gi bdag nyid la 'jug pa'i dgos pas na phyir ro/ /bla ni 'bras bu ster ba'i don gyis so/ /

ston pa ni log rtog bzlog pa'o/ /dam tshig ni sdom pa ste/ bde ba dang stong pa'i dra ba phyed pa de nyid ji lta ba mkhyen cing thugs su chud pa'o/ /de nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa ni/ e waM las ni rab tu zhugs/ /zhes gsungs so/ /dbang po gdul bya'i rgyud mkhyen pa'o/ /bsam pa

ni gdul bya'i 'dod pa mkhyen pa'o/ /de dag ni gnas su gyur pas mchog go/ /gis ni drug pa'i don gyi gnyis pa'o/ /ye shes sku ni ye shes phung po can te bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin gyis rtag pa nyid rtag tu 'byung ba'o/ /de bas na/ gang gis nga la gzugs su mthong / /gang gis ngal

sgrar shes pa/ /log par rtog pa spang ba ste/ /skye bo de yis nga mi mthong / /sangs rgyas rnams ni chos kyi sku/ /'dren pa rnams kyi chos nyid ni/ /de ni rnam par shes mi nus/ /zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro/ /gtsug tor ni bltar mi mngon pa ste/ /de nyid zil gyis mi non pa'i rtags yin pas na gtsug tor chen

po'o/ /tshig gis rjod par byed pa ste/ mi zad pa'i gsung mnga' bas bdag po'o/ /ye shes ni mtha' dang bral ba ste mi 'gyur bas na sku'o/ /de'i mtshan nyid ni rang 'byung ba ste/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i mtshan gyi don brjod pa'o/ /'brel pa gcig pas mchog go/ /don zab pa ni rtogs par dka' ba'o/ /

don rgya che ba ni blo'i yul ma yin pas so/ /don chen po ni rang gzhan grub pas so/ /mtshungs pa med pa ni gcig pur gyur pas so/ /zhi ba ni glo bur gyi dri ma dang bral bas so/ /dge ba gsum ni skye ba dang / /gnas pa dang / 'gag pas dben pa'o/ /yang na lus dang ngag dang / yid gsum las 'byung ba gsum mo/ /yang

na dus gsum du gsungs pa dang / /gsung bar 'gyur ba dang gsung ba'o/ /de nyid ni yang dag pa'i shes par sgrub par byed par yang sbyar bar bya'o/ /rgyud ni tshig dang don to/ /rgyu dang lam dang 'bras bu chen po ste/ de rab tu rgyas par gsal bar byed pas tshig la yang ngo / /thabs

kyi rgyud sgyu 'phrul dra ba mtshon pas btags pa ste/ lha sbyin zhang po can zhes bya ba lta bu'o/ /las ni skal ba'i rgyud de gong du bstan zin to/ /rdo rje 'chang chen ni grags chen la/ /gsang sngags 'chang ni snying po don gyi sangs rgyas so/ /ji snyed pa ni dpag med rnams kyis so/ /dgyes bzhin du glur

blangs pa bshad du gsol zhes pa ni nges pa'i don to/ /gsang 'dzin ni rgyud 'di nyid sngar bshad pa'i don yang ngo / /phyir ni gtso bor gyur pa gzhan med pa'o/ /nges pa ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa ste/ der ma byung gi bar la 'byung gi bar zhes bya'o/ /gzung ba ni bdag don du'o/ /

gsang ba spang ba ni gzhan gyi don gyi phyir ro/ /bsam pa'i khyad par ni dbang po'i bye brag la'o/ /bshad par 'tshal ba ni de kho na nyid bcu dang / rim pa gnyis dang zung du 'jug pa'o/ /gsang dbang ni dug bcom pa'i de nyid la dbang ba'i lag na rdo rjes so/ /de skad du zhes pa ni lnga'i gsol

ba gdab bo/ /spyod lam ni gus pa'i rtags so/ /de nas de ma thag tu'o/ /rigs dang stobs mtshon pas shAkya thub pa'o/ /rkang gnyis ni lha dang mi'i ste/ de'i mchog tu gyur pa'o/ /bzang ba dang / kha dog dang dbyibs phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /ring zhing yangs pa ni chu dang zheng ngo / /

brkyang ba dang / 'od phyung ba dang / /'dzum pa bstan pa'i bdud btul ba dang / 'khor bag dang ldan pa la dgod pa dang / thugs rje chen pos sems can gyi yid dang mthun par bstan pa'o/ /tshangs pa'i gsung dbyangs ni yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa ste/ /'dir snyan pa dang / che ba dang

gsal ba dang / don go bar nus par 'dus pa ston pa'o/ /bkang ba ni grags pa'o/ /gsang ba ni gsang ba chen po la'o/ /slar gsungs pa ni zhus pa'i lan no/ /snying rje chen po ni thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'o/ /dag par byed pa ni nyon mongs pa dag par byed pa ste/ bkra shis

par ro/ /sdig sel ba ni rdul dang bral ba'o/ /brtson pa ni ma yengs par rtse gcig pa'o/ /rang don nyid kyis legs so zhes pa'o/ /gnyis pas gzhan don gzung ba'o/ /legs par bstan pa ni 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i lam du'o/ /nyon zhes pa ni/ rdo rje 'chang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi

rang bzhin du blta ba dang rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di nyid yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po ches brtan pa ltar blta ba dang / thun mong gi 'khor rin po che lta bu'i gang zag tu blta ba dang / bshad bya sems kyi rang bzhin shes rab dang snying rje dbyer mi phyed par blta ba dang / gsung dri ma med pa'i bdud rtsis dbang po

tshim zhing khyab par 'gyur ba'i phyir/ /gsang sngags ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dum bu lha'i 'khor lo ste/ snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / rig sngags rnams la thams cad ces bya'o/ /de dag ni rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i lha'i 'khor lo gzung ngo / /de nyid kyi rigs shes par yang bya'o/ /rigs

chen ni rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i rang bzhin lnga pa dang drug pa'o/ /kho bo ni rigs 'pho bar 'dod pa ste/ dam pa'i zhal las 'ongs pa ni rgyas gdab gsum gyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir te mdor bstan pa'o/ /gsang sngags rig sngags 'chang ba'i rigs/ /zhes pa ni gsang sngags la

sogs pa ni rig sngags kyi las byed cing / don bsgrubs na 'chang ba ste las kyi rigs so/ /yang na thams cad shes rab kyi rtags su shes par byas la/ des de la nan tan du byas pas de 'grub ces pa'o/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs ni rigs gsum ste/ la ni de nyid gzhir

byas pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la ni/ /zhes bya ba la rnam par gzigs pa ni sku'o/ /'jig rten ni log pa'i shes pas brtags pa'i 'khor ba ste/ de nyid rang gi ngo bo rnam par dag pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rang bzhin la/ 'khor ba'i skyon gyis ma gos pas na

pad+ma'i rigs so/ /de bas na/ dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje las gti mug la sogs kyis mi 'ching / /rang rang nyid ni rdzogs byang chub/ /ces gsungs pa'i phyir ro/ /'jig rten gzugs la sogs pa ste/ /snang ba'i dbang po'i yul du 'gyur ba'o/ /de'i byed pa po ni mnyam pa nyid

kyi ye shes te/ /rin po che'i rigs la phyogs med pas na chen po'o/ /phyag rgya ni khyab cing mi 'da' ba'i don gyis te/ 'bras bu 'ba' zhig pas chen po'o/ /rigs mchog ces pa ni/ rigs lnga dbyer mi phyed pas rtsod 'das kyi rigs so/ /rdo rje'i rigs ni chen po ste/ rigs

bzhi'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir 'khor rnams la zil gyis mi gnon pa'i skye mched yod pa dang nyid kyis zil gyis mi gnon pa'i skye mched kyi 'khor rnams rigs drug gi rgyud du mkhyen pas gtsug tor cher gzigs nas zhes bya'o/ /gtso bo rdo rje dbang phyug la dgongs pa dang / 'bras

bu kho na lam du bya ba'i phyir/ rigs drug gi rang bzhin byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen po nyid bshad par bya ste/ tshig ces pa ni tshig gi rgyud do/ /bdag po ni 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' ste rdo rje 'chang ngo / /tshigs su bcad pa ni rkyang ba bsdus pa'o/ /bka' stsal pa shugs

kyis shes par bya ste/ longs spyod rdzogs pa chen po dang / 'khor los sgyur ba dang / bstan pa'i bdag pos so/ /gsang sngags ni skye ba med pa'i snying po can yi ge a'o/ /rgyal po ni thams cad kyi bdag por gyur bas so/ /drug ni sde tshan shes rab kyi yi ge'o/ /ldan pa ni sde tshan

bdun pa'i thabs kyi yi ge'o/ /de mtshon byed du gyur cing / /thun mong dang mchog gi nus pa 'byung zhing shes par bya'o/ /gnyis su med par 'byung ba dang / /zhes bya ba ni ma ning yi ge'i rang bzhin mtshon par bya'o/ /mi skye ba ni ngo bo ste chos so/ /chos ni rkyen las skyes pa ste chos

can no/ /can ni tha mi dad pa'i rang bzhin 'di gsungs pa'o/ /de ltar gnyis su med pa'i ye shes yongs su dag cing dri ma med pa ji ltar gnas she na/ ring thung gi bye brag gis rigs dang rigs kyi ye shes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs ni me long lta bu'i ye shes te/ mtshan dang

dpe byad kyi 'khor lor snang ba dang / sna tshogs dkar dmar gyi rnam par snang ba ni gdul bya'i snang ba'i khyad par te/ de nyid rnam par dag pa dang rnam pas rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba i I zhes bya'o/ /rin po che'i rigs ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes te/ thun mong ma

yin pa'i dbang po'i longs spyod du gyur pa dang / thun mong gi dbang po'i spyod yul du gyur pa ni gdul bya'i dbang po'i khyad par te/ rnam par dag pa dang rnam par dag pas mtha' bzhi la mi gnas pa ni au au zhes bya'o/ /pad+ma'i rigs ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes te/

khro ba dang mnyam pa dang zhi ba'i khyad par gyi rigs bsdus rgyas bye brag tu snang ba dang / rnam shes skye ba'i sgo tha dad par snang ba ni gdul bya'i dbang po'i khyad par te/ rnam par dag pa dang rnam par dag pas kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba rgyud gcig tu gnas pa u U zhes

bya'o/ /las kyi rigs ni bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes te/ thogs pa med pa'i skus rigs so so'i phrin las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mdzad pa dang / dag pa'i kun rdzob kyi mtshan nyid rang dang mthun pa'i don byed/ gdul bya'i snang ba'i khyad par te/ rnam par dag pa dang rnam par dag pas

'bad pa med par rang gi ngang gis 'byung ba ni aM a'o/ /rdo rje'i rigs chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes te/ thams cad gcig tu gyur pa nyid dang / sgro skur dang bral ba nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang gang zag gi khyad par te/ rang gi ngo bos ni gcig la rtag tu 'byung ba dang rjes 'jog tu gnas

pas rnam par dag pa dang / rnam par dag pas 'di'i zhes 'ga' la yang mi gnas pa'i e ai zhes bya'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs ni bde ba chen po'i ye shes te/ gzugs can ma yin pa dang / skye 'jig med pa dang / yul la mi gnas pa dang / 'gro 'ong med pa dang / phyi dang

nang gi chos thams cad de'i ngo bor gcig pa dang / zug rngu gang gis kyang ma gos pa'i ye shes snang ba med pa la sogs pa 'bras bu'i lus brgyad dang ldan pa dang / mtshan ma thams cad rang grol bas dbang po rang bzhi zhing ming gis dben pa'i zung 'jug rgyud las skyes pa ni/ rigs thams

cad ye shes thams cad nyid yin pas rtsod 'das zhes bya ste/ dbye ba med pa la a A zhes bya'o/ /de rtogs par bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa'i blo'i khyad par nang rten cing 'brel te 'byung bas 'jug pa ste/ s+thi to hr-i de zhes bya ba ni re zhig pa'i gnas mtshon pa ste/ snying ga chos kyi 'khor

lo la sogs pa'o/ /dz+nyA na zhes bya ba ni dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba dang / dga' bral dang / lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i ye shes gnas de dag tu rnyed par 'gyur ba'o/ /mUrti zhes bya ba ni spyi gtsug la bya ste/ phra mo'i rnal 'byor gyi sbyor bas 'khrul 'khor gyi sbyor

bas lam nges par sbyangs nas thig le'i rnal 'byor gyis shigs pa med pa'i yi ge haM las byang chub kyi sems 'dzag pa 'dren cing rol pas bde ba rnyed par 'gyur ba'o/ /ra ga ra ste chags pa chen po'i sbyor bas 'og nas 'byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das ma'i ye shes de nyid haM ngo / /ji ltar rnal

'byor du bya ba ni ra ste rdo rje dang pad+ma'o/ /de yang ye shes kyi byed pa po dang phrad pa las byang chub kyi sems gnyis ni a dang bud+d+ho'o/ /de nyid nang gi 'jug pa'i rim pas rtogs par gyur pa ni bud+d+ha nAM no/ /dga' ba gsum lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bor 'byung ba dang / lhan cig skyes pa dus

gsum du 'byung ba ni t+r+ya d+h+wa brti nI'o/ /man ngag bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya'o/ /ji ltar nyams su blang ba yang dbyer mi phyed pa'i ye shes blo'i yul ring du gyur pa ni badzra tI k+Sh+Na'o/ /de ltar yang sdug bsngal gcod par nus pa yang ma yin te/ dam pa'i zhabs kyi pad+mo la btud pa'i

drin gyis/ skad cig la rnyed par gyur pas duHkha ts+tshe da'o/ /de bas/ kye ho grogs dag lhan cig skyes pa de/ /gzhan nas mi rnyed bla ma'i zhal las dris/ /zhes gsungs pas so/ /des gnang bar gyur pa'i rim pa ni pradz+nyA dz+nyA na'o/ /mUrti ni rgyun te bzhi pa'o/ /ya ni ya te gnas

pa'i don to/ /de nyid gnyug ma'i ye shes rang gi mtshan nyid du byas pa ni dz+nyA na ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje nyid yin par kA ya wAka go/ /yang ni bA gI shwa ri ni gsung gi dbang phyug gi rgyud pas de nyid shes par bya ste/ lung dang rang gi rigs

pa dang bla ma'i gdams ngag gis zhes gzhan du bstan to/ /a la sogs pa'i don ni skye ba med pa'i bde ba chen po'i snying po zhes dang / mngon par zhen pa dang bral ba'i stobs kyis dam tshig gi spyod pa dang / /rigs pas thams cad kyang de bzhin du bsdu ba dang / de kho na nyid

re re dang bral ba dang zhes bya ba'i don la yang mi gnas pa'o/ /'di ltar ni bshad zin pa dang sbyar ro/ /a las 'byung ba ni sangs rgyas kyi rgyud don A'o/ /don chen la sogs pa ni don che bas phan yon che ba 'byung bas na skye ba med pa'i snying rje'i snying po can ni yi ge dam pa a las 'byung ba

yin no zhes bya'o/ /mchog ni mchod pa dang rjed gzhi thams cad kyi srog tu gyur pa ste/ khong nas 'byung bas na srog go/ /de'i phyir skye ba med pa mtshon par nus te/ dper na srog gi rlung 'gags na thams cad 'gag par 'gyur ba bzhin no/ /brjod pa dang bral bas phun sum tshogs

pa 'byung ba ste/ brjod pa ni ming yin la de las blo skye ba'i phyir ro/ /thams cad du brjod pa ma bkag pa ni ma yin te/ srog yin pas rgyur 'gyur la/ yan lag gi gsal bar byed pa'o/ /de ltar yi ge gtso bo las mngon par 'phel ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo thams cad kyi

sa bon dang / snying po dang sngags su gyur pa'o/ /gsal yig ma 'phel ba ma yin te/ srog tu brjod pa'i phyir dang / bcu gcig pa'i thig les thabs kyi rang bzhin gzung ba'o/ /thabs su mi 'gyur ba ma yin te/ mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i gur las/ bde ba chen po 'khor ba khyab/

bde ba spangs ni de ma yin/ /zhes pas/ thig le spangs pa la rnyed par ma gsungs so/ /bde ba chen po ni shes rab ma yin te/ de nyid las/ bud med bzang mo'i reg bde ba/ /glu thos pa yi zhi ba bde/ /dri bsnams pa yi bde ba che/ /skyes nas reg pa'i bde ba che/ /bcud len

rab tu sbyor ba yis/ /bde ba su zhig 'gog par byed/ /ces gsungs pas na/ shes rab dang thabs tha mi dad pa nyid las dkyil 'khor pa thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir mchod pa chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ 'dod chags dang / 'du shes dang / me'i

khams rnam par dag pa ni mchod pa chen po ste bde ba'o/ /des rgyu dang 'bras bu'i skabs su sems can thams cad dga' bar byed do/ /zhe sdang dang / rnam par shes pa dang / chu'i khams rnam par dag pa ni zhe sdang chen po ste mchod pa'o/ /des nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i

nyon mongs pa gcod par byed do/ /gti mug dang gzugs dang / sa'i khams rnam par dag pa ni gnyis med de/ gti mug chen po'i mchod pa'o/ /de mi shes shing shes pa med pas na gti mug blo ste ma rig pa'i rtsa ba can gyi gti mug sel to/ /phrag dog dang /

'du byed dang / rlung gi khams rnam par dag pa ni 'gro 'ong med pa'i rang grol du gyur pa ste/ phrag dog chen po'i mchod pa'o/ /de yang tha mal pa'i phrag dog gcod par byed pas na sgra che ba zhes bya'o/ /ser sna dang / tshor ba rnam par dag pa'i khams ni blo yis ma spags pa ste/ chags

pa chen po'i mchod pa'o/ /des mngon par zhen pa thams cad sel bar byed do/ /de ltar 'khor ba'i rnam par dag pa rigs dang de bzhin gshegs par bstan la/ de yang ye shes kyis dag par byas la rtsod 'das su shes par bya'o/ /bstan pa la dgos pa med pa ma yin te/

phal ba'i rnam par spangs pa'i phyir/ /bsgom par yang dag rab tu grags/ /phal ba'i rang bzhin spangs nas ni/ /bsgom pa de ni sgom pa min/ /zhes gsungs pas so/ /'dod pa chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa las sems bskyed pa'i rang bzhin du bstan par bya ste/ dga' ba dang mchog

tu dga' ba dang / lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / dga' bral gyi mtshan nyid ni/ 'dod chags chen po dang / bde ba chen po dang / mgu ba chen po ste/ de yang / sna tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs brjod/ /'khyud dang 'o byed la sogs pa/ /rnam par smin pa de las bzlog /bde ba'i

ye shes za ba nyid/ /rnam par nyed pa spyod pa mdzod/ /bdag gis bde ba spyad do zhes/ /mtshan nyid bral la gsum las gzhan/ /chags dang chags med rnam par spangs/ /zhes gsungs pas shes par bya'o/ /gzugs chen zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni dbang bskur ba'i

rang bzhin du bshad par bya ste/ de yang ye shes la dbang ba dang / nyon mongs pa la dbang ba dang / rlung la dbang ba dang / bdud la dbang ba ste/ de yang gzugs lus che ba dang / kha dog dang dbyibs che ba dang / ming dang rgya che ba dang / dkyil 'khor che zhing yangs pa ste/ brda dang

nyams su myong ba rtogs pa dang / don gcig pa nyid kyis gzugs dang don lus ni snang ba thams cad de chen po ni brdar gyur pa'i don bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du'o/ /kha dog dang lus ni bye brag 'dzin pa'i shes pa ste/ nyon mongs brgyad khri bzhi stong ngo / /che ba ni mchod pa mchog

gi dus su'o/ /snying por gyur pa ni de bzhin nyid rig pa ste/ de bas na/ rang rig pa yi bdag nyid de/ /dag pa gzhan gyis grol mi 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs pas so/ /ming dang rgya che ba ni ji srid du ming du btags pa de srid du brtags pa'i rtogs pa ste/ de dag thams cad kyi byed pa

po ni rlung lnga'i bdag nyid bcu'i ming can rnam shes kyi bzhon pa ste/ de yang dag par byed pa ni bla ma'i zhabs kyi pad+mo las rnyed pa'o/ /thams cad lhan cig skyes pa'i 'jug pa nyid kyi che ba ste/ de ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rtog pa'i chos mtha' dag gi 'obs kyis bskor ba'i nang

du dri ma dang bcas pa'i srid pa'i chus bkang ba ste/ srid pa'i shing spangs shing gtor bas bskyed pa las shin tu ring du skyes nas 'dod pa'i 'bras bu mig dga' ba bskyed pa dang / rna ba bde ba byed pa dang / dri zhim pa dang / ro zhim pa mkhrang zhing spom la sna tshogs rnam pa mang po nyams

su myong bar byed cing / rgyu gsar du bskyed pa'i sred pa las ldog par 'gyur zhes gsungs pas so/ /dkyil 'khor chen po ni sku bzhi dbyer med 'khor lo ste/ bde ba chen por gcig pas yangs pa'o/ /de nyid la dngos grub dang bar du gcod pa mi gnas pa'i don to/ /dman

pa rnams kyis ni lus ngag gi brdas so/ /shes rab mtshon chen po la sogs pas ni chos bshad pa'i rang bzhin du bstan par bya ste/ don gcig pa dang / ma rmongs pa dang / thabs mang ba dang / dka' ba med pa'o/ /de nyid dgag sgrub dang bral ba dang nyams su myong ba dang /

phyag rgya bzhi pa dang / 'bras bu lam du byed pa'o/ /de ni 'di ltar shes par bya ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rig pas dbu mar shes par bya ste/ de ni mtshon chen po yin pas/ /sgro btags kun las rnam grol ba/ /de ni dbu ma pa yis rig /ces bshad pa yang ming

du btags pa dang / blo yis brtags pa thams cad grol ba ye shes kyi rgyud nyid du 'chang ba'o/ /nyon mongs pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa ste/ rlung gnas su zhugs pa'i man ngag ni lcags kyu chen po'o/ /de yang spyi'i rnam pa las grol ba ste/ spyi'i rnam

pa ni slob dpon klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas/ /'on kyang sgra las skyes pa yi/ /rnam rtog gzugs brnyan nyid yin no/ /zhes gsungs pas so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid ni/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bo dang / /mchog mtha' dga' bral dang po can/ /mun pa la ni mar me bzhin/ /de bzhin

bus kyang yid ches gyis/ /zhes gsungs pa'i phyir mchog go/ /grags chen ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug ste/ snyan par grags pa ni thabs che ba la sogs pa'o/ /snang ba chen po ni bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'i 'bras bu ste/ de nyid rgyu'i dus nyid du rang gi ngo bor gyur

pa gsal ba che zhes pa'o/ /tha dad pa ma yin te/ /de yi rang bzhin de yin phyir/ /de yi nus pa de la gnas/ /de phyir de yi rang bzhin no/ /lam nyid nas ni bsgom par bya/ /zhes gsungs pas so/ /mkhas pa la sogs pa phrin las kyi rang bzhin du bshad par bya ste/ de yang

rigs mtha' yas pa rigs gcig tu byed pa yang rigs mthun pa gnyen por byed pa dang / rigs kyi mtshan ma dngos grub bsgrub pa dang chos thams cad lhan cig skyes par byed pa'i las so/ /de ni rnam 'phrul sna tshogs pa gcig pa nyid dang / thabs khyad par can nyid

dang rjes su mthun pas byin gyis brlabs pa nyid dang / 'khrul pa zhig pa'i rang bzhin te/ de ni dper na chu zla dang / dug gis dug gso ba dang / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bu dang / chu rnams rgya mtsho chen por lan tshwar ro gcig pa bzhin no/ /de lta bas na/

mkhas pa rnams ni bde ba chen po ste/ /bden pa gnyis las yongs su grub pas so/ /sgyu 'phrul chen po ni de nyid las rigs snang ba'o/ /'chang ba ni mnga' ba zhes bya ba'i don to/ /de bas na/ gang+gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma dang mtshungs pa/ /rigs gcig la ni de

bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs/ /rigs kyi tshogs las rigs ni du ma ste/ /rigs de las ni rigs ni du ma brgya/ /de las yang ni rigs 'bum chen po ste/ /rigs ni sa ya phrag mang po yin pas/ /mi yi rigs ni grangs med de/ /dam pa dga' ba'i rigs las 'byung ba'o/ /

zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro/ /sgyu 'phrul chen po ni bskyed pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo'o/ /de dag gi dgos pa ni kun du brtags par byed pa'i don te/ de yang / bskyed pa'i rim pa'i yi ge phyogs/ /gang dang gang gis 'jig rten bcings/ /de dang de ni bcings las grol/ /de

nyid mi shes 'jig rten 'ching / /de nyid rnam spangs grub mi thob/ /ces gsungs pas so/ /mtshan mas mtshan ma 'jig pa mi 'thad pa ma yin te/ de yang / /zhal phyag kha dog dbyibs las ni/ /'on kyang tha mal bag chags 'jigs/ /dug gi dum bu gang nyid kyis/ /skye bo

thams cad 'chi ba ste/ /dug gi de nyid shes de yis/ dug gis dug ni 'joms par byed/ /ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so/ /de bas na don grub pa zhes bya'o/ /dga' ba ni sngar bzhin la/ de bas dga' ba ni rigs kyi mtshan mas mtshan pa'o/ /de'i dgos pa ni dgos

pas gzhan ldog pa dang / dngos grub myur du grub pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /de yang dbang bskur nas spyi bor rang gi rigs kyi bdag por gyur par bsam mo zhes gsungs pa ni 'khor rnams ye shes la dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir lus spangs sems spangs kyis/ bsgrub bya zung

'jug bsgrub par bya ba'i rgyu nyid du gsungs so/ /ma nges pa ma yin te/ ye shes mngon du gyur pa nyid kyis/ gtso bos ni bde ba chen po mtshon pa'o/ /sgyu 'phrul chen po ni chos thams cad de/ de'i mtshan nyid ni mig 'phrul lta bu'o/ /can zhes bya ba ni sems lhan cig skyes

pa'i ngo bor gyur pa ni sangs rgyas nyid de/ /'jig rten khams ni gang nas kyang / /gzhan du sangs rgyas mi rnyed de/ /sems nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid/ /sangs rgyas gzhan du bstan du med/ /ces gsungs pas so/ /sbyin bdag chen po la sogs pa'i pha

rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par dag pa bshad par bya ste/ sbyin bdag chen po ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshul khrims chen po la sogs pa yang ngo / /gtso bo chen po ni bde ba chen po'i nyams myong gis sgeg pa'o/ /'chang ba ni brgyud pa'i gzhung lugs kyi phreng

ba 'dzin pa ste/ de nyid las mi 'da' ba'i don gyis na mchog go/ /bstan pa ni rang byung gi ye shes kyis rgyud la goms pa'o/ /brtul ba ni sna tshogs pa thams cad rdo rje 'chang gi bar du goms pa ste/ de yang khams gsum sna tshogs pa 'di thams cad sems kyi rang

bzhin du gnas pa ste/ de ltar la lar ni snying rje dang srin po'i bdag nyid do/ /la lar ni mi snang ba dang / mu cor du smra bar ro/ /la lar ni srid pa dang nor bu bzhin no/ /la lar ni gnyid log pa dang sad cing bsdams par ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher gsungs pas so/ /ting nge

'dzin gnas ni blos ma bslad pa'i me tog go/ /lus 'chang ba ni dbang po rang snang ba'i 'jug pa'o/ /stobs dang thabs ni ltos pa med par rang nyid gsal ba ste/ de yang / chu bo klung 'bab rgyun dang ni/ /mar me 'bar ba'i rtse mo bzhin/ /sngags kyi de rig rnal 'byor pas/

rgyun mi 'chad pa'i bsam gtan bsgom/ /zhes pa gsungs pas so/ /rgya mtsho ni bdag gzhan gyi dbye ba spangs pa'i ye shes kyi byug pa chen po'o/ /ma chags pa dang / mi 'da' ba dang / mi 'khrug pa dang / bar chad med pa dang / rtse gcig pa dang / rgya che ba dang / mi thub pa

pa dang / tshegs chung ba dang / don 'byung ba dang / zung du 'jug par yang sbyar ro/ /gnyis ldan pa ni thams cad la khyab par sbyar ba'i tha tshig go/ /byams chen la sogs pa ni me long lta bu'i ye shes su bshad par bya ste/ phyogs med par snang ba dang / nyams su myong ba dang / mtshan

ma'i rlom sems dang bral ba dang / 'bad pa la rag ma las par snang ba'o/ /de yang byams pa ni byams pa chen po ste/ de'i rang bzhin dpag tu med pa ste tshad ma bshad pa'o/ /snying rje chen po ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i nyams myong ste/ blo thams cad las mchog tu gyur pa'o/ /

shes rab chen po ni mi dmigs pa dang mi gnas pa ste/ 'bras bu dang shes rab dang ldan pa'o/ /mkhas pa chen po ni 'khrul ba zhig pa ste/ rang gi ngang gis 'byung bas na thabs che ba zhes bya'o/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po mnyam snyoms pa ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes su bshad par bya ste/ snang brtags

mnyam pa nyid dang / rgyu 'bras dang / dpe don dang / 'khor 'das mnyam pa nyid do/ /de yang rdzu 'phrul chen po ni gzugs la sogs pa ste/ rgyu rkyen la rag las pa'i phyir skye ba med pa'i stobs dang ldan pa'o/ /shugs chen zhes bya ba ni the tshom med pa ste/ gnyug ma'i shes pa rgyur brtags
