shud+d+he i daM ba liM gr-ih+Na/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ de nas bstod de/ hUM chos nyid zhi ba'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang / /gdug pa 'dul phyir khro bo'i gzugs su bstan/ /be+e DUr+ya yi mdog 'dra sku mnga' zhing / /gdug pa 'dul phyir 'jigs byed skul bstod/ /shin tu khro zhing gnag pa ma he'i

zhal/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal bzhi 'jigs pa'i zhal/ /steng zhal gtsigs pa'i zhal ni shin tu 'khrug /zhal drug spyan gsum 'jigs byed zhal la 'dud/ /g.yas kyi phyag drug mtshon cha gri gug dang / /ral gri mda' dang 'khor lo tri shUl mdung / /g.yon na thod pa

phub gzhu be con mgo bo bsnams/ /bsdigs pa'i mtshon cha 'jigs byed phyag 'tshal bstod/ /brkyang bskum tshul gyis zhabs bzhi thur du bgrang / /ma he sngo nag brdzis pa'i gdan la bzhugs/ /'jigs byed stobs ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /glang stag zhing

chen sprul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan/ /rus pa'i rgyan cha drug ni dbang du 'khrol/ /thod skam dbu rgyan thod rlon do shal byas/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed rgyan la rab tu bstod/ /dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes/ /rno gdug mche ba rab tu gtsigs/ /ha ha zhes bzhad srid gsum zil gyis

gnon/ /pheM gyi sgra sgrogs rgyal po khyod la bstod/ /bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas/ /zhe sdang rdo rje'i 'od zer tsha tsha 'phro/ /bdud dang dgra bgegs ma lus skrag par byed/ /ma lus dbang du sdud la phyag 'tshal bstod/ mun nag lta bu'i sku brjid cing / /nyi ma 'bum gyi

gzi brjid can/ /gdug pa'i mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams/ /bdud 'dul khro bo'i rgyal po khyed la bstod/ /hUM dmar nyi ma'i 'od 'phro ma/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis mdzes pa'i sku/ /g.yas pa gri gug yab la 'khyud/ /g.yon pa thod khrag gtso la stobs/ /phyag gsum

me stag rab tu 'phro/ /zhal nas ha ha nges par sgrogs/ /dbu skra dmar ser rab tu 'bar/ /phag mo yum la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /hUM gti mug nga rgyal gshin rje gshed/ /'dod chags phrag dog gshin rje gshed/ /dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrang / /gdug pa'i mtshon cha sna tshogs

'dzin/ /glang stag zhing chen rgyan gyis brgyan/ /thod pa'i do shal rgyan drug ldan/ /sku las me 'bar gdug pa 'dul/ /gshed po bzhi la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /mi dge bcu spangs sa bcu bgrod/ /phyogs bcu'i bdud 'dul khro bo bcu/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog mthing / /gdug

pa'i mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin/ g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa bsnams/ /lha dang lha min thams cad 'dul/ /rgyan drug thod pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan/ /'jigs byed bcu la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /hUM ye shes rnam bzhi yang dag rtogs/ /g.yon pa thod pa kha T+wAM ga /rgyan dang

lnga bcus sku la brgyan/ /brkyang bskum ha ha zil gyis gnon/ /lcags kyu ma dang zhags pa mo/ /lu gu rgyud dang 'bebs pa mo/ /mkha' 'gro bzhi la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /lhag chad yi ge brgya pas bshags/ /de nas dang la mjug bsdu ba ni/ /hUM zhes pa yi sgra brjod de/ /gcig gis dang

la yab la bsdu/ /yab nyid 'od du zhu las hUM/ /hUM de rim gyis zhu ba las/ /zag med bde ba'i ngang la gnas/ /rtag pa'i mtha' las grol bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje skad cig lhar bsgoms la/ /sngags kyi 'khor lo rab brjod pas/ /chad pa'i mtha' las grol bar 'gyur/ /

de nas spyod lam ci bder gnas/ /'jam dpal khro bo'i sgrub thabs rdo rje 'od kyi rim pa zhes bya ba/ bla ma sdom pa bzang po'i thugs dam/ bla ma lo tsA ba d+harma b+his bsgyur ba'o//[ ]@/ /'jam dpal gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bzhugs//

@##/ /bla ma dam pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shAkya thub pas gsungs pa'i 'jam dpal mtshan brjod 'di la zab pa dang rgya che ba gnyis las/ 'di rgya che ba'i man ngag go/ /don brgyad las 'di man ngag gi sa'o/ /de la rim gyis pa dang cig car ba las 'di rim gyis pa'i sa'o/ /de la bum

pa'i dbang gi dus su/ /rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor la brten nas/ de yang / sa yi dkyil 'khor bzhi yi khyon/ /zhes zer/ de la brten nas dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bstan te/ smon 'jug gnyis kyis slob ma las la 'jug pa'i dus su/ ri yi phug gam chu 'gram mam/ /lha khang mchod

rten dben sa dang / /dur khrod gnas dang shing drung du/ /de la sogs te gnas yid du 'ong bar/ slob dpon stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ bsam gtan la gnas par bya'o/ /rgyud nas/ bsam gtan chen po'i ting 'dzin gnas/ /gsungs so/ /de nas rang 'jam dpal du bsgoms la/ /

tshad med pa bzhi bsgom/ de'i rjes la/ a A sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ oM hUM hrIHb+ha ga wAn/ dz+nyA na mUrti/ wA gI shwa ra ma hA bA tsa/ sarba d+harmA ga ga na/ a ma la su pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma d+hA tu dz+nyA na gar+b+ha aH zhes pas bdag dang snang srid stong bar bsam/ de'i ngang las bdag gshin rje gshed du

bsgoms la/ sa snang ba la bslang ba dang / /mi snang ba la bslang ba dang / bgegs bskrad pa dang / sa gzung ba dang / mchod gtor gyis mnyes par bya ba dang / klog 'don bya ba dang / sngon 'gro rnams bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sta gon ni bdud rtsi'i chus chag chag btab

la/ /gnam thig gdab pa dang / sa thig gdab pa dang / byin gyis brlab pa dang / bri ba la 'jug par bya'o/ /de nas lha dang bum pa'i sta gon bya ste/ bum pa dkar po nag po ra ri spangs pa la ras kha tshar ma nyams pa'i mgul chings byas la phyag rgya lnga gdags/ de la sogs pa'i

yo byad rgyas par bsog /de ni bum pa'i sta gon no/ /de nas rnal 'byor pa sta gon la gnas par bya ste/ spyir khrus dang ldan par bya/ sdig bshags bya/ skyabs 'gro byas la/ slob dpon 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas par bya'o/ /de ni slob dpon

gyi sta gon no/ /slob ma'i sta gon ni phyir khrus byas la/ sdig pa bshags pa dang / skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bar chod bsrung ba'i phyir srung skud gdags pa dang / dpa' bo 'bru gsum gyis byin gyis brlab pa'o/ /de ni slob ma'i sta gon no/ /bar der zhi ba'i sbyin sreg rgyas

par bya'o/ /dbang thob pa dang ma thob pa gnyis su shes par bya'o/ /dbang thob na sems bskyed bya mi dgos/ /ma thob na sems bskyed bya/ gnyis pa la 'jug /gsum pa la rdzogs par bya'o/ /de yang gsum rig gtsang ma dag pa ste/ dbang thob pa yin na bum pa gcig la

dbang bzhi stan thog tu bskur/ byin rlabs brtan par bya ba'i phyir slob dpon la yon dbul lo/ /de'i cho ga ni dang po kho nas sa bslang ste/ sa bdag lha klu 'khor dang bcas pa rnams/ /sa yi dmigs dang ne'u gsing lu ma rnams/ /rdzing dang lteng ka so so'i gnas rnams nas/ /sa bdag

klu gnyan sde dang 'khor du bcas/ /sa yi lha mo 'khor dang bcas pa rnams/ /gnas 'dir spyan 'dren mchod kyis gshegs su gsol/ /dkyil 'khor chen po 'di yi sa bslang phyir/ /byin gyis brlabs pa'i gtor ma 'di bzhes la/ /rin chen gser gyis gzhi bslang du gsol/ /lag

pa g.yas pa sa la brdabs pas/ sa gas pa'i ser gnas sa'i lha mo ro stod bsnyems te byung nas/ lag pa g.yas pa khas len gyi phyag rgya/ g.yon pa bum pa bsnams pa de ltar byon par bsam/ de la gtor ma dang me tog dri zhim pos mchod la/ 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba

btab ste/ sngon bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas srod la bdud btul/ /tho rangs mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa yang sa gzhi rin po che 'di'i steng du mdzad pa lags pas/ rnal 'byor pa che ge mo zhes bgyi ba la sogs pa yang / tshogs gnyis bsags pa'i rten

'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i pho brang 'debs par 'tshal bas sa'i lha mo 'khor dang bcas pas sa bdag klu gnyan kun/ sa rin du rin po ches brgyan pa'i gtor ma 'di bzhes la/ dang po dge sbyor dbu bzung ba nas/ tha ma rdzogs pa mthar phyin dus gnas 'di bdag la

g.yar lags pas/ sa 'di brtan pa dang bkra shis par mdzad du gsol zhes brjod la gtor ma sbyin no/ /de'i cho ga 'di skad do/ /hUM skyob pa sangs rgyas rin po che/ /sa dang pha rol phyin pa la/ /lha mo 'khor bcas dpang du gyur/ /shAkya thub pa skyob pa yis/ /bdud kyi sde rnams bcom pa

ltar/ /de bzhin bdag gis bdud rnams gzhom/ /pham par byas te dkyil 'khor bri/ lha mo de/ de nyid du thim par bsam mo/ /de ni sa bslang ba'i cho ga'o/ /de nas bdag nyid 'jam dpal du gsal bar bsgoms la/ de nas rdo rje gsor dril bu gsil zhing / rdo rje 'gros kyis bskor

zhing sa gzhi gzung ngo / /de nas bdag nyid dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bsdad de/ las thams cad pa'i sngags brjod cing sdang mig phyogs bcur blta/ rdo rje nam mkha' la gsor zhing mtshams bcad do/ /de nas dri sna tshogs dang spos kyi chus sbyar la lag tu thogs la/ pus mo

g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs la 'di skad do/ /hUM bcom ldan ye shes sems dpa' ni/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi bdag po ste/ /slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang / /dkyil 'khor thugs rje'i bdag nyid can/ /de dag slob mar bcas pa dang / /mgon po bdag ni 'byung bar 'tshal/ /

las thams cad pa'i sngags kyi dri'i chus byug go/ /bdag gi thugs kar thig skud kyi sna gcig gzung / slob ma de phyag na rdo rjer gsal btab la/ thig skud de lte ba'i khung du gzung la/ /hUM nam mkha' gang ba'i bcom ldan 'das/ /khyod kyis sems can 'gro don mdzad/ /

las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis thig gdab po/ /thig skud kyi sgra yis bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs dam bskul nas sems can gyi don mdzad par bsam mo/ /da ni sa tshon byin gyis brlab ste/ oM hUM swA hrI hA bris la rigs lnga'i dgug gzhug bya'o/ /de zhu bas rin po che lnga'i

phye mar gyur nas/ des bris te g.yon pas de nas pad+ma'i gdan re dgod/ de las lha'i 'phro 'du dang bskyed pa gzhan nas gsal lo/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po 'jam dpal gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bla ma sdom pa bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// [ ]skyabs 'gro sems bskyed dbang bzhi'i gdams pa bzhugs/ /

da ni smon 'jug gnyis dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed par bya ste/ de la yang dang por sdig pa bshags par bya ba ni/ slob dpon dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba skye ba nas da lta'i lus 'di blangs pa tshun chad mi dge ba'i las bgyis pa dang / bgyid du stsal ba dang / bgyid

pa la rjes su yi rang ba rnams bla ma dkon mchog yi dam/ mkha' 'gro'i spyan sngar mthol lo bshags so/ /da ni skyabs su 'gro ste/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba snying po byang chub la thug gi bar du/ phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o/ /chos la skyabs su mchi'o/ /dge

'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/ /da ni sdom pa gzung ste/ bla ma dkon mchog gi spyan sngar/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la/ /tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang / /dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang / /sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum/ /bdag gis rtag par gzung bar bgyi/ /de ni smon

pa'i sems bskyed de/ da ni 'jug par bya ste/ dang po bshags pa bya ste/ bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas skye ba thog ma med pa nas da lta'i lus 'di blangs pa yan chad du mi dge ba'i las bgyis pa dang / bgyid du stsal ba dang / gzhan

bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang ba rnams/ bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro rnams kyi spyan sngar mthol lo bshags so/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba snying po byang chub la thug gi bar du bla ma la skyabs su mchi'o/ /yi dam la skyabs su mchi'o/ /mkha' 'gro la skyabs su mchi'o/ /da ni sdom pa

gzung bar bya ste/ sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro gsum/ /deng nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi/ /nam du yang ni mi gtong ngo / /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po yi/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang / /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /slob dpon dag kyang gzung

bar bgyi/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la/ /nyin re bzhin du dus drug tu/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/ /byang chub chen po las byung ba'i/ /pad+ma'i rigs chen dag pa la/ /phyi nang gsang ba theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /las kyi

rigs mchog chen po yi/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi/ /byang chub sems ni bla na med/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir/ /bdag gis sdom pa ma lus gzung / /ma bsgral ba

rnams bdag gis sgrol/ /ma grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol/ /dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing / /sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod/ /ces 'jug go/ /nub dang po la smon 'jug gi sems bskyed do/ /so shing dor la rang re'i rmi lam brtag go/ /de nas dbang bskur

bar bya ste/ /dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i dus su bzlas pa bya ba ni/ oM wA gI shwa ri muM/ oM badzra tIk+Sh+Na duHkha ts+tshe da pradz+nyA dz+nyA na mUrta ye/ dz+nyA na kA ya wA gI shwa ra a ra pa tsa nA ya te na maH/ a A sarba ta thA la sogs pa las thams cad pa'i bsnyen pa rdzogs par bya'o/ /nub gnyis pa la byang chub lam du drang

ba ni/ mig ras kyis bka' la lag tu me tog thogs la/ sgo'i phyi logs su bzhag la/ slob dpon nyid kyis 'di skad brjod do/ /skal ldan rigs kyi bu mchog khyod/ /dang dang mos pa ci la dga'/ /zhes lan gsum brjod pas/ /slob mas 'di skad brjod do/ /bdag cag

'khor ba las bsgral phyir/ /kun mkhyen ye shes phung po can/ /srid pa'i 'khor lo gnas sbyor ba/ /di ring bshad pa'i rin chen gyis/ /gtso bos bdag la bka' drin gsol/ /zhes lan no/ /yang slob dpon gyis/ /ma rig rmongs pa'i bu mchog khyod/ /rdo rje byang chub lam nas

drangs nas ni/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bstan pas bya/ /bla med byang chub lam nas drang bar bya'o/ /badzra aM ku sha dza zhes brjod pas las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis bgegs bskrad do/ /de nas las kyi slob dpon lag tu rdo rje gtad la/ lag pa nas drangs nas gral so sor bya'o/ /

rang gi gdong g.yogs byas la gzhag go/ /yang slob dpon kho rang gis/ skal ldan rigs kyi bu mchog khyed/ /las dang spyod pa ci la dga'/ /byas pas/ yang slob mas/ bdag ni skal ldan bde chen la/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal dngos grub gsol/ /zhes so/ /de nas

me tog lag tu thogs la/ thal mo sbyar la 'di skad brjod do/ /byang chub rdo rje 'jam dpal la/ /rin chen me tog dam pa 'bul/ /bdag kyang 'jam dpal skur gyur cig /'jam dpal sku yi rdo rje gsol/ /pra tIts+tsha ho zhes me tog dbul lo/ /me tog lha la tshud na des

chog go/ /ma tshud na lan gsum bskyar ro/ /de yang ma tshud na las thams cad bskyar ro/ /de nas slob dpon gyis 'di skad brjod do/ /de ring dang ba'i shugs kyis ni/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa bstan par bya/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab/ /dam tshig mchog tu gyur par byed/ /

badzra tsak+Shu pra be sha phaT ces mig dbye'o/ /de nas dbang bskur te/ dang po bum pa'i dbang bskur te bdag gi thugs ka nas 'od 'phros pas bum pa 'od du zhu ba las de 'khor lor gyur/ 'khor lo 'od du zhu/ hUM du gyur/ de la rdo rje mi bskyod pa'i dbang ngo / /de spyi bo'i thog tu bzhag la mchod

pa dbul te/ mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che/ /sems can thams cad dga' bar byed/ /mchod pa chen po zhe sdang che/ /nyon mongs kun gyi sgra che ba/ /mchod pa chen po gti mug che/ /gti mug blo ste gti mug sel/ /mchod pa chen po khro ba che/ /khro ba chen po sgra che ba/ /mchod pa

chen po chags pa che/ /chags pa thams cad sel bar byed/ /oM badzra puSh+pe hUM/ d+hU pe/ A lo ke/ gan+d+he/ nai we t+ye/ shab+da hUM/ oM badzra tIk+Sh+Na duHkha ts+tshe da pradz+nyA dz+nyA na mUrta ye dz+nyA na kA ya wA gI shwa ra a ra pa tsa nA ya ten maHa A i I u U e ai o au aM aHs+thi to hr-i di/ dz+nyA na mUrti ra hi bud+d+ho bud+d+hA nAM a A

sarba ta thA ga ta la sogs pa las thams cad pa'i sngags btang / de ni bum pa'i dbang bskur ro/ /de nas dbu rgyan dang cod pan gyi dbang bskur te/ dbu rgyan dang cod pan mdun du bzhag la/ bdag gi thugs ka nas 'od kha dog lnga 'phros te/ dbu rgyan dang cod pan 'od du zhu rin po che'i sul

mangs cig tu gyur/ rin po che 'od du zhu bas/ rin chen 'byung ldan gyi dbang ngo / /slob ma'i mgo la bskon la/ gong gi mchod pas mchod do/ /de nas rdo rje'i dbang bskur te rdo rje las 'od 'phros pas rdo rje 'od du zhu nas pad+ma dmar po cig tu gyur/ /pad+ma de zhu bas aM du gyur/

aM zhu bas snang ba mtha' yas kyi dbang bskur ro/ /de slob ma'i lag tu bzhag pas mchod bstod gong bzhin du bya'o/ /de nas dril bu'i dbang bskur te/ slob dpon gyi mdun du dril bu bzhag la thugs ka nas 'od 'phros pas dril bu zhu/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor cig tu gyur/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor

de ha cig tu gyur/ de las don yod grub pa'i dbang ngo / /dril bu slob ma'i lag tu bzhag la mchod bstod gong bzhin du bya'o/ /de nas ming gi dbang bskur te/ slob dpon gyi phyag g.yas pa'i steng du thugs ka nas a de 'od du zhu zla ba'i dkyil 'khor cig tu gyur/ zla ba 'od du zhu oM du gyur/

de las rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang ngo / /slob dpon gyi phyag slob ma'i spyi bo'i steng du bzhag ste/ mchod bstod gong bzhin du bya'o/ /de ltar dbang bskur ba ni phung po lnga ni rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas te/ ye shes lnga'i dbang thob pa'o/ /des ni bum pa'i dbang ngo / /gsang ba'i dbang ni/ bdag lha'i

rnal 'byor du byas la/ de'i spyi gtsug tu bla ma bsgom/ de'i spyi gtsug tu gshin rje gshed yab yum bsgom/ de'i spyi gtsug tu dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa rnams bsgom mo/ /dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad snyoms par zhugs pa'i byang chub kyi sems gshin rje gshed yab yum

la thim par bsam/ gshin rje gshed yab yum snyoms par zhugs byang chub kyi sems la babs nas/ bla ma yab yum la zhugs par bsam/ bla ma yab yum snyoms par zhugs pa'i byang chub kyi sems de dag gi lam du zhugs nas lce steng du sbyar la/ ar+g+ha dang bsres la slob ma'i lce steng

du bzhag la slob ma'i ngag skyon dag par bsam/ de mgrin par/ de snying gar/ de lte bar/ de rim gyis yar drangs pas ngag gi lam du zhugs/ de sna bug g.yas su zhugs/ de g.yon du zhugs/ ngag rlung ni 'gro 'ong bzlas pa byas pas sgra ngos gzung med pas ngag gi sgra grag stong du 'gro ste ngo

sprad do/ /shes rab ye shes kyi dbang ni/ rnal 'byor pa g.yas su gzhag /rnal 'byor ma g.yon du gzhag /de nas slob dpon gyis rdo rje dang dril bu mdun du bzhag la/ gshin rje gshed yab yum du bskyed do/ /rdo rje de la bdag gi thugs ka nas 'od zer 'phros pas rdo rje 'od du zhu 'od zer

gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs dam gyi rgyud bskul/ slar 'dus pas yi ge hUM cig tu gyur/ hUM 'od du zhu ba las 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed sku mdog nag po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas dbyug to/ g.yon sdigs mdzub dang zhags pa bcas

pa/ glang chen stod g.yogs/ zhing chen g.yang gzhi stag gi sham thabs dang / sprul gyi chun po dang thod pa'i phreng ba dang / dur khrod kyi chas can du bskyed la slob ma'i thugs kar bzhag la/ ye shes sems dpa' dgug gzhug bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje de slob ma'i lag tu gtad thabs kyi rang

bzhin du dbang bskur ro/ /dril bu la bdag gi thugs ka nas 'od 'phros pas dril bu 'od du zhu/ dril bu'i 'od zer gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs dam gyi rgyud bskul/ tshur 'dus pas yi ge a cig tu gyur/ a de 'od du zhu ba las rdo rje phag mo sku mdog dmar mo/

g.yas gri gug /g.yon thod pa bsnams pa cig tu bskyed la slob ma'i spyi bo thog tu bzhag la ye shes dgug gzhug bya'o/ de nas mo'i lag pa g.yon du gzhag /dngos kyi rig ma med na dril bu'i 'od kyis rig mar bsgom mo/ /de ltar shes rab kyis rim par dbang bskur ro/ /de nas

slob dpon gyis mkha' gsang byin gyis brlab/ slob dpon gyi gsang ba'i gnas nas hUM cig 'phros pas slob ma'i gsang bar thim/ rdo rje rtse lnga pa phyed pa cig tu gyur/ rdo rje'i bum par oM gyis mtshan pa cig tu gyur par bsgom/ yum gyi mkha' gsang byin gyis brlab ste/

bdag gi yum gyi mkha' las ma dmar mo cig 'phros pas slob ma'i yum gyi gsang bar thim/ ma de 'od du zhu ba las pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad ze'u 'bru dang bcas pa cig bsgom/ /de nas slob dpon gyis hUM zhes brjod pas rdo rje bskul/ a zhes dril bu bskul/ a A sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya/ ha ra

ha ra/ oM hUM hrIHb+ha ga wA na/ dz+nyA na mUrti wA gI shwa ra ma hA pa tsa/ sarba d+harmA ga ga na/ a ma la su pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma d+hA tu dz+nyA na gar+b+ha aHzhes pas skad cig ma la bskyed de/ bde ba ngos bzung ngo / /de ni bde ba bskur ba'i rim pa'o/ /dbang gi don lam du bslang ba ni/ de'i dus las ma g.yos par yab

yum gnyis kyi bsrubs pas rlung ma'i drod can gyi me lce a ba d+hU tI na yar zhugs te/ spyi bo gtsug tor gyi haM zhu ba las/ klang rgyas bde ba'i 'khor lo'i rtsa 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis grol/ de la bdud rtsi byang chub kyi sems babs te dga' ba'o/ /byang chub kyi sems de mgrin pa longs

spyod kyi 'khor lor bskyil bas rtsa 'dab ma bcu drug grol te mchog dga'/ de chos kyi 'khor lor bskyil bas rtsa 'dab brgyad grol te dga' bral/ de lte ba sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor du babs rtsa 'dab drug cu rtsa bzhi grol te/ de lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o/ /de rang gnas su 'phangs te ha ha zhes

pas lte ba nas snying gar drangs/ hi hi zhes pas snying gnas mgrin par drangs/ hUM hUM zhes pas mgrin pa nas klad pa bde chen du drangs pas gtsug tor chen po'i haM la spur len la spur 'dus pa'am khab len la lcags 'dus pa bzhin du 'ub kyis 'dus so/ /de la seng ge rnam par rol gyi khyab

par bsgom mo/ /de ltar yar drangs mar dbab byed kyin bde stong gi nyams ngos zin par bya'o/ /dbang bzhi pa ni bzhi par ming btags kyang gsum las bskur bar mi 'dod do/ /gong ma'i nyams de sems nyid la ngo sprod pa la bzhi las shes zer ro/ /de la bzhi pa'i dbang gi ngo sprad de/ gdams

ngag ngo sprad kyis sems ngos zung shig bya/ dar cig lon pa dang / de ka rang yin byas la/ lag pa nam mkha' la yug byas la/ bzhi pa bde ba'i don no/ /phyag rgya chen po'i lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes de gzugs kha dog tu ma grub pas nam mkha' la ngo sprad do/ /gsum pa'i nyams de ngos

gzung dang bral bas/ gzhon nu ma'i bde ba nyams su myong du yod pa la dngos po mngon sum du bstan du med/ de ka la ngo sprad pas dbang bzhi pa'i gdams ngag go/ /lta stangs bzhis rigs pa spros pa dang bral bar ngo sprad do/ /bum pa'i dbang gi dus su rigs lnga'i bkra shis gsol zhing dbang

bskur/ gsang dbang man chad dbang bzhi pa rdzogs nas bkra shis kyi dbang bskur te dngos grub blang ngo / /bkra shis gsol ba ni/ rgyud las/ bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa/ /grags pa'i bkra shis snyan grags dge / dbugs 'byin chen po dga' ston che/ /zhes so/ /rdzas la brten pa'i

bkra shis kyi ston mo ni/ 'brang rgyas dang / mar dang / thud dang / zho dang / mngar gsum dang / khur ba dang / la phug dang / zas sna mang du thogs la rigs lnga'i bkra shis gsol te/ bkra shis dam pa chos dbyings bskyod pa med mod kyang / /rgyal ba rigs lnga'i bkra shis bde legs shog /bkra

shis kun gyi bkra shis pa/ /grags pa'i bkra shis snyan grags dge /dbus phyogs sangs rgyas rigs kyi zhing khams nas/ /spros dang bral ba'i bkra shis gang lags pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog /shar phyogs rdo rje rigs kyi zhing khams nas/ rdo rje

rigs kyi bkra shis skye 'chi med/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog /bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa/ /grags pa'i bkra shis snyan grags dge/ /lho phyogs rin chen rigs kyi zhing khams nas/ /rin chen rigs kyi bkra shis dgos 'dod 'byung / /

bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog /bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa/ /grags pa'i bkra shis snyan grags dge /nub phyogs pad+ma rigs kyi zhing khams nas/ /skyon med pad+ma lta bu'i bkra shis pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog /bkra shis kun

gyi bkra shis pa/ /grags pa'i bkra shis snyan grags dge /byang phyogs las kyi rigs kyi zhing khams nas/ /las rnams grub pa'i bkra shis gang legs pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang der 'dir bde legs shog /oM bud+d+ha kA la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM/ /oM badzra kA la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM

rat+Na kA la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa tAM/ oM pad+ma kA la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa hrI/ oM karma kA la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa AH/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pa rgyal ba rigs lnga'i bkra shis pa de bzhin du/ bdag cag dpon slob bkra shis par gyur cig /bkra shis rdzas brgyad kyi bkra shis ni/ bkra

shis kun gyi bkra shis pa/ /chos kyi rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs/ /sangs rgyas sku yi bkra shis shog /chos kyi dung ste sgra chen ldan/ /bud+d+hA gsung gi bkra shis shog /'od bzang 'bar ba dpal gyi be'u/ /bud+d+ha thugs kyi bkra shis shog /khyab bdag chen po rin

chen gdugs/ /bud+d+ha dbu yi bkra shis shog /spyan lnga chags pa med pa 'chang / /bud+d+ha spyan gyi bkra shis shog /bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog /bud+d+ha mgul gyi bkra shis shog /nyid kyi zhal nas ljags bzang ba/ /bud+d+ha ljags kyi bkra shis shog /bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa/ /grags

pa'i bkra shis snyan grags dge /sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang / /sangs rgyas zhabs kyi bkra shis shog /skyabs 'gro sems bskyed dbang bzhi'i gdams pa slob dpon sdom pa bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@/ /bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thog

mar dge ba'i don/ sprul sku lam du byed pa rdo rje'i glu ni/ oM badzra tIk+Sh+Na rdo rje rnon po bcom ldan snang ba mtha' yas so/ /duHkha ts+tshe dmi mthun pa'i sdug bsngal gcod pa mi bskyod pa'o/ /pradz+nyA dz+nyA na mUrta ye/ shes rab ye shes gti mug sel ba rnam snang ngo / /dz+nyA na kA ya/ ye shes kyi sku

phrin las byed pa don yod grub pa'o/ /wA gI shwa ra ngag gi dbang phyug gdul bya tshim pa/ a ra pa tsa ma skyes pa'i don rin chen 'byung ldan/ oM te te hUM bde ba'i don rtogs/ te na hUM bde ba'i lam rnyed/ te te te na hUM gnyis su med pa'i bde ba thob pa'o/ /ya te na maHtheg chen ma nor ba

yin no/ /bar du dge ba'i don ni/ longs sku lam du byed pa rdo rje'i glu ni/ oM s+thi to hr-i di chos thams cad rang bzhin skye med kyi ngo bor gnas/ dz+nyA na mUrti ra haM/ ye shes kyi bde ba rang la yod/ bud+d+ho bud+d+hA nA na/ sangs rgyas sems can ye nas gnyis su med/ t+yai d+d+hA brtI nAn/ dus gsum gyi

don brjod pa las 'das pa'i gnas yin/ bde ba'i don ston/ te na hUM/ bde ba'i lam rnyed/ te te te na hUM thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa'i bde ba thob po/ /mthar thug dag pa'i don ni/ chos sku lam du byed pa rdo rje'i glu ni/ oM sarba d+harmA a A/ chos thams cad skye ba med

pa nyid/ oM sarba d+harmA/ i I/ skye med skye ba med pa nyid du snang / oM sarba d+harmA u U/ ma skyes chos rnams dus gsum yid kyis dran/ oM sarba d+harmA e ai/ chos rnams skye med mi 'da' dam tshig nyid/ /oM sarba d+harmA o au/ chos rnams thams cad longs spyod mchog /oM sarba d+harmA

aM/ chos thams cad 'bras bu bde ba che/ oM sarba d+harmA aHchos sku bde ba chen po nyid kyi don/ oM te te hUM bde ba'i don rtogs te na hUM bde ba'i lam rnyed/ te te te na hUM gnyis su med pa'i bde ba thob/ ya te na maHtheg pa chen po ma nor ba yin glu dang po bum dbang thob pas blang / /

glu bar pa de gsang dbang dang / shes rab ye shes thob pas blang / glu gsum pa de dbang bzhi thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa chen pos blang ngo / /rdo rje glu'i gdams ngag rdzogs so//[ ]@/ /bla ma dam pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khrus kyi cho ga bya ste/ de yang rgyud na/ dag par byed

cing sdig sel ba/ zhes pas/ khrus kyi cho ga bshad de/ de la gnyis/ phyi'i khrus dang nang gi khrus so/ /dang po phyi'i khrus bya ste/ sa gtsang ma la maN+Dal byas la/ de'i steng du bum pa skyon spangs pa gzhag /ras kha tshar ma nyams pas bum pa'i mgul chings bya/ 'bras bu can gyi shing

gis bum pa'i kha rgyan bya/ nang du chu gtsang mas bkang la/ snying po rnam pa lnga la/ 'bru'i snying po til/ rtsi thog gi snying po mar/ shing thog gi snying po bu ram/ me tog gi snying po sbrang rtsi/ chu'i snying po lan tshwa'o/ /'bru lnga la/ nas/ gro/ til/ khre/ 'bras so/ /sman lnga la/ stag tsher

ma/ rgya mtsho dbu ba/ dbang po lag pa/ shu dag /sle tres so/ /spos lnga la/ a ga ru/ tsan+dan dkar dmar/ ga pur/ dzA ti/ gla rtsi'o/ /de dud 'gro'i sa bon yin par 'dod/ rdzas de rnams bum pa'i nang du blugs la/ maN+Dal gyi steng du gzhag /de nas rang 'jam dpal du skad cig

gis bskyed la/ las thams cad pa'i sngags lan cig brjod la stong bsam mo/ /de'i ngang las bum pa'i nang du b+h+rUM 'phros 'dus pas phyi rin po che gser gyi bum pa la/ nang rin po che lnga'i gzhal yas khang phyi nas bltas na nang gsal ba/ nang nas bltas na phyi gsal

ba cig tu bsgom/ bum pa'i khar pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa cig bsam/ rgyud la/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas a las byung / /gsung ngo / /de la dzaHhUM baM hoHsa a las 'jam dpal bsgom/ rgyud las/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas a las byung / /gsung ngo / /de la dzaHhUM baM hoHsa

ye shes pa dgug gzhug bya/ las thams cad pa'i bsngags bzlas pas/ 'jam dpal gyi gsang ba nas bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun byung nas bum pa khengs par bsam mo/ /ye shes pa gshegs su gsol/ dam tshig pa 'od du zhu nas khrus chu dang 'dres par bsam mo/ /nang zab mo sngags kyi

khrus ni/ 'jam dpal du skad cig gis bsgoms la/ 'dud dang sngags kyi mjug la a nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod la/ de nas ye shes kyi me long gi ngang la gzhag pas sgrib pa lnga ni sems nyid la gser gyi g.ya' tsam yang ma gos te/ de ni nang gi khrus zhes bya'o/ /phyi'i dri ma 'khru ba ste/ nang gi rnam rtog

gi dri ma rnams 'khrud pa'i brda yin/ phyi khrus nang khrus slob dpon sdom pa bzang po'i lugs 'bro lo tsA ba d+harmA b+his bsgyur ba rdzogs so//[ ]@/ /bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sbyin bdag chen po gtso bo ste/ /gsungs pas gtor ma bshad de/ de la rnam pa gnyis te/ phyi'i

gtor ma dang nang gi gtor ma gnyis so/ /dang po phyi gtor gtang ba/ rin po che'i snod du kha zas gtsang ma dang chu gtsang mas bkang la/ dang po skyabs 'gro bya/ tshad med pa bzhi bsgom/ oM AHhUM/ gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs/ de nas las thams cad pa'i sngags gsum gyi rting la/

namaHsarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki te/ oM saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra hUM/ zhes pa gsum gyis bsngo/ dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa rnams dang / gtsang rigs kyi mgon po rnams dang / 'gro ba ris drug gi sems can rnams la 'dod pa'i longs spyod char bzhin 'bab par gyur cig ces bsngo'o/ /

nang gi gtor ma ni/ yaM las rlung / raM las me/ kaM las thod pa gsum gyi sgyed pu/ A las thod pa'i gzhal yas khang gi nang du/ go ku da ha na/ bi mu shu na da/ de la a las zla ba'i khams rdo rje rtse lnga pa skyug pa cig bsgom mo/ /de la oM hUM hrIHzhes brjod pas las kyi rlung bskyod pas bsod

nams kyi me sbar bas dam tshig gi bdud rtsi dros ye shes kyi bdud rtsir gyur/ las thams cad pa'i sngags kyi mjug la/ ga Na tsakra i daM ba liM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na khA hi khA hi zhes lan gsum gyis bla ma dam pa rnams dang yi dam gyi lha tshogs rnams dang / rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs rnams dang /

chos skyong ba'i srung ma thugs dam can rnams phyi'i mchod pa/ gsang ba'i mchod par bzhes shig /bag chags kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad rgyu dang 'bras bu nas zhi bar mdzad du gsol lo zhes brjod la gtor ma gtang / de nas chos kyi sbyin pa gtang / gtor ma'i cho ga

rdzogs so//[ ]@/ /bla ma dam pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sngags pa mtshan nyid dang ldan pas zhag bdun ro'i rab gnas bya ste/ de yang / ngan song thams cad rnam sbyong ba/ /mgon po sems can kun gyi mchog /gsung ngo / /shi ba sbyang ba bstan te/ dkyil 'khor cho ga rdzogs bya ste/ /

zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor steng du bya/ /khro bo de la 'og tu bya'o/ /thig gdab tshon gyi cho ga bya/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su bum pa gtsang ma la ras kha tshar ma nyams pas mgul chings bya/ der snying po lnga dang / 'bru lnga dang / sman lnga dang / chu gtsang mas dgang / dkyil 'khor gyi zur

bzhir mda' bzhi la dar sna lnga btags la gzhag /gshin bum mgul chings sngon por byas la gzhag go/ /de nas dri ma bca' ste/ dri ma la mtshan byang btags la/ gdugs dang dar sna dang me long btags la gzhag go/ /de nas bgegs bskrad pa ni las thams cad pa'i sngags bzlas shing

nyungs kar phyogs bzhir gtor ro/ /de nas bgegs mthong ba rnams la phyi'i gtor ma btang la bden pa bdar te 'di skad do/ /tshe 'das pa'i blo 'di rgyal po'am/ ma mo'am/ btsan nam/ bdud dam/ dmu'am/ klu'am/ sa bdag gam/ the'u rang la sogs te/ gang gi lag na yod kyang rung

ste/ khyed la glud gtor rin po ches brgyan pa 'bul gyis/ 'di bzhes la gson gyi tshe la ma gnod/ gshin gyi bla ma bcad par rnal 'byor pa'i bka' la nyon cig /de skad byas la las rgyu 'bras kyi chos bshad la/ gtor ma sngags drug phyag rgya drug gis byin gyis brlab po/ /bgegs

dma' ba rnams la pho nya dgye/ rdo rje'i le'u gdon/ nyungs kar gtor to/ /de ltar byas la dri ma la bla yang yang dgug go/ /de nas til la sdig pa'i gzugs byas la tshe 'das kyi sdig pa 'di la bstims/ de nas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya/ dus gsum du mchod pa dang gtor ma cha gsum

gtong ngo / /dug sbyang ba ni de yang dag par byed cing sdig sel ba zhes so/ /khrus cho ga bshad de/ bum pa'i nang du chu dang sman dang / spos lnga la sogs pa blugs la/ bum pa'i khar pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa dkar po cig bsams la/ rgyud las/ dpal ldan sangs rgyas pad+ma skyes/ /zhes so/ /

de'i steng du a las 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' bsgom mo/ /rgyud las/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas a las byung / /gsung ngo / /de la dzaHhUM baM hoHsa ye shes pa dgug gzhug bya/ las thams cad pa'i sngags bzlas/ 'jam dpal gyi gsang gnas nas bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun byung nas bum pa

dkar mer gyis khengs par bsam mo/ /de nas khrus byas te/ me long nang du mtshan byang gsal bar byas la/ a 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum/ /'di dag 'jig rten dug gsum ste/ /sangs rgyas bden pas dug mi mnga'/ /sangs rgyas bden pas dug bcom mo/ /chos dang

dge 'dun yang de bzhin du sbyar ro/ /sa ni dug gi pha yin te/ /sa ni dug gi ma yang yin/ bden pa'i bden tshig 'di brjod pas/ /tshe 'das dug ni dug med shog /las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis khrus dus gsum du bya'o/ /zhag bdun pa'i tha ma la phyir mi ldog par bya ba'i phyir/ bum pas

dbang bskur la/ phyogs bzhir phyin la 'di skad do/ /tshe 'das nyon mongs snying re rje/ /gal te las kyi dbang btsan nas/ /shar gyi phyogs su skye srid do/ /shar gyi phyogs su skyes pa ni/ /de na skyob pa'i mgon po bzhugs/ /mgon po'i ming ni rnam snang mdzad/ /mgon po'i ming ni yul 'khor srung

sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mgon po de la skyabs song cig /des phyogs 'og ma gsum 'gre'o/ lhor rin 'byung mgon po'i ming ni 'phags skyes po/ /nub snang ba mtha' yas/ mgon po'i ming ni spyan mi bzang / byang sangs rgyas don yod grub pa/ /mgon po'i ming ni

rnam thos sras/ /de nas tshe las 'das pa'i rig pa a dkar po bsam/ a de 'jam dpal gyi thugs kar 'phang ngo / /de nas byang bu mar me la bsreg /tha ma la sAts+tsha gdab/ tshe 'das pa'i don du smon lam rgya chen po gdab po/ /sdom pa bzang pos mdzad pa 'bro lo tsA ba d+harmA b+his bsgyur ba ro'i

rab gnas cho ga rdzogs so//[ ]@/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shi ba la phan gdags pa ro sreg pa ni/ maN+Dal drug gi cho ga bya/ de nas ro khang bur bcug la/ las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis ro de la bsngags sam/ /

yungs kar la bsngags te mi dmigs par bsam/ de la dang po 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' bsgom/ bdag gi thugs ka'i a las 'od 'phros pas 'gro ba rigs drug gi sgrib pa sbyang bar bsam mo/ /de nas me bcug la zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya/ de nas mchod pa dbul 'dud dang 'jam

dpal gyi bstod pa bya/ de nas ye shes sems dpa' gshegs su gsol/ ro sreg pa'i cho ga slob dpon sdom pa bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@/ /'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas sAts+tsha gdab pa ni/ rus pa la las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis

brab po/ /de nas lag pa rdo rje rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya bcas la las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlab/ sa rin po che sna lnga'i phye mar bsam/ de la dri sna tshogs pa sbyar ba'i chus sbrus shing brdung ngo / /de la rin po che yang bdar ro/ /de nas 'jim pa'i gong bu la rdo rje rtse gsum

pa'i phyag rgyas reg ge byas la las thams cad pa'i sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas la rin po che'i gong bur gyur par bsam/ las thams cad pa'i sngags kun la sbyar ro/ /'bi 'bi thabs/ sku par shes rab/ 'debs pa thams cad thabs shes rab zung du 'brel

'bi 'bi zab pa/ sku par rgya che ba/ 'bi 'bi chos sku/ skur gyur pa longs sku/ 'od zer gyi 'phro 'du byed pa sprul sku'i don no/ /sAts+tsha gdab pa'i rim pa slob dpon sdom pa bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@/ /'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /da ni rab

tu gnas pa bya ste/ dkyil 'khor bris la mtshan rnams dkyil 'khor la bkod la/ sku'i rab gnas rnam snang la bstim/ gsung gi rab gnas snang ba mtha' yas la bstim/ thugs kyi rab gnas mi bskyod pa la bstim par bya'o/ /gong ltar sAts+tsha btab nas mchod rten

gyi mnga' gsol te/ mchod pa rnams gzhung bzhin du bsams la/ dang po spyan drang ste/ ye shes rang snang sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas/ /'khor lo thig ma thig bzhi bang rim can/ /gnas bzhi'i dbyibs tshul sgo bzhi sgo brtsegs ldan/ /rang bzhin lhun grub mchod rten brgyad po gshegs

su gsol/ /bcom ldan sprul sku mdzad pa las byung ba'i/ /lha las babs pa'i mchod rten gshegs su gsol/ /pad+ma can gyi mchod rten gshegs su gsol/ /byang chub chen po'i mchod rten gshegs su gsol/ /cho 'phrul chen po'i mchod rten gshegs su gsol/ /rang bzhin

lhun grub mchod rten gshegs su gsol/ /rnam par dag pa'i mchod rten gshegs su gsol/ /ka ni ka yi mchod rten gshegs su gsol/ /bkra shis sgo mangs mchod rten gshegs su gsol/ /ye shes blo stegs mchod rten gshegs su gsol/ /chos kyi 'khor lo'i mchod

rten gshegs su gsol/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten gshegs su gsol/ /dregs pa'i phung po dur khrod brgyad kyi rten/ /mkha' 'gro'i gnas dang dngos grub kun gyi gzhi/ /bde gshegs rten dang ri bo la sogs pa/ /sgrub pa'i mchod rten brgyad po gshegs

su gsol/ /de dag kun dang theg pa so so yi/ /tha snyad rnams dang mthun par rten bzhengs pa'i/ /sprul ba'i mchod rten mtha' dag dang / /'gro ba'i don phyir gshegs su gsol/ /e h+ye hi d+harma kA ya kha da la b+h+yo bruM dr-i sh+ya ho/ /sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/

dzaHhU~X baM hoHde nas gdan 'bul ba ni/ dag pa'i me tog dkyil 'khor dang / /rin chen sna tshogs 'bru nyid dang / /thabs dang shes rab nyi zla'i gdan/ /pad+ma'i gdan la gzhugs su gsol/ /oM pad+ma ka ma la ye hUM/ de nas phyag bya ba ni/ mdzad pa rdzogs pa'i byin rlabs las

byung ba'i/ /shar nas byams ldan mthar legs rdo rje rdzogs/ /lho nas yid bzhin lhun grub ka ni ka /nub nas bsam 'das bde byed pad+ma brtsegs/ /byang nas khams gsum rmad grags bde rgyas sgron/ /byin rlabs mchod rten brgyad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas bskor

ba byas/ me tog gtor la/ de nas mchod pa rnams gzhung bzhin du bya/ de nas smon lam gdab ste/ bdag cag gis dge sbyor du bya ba ni/ sems can mthun pa bskyed nas sa gzhi legs par snyoms nas chag chag btab pas/ sems can thams cad byang

chub kyi sems su mnyam gyur cig /rmang bting ste 'gyed 'dud btang nas rab gnas dang mchod pa gzhung bzhin du bgyis pas dge bcu'i lam spyod cing ma chags par gyur cig /byang chub [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun lam la sbyor ba la/ tshogs kyi lam sbyor ba'i lam mthong ba'i

lam bsgom pa'i lam/ mthar phyin pa'i lam mo/ /tshogs lam bzhi sum cu gnyis la bang rim dang po brtsigs te/ rab gnas dang mchod pa gzhung bzhin du bgyis pas tshogs kyi lam du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la/ lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / tshor ba dran pa nye bar

gzhag pa dang / sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang ldan par gyur cig /bang rim gsum pa brtsigs te rab gnas dang mchod pa gzhung bzhin du bgyis pas yang dag par spong ba bzhi la sdig pa'i chos mi skye ba dang / skyes pa spang ba dang dge ba'i

chos ma skyes pa bskyed pa dang / skyes pa'i chos rnams 'phel ba'o/ /bang rim gsum pa brtsigs te/ de la rab gnas dang mchod pa gzhung bzhin bgyis pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la mos pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis spod ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / sems la spyod

pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang ldan pa dang / brtson 'grus dang ldan pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang ldan par gyur cig /bang rim bzhi pa brtsigs te/ brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /

shes rab kyi dbang po dang / dad pa'i dbang po dang ldan par gyur cig /bum rten nor bu brtsigs te/ de la rab gnas dang mchod pa gzhung bzhin du bgyis pas/ des mi mthun pa'i phyogs 'joms pas/ stobs lnga la dad pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / dran pa'i

stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang / /shes rab kyi stobs lnga dang ldan par gyur cig /bum pa brtsigs te rab gnas dang mchod pa gzhung bzhin du bgyis pas/ mthong lam la/ byang chub yan lag bdun la dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag /chos rnam par 'byed pa yang

dag byang chub kyi yan lag /brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag /dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag /shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag /ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag /btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang ldan

par gyur cig /bre legs par brtsigs te/ de la rab gnas dang mchod pa gzhung bzhin du bgyis pas/ bsgom pa'i lam 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad la/ yang dag pa'i lta ba/ yang dag pa'i rtog pa/ yang dag pa'i ngag /yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha'/ yang

dag pa'i 'tsho ba/ yang dag pa'i rtsol ba/ yang dag pa'i dran pa/ yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad la rgyun du gnas par gyur cig /oM badzra A yu She swA hA/ chos kyi sku'i srog shing la/ srog shing phul pa'i byin rlabs kyis sems can thams

cad shes pa bcu dang ldan par gyur cig /oM pra marda na ye swA hA/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la/ 'khor lo phub pa'i byin rlabs kyis mthar phyin pa'i sems can thams cad ma 'dres pa rnam par thar pa brgyad dang ye shes dang ldan par gyur cig /oM b+ha ma na ye swA hA/ chos

kyi sku'i mchod rten la 'gro/ gdugs phul ba'i byin rlabs kyis/ sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i skyabs dang ldan par gyur cig /oM kuM b+hi ra d+h+wa dza ya swA hA/ chos kyi sku'i 'gre/ chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan phul ba'i byin rlabs kyis sems can la 'khor ba mi spong mi stongs shes/

mi nub pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan thob par gyur cig /oM pa taM kA ya swA hA/ chos kyi sku'i mchod rten la/ ba dan phul ba'i byin brlabs kyis/ chos kyi snyan grags bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob par gyur cig /oM pa taM kA lam+pA ya swA hA/ chos kyi sku'i mchod rten la/ dar gyi cod pan phul

ba'i byin rlabs kyis/ sems can thams cad bde bar gshegs pa'i skur gyur te/ dar gyi lha ba lha ba dang / bsnyen bkur mchod pa rgyun mi 'chang pa thob par gyur cig /oM rat+na mA la tra'aM/ chos kyi me tog gi phreng ba phul bas/ sems can thams cad

mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pa dang / blta bas chog mi shes par gyur cig /oM badzra dar swA hA/ /chos kyi/ dar dpyangs phul ba'i byin rlabs kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par so sor gsal bar gyur cig /oM badzra g+haN+Ta swA hA/ chos kyi dril bu phul ba'i byin rlabs

kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi rnga thob par gyur cig /chos kyi me tog phul ba'i byin rlabs kyis/ rnam par thar pa mthar phyin pa'i lam la 'khor 'das dbyer mi phyed pa kun du bzang po lta bu thob par gyur cig /chos kyi sku'i mchod rten la nyi zla gnyis kyi rgyan phul ba'i byin rlabs

kyis/ rang 'byung gi chos rnams rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar gyur cig /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams spyan drangs/ gdan phul phyag btsal mchod pa phul bas/ sa dang po nas sa bcu gcig gi bar dmigs pa med pa'i shes rab sa bcu pa dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje/ de gnyis dbyer med pa

rigs drug pa rdo rje 'chang gis bcu gsum pa ye shes thob par gyur cig /sku'i rab gnas ni/ mchod pa go rims gzhung bzhin bgyis la/ spyan dbye ste/ spyan lnga rab rib rnam dag skyon bral ba/ /gsal dang mi gsal rnam rtog mi mnga' yang / /sri zhu bkur sti rim gro'i tshul du ni/ /spyan gyi dbang

po gsal ba'i tshul bstan nas/ /lha yi spyan dang rtag tu ldan gyur cig /ye shes spyan dang rtag tu ldan gyur cig /oM badzra tsak+Shu swA hA/ lhan cig skyes pa'i nang gi gzugs/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi spyan la 'bul/ /gzugs kyi longs spyod rdzogs gyur cig /oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra A

lo ke hUM/ sgra skad kun la 'phrul gyi snyan mnga' ba/ /'on dang rmongs pa'i rnam rtog mi mnga' yang / /sri zhu bkur sti rim gro'i tshul tsam du/ /snyan gyi dbang po gsal ba'i tshul bstan nas/ /lha yi snyan dang rtag tu ldan gyur cig /snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i sgra/ /sgra yi longs spyod

rdzogs gyur cig /oM badzra g+haN+De hUM/ shangs kyi dbang po rnam dag skyon med pa/ /dri min dri ma'i rnam rtog mi mnga' yang / srid zhu bkur sti rim gro'i tshul can du/ /shangs kyi dbang po gsal ba'i tshul bstan nas/ /ye shes rlung gis nyon mongs gtor byas te/ /rnam par byang ba'i tshogs

dang ldan gyur cig /lhan cig skyes pa nang gi dri/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi shangs la 'bul/ /dri yi longs spyod rdzogs gyur cig /oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra buSh+pe hUM/ /ljags kyi dbang po le brgan 'bar ba la/ /mngar dang kha yi rnam rtog mi mnga' yang / sri zhu bkur ste rim gro'i tshul tsam du/ /

ljags kyi dbang po gzhar po'i tshul bstan nas/ /gsung dbyangs yan lag drug cu ldan pa dang / /'gro ba kun gyi sgra ru chos ston shog /ro brgya ldan pa bdud rtsi'i zas/ /lhan cig skyes pa nang gi ro/ /rgyal ba rnams [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]ljags la 'bul/ /ro yi longs spyod rdzogs gyur cig /oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra nai bi d+ye

hUM/ rgyal ba'i sku mchog lta bas mi 'bral yang / /'dod pa'i dri ma'i skyon gyis ma gos te/ /sri zhu bkur sti rim gro'i tshul tsam du/ /ras mchog 'di yis rgyal ba'i sku phyis pas/ /mtshan dang dpe byad ldan pa dang / /'gro ba kun gyi yid du 'ong bar shog /'jam mnyen 'khril dang ldan pa'i

mchog /lhan cig skyes pa nang gi reg /rgyal ba rnams kyi sku la mchod/ /reg bya'i longs spyod rdzogs gyur cig /oM sarba ta thA ga ta ti k+ti sin+ti ri hUM/ kun tu rtog pa ma lus pa/ /dri ma bral ba'i bdag nyid can/ /chos dbyings ye shes ngo bo nyid/ /bde gshegs gtso la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /

phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i/ /rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa rnams/ /sku ni mi yi rten la bzhugs/ /gsung ni brjod pa rnam par rgyal/ /thugs ni mnyam gzhag mi rtog kyang / /sems can rnams kyi don slad du/ /dbu yi gtsug na yi ge oM/ /rnam snang yi

ge phyogs bcur 'phros/ /sems can lus kyi sgrib pa sbyong / /ljags kyi steng na yi ge aM/ /snang mtha' yi ge phyogs bcur 'phros/ /sems can rnams kyi sgrib pa sbyong / /de nas mchod pa rnam pa lnga dbul/ bstod pa bya/ rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga slob dpon sdom pa bzang pos

mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@/ /'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la/ /ye shes me lce 'od 'bar gsal/ /'dod pa'i don grub dam pa ste/ /zhes pas/ las bzhi'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga bstan par bya ste/ de yang nub dang po lhan cig skyes pa'i bdud dang bral bar bya ba'i

phyir/ /zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya/ de nas bar chod kyi bdud dang dbral bar bya ba'i phyir drag po'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /dang po thab dang rdzas kyi mtshan nyid bstan te zhi ba la dbyibs zlum po/ dpangs dang zheng du sor bzhi pa bya'o/ /rgyar khru gang kha dog dkar po'o/ /yang na chur mdzub gang

dpangs su chag gang do/ rdzas la me tog dang / dkar gsum mngar gsum gu gul dkar po de rnams so/ /drag po la zur gsum dpangs sor bzhi zheng chur khru re'o/ /rdzas khrag dang dug dang til nag dang nyungs nag ling+ga dmar nag dang rdzas rnams thams cad nag po'o/ /dbang

la zla gam zhi ba'i phyed de kha khyer la'o/ /dpangs dang zhing gong dang 'dra/ rdzas dmar po la sogs pa bya'o/ /tsan+dan dmar po/ me tog dmar po/ mar dang nas smug po rnams so/ /rgyas pa la gru bzhi rtse khru gang zer/ zheng khru gang ba/ sbom phra chag gang ba me tog la sogs pa'i

rdzas thams cad ser por bsag go/ /thun mong gi mchod pa'i rdzas rnams ni/ /mar dang 'bras dang sran ma dang / u dum+WA ra'o/ /dus ni zhi ba la nyin phyed/ kha shar du blta'o/ /drag po la nam phyed kha lhor bltas la bya'o/ /dbang la nyi ma nub ka kha nub tu bltas la bya'o/ /

rgyas pa la dus snga dro kha byang du bltas la bya'o/ /dgang gzar ni zhi ba la dngul/ dbang la zangs/ drag po la lcags/ rgyas pa la gser las bya'o/ /de nas me lha bskyed pa ni/ rang 'jam dpal du gsal ba'i thugs ka nas/ hUM dang dzaH'phros pas thab kyi nang du babs/ hUM zhu ba las gun+d+her

gyur/ dzaHlas lcags kyur gyur/ gun+d+he zhu ba las me lha sku mdog dkar por gyur/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ gsus pa ldir ba tshangs pa'i skud pas brgyan pa/ g.yas pa na gun+d+he/ de 'og mchog sbyin/ g.yon dang po na se 'bru/ de 'og bgrang phreng ngo / /dzaHzhu ba las yum sku

mdog ser mo g.yas lcags kyu g.yon phreng ba 'dzin pa'o/ /yab kyi g.yon ngos su 'khril bar bsgom mo/ /me lha'i thugs kar me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum cig bsam/ bdag gi thugs ka nas me'i dkyil 'khor la b+h+rUM cig 'phros de zhu ba las gzhal yas khang gdan dang [(]gcas [,]bcas [)]pa

bsgom/ de'i nang du lha nyi shu rdzus skyes su bsgom/ rnam pa nyi shus byang chub pa gsung ngo / /rdzus skyes ni/ skad cig gcig gis rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /zhes so/ /dam tshig sems dpa' bskyed pa'i rim pa'o/ /de nas ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te/ dad pa dang ni dam tshig

gis/ /tshur gshegs tshur gshegs sems dpa' che/ /lha yi rgyal po bram ze yin/ /'bar ba'i nang du gshegs nas kyang / sreg rdzas mchod pa 'di bzhes shig /ag+ni dr-i sh+ya aM ku sha dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes gnyis su med par bstim/ de nas me lha la sreg rdzas dbul ba ni/

rdzas gong ma rnams dbul lo/ /oM wA gI shwa ri muM/ sarba ta thA ga ta ag+ni ha bya ka bya zhi ba shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ rgyas pa la puSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/ dbang la ba sh+yaM ku ru swA hA/ drag po la mA ra ya phaT swA hA/ nyi shu rtsa gcig dbul lo/ /de nas me lha bstod de/ tshangs pa 'jig rten mgon gyi sras/

me lha'i rgyal po drang srong mchog /'jig rten yongs la bskyab pa'i phyir/ /thugs rje dbang gis sku sprul pa/ /rig sngags 'dzin cing gsang sngags gsung / /bdud rtsi bcud ldan gun+d+he bsnams/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas/ /thugs rje'i sprul pa khyed la bstod/

ces bstod do/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha la mchod pa 'bul te/ oM na maHsaman+ta mA ra Ne zhi ba shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ oM badzra bi dza ye zhi ba shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ oM badzra ma le pa sha zhi ba shAn+tiM swA hA/ oM badzra ma hA ba le zhi ba shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ oM ka ma ri zhi pa shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ oM badzra ti ti pra

be zhi ba shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ rgyas pa la puSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/ dbang la ba sh+yaM ku ru swA hA/ drag po la mA ra ya phaT swA hA/ nyi shu rtsa gcig dbul lo/ /oM badzra puSh+pe zhi ba shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ d+hU pe zhi ba shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ badzra A lo ke zhi ba shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ badzra gan+d+he zhi ba shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ badzra

nai bi t+ye zhi bshIn+taM ku ru swA hA/ badzra shab+da zhi ba shin+taM ku ru swA hA/ paM sh+yaM ku ru puSh+TiM ku ru/ mA ra ya phaT/ mchod pa'i mjug tu re re brjod do/ /de nas bstod pa bya ba ni/ gzhon nu'i sku lus 'chad ba po/ /ye shes sgron mes rab brgyan cing / /'jig rten gsum gyi mun sel ba'i/ /

'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /nyid kyi 'dab bzang tshogs kyis ni/ /zla brgyas pa'ang zil gnon cing / /rig pa rnam par gsal 'gyur ba/ /'jam dpal de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ma bgyis don gyis zur gsal ba/ /nor bu 'bar ba'i sku mnga' zhing / /nyid ni kun du gsal

ba'i sku/ /'jam dpal de la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bdud rtsi dri zhim 'jam pa yi/ /yid 'ong gsum gyi sgra sgrogs la/ /dam pa chos kyi rin chen mdzod/ /'jam dpal de la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /gangs kyi chu ltar gsal ba la/ /'jig rten khams rnams rnam par bzhugs/ /

nyon mongs dri ma rnam spangs pa/ /'jam dpal de la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /mche ba gtsigs shing 'jigs pa yi/ /'jigs pa'i sku yi tshul gyis ni/ /gshin rje'i dregs pa 'joms mdzad pa/ /'jam dpal de la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /ras kyi spyan dang mdangs 'dra ba/ ut+pal/

sngon po rab mdzes pa/ /shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu 'dzin/ /'jam dpal de la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas la/ /rgya che'i spyod pa rab ston pa/ /'gro ba'i lam ni ston pa po/ /'jam dpal de la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /de nas 'dud pa nyi

shus bstod do/ /de nas smon lam gdab ste/ /bar chad ma lus zhi ba dang / /gdug pa tshar ni gcad pa dang / /'jig rten dbang du bsdu ba dang / /tshe dang dbang thang bskyed pa'i phyir/ /thun mong mchog gi dngos grub stsol/ /oM badzra muH/ zhes pas gshegs su gsol/ /dam

tshig sems dpa' bdag la bsdu/ /slob dpon sdom pa bzang pos mdzad pa sbyin sreg gi cho ga rdzogs so//[ ]@/ /'jam dpa' ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thun mong grub rin po che gter sgrub pa/ 'jam dpal gyi bsnyen pa gzhung bzhin

du byas la/ de nas grong khyer chen po'i dbus sam/ rgyal po'i pho brang du maN+Dal mda' gang gru bzhi ba byas pa/ ba'i rnam lnga dang dri zhim po sna tshogs kyis byugs la/ glegs bam gru bzhi pa cig la pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bris la/ pad+ma'i lte ba la/ dzaM b+ha la'i gzugs ser po/ gsus pa che ba byin sha rgyas pa rgyan ma lus pas

brgyan pa/ g.yas pa na bI dza pUr ra bsnams pa/ g.yon pa na ne'i le'i rgyal pa bsnams pa bum pa'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o/ /de'i mdun du gnod sbyin sku mdog ser po rin po che bsnams pa/ g.yas su gnod sbyin sku mdog dmar ser bum pa bsnams pa/ rgyab tu gnod sbyin sku mdog dkar po rin po che thogs pa/

g.yon du gnod sbyin sku mdog nag po ral gri thogs pa/ shar lhor sku mdog ser skya ral gri bsnams pa/ lho nub tu sku mdog smug nag mdung thogs pa/ nub byang na sku mdog ser skya rin po che'i khang pa thogs pa/ byang shar na sku mdog ser po gri phub thogs pa/ g.yon thams cad rin po che'i rgyal mtshan

thogs pa/ dar sna tshogs kyis thod bcings pa'o/ /yang glegs bam gru bzhi pa cig la pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa lte ba la lha mo nor rgyun ma ser mo rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ g.yas mchog sbyin g.yon 'bras kyi snye ma bsnams pa'o/ /lha mo brgyad kyang gtso mo'i cha lugs can no/ /de na

maN+Dal gyi khar bum pa nas dang 'bras kyis bkang la gzhag go/ /de'i khar lha mo'i glegs bam bzhag la/ de'i khar dzaM b+ha la'i glegs bam gzhag /glegs bam gnyis kyi bar du rin po che'i ka ba gzugs/ de la dgug gzhug legs par byas la bdag 'jam dpal du

gsal ba'i thugs ka nas dzaHhUM baM hoH'phros pa me tog lug ru dang / dkar gsum mngar gsum gyis mchod la gtor ma sum yar du gtang / mchod pa rnam lnga dbul/ de'i mjug la 'khor dang longs spyod dngos grub stsol cig ces bya'o/ /nyin mo lha mo rnams kyi snying

po bzlas te/ oM ba sun+d+hA ri N+yai swA hA/ oM tsan+d+ra kan+t+yai swA hA/ oM dat+t+yai swA hA/ oM su da t+t+yai swA hA/ oM Ar+ya yi swA hA/ oM su b+ha d+yai swA hA/ oM gup+t+yai swA hA/ oM de byai swA hA/ oM sa ra swa t+yai swA hA/ zas sna tshogs kyi gtor mas mchod/ mchod pa rnam lnga dbul/ dngos grub blang ngo / /nub mo pho sngags

te/ oM dzam+b+ha la dza lan+d+rA ya swA hA/ oM ma Ni b+ha drA ya swA hA/ oM pu r+Na b+ha drA ya swA hA/ oM d+ha na dA ya swA hA/ oM bai shra baNA ya swA hA/ oM ki li mA la ye swA hA/ oM bi tsi kuN+Da li ni swA hA/ oM mu khen+dA ya swA hA/ oM tsa ren+d+rA ya swA hA/ gtor ma dbul/ mchod pa lnga dbul/ dngos

grub blang / 'jam dpal gyi bsnyen pa rdzogs pa'i gtor ma la/ gnod sbyin pho mo la zla ba gsum du mchod pa na 'dod pa phun sum tshogs so/ /me tog lug ru dang / gu gul dkar po dang / dkar gsum mngar gsum dang nas dang 'bru sna lnga'i sbyin sreg lan brgya rtsa brgyad byas na

lha'i longs spyod dang mnyam par 'gyur ro/ /tho rangs bya ze tsa na pho sngags mo sngags zlos pa yin/ /chu sbyin yang nas yang du btang na longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan no/ /de yang 'dod pa'i don grub dam pa ste/ /gsung ngo / /'di ni rin po che gter gyi sgrub pa'o/ /rgyud las/ yid

bzhin nor bu chen po 'chang / gsung ngo / /thun mong gi dngos grub sgrub pa'i thabs kyi man ngag /slob dpon sdom pa bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@/ /dam pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas maN+Dal dbul te/ maN+Dal tshad dang ldan pa la/ ba'i rnam lnga byugs la badzra

re khe hUM zhes pas dri zhim po'i 'de gu byas la byug pa bya/ oM haM ma hA me ra ba ye na maH /oM yaHga dza raT+wA ya na maHoM ra pu ru Sha raT+wA ya na maH/ oM la s+t+rIrad+d+hA ya na maH/ oM wa a shwa raT+wA ya na maH/ oM ya khang+ga raT+wA ya na maH/ oM ra ma Ni raT+wA ya na maHoM waHsarba ni d+hi kuM b+hA ya na maHoM la tsakra raT+wA ya

na maH/ de ltar me tog tshom bu dgu dgur bya'o/ /paM pad+ma maN+Dal/ ma srur+ya maN+Dal/ a tsan+d+ra maN+Dal zhes gdan dbul lo/ /gdan de'i steng du tsad+h+ri thub la sogs pa'i bla ma rnams spyan drangs la/ de la phyag bya ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i sku/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /dkon mchog

gsum gyi rtsa ba ste/ /bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas bskor ba bya/ de nas mchod pa bya ste/ mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che/ /sems can thams cad dga' bar byed/ /mchod pa chen po zhe sdang che/ /nyon mongs kun gyi dgra che ba/ /mchod pa chen po gti mug che/ /gti mug

blo ste gti mug sel/ /mchod pa chen po khro ba che/ /khro ba chen po dgra che ba/ /mchod pa chen po chags pa che/ /chags pa thams cad sel bar byed/ /'dod pa chen po bde ba che/ /dga' ba chen po mgu ba che/ /oM badzra puSh+pe hU~M/ oM badzra d+hU pe hU~M oM badzra A lo ke hUM/ oM badzra gan+d+he hUM/ oM badzra nai bi bye hUM/ oM badzra shap+da hU~M/ de nas

sdig pa bshags/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul/ mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba gdab/ de nas dge ba'i rtsa bar bsngo'o/ /de nas yi dam gyi maN+Dal dbul te/ maN+Dal tshad dang ldan pa la/ dri'i 'de gu byug par bya/ oM badzra re khe hUM/ oM bud+ha many+dzu shrI na maH/ oM badzra satwa hUM na maH/

oM badzra rat+na hUM na maH/ oM badzra pad+ma hUM na maH/ oM badzra karma hUM na maH/ paM pad+ma maN+Dal/ ma sUr+ya maN+Dal/ de la ye shes sems dpa' dgug gzhug bya/ de nas phyag bya ste/ chos sku longs sgu sprul sku nyid/ /gzha' tshon nam mkha' dbyer med kyang / /rnam snang mi bskyod rin chen 'byung / /snang

mtha' don yod grub pa la/ /lus ngag gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzhon nu'i sku lus 'chang ba po/ /ye shes sgron mas rab brgyan cing / /'jig rten gsum gyi mun sel ba'i/ /'jam dpal dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod pa gong dang mthun pa bshams nas dge ba'i rtsa bar bsngo

ba yan chad gong dang mthun/ de nas ye shes pa gshegs su gsol/ dam tshig pa rang la bsdu/ yi ge brgya pa'i bshags pa bya/ bla ma'i maN+Dal yi dam gyi maN+Dal gyi cho ga 'bro lo tsA bas bsgyur brdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI e ka dza TI b+ha ga wAn maN+Dal tsakra sA d+ha naM

bod skad du/ dpal bcom ldan 'das ral pa gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs/ bcom ldan 'das ral ba gcig pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos sku rang sems bde chen 'od gsal rnam mi rtog /'bar ba'i sku mchog sna tshogs tshul 'chang mkha' 'dra ba/ /longs

spyod rdzogs sprul chos bdag dbyer med ro gcig tshul/ /ral pa gcig 'phyang rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gtso la 'dud/ /lnga phung dang ni dri ma bzhi/ /chen po bzhi dang spyod yul brgyad/ /rnam bzhi tshor ba rnam dag lha/ /ye shes 'khor lo 'dir bshad bya/ /dang po kho nar rnal 'byor

pas bla ma mchog la rim gro yongs su rdzogs par byas te/ de'i bka' drin thob pas dkyil 'khor chen po'i bdag po la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / ma smin pa la sogs pa thams cad la snying rje chen pos go 'phang bla na med par sems bskyed la/ sku gsung thugs ye

shes rol pa'i nang du chud pas dbang bskur ba yang dag par bzung nas/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i de kho na nyid nges par 'byung ba 'di bsgom par bya'o/ /yid dang rjes su mthun lam bsam/ /dur khrod dang ni shing drung sogs/ /yang na bdag po'i tshul 'dra'am/ /dngos grub gnas

ni rgyud las bsngags/ /der bar chad bsal ba'i phyir gtor ma sbyin pa sngon du 'gro bas bka' bsgo zhing lha la sogs pa yang dag par mchod de sgrub pa'i don du gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /gzhan yang ji snyed mchod pa'i yo byad dang / cho ga'i khyad par thams cad la dgos pa'i

rdzas rnams thams cad bsags pa dang / gnas nye bar bkod pas dgyes pa bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa dang ci nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan ma mthong bar phyir mi nur 'bad pa dang / brtson pa drag pos spro bar bya'o/ /de nas sgrub po dam tshig can/ /rab tu bde ba'i stan la

'dug /shel ltar dngas pa'i yid kyis su/ tshogs rten dkyil 'khor dgug par bya/ se gol gtogs pas lag pa gnyis rdo rje'i khu tshur bcings te/ gar bskor nas mdzub mo gnyis lcags kyu ltar byas pas spyan drang ba dang / mdzub mo gnyis dang mthe'u chung

gnyis mdud de 'khor lo ltar bzhag la gzhug par bya'o/ /oM e h+ye hi b+ha ga wAn shrI/ e ka dza TI maN+Dal la tsakra ma hA kA ru Ni ka ho sa ma ya dzaHsa ma s+t+waM/ sa ma ya hUM/ sa ma ya hoHzhes bya ba'i sngags kyis so/ /bdag gi dad dang mgon po yis/ /thugs rje dang ni dam

tshig gis/ /nam mkha' la ni nyi ma ltar/ /dkyil 'khor rgyal po byon par 'gyur/ /ji skad 'chad par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi rten blta bas ma ngoms pa'i rnam par bkod pa rgya chen po mdun gyi nam mkha'i ngos la byon par bltas la bdag nyid kyi snying gar nyi ma

la gnas pa'i hUM mthing nag las 'phros pa'i phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang de kho na nyid kyi mchod pa thams cad kyis rab tu mchod nas gus pa drag pos sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /thog med dus nas de ring bar/ /mi dge gang bgyis so sor bshags/ /'jig rten 'jig rten

'das pa yi/ /dge ba la ni rjes yi rang / /ral pa gcig mchog lha dang sngags/ /de yi sras la bdag skyabs mchi/ /bde chen 'od gsal rnam mi rtog /byang chub mchog sems snying rje gzung / srid pa dus gsum tshogs bsags pa/ /de dag 'gro ba'i don phyir bsngo/ /bdag sogs

mgon med mgon gyur pas/ dngos grub bgyi phyir brtan pa dgongs/ /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi'i lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pos blo gros yongs su sbyongs la/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis de kho na nyid ji lta ba bzhin du yid la bya'o/ /oM swa

b+hA ba shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHswa b+hA ba shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ dngos kun ma lus bsdus pa'i sngags/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba che/ /de yi rang bzhin rang bzhin med/ /nam mkha' lta bur mkhas pas bsgom/ /oM a sarba d+harma pra tI sa mut+pA da hU~M/ /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA A t+ma ko\u0f85haM zhes bya ba brjod do/ /

stong pa nyid chen po'i dang las re las byung ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du hUM yig las dag par skyes pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje 'bar ba chen po bsams la/ de las 'phros pa'i 'od zer gyi lce rab tu rnon po 'khrigs pas rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang / ra ba dang / dra ba dang / gur du grub par

blta'o/ /de dbus a dbyibs nam mkha' dri med la/ /in+d+ra byi ru dung dang gser mdog can/ /ya~M ra~M pa~M la~M gzhu dang me thab dang / /zla rgyas ri dbyibs de steng rnam par shes/ /de dag nyid gnas yongs su gyur pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo gru bzhi pa dang ka ba brgyad

kyis nye bar mdzes pa'o/ /dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa dang twa ra na la sogs pas mdzes par bya'o/ /oM badzra shud+d+haHsarba d+ha rmA badzra shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ de'i dbus su bsgom par bya ba ni cung zad gyen du 'phags pa'i pad+ma'i sdong po kha phye ba'i steng du gnas pa dbang phyug chen po dang / u ma de ba bltas

la/ de'i steng du kA li las grub pa'i nyi ma dang / A li las grub pa'i zla ba kha sbyor gyi nang du hU~M dang ba~M gyi sa bon rab tu 'phro bar bsams te/ de gyur pa las rdo rje gri gug dang thod pa snying po gnyis nyid kyis mtshan par blta zhing / yang 'od zer can gyi mdzad pa yongs su

bsgrub pas/ bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa ral ba gcig pa sku mdog mthing nag g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhabs bskum pa dang brkyangs pas 'jigs byed dang / dus mtshan mnan cing brdzis pa/ zhal gsum dang phyag drug pa/ rnam par mi rtog pa'i ngo bo nyid shin tu dbang du

gyur pa'i/ dbu skra dmar ser ral ba'i thor cog gcig tu 'phyang ba/ rdo rje ral pa gcig ma dang lhan cig mchog tu dga' bas 'khyud pa/ rdo rje dang rin po che dang rus pa dang sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan cing / phyag rgya drug gis nye bar spras pa/ mi mgo mang po'i phreng ba'i do shal

brgyud pa dang / Da ma ru dang / g.yer kha dang / sil khrol gyi rgyan dpyangs pa/ keng rus kyi thod pa dang / lag pa rlon pa dang / u dum+Wa ra'i me tog gi phreng bas dbu spras pa/ glang po che'i pags pa dang / stag gi pags pas g.yogs shing smad dkris pa/ cung zad khros pa'i cha byad

can/ 'jigs par byed pa'i gad mo dgod cing zhal mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa'i bar nas me stag rnam par 'phro ba/ nyid kyi sku las skyes pa'i ye shes kyi me dpung chen po rnam par 'khyil ba'i dbus na gar gyi rol pas nye bar mdzes pa'i bdag nyid do/ /g.yas dkar g.yon dmar

dbus mthing zhal spyan gsum/ /phyag drug gri gug thod pa ral gri dang / /ut+pal 'khor lo tshangs pa'i mgo bo 'dzin/ /ji bzhin zhal phyag yum ni dmar ba'o/ /de nas snyom par 'jug pa'i sbyor ba las lha'i 'khor lo dbyung bar bya ste/ shar la sogs pa'i phyogs kyi 'dab

ma bzhi la lhung ba'i sa bon ni/ a i u e zhes bya ba ste/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i sbubs su chud cing dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu'i kha dog can 'od kyi sbyor bar 'khor lo dang rin po che dang pad+ma dang rdo rje rgya gram snying po de nyid kyis mtshan par gang gyur pa'o/ /de dag yongs su

gyur pa ni rdo rje 'khor lo dang rdo rje rin chen dang rdo rje pad+mo dang / rdo rje sna tshogs rnams su grub par blta'o/ /de dag gi sa bon ni rang gi nye ba'i rgyu'o/ /sku mdog ni sa bon gyi kha dog go/ /byang shar la sogs pa mtshams kyi 'dab ma bzhi la ni sa bon gyi 'od zer las mngon par grub pa'i dri

chen dang dri chu dang / rak+ta dang / byang chub kyi sems yongs su dag pa'i bdag nyid kyi bum pa ka pA las mtshan pa dag blta'o/ /de'i phyi rol du 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la shar nas brtsams pa'i rim gyis phyogs bzhir lhung ba'i sa bon ni/ /A I U i zhes bya ba ste/ snga ma

bzhin du dkar po dang ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu'i kha dog can no/ /nyi ma dang zla ba'i sbubs su chud cing 'od kyi sbyor bas sgron ma dang / rdo rje dang / zhags pa dang / ral gri dang / snying po de nyid kyis mtshan par gang gyur pa'o/ /de dag yongs su gyur pa ni gti mug rdo rje dang

bag chags rdo rje dang / 'dod chags rdo rje dang / zhe sdang rdo rje rnams su grub par blta'o/ /de dag gi phyag mtshan ni rang gi nye ba'i rgyu'o/ /sku mdog ni sa bon gyi kha dog go/ /byang shar la sogs pa mtshams kyi rtsibs bzhir lhung ba'i sa bon ni/ o au aM aHzhes bya ba ste/ nyi

ma dang zla ba'i sbubs su chud cing ser po dang dkar po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu'i kha dog can no/ /'od kyi sbyor bas ri rab dang zla ba dang / nyi ma dang ba dan dang / snying po de nyid kyis mtshan par gang gyur pa'o/ /de dag yongs su gyur pas ni brtan pa'i rdo rje ma dang / sbyor ba'i

rdo rje ma dang / 'bar ba'i rdo rje ma dang / stobs kyi rdo rje ma zhes bya ba'i lha mor mngon par grub par blta'o/ /de dag gi phyag mtshan ni rang gi nye ba'i rgyu'o/ /sku mdog ni sa bon gyi kha dog go/ /dpal ldan lha tshogs 'di dag thams cad kyang / /nyi zla dbugs bral gdan la brjid

pa dang / /g.yon phyag bde chen ros gang thod pa 'dzin/ /rin chen rus pa sprul rgyan mtshungs pa yin/ /de bzhin du khyams shar la sogs pa phyogs bzhir lhung ba'i sa bon ni/ /ka tsa Ta ta zhes pa ste/ dkar po dang / sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po'i kha dog can nyi ma dang zla

ba'i sbubs su chud cing 'od kyi sbyor bas me long dang / pi wang dang dri mchog dang / zhal zas snying po de nyid kyis mtshan par gang gyur ba'o/ /de dag yongs su gyur pa ni gzugs rdo rje ma dang / sgra rdo rje ma dang / dri rdo rje ma dang / ro rdo rje ma'i lha mo rnams mngon par grub

bar blta'o/ /de dag gi phyag mtshan ni rang gi nye ba'i rgyu'o/ /sku mdog ni sa bon gyi kha dog go/ /byang shar la sogs pa'i khyams kyi grar lhung ba'i sa bon ni/ /sa ya sha k+Sha zhes pa ste/ ljang gu dang / dkar po dang / sngon po dang / dmar po'i kha dog can/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i sbubs su chud

cing / /'od kyi sbyor ba ni na bza' dang / chos 'byung dang / maN+Dal dang / mar mes mtshan par gang gyur ba'o/ /de dag yongs su gyur pa ni/ /reg bya rdo rje ma dang / chos rdo rje ma dang / zhing rdo rje ma dang / snang ba rdo rje ma'i lha mo rnams mngon par grub par blta'o/ /de dag gi phyag

mtshan ni rang gi nye ba'i rgyu'o/ /sku mdog ni sa bon gyi kha dog go/ /de nas shar la sogs pa'i sgo bzhir yang de bzhin du blta bar bya ste/ r-i dkar po las byung ba'i lcags kyu yongs su gyur pas ni rdo rje lcags kyu'o/ /r-I ser po las byung ba'i zhags pa yongs su gyur par ni rdo rje

zhags pa'o/ /l-i dmar po las byung ba'i lcags sgrog yongs su gyur pas ni rdo rje lcags sgrog go/ /l-I ljang gu las byung ba'i dril bu yongs su gyur pas ni rdo rje dril bu'o/ /khyams na lha brgyad pad+ma nyi zla'i gdan/ /rin chen rus brgyan skyil krung phyag mtshan gcig /sgo

bzhir gnas ni nyi zla dbugs bral gdan/ /sbrul rgyan stang stabs g.yon phyag ka pA la'o/ /de ltar 'khor lo yongs su rdzogs pa'i khor yug chen po la ni grub pa'i dur khrod brgyad kyis yongs su bskor ba ste/ ji skad du/ gtum drag tshang tshing dkrigs pa dang / /'ur 'ur

'bar bas khyab pa dang / keng rus 'jigs rung shar sogs kyi/ /phyogs su g.yon skor gyis legs gnas/ ha ha dgod pa dbang ldan du/ /byin zar dpal gyi nags tshal lo/ /mun pa mi bzad bden bral du/ /rlung du kI la kI lar sgrogs/ /zhes byung ba bzhin no/ /

de dag re rer yang shing dang phyogs skyong dang klu dang / sprin dang zhing skyong dang / dgra bcom pa dang / grub pa dang mkha' 'gro dang / mchod rten dang / me dang chu chen po la sogs pa brgyad brgyad yod par blta'o/ /de'i 'og tu bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor chen po'i bdag nyid shin tu

mi 'phrogs pa'i bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ros rab tu 'jus pas ha cang dga' bas mi zad pa'i ngo bor mos shing / rim gyis stong pa nyid du thim par gyur te/ bcom ldan ma dang lhan cig tu zhu nas rab tu dang ba'i gzugs can gyi nA da dkar ba dang dmar ba'i rnam par gnas

par bsam mo/ /de'i tshe phyogs kyi 'dab ma bzhir rgyal ba bzhi'i thugs ka las tshad med bzhi'i lha mo sprul pas sems can gyi don du slar ldang bar gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /'jig rten mgon po bcom ldan bzhengs/ /'gro ba nyon mongs yongs su skyobs/ /stong

pa'i ting 'dzin spangs nas su/ /byams chen sku mchog bltams par mdzod/ /thugs rje chen po bcom ldan bzhengs/ /sems can sdug bsngal rab tu sgrol/ /zhi ba'i mtha' la mi gnas par/ brtse chen rnam par 'phrul par mdzod/ /bde chen rgyal po bcom ldan bzhengs/ /

lus can bde don yang dag gzigs/ /zag med dbyings thugs ma gzhom par/ /dgyes chen kun du snang bar mdzod/ /gtso chen rdo rje bcom ldan bzhengs/ /skye bo dub pa mngon dgongs la/ /mtha' gcig rgyun chad mi bzhugs par/ /ma lus 'tshal ba sgrub tu gsol/ /zhes

bya ba'i glus gnyid sad pa dang 'dra bar byas te/ slar sa bon gyi yi ge gnyis dang mtshan ma gnyis las bcom ldan 'das yab dang yum mngon par grub pa'i rim pa sngar ji skad smos pa bzhin du sprul bar bya'o/ /gsang sngags las grub 'khor los sgyur rgyal bzhin/ /khrag

'thung ral pa gcig 'phyang thugs rje yi/ /dbyings las sku bltams mkha' las nyi ma ltar/ /ma lus don grub 'bar ba de rjes bsam/ /de nas gzhal yas khang dang lha rnam par dag pa khong du chud par bya ste/ 'di skad du mi mnyam med pas zur bzhi yin/ /dran dang dbang po'i

sgo bzhi yin/ /bsam gtan bzhi ni rta babs bzhi/ /rnam thar brgyad phyir ka ba brgyad/ /byang chub yan lag bdun dag phyir/ /dra ba dang ni dra ba phyed/ /phyogs bzhi tshad med bzhi yin te/ /pad+ma 'khor lo shes rab thabs/ /rnam par shes brgyad yongs dag pa/ /

de ni dur khrod chen po brgyad/ /ces bya ba lta bu dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa gang yin pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa yang / re zhig zla ba ni me long lta bu'i rang bzhin no/ /nyi ma ni mnyam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no/ /sa bon dang mtshan ma ni so sor kun du rtogs pa'i rang bzhin no/ /

yongs su gyur pa ni bya ba grub pa'i rang bzhin no/ /gzugs brnyan nye bar rdzogs pa ni/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin no/ /rnam par shes pa'i phung po rnam par dag pa ni dpal rdo rje ral pa gcig pa'o/ /gzugs kyi phung po rnam par dag pa ni rdo rje 'khor lo'o/ /

tshor ba'i phung po rnam par dag pa ni rdo rje rin chen no/ /'du shes kyi phung po rnam par dag pa ni rdo rje pad+ma'o/ /'du byed kyi phung po rnam par dag pa ni rdo rje sna tshogs so/ /gti mug rnam par dag pa ni gti mug rdo rje'o/ /bag la nyal rnam par dag pa ni bag chags rdo rje'o/ /'dod chags

rnam par dag pa ni 'dod chags rdo rje'o/ /zhe sdang rnam par dag pa ni zhe sdang rdo rje'o/ /sa'i khams rnam par dag pa ni brtan pa'i rdo rje ma'o/ /chu'i khams rnam par dag pa ni sbyor ba'i rdo rje ma'o/ /me'i khams rnam par dag pa ni 'bar ba'i rdo rje ma'o/ /rlung gi khams rnam par dag

pa ni stobs kyi rdo rje ma'o/ /gzugs rnam par dag pa ni gzugs rdo rje'o/ /sgra rnam par dag pa ni sgra rdo rje ma'o/ /dri rnam par dag pa ni rdo rje ma'o/ /ro rnam par dag pa ni ro rdo rje ma'o/ /reg rnam par dag pa ni reg rdo rje ma'o/ /chos rnam par dag pa ni chos rdo rje ma'o/ /zhing rnam

par dag pa ni zhing rdo rje ma'o/ /snang ba rnam par dag pa ni snang ba rdo rje ma'o/ /tshor ba bde ba rnam par dag pa ni rdo rje lcags kyu'o/ /tshor ba sdug bsngal rnam par dag pa ni rdo rje zhags pa'o/ /tshor ba btang snyoms rnam par dag pa ni rdo rje lcags sgrog go/ /de dag gi bag

chags rnam par dag pa ni rdo rje dril bu'o/ /'od gsal bde chen mi rtog rtag chad rnam par dag /pad+mo thod pa dbugs bral dbang phyug u ma'i gdan/ /dus gsum mthar phyin skyob drug thabs dang shes dag phyir/ /zhal gsum phyag drug phyag rgya drug zhabs brgyad bskum nyid/ /de bzhin

du rdo rje 'khor lo la sogs nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i dkyil 'khor pa thams cad kyi gdan dang phyag mtshan la sogs pa rnam par dag pa yang ci rigs su rig par bya'o/ /gang yang dkyil 'khor ba la rgyas gdab pa'i phyag rgya lnga'am drug kyang rnam par rig par bya ste/ re zhig bla ma dang lhag pa'i

lha la phyag 'tshal ba'i don du spyi gtsug tu 'khor lo ste/ de ni mi bskyod pa'i bdag nyid rnam par dag pa'o/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' bsgo ba nyan pa'i phyir rna ba la rna cha ste/ de'i 'od dpag med kyi bdag nyid rnam par dag pa'o/ /gsang sngags zab mo bzlas pa'i phyir mgul ba la mgul

do ste/ de ni rin chen 'byung ba'i bdag nyid rnam par dag pa'o/ /srog chags thams cad la 'tshe ba spangs pa'i phyir lag pa la lag gdub ste/ de ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi bdag nyid rnam par dag pa'o/ /phyag rgya nye bar bkod pa bstan pa'i phyir rked pa la ske rags te/ de ni don yod

grub pa'i bdag nyid rnam par dag pa'o/ /rang gi shes rab dang lhan cig pa'i phyir tshom bu ste/ de ni ral ba gcig pa'i bdag nyid rnam par dag pa'o/ /de nas gzhal yas khang gi cha nyi shu rtsa bzhi shar gyi 'dab ma nas brtsams te byang gi sgo'i bar yul nyi shu rtsa bzhir rnam par dag pa sbyar

bar shes par bya zhing rang gi lus kyi cha nyi shu rtsa bzhi yang yul nyi shu rtsa bzhir rnam par dag pa lha dang sbyar ba yang rtogs par bya ste/ dang po kho nar de kho na nyid kyi gnas snying gi dbus su dpal rdo rje ral gcig pa'o zhes pa 'di ni khyad par ro/ /pul+lI ra mA la ya mgo la rdo rje

'khor lo zhes pa nas/ dzA lan+d+ha ra spyi gtsug dang / /au T+yan rna ba g.yas/ /urbu dA ste glad pa'i rgyab/ /go dA wa ri rna ba g.yon/ /ra me shwa ra smin ma'i dbus/ /de bI ko Ta mig gnyis dang / ma la wa ni phrag pa gnyis/ /kA ma ru pa ni mchan khung gnyis/ /o tre nu ma gnyis

yin no/ /tri sha ku ne lte ba dang / /ko sa la ni sna yi rtse/ /ka liM ga ni kha nyid de/ /lam+pA ka ni mgul pa'o/ /kAny+tsi snying gi rtse mo dang / /hi ma la ya lgang pa gnyis/ /bre ta pu ri mtshan ma dang / /gr-i ha de ba gsang ba'i gnas/ /sau rASh+Ta ni brla gnyis te/ /su bar+Na dI pa byin

pa gnyis/ /na ga ra ni sor mo rnams/ /sin+d+hu rkang pa'i rgyab tu'o/ /ma ru mthe bo rnam gnyis te/ /ku lu tA ni pus mo gnyis/ /rdo rje dril bu zhes bya ba'i bar du grangs ji lta ba bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o/ /de rjes yab dang yum rim rdo rje sngon po dang / /pad+ma dmar po'i rgyas gdab go cha drug

drug bcing / /dud mdog ha hi hu he ho haM zhes dang / /khrag mdog a i u e o dang aM nyid do/ /de la snying gar ni ha'o/ /mgo bo la ni hi'o/ /spyi gtsug tu hu'o/ /phrag pa gnyis ni he'o/ /mig gnyis la ni ho'o/ /yan lag thams cad la ni haM ngo / /de bzhin du lte bar ni a'o/ /

snying gar ni i'o/ /khar ni u'o/ /mgo la ni e'o/ /spyi gtsug tu o'o/ /yan lag thams cad la ni aM ngo / /de'i 'og tu dam tshig pa'i 'khor lo yongs su rdzogs pa nyid brtul zhugs dang / cho ga de kho na nyid kyis byin gyi rlabs bcug pas nges par brten par bya ba'i don du/

ye shes pa'i 'khor lo dri ma med pa de spyan drangs te/ yang dag par gzhug par bya'o/ /mdzub mo mdud byas gung mo rtse sprad cing / /mthe bong rdo rje brtan por rab tu sbyar/ /sor mo gzhan gdengs dpral ba'i dbus gzhag la/ /bskor zhing bskor bas yongs su bsgyur bar bya/ /g.yon

brkyang g.yas mnan gyen du blta/ mig sgyur pheM gyi sgra sgrogs pas/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma tshogs dgug /ces bya ba 'di lta bus nyid kyi gnas nas dam tshig rjes su dran pas mdun gyi nam mkha'i ngos 'dir mngon par

byon par gyur to/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka ta sa ma ya shri ye hUM/ thog mar sku khrus gsol ba'o/ /oM pA d+yaM pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ zhal bsil dbul ba'o/ /oM any+tsa mA naM pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ zhabs bsil ba'o/ /oM pad+ma sUR+Ya tsaN+Da maN+Dal ma ye swA hA/ gdan dbul lo/ /de nas

thog mar lus thams cad nye bar 'dud pas phyag byas te/ gang zhig sna tshogs ro gcig dbang po'i gzhu 'dra ba/ /nyon mongs rdul bral bde chen 'od gsal spros bral zhing / /ye shes rgyun 'bab rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor cher 'byung la/ /gus pa'i khur gyis mgrin pa smad nas bdag phyag

'tshal/ /de nas mchod pa byin gyis brlabs nas dbul bar bya ste/ oM badzra puSh+pe AHhUM/ oM badzra d+hU pe AHhUM/ oM badzra dI pe AHhUM/ oM badzra gan+d+he AHhU~M/ oM badzra nai bi d+ye aHhU~M/ lan gsum gsum gyis so/ /kha dog sna tshogs dri zhim dbyibs mdzes me tog dang / /bdug spos

a ka ru dang sbrul gyi snying po dang / /snod mdzes rin chen sgron me snang ba drir bcas dang / /chu gtsang dri mchog snying po sbyor ba dpag med dang / /mdog bzang ro brgya ldan pa'i zhal zas mang po rnams/ /gus bcas yid 'ong lha mchog tshogs la 'bul lags kyis/ /sems can

ma lus srid pa'i gdung ba zhi ba dang / zag med bde chen ye shes bdud rtsis myos par mdzod/ /oM na mo b+ha ga wAn e ka dza TI sarba maN+Dal tsakra de ba tA puSh+pe pu dza me g+ha sa mu dra spa ra Na sa ma ye hUM zhes pa nas/ nai bi d+ye pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spa ra Na sa ma ye hU~M zhes bya ba'i bar du sbyar bas

dbul bar bya'o/ /pi wang gling bu rdza rnga rnga zlum bzhad ma dang / /sgeg mo glu ma gar ma gzugs mdzes ro dang reg /maN+Dal chos ma rgyan sogs de bzhin bkod pa ni/ /zab cing rgya che rgya mtsho sprin 'phro gzhan yang mchod/ /oM AHbadzra bi ni hU~M/ oM AHbadzra baM se hU~M / oM AHbadzra

mu rdzi hU~M / oM AHmr-i taM ge hU~M/ oM AHbadzra hA s+ye hU~M/ oM AHbadzra gI ti hU~M/ oM AHbadzra nr-i rti hU~M/ oM AHbadzra A daR+she hU~M/ oM AHbadzra ra se hU~M/ oM AHbadzra spaR+she hU~X/ oM AHbadzra maN+Dal le hU~M/ oM AHbadzra d+harme hU~M/ oM AH badzra sarba a laM kA re hU~M/ oM AHbadzra sarba pU dzA r+tha me g+ha sa mu

dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ya hU~M/ 'di dag ni phyi'i yo byad kyi mchod pa'i rim pa'o/ /de nas rgun 'brum mam bu ram shing la sogs pa las btung ba bzang po sbyar te/ mtshan ma bzang po'i ka pA la gang bar byas nas sgron ma dang / bdud rtsi'i ro dang lhan cig tu gyur pa mdun du gzhag ste snod sbyangs

la/ /oM aHbadzra ma hA sa ma ya ho zhes bya bas dam tshig dran par bya'o/ /man ngag ji bzhin pas lag pa rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs te/ g.yas kyi mthe bong dang / mdzub mo dang / gung mo dang / srin lag dang / mthe'u chung dang / lag mthil rnams la

go rims ltar/ ha hi hu he ho haM/ zhes bya ba'i yig 'bru gnas la dkar ba dang / sngo ba dang / ser ba dang / dmar ba dang / ljang ba dang / mthing ga'i mdog can yab kyi thugs ka'i hUM las 'phros pa'i 'od zer rig pa las yongs su gyur pa'i gzugs kun du 'od dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa dang / nor

gyi dbyig dang / 'od zer can dang las kyi bde dang / 'jigs byed rgyal po rnams/ g.yon zla ba'i gdan la rnam par gnon cing / g.yas skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis mngon par dgyes pa rang gi sa bon gyi kha dog can/ 'khor lo la sogs pa sangs rgyas lnga'i mtshan ma dang / gri

gug gis g.yas kyi phyag mtshan pa dang / thams cad kyang g.yon na khrag gi bdud rtsis rab tu gang ba'i thod pa can no/ /de bzhin du g.yon gyi mthe bo la sogs par yang grangs ji lta bas/ a i u e o aM zhes bya ba'i yig 'bru gnas ba la dkar ba dang / sngo ba dang / ser ba dang / rab tu

dmar ba dang / ljang gu dang / sin+d+hu ra'i mdog can/ yum gyi thugs ka'i baM las 'phros pa'i 'od zer reg pa las yongs su gyur pa'i gzugs rab gsal ma dang / rab brtan ma dang / rgyan can ma dang / 'od 'chang ma dang / tshogs can ma dang / skrag mdzad ma rnams g.yas nyi ma'i gdan

la gnon cing g.yon gyi skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis yongs su dgyes ma/ rang gi sa bon gyi kha dog can 'khor lo la sogs pa sangs rgyas lnga'i mtshan ma dang / /ka pA la g.yas kyi phyag mtshan pa/ thams cad kyang g.yon na khrag gi bdud rtsis rab tu gang ba'i thod pa can no/ /de

nas go cha de dag la ye shes kyi lha yang dag par bkug ste/ dam tshig la bcug nas yid las byung ba'i mchod pas mchod cing thal mo mnyam par sbyar bas phan tshun rjes su zhugs pa dang / de bsdams pas phan tshun yongs su thim par blta'o/ /gang thim par gyur pa de yang hU~M a zhes

gsung mthon pos bos bas stong pa nyid dang thig ler mi gnas par yi ge gnyis kyi gzugs su mngon par blta bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas g.yas kyi srin lag gis dam tshig la reg cing chos 'byung bsnol ba bri bar bya ste/ zur drug la go cha'i yi ge drug brjod pas yi ge de dag gis mtshan par bya

ba dang / de'ang g.yas kyi mthil gyis bon hU~M/ las mngon par skyes pa'i rgyun bdud rtsir 'dzag pa nas 'byung ba'o/ /de bzhin du g.yon pa'i srin lag gis dam tshig can la reg cing chos 'byung bsnol ba sngar gyi rjes su bris pas 'og tu gsal bar bya ste/ zur drug la go cha ma'i yi ge drug brjod

pas yi ge de dag gis mtshan par bya ba dang / de'ang g.yon gyi mthil gyi sngar gyi sa bon a las mngon par skyes pa'i rgyun bdud rtsi 'dzag pa nas 'byung ba'o/ /mthar g.yas dang g.yon gyis yab dang yum gyi cho ga'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su reg pas ho dang baM lhan cig gnas

pa yang bltas la/ se gol gtogs te ha cang mi ring ba'i steng gi mkhar 'phags par bzhugs so/ /de rjes g.yas g.yon snying gar zla ba nyi ma dang / chu skyes dbus nas sku gsung thugs bltas ming brjod pas/ /dkar bsil dmar tsha rab tu sngo 'jam 'od reg phyir/ /dri med rab bzhu

lha tshogs sbyor bas bdud rtsi dbab/ /de ltar 'od kyis bskul ba na dbus kyi yi ge las gyen du 'greng ba'i zer gyi cho ga dang bcas pa'i bcom ldan 'das yab yum spyan drangs nas nam mkha'i yi ge la bstims te/de ma thag tu lha bcu bzhi'i bdag nyid du gyur nas snyoms par

zhugs pa dang / thams cad kyi sbyor mtshams nas thig le bdud rtsi rgyun ltung bas dam tshig bzhu ba'i khu ba bsil zhing rnam par dkar pa gya nom par bya'o/ /rim gyis bde ba chen po'i ro ma bzod pa'i phyir go cha bcu bzhi 'od kyi rnam par zhu ba bdag po la thim pa dang / de yang

mi 'phrogs pa'i dga' bas rnam par myos pa'i phyir sa bon gyi ngo mtshar zhu bar bsam mo/ /de nas baM ho brjod pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ro can rnam pa thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i yon tan byed par blta'o/ /de bzhin du yi ge de yang rtsa ba'i yi ge la thim zhing de yang
