yang / /rang nyid ji lta'i bskyed bstim bya/ /bdag dang de rnams thugs ka nas/ /'od zer dmar po lcags kyu'i dbyibs/ /me ltar tshal gdung 'phros pas/ /gang dmigs la sogs skye 'gro yi/ /pho yi snying dang mo yi ni/ /gsang

ba'i gnas nas bzung nas ni/ /rang dbang med par mdun du bkug /'od zer 'phros bas phog pa yis/ /de rnams 'od du zhu nas ni/ /byang sems dkar dmar rnam par gyur/ /ril bu la sogs rdzas rnams dang / /rang gi gsang bar bsdus la bstim/ /

thugs ka'i hrIHla 'dus par bsam/ /byams dang snying rje drag tu bsgom/ /rlung bzung sngags bzlas gang goms bya/ /thun rjes thogs rim thun mtshams su/ /bsngo ba smon lam spyod lam bya/ /thun bzhi thun drug la sogs spyad/ /tshogs dang gtor mas

thun mtshams mchod/ /bstod pas bstod cing bkra shis brjod/ /yig brgya la sogs bshags pa bya/ /rtags dang cho 'phrul mkha' 'gro'i ltas/ /dngos grub mtshan ma la sogs pa/ /bzang ngan bye brag ji ltar yang / /rmi lam bzang dang ngan la

sogs/ /gang la'ang dga' dang mi dga' yi/ /mtshan mar 'dzin par mi bya'o/ /de ltar zhag bdun nyer gcig dang / /zla gsum zla drug la sogs par/ /mchog dang thun mong dngos grub bsgrub/ /de nas sgrub pa tshar rjes su/ /ril bu 'khor lo lus la

bcad/ /sid+d+hU ra yis spyi bor byug /dpral ba mgrin pa snying ga dang / /lte ba gsang gnas dag tu byug /bum pa'i chu yis bkru btung bya/ /thod chang btung la dngos grub blang / /gtor ma la sogs sbyin sreg bya/ /bum chu gang blud dbang du 'gyur/ /sba

lcag bzad zhing glad la bskor/ /'gro ba dbang du 'dus par bsgom/ /sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor zla gam khar/ /dbang gi shing dmar zla gam brtsigs/ /me sbar lha tshogs bskyed par bya/ /ye shes pa bstim mchod bstod dbul/ /sreg rdzas 'dod yon

sna tshogs dang / /ril bu mar dang 'bru sna bsreg /zas nor gos dang rin po che/ /shing thog 'bru sna ji snyed 'bul/ /gsol ba gdab cing mchod bstod bya/ /rjes su ye shes sems dpa' gshegs/ /thal ba chu bo'i gzhung du dor/ /de yis snang ba dbang du 'gyur/ /

rtsa la bkod pa'i sgrub thabs 'di/ /las spyor lta bur bzhed pa yin/ /yang gsang sems la bkod pa ni/ /dben gnas phyi ru mi btsal te/ /lus 'di gzhal yas khang nyid yin/ /lha sku logs su mi btsal te/ /sems nyid skye 'gag med pa de/ /

rigs kyi bdag po bla ma yin/ /ma rtogs nyon mongs gti mug 'di/ /rtogs grol thugs rje chen po yin/ /yid byed rtog tshogs 'phro ba de/ /rtogs pas sangs rgyas stong rtsa yin/ /zhe sdang gdug rtsub ldan pa de/ /gzhi med rtogs pas rta mgrin yin/ /

'dod sems gdung ba tur tur de/ /rtsa bral rtogs pas gsang ye yin/ /nyon mongs nga rgyal rtog tshogs rnams/ /ngar 'dzin bral bas dpa' bo yin/ /phrag dog rlung ltar 'tshub pa de/ /re dogs zad pas dpa' mo yin/ /chu khams khrag dang

rnam shes dag /rdo rje rigs kyi mkha' 'gro ma/ /sa khams sha dang tshor ba de/ /rin chen mkha' 'gro zhes su grags/ /me khams drod dang 'du shes de/ /pad+ma rigs kyi mkha' 'gro yin/ /rlung khams dbugs dang 'du byed de/ /las kyi mkha'

'gro zhes su grags/ /nam mkha'i khams dang sems nyid gzugs/ /mkha' 'gro pad+ma'i dra ba'o/ /skye mched tshogs drug de yi yul/ /'dod yon mchod pa'i lha mo yin/ /dge dang mi dge'i rtogs tshogs rnams/ /dam can bka' sdod

srung mar bshad/ /de ltar sems kyi ngo bo de/ /ma rtogs 'khrul bas 'khor ba ste/ /de shes rtogs pas mya ngan 'das/ /lha sku sems kyi rang rtsal de/ /dngos por bzung bas 'khrul pa ste/ /lha yang sems nyid chos skur gsal/ /sngags

ni smra brjod bral ba'i phyir/ /phyi nang rlung gi rgyu ba yang / /smras tshad grag stong brjod med yin/ /gdod nas dag pa'i rig pa 'di/ /ye nas chos skur gnas pa la/ /ngo sprad de ngo shes pa yin/ /chos dbyings ye shes rtogs pa la/ /sangs rgyas zhes

su grags pa'o/ /goms 'dris brtan na drod rtags 'char/ /de sbyangs chos sku'i ngo bo la/ /gzung bar bya ba'i yul tsam med/ /drod rtags tshad dang nyams myong la/ /ma chags rang byung rtsad nas dag /rang don chos sku mngon gyur te/ /gzhan don gzugs sku lhun grub

'byung / /'khor ba mya ngan 'das par 'gyur/ /snyan brgyud dri ma med pa'o/ /ma gcig grub pa'i rgyal mo nas brgyud pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ /a ba ra mi ta A yudz+nyA na maN+Dal bid+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ tshe

dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rang bzhin tshe dpag med pa'i sku/ /ye shes lnga ldan gsung gi bdag /thugs rje'i thugs kyis rjes 'dzin pa'i/ /bla ma tshe dpag med la 'dud/ /

rtsa rgyud bshad rgyud las byung ba'i/ /cho ga bzang pos yongs bzung bshad/ /slob dpon mtshan nyid kun ldan zhing / /gzhan phan sgrub pa'i blo gros can/ /rang dang gzhan gyi don sgrub phyir/ yid 'ong nyams dga'i gnas nyid du/ /lha yi rnal 'byor gsal ba dang / /gtso

bo 'bum la 'khor rnams khri/ /rab 'bring mtshan ma thob pa dang / /slob mas me tog dang bcas pas/ /gus pas gsol ba gdab par bya/ /de nas dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir/ /sa gzhi brtags shing bzung dang sbyang / /nyes pa med pa'i sa phyogs der/ /

bskyed pa'i rim pa gsal byas nas/ /baM las bskyed pa'i lha mo ser/ /mdzes pa'i rgyan ldan lus phyed snang / /bum pa 'dzin la mchod cing bstod/ /skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /spyod ba'i tshul dang khyad par gyi/ /sa dang pha rol phyin pa la/ /lha

mo khyod ni dbang du 'gyur/ /skyob pa shAkya seng ge yis/ /ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom ltar/ /de bzhin bdag gis bdud sde las/ /rgyal bar byas te dkyil 'khor bri/ /lag pa sa la bsnun pa yis/ /dga' ba'i mdangs ldan lha mo yis/ /khyod ni slob

dpon mchog yin gyis/ /dkyil 'khor las ni rab tu bsgrubs/ /brjod nas sa la thim pa ltar/ /phyogs skyong gtor ma 'bul ba dang / /mthun pa'i grogs dang gsol ba gdab/ /ro bsal nyes pa spangs pa de/ /'thas par bcag cing rnam lnga dang / /bdud rtsi lnga

ni khyab par byug /me yis zhi ba'i las kun gyi/ /sbyin sreg sbyangs dang sngags kyis ni/ /phyin brlabs lha yi khang par bsam/ /bskyed pa'i yan lag kun rdzogs pas/ /slob dpon dkyil 'khor steng 'dug la/ /slob ma gus pas spos thogs te/ /mchod

cing bstod dang gsol ba gdab/ /bcom ldan mgon po tshe dpag med/ /skyon gyis ma gos li khri ltar/ /mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sku mnga' ba/ /mnyam nyid sku la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /dkyil 'khor lha tshogs thams cad ni/ /yon tan ma lus bskyed

mdzad cing / /yid bzhin nor bu mtshungs ldan pa'i/ /'gro ba skyob la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /tshe dpag med pa gsung gi bdag /'chi bdag ma lus 'joms mdzad pa'i/ /tshe yi dngos grub stsol ba'i sku/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /

de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ /dkyil 'khor bsdus te rta mchog sku/ /khro zhing rab brjid nga rgyal dang / /rkang pa hUM las rdo rjer byas/ /mig gnyis nyi zla 'bar ba ste/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yis/ /'jigs med byang shar mtshams song nas/ /dkyil 'khor

sa gzhi la gnas pa'i/ /lha dang lha min bgegs tshogs nyon/ /nga ni dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin/ /nga yi bka' las ma 'da' bar/ /bgegs kyi tshogs rnams 'gro bar gyis/ /gal te mi 'gro 'dug gyur na/ /ye shes rdo rje 'bar ba yis/ /mgo bo tshar pa brgyar 'gas shing / /

lus rnams stong du gyur nas ni/ /rnam par 'joms par gdon mi za/ /de bas khyed rnams gzhan du dengs/ /rta mchog sngags dang rdo rje 'gros/ /dkyil 'khor lan gsum bskor bar bya/ /de nas khro bo'i phur pa rnams/ /kI la ya zhes btab nas kyang / /

A ko Ta yis brdung bar bya/ /me da'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlab/ /sa yi lha dang lha tshogs rnams/ /sta gon gnas par bya ba ni/ /lha rnams rdzogs par bskyed pa dang / /mchod cing bstod de spos thogs la/ /bcom ldan mgon po tshe dpag med/ /dkyil 'khor

lha tshogs thams cad dang / /rig pa'i lha mo rdzu 'phrul can/ /byang chub sems dpa' la sogs kun/ /thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /khyed rnams la yang mchod pa dang / /slob ma rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /rdo rje can bdag che ge zhes/ /dkyil

'khor dam pa bzhengs su gsol/ /rjes su brtse bar nyer dgongs nas/ /song nub dgyes par 'byon par 'tshal/ /de nas phyi nang mchod pas mchod/ /dkyil 'khor lhag par gnas pa'o/ /rin chen rgyu las byung ba yis/ /lto che mgrin pa ring ba dang / /mchu 'phyangs nag nog

ra ri med/ /lha grangs mnyam pa las bum dang / /rang rang phyag mtshan rdzogs par bya/ /ha sa de ba gser dngul dang / /mu tig mu men byi ru gzhug /nas til gro sran mung+ga dang / /ga pur dzA ti gur gum mchog /tsan+dan gnyis dang a ga ru/ /mar dang bu ram sbrang rtsi dang / /lan

tshwa rnams kyis lto ba dgang / /kha tshar ma nyams ras zung gis/ /mgrin par rab tu brgyan pa dang / /kha rgyan ku sha 'bras bu can/ /sna tshogs pad+ma ras kyi steng / /yang na ku sha'i gdan la bzhugs/ /b+h+rUM las bskyed pa'i gzhal yas khang / /chu skyes nyi zla'i gdan stengs

su/ /lha rnams rdzogs par bskyed pa dang / /sngags bzlas ye shes bdud rtsi'i rgyun/ /bum pa gang bar bsam pa dang / /lha rnams rang rang bstod pa bya/ /las bum rta mgrin bskyed pa dang / /sngags bzlas par chad bsrung ba dang / /sha lnga bdud rtsi'i gtor mas

mchod/ /'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab/ /slob ma lhag par gnas pa yang / /snyim pa me tog dang bcas pa/ /skye rgas 'chi ba na kra yi/ /chu srin la sogs 'jigs rung ba/ /srid pa'i mtsho las bdag sgrol mdzod/ /dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa po/ /slob dpon khyod

ni dgongs su gsol/ /byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa'i/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig de ni bdag la stsol/ /byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /skyabs gsum de ni bdag la stsol/ /thar pa chen po'i

grong mchog tu/ /mgon po bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal/ /'od kyis bur byas sdig pa sbyangs/ /bu tshur theg pa chen po pa/ /khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te/ /gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga ni/ /khyod la yang dag bstan par bya/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /sangs rgyas

dus gsum 'byung ba rnams/ /rdo rje gsang sngags rab bsgoms pas/ /ye shes mnyam med yang dag brnyes/ /skyob pa shAkya seng ge yis/ /drag po chen po bdud kyi sde/ /dpung chen dag kyang de yis bcom/ /de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir/ /bu yis blo gros

'di gyis shig /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ /sdig pa bshags pa la sogs kun/ /sngon du 'gro ba'i cho ga bya/ /tshe dpag med pa bdag la dgongs/ /ma lus bzhugs pa'i bde gshegs rnams/ /'di nyid nas bzung sangs rgyas par/ /bla med bdag la gzigs par mdzod/ /dam

tshig sdom pa bzung ba ni/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa ni/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bya/ /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang / /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bya/ /slob dpon

dag kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la/ /nyin re bzhin du lan drug tu/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/ /byang chub chen po las byung ba'i/ /pad+ma'i rigs chen dag pa la/ /phyi dang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum/ /

dam pa'i chos kyang gzung bar bya/ /las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /mchod pa'i las kyang mi nus bgyi/ /tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang / /dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang / /sems can don byed tshul khrims

gsum/ /bdag gis brtan por gzung bar bgyi/ /gnyis su med pa'i tshangs spyod dang / /rang gi dam tshig bsrung par bgyi/ /bdag gi dge ba'i las kyis ni/ /sangs rgyas myur du bsgrub bya ste/ /sems can 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las/ /bla med gnas su bsgral bar bgyi/ /gus pas lan gsum brjod

par bya/ /dpral ba mgrin pa snying ga ru/ /dri yi thig le gsum byas te/ /rta bdun chu skyes 'khor lo'i ster/ /thugs gsung sku yi snying pos brgyan/ /rigs kyi lha las 'od 'phros pas/ /ye shes gnyis su med par bstim/ /chu gnyis sngon du 'gro bas mchod/ /deng nas bzung nas bu khyod kyis/ /

'khor ba'i nyes pas ma gos par/ /mchod pa kun dang ldan par ni/ /bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig /a shwad+tha dad pa la sha /u du m+WA ra la sogs pa/ /bcu gnyis sor gyi tshad tsam la/ /rtse mor me tog gis brgyan nas/ /maN+Dal 'dab brgyad rnam lngas byug /shar nas dbus su dor ba ni/ /pad+ma'i

phyag rgya dang bcas pa/ /steng du mchog gi dngos grub yin/ /phyogs su phrin las grub pa dang / /thur bltas sa 'og 'grub pa yin/ /mtshams su 'jig rten dngos grub po/ /de nas skyor chu sbyin pa ni/ /oM hrIH bi shud+d+hA s+sarba d+harmAHsarba pA pA ni tsA s+ya bi sho ng+ha ya sarba bi kal pAn a pa na ya hUM/ zhes pas sgo

gsum dag sbyangs nas/ /skud pa dmar po sum sgril la/ /rta mgrin sngags kyis bcing bar bya/ /ku sha gtsang ma sngas dang stan/ /ma nor seng ge'i nyal stangs bzhin/ /thub pas ting 'dzin 'grub pa ltar/ /mtshan ma gang byung brjod par bya/ /bzang na dngos grub spro ba bskyed/ /ngan na sbyin sreg

gis ni bzlog /zab cing rgya che'i chos bshad ni/ /'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen dag /u du m+WA ra'i me tog bzhin/ /brgya lam na ni re 'ga' zhig /'byung ngam yang na mi 'byung srid/ /gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul 'byung ba/ /de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste/ /bla ma rdo rje can mchod la/ /nang par

langs te dkyil 'khor lha/ /nam mkhar bteg ste thig gdab ste/ /bu mo gtsang ma sdom ldan gyis/ /ras bal las byung bkal ba dang / /ye shes lnga'am sku gsung thugs/ /oM a n+yo n+ya a nu ga ta sarba d+ha rmA/ /brjod nas bsgril bar bya ba ni/ /pad+ma'i snod du bzhag nas kyang / /mi 'chi lnga yis spangs

byas la/ /blo ldan ye shes bstim byas nas/ /nam mkhar ye shes dza dzas gdab/ /sgo yi bcu gnyis cha dang ldan/ /srid kyang khang pa nyis 'gyur la/ /tshangs pa'i las thig drangs pa la/ /oM badzra sU tra sa ma ye ma ti kra ma hUM/ tshangs dang zur thig la sogs pa/ /bstan bcos mthong zhing blo ldan

des/ /cha ni gang yin rnam par dbye/ /gal te nyes pa'i 'bras bu ni/ /chad na bla ma'i srog g.yo zhing / /dman lhag nad kyis btab par 'gyur/ /phyogs 'khrul slob ma rmongs par 'gyur/ /blo ldan nyes pa med par bya/ /gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs bcas/ /dra ba dra ba phyed pas brgyan/ /nyi zla dril bu

g.yer khas spras/ /pho brang chu skyes rim pa gnyis/ /mu khyud pad+ma'i phreng ba dang / /khyams dang phyi rol pa dar dang / /rdo rje me ri la sogs pa/ /rnam pa ma lus rdzogs par bya/ /rin chen lnga dang 'bru phye'am/ /pad+ma'i snod du so sor bzhag/ /sa bon bris la ye shes bstim/ /sku gsung thugs

kyis byin gyis brlab/ /sngon po ser po dkar po ljang / /dmar po 'di ni nang du 'dod/ /g.yas skor rgyun ma chad par bri/ /dbang ldan mtshams su drang ba bya/ /pad+ma'i snod kyis steng nas bkab/ /'di ni chos dbyings dag pa ste/ /sems can khams ni rab sgrol byed/ /bcom ldan

mgon po tshe dpag med/ /tshon gyi las ni yang dag brtsam/ /me tog dor la mtshan ma brtag /shar sngo lho ser nub dkar po/ /byang phyogs in+d+ra nI la'i mdog /pad+ma lha snam dmar po'o/ /de ltar rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ /khrus byas dri zhim lus byugs nas/ /gos bzang brgyan la

lan gsum bskor/ /tshe dpag med pa'i nga rgyal gyis/ /shar gyi sgo nas nang du zhugs/ /yid kyis sgo bzhi dbye bar bsam/ /oM badzra mung+g+ha Ta/ sa ma ya pra be sha ye hU~M/ /rnam rgyal la sogs bum pa rnams/ /gnas dang go rims bzhin du dgod/ /sna tshogs gos dang rgyan phreng sogs/ /mchod

pa'i rdzas kyis legs par brgyan/ /dkyil 'khor lha rnams rdzogs par bskyed/ /ye shes bstims la mchod bstod bya/ /tshogs kyi 'khor los tshim pa dang / /bar chad zhi phyir shar phyogs su/ /zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya ba dang / /slob ma'i cho ga ji lta bar/ /slob dpon bdag nyid dbang dang

ldan/ /shar gyi phyogs nas 'jug pa dang / /de nas slob ma gzhug pa'i phyir/ /khrus byas bgegs dang sdig pa sbyang / /gdong pa ras kyis bkab nas ni/ /bu khyod su yin ci la dga'/ /bdag ni skal bzang rigs yin no/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku/ /slob dpon la ni skyabs su mchi/ /gtso bo

lha mor bcas pa yi/ /lha rnams la yang phyag 'tshal lo/ /thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon pos bdag ni gzhug tu gsol/ /de nas tshig 'dis gsol ba gdab/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /tshe dpag med pa'i grong khyer mchog /snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di ru ni/ /

bdag gis slob ma gzhug par bya/ /oM A khaM bI ra hU~M/ me tog phreng ba gtad pa dang / /dkyil 'khor lha la phyag 'tshal te/ /oM na ma ste hU~M/ oM na ma mi hU~M/ na mo na maH hU~M swA hA/ shar nas zhugs nas lho nas dbang / /nub nas chos bshad byas nas ni/ phrin las sgrub pa la sogs pa'i/ /don du

gsol ba gdab pa ni/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza u pa thA na ya A t+ma naM/ ni r+yA ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra satwa a ng+hi tiSh+Tha na swa maM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza a b+hi She ka ta A t+ma naM ni r+yA ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra rat+na a b+hiShi ny+tsa mAM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza pra bar ng+ha na ya A t+ma nAM ni r+yA ta yA mi/ sarba

ta thA ga tA badzra d+ha rma naM pra war d+ha ya maM/ sarba ta thA ga tA pU dza karmA naM/ At+ma nAM ni r+yA ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra karma ku ru maM/ /dam tshig sdom pa sbyin pa dang / /rnal 'byor du ni sems bskyed do/ /oM sarba yo ga tsit+ta ud pA da yA mi/ /rdo rje snying gar bzhag /oM su ra te sa ma ya staM/ /sid+d+hi badzra ya thA su khaM/ /

deng khyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / /tshe dpag med kyi dngos grub thob/ /dngos grub gzhan dag lta ci smos/ /dkyil 'khor ma zhugs mi smra'o/ /dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re/ /'di ni dam tshig rdo rje ste/ /gal te khyod kyis smras gyur na/ /dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje yis/ /rang gi mgo

bo 'gas par 'gyur/ /tshe dpag med pa deng khyod kyi/ /snying la de ring yang dag zhugs/ /gal te tshul 'di smras na ni/ /de ma thag tu dral te gshegs/ /'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed/ /dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub rnams/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'dis 'grub

badzra u da ka oM AHhUM/ deng nas brtsams nas bu khyod kyi/ /tshe dpag med pa nga yin gyis/ /khyod kyis ngal brnyas pa na/ /mi bde ma spangs dus byas nas/ /dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re/ /de nas slob ma'i gtso bo yis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ /bdag la byin gyis rlobs mdzod

la/ /tshe dpag med pa dbab par mdzod/ /rkang mthil rlung gi dkyil 'khor dz+haiM/ /snying gar laM las sa'i dkyil 'khor/ /mgrin par baM las chu'i dkyil 'khor/ spyi bor yaM las rlung dang haM/ /de yi spyi bor tshe dpag med/ /yab yum 'od kyi rang bzhin du/ /gar byed sku las ye shes kyi/ /bdud

rtsi babs nas sku la thim/ /zag med bde bas gang bar bsgom/ /oM hrIHb+h+rUM badzra dz+nyA na A yu She A be sha ya A be sha ya a/ s+t+waM b+ha ya/ ra ra ra tsa la ya hUM a haHdz+h+yaiM/ zhes brjod rol mo'i sgra dang ni/ /gu gul zla mtshan thod pa ru/ /dur khrod sol ba'i me yis bsreg /bab gyur zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ /aH

las gsung gi bdud rtsi bsam/ b+h+rUM hrIHbadzra/ dge dang mi dge la sogs pa/ /smros shig rdo rje can gyi rigs/ /tiSh+Tha badzra brtan par bya'o/ /tshe dpag med pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ /rig pa'i me tog 'di dor bas/ /sngon tshe ye shes brnyes pa'i lha/ /gang yin de la 'bab par shog /

pra tIts+tsha badzra ho/ /bye brag dang dngos grub brtag par bya/ /pra ti gr-ih+Na hi maM sa twa ma hA ba la/ /slob ma'i mgo la bcing bar bya/ /tshe dpag med pa deng khyod kyi/ /mig 'byed par ni brtson par mdzad/ /phye bas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med/ /oM badzra ne tra a pa

har ba TalaM hrIH/ /dkyil 'khor bzang po 'di la ltos/ /nga ni dad pas rab tu bskyed/ /khyod ni tshe dpag med du skye/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab/ /'gro don phun tshogs dngos grub kyang / /thams cad khyod la mngon du 'gyur/ /dngos grub thob cing dam tshig srungs/ /

gsang sngags la yang brtson par gyis/ /rim gyis rnam par dag pa bstan/ /de nas slob ma dad ldan des/ /bla ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ /yon mchog dam pa 'bul ba dang / /dbang bskur don du gsol ba gdab/ /bcom ldan mgon po tshe dpag med/ /yab yum gnyis med

bde chen sku/ /'chi med bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun gyis/ /dbang bskur ba ni bdag la stsol/ /lan gsum brjod nas shar phyogs su/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad khri la 'dug /rnam rgyal bum pa la sogs nas/ /chu rnams dung chos bum par bsdus/ /rdo rje'i glu dang rol mo'i sgra/ /rigs lnga rig ma'i lha mo dang /

byang chub sems dpa' bkra shis brjod/ /khro bo rnams kyis bgegs bsrung ngo / /gsang gsum dam tshig las byung ba'i/ /ye shes bdud rtsi'i dri ma med/ /lha yi chu ni dag pa yis/ /mi bskyod rdo rje dbang bskur ro/ /oM badzra a ng+hi tiSh+Tha dz+nyA na a b+hiShiny+tsa hU~M/ gser la sogs pa'i dbu rgyan la/ /rin

'byung bskyed cing ye shes bstim/ /dar dpyangs bcings la tshig 'di brjod/ /thor tshugs cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rab bsngags pa'i/ /rin chen dbu rgyan dam pa dang / /dar dpyangs dbang bskur sbyin par bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta rat+na mu ku Ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ /rin chen la sogs

rdo rje la/ /snang ba mtha' yas bskyed cing bstim/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i dbang / /di ring khyod la bskur bar bya/ /sangs rgyas kun du rab bsgrub phyir/ /rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis zung / /oM badzra a ng+hi pa ti s+t+waM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ dril bu don grub bskyed byas la/ /ye shes bstims la tshig 'di brjod/ /thabs dang

shes rab ldan pa yi/ /'gro don mnyam med byed pa yi/ /mchod pa'i phrin las rdzogs byed pa'i/ /dril bu las kyi dbang bskur ro/ /oM a ng+hi pa ta ye a b+hiShiny+tsa mAM/ /slob ma oM las rnam snang bskyed/ /ye shes spyan drangs gnyis su med/ /rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas/ /byang chub snying po'i bar du ni/ /cis kyang

gzhom par mi nus pa'i/ /rdo rje'i ming du rab tu grags/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hiShe ka ta mAM/ /chu dang cod pan rdo rje dang / /dril bu dang ni ming gi dbang / /rig pa yi ni dbang lnga'o/ /nyon mongs lnga ni rnam dag pas/ /dbang bskur lnga ni thob pa yin/ /ma rig pa las 'das nas kyang / /ye shes lnga ni rim gyis

thob/ /de nas spyi bo mgrin po dang / /snying ga lte ba gsang gnas rnams/ /'khor lo lnga yi gnas nyid du/ /rigs lnga tshe dpag med rnams kyi/ /dbang bskur lha rnams yab yum ste/ /'chi med byang chub sems su gyur/ /rtsa gsum 'khor lo lnga rnams gang / /byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur ro/ /'chi med rdo

rje'i lus su gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i sku ru bsgom/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na 'dug /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang / /rdo rje sems dpa'i brtul zhugs brtan/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi badzra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha e Sha s+t+waM d+ha ra ya mi badzra satwa hi hi hU~M hU~M/ thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje

sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje snyems tshul bdag po'i bdag /dpa' mchog dang po'i skyes bu'o/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ shes rab dbyings kyi rjes 'gror bshad/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang / /byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzhed/ /srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag /ngo bo nyid kyis

dngos bral byas/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /mchog gi srid pa byed par 'gyur/ /mtshan ma med par 'gro ba'i don/ /gang dag bdag gis byed nus pas/ /phyir mi ldog pa dbang bskur che/ /dpa' bo chen po bdag la stsol/ /shar du seng ge'i khri la 'dug /steng du gdugs dkar phub nas kyang / /rnam

rgyal bum pas dbang bskur te/ /dbang bskur rdo rje chen po la/ /khams gsum pa yis phyag byas te/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum gyi/ /gnas las byung ba sbyin par bya/ /oM badzra a b+hi She ka ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ /dril bu glegs bam lag tu gtang / /phrin las thogs pa med pa rnams/ /bu yis

gzhan don bla med byos/ /khyod ni rdo rje slob dpon yin/ /chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ro/ /lha yi snying po lan gsum brjod/ /me tog phreng ba spyi bor bzhag /bcom ldan bdag gis gzung lags kyis/ /bdag la nye bar mdzad du gsol/ /bcom ldan bdag gis sbyin lags kyis/ /'di la 'go

bar mdzad du gsol/ /'jig rten khams ni ma lus par/ /sems can ma lus drang ba'i phyir/ /chags pa med pa'i bsam pa yis/ /ji ltar gdul bya sna tshogs la/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyis/ /de bzhin rigs kyis gang 'dul ba/ /khyod kyi phrin las mchog yin no/ /deng nas bzung nas

bu khyod kyi/ /zhi rgyas dbang dang bsad pa dang / /dgug dang bcing dang bsreg pa dang / /bskrad dang dbye ba la sogs pa/ /phrin las sna tshogs grub par gyis/ /ral gri mig sman sa 'og dang / /mchil lham de bzhin ri lu ste/ /mi snang bcud len mkha' la spyod/ /thun mong dngos grub ma

lus pa/ /de dag khyod kyis grub par bya/ /ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis/ /'jig rten rab rib sel ba ltar/ /bu khyod kyi ni mi shes pa'i/ /rab rib rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal/ /oM badzra ne tra a pa ha ra pa Ta laM hrIH/ chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /dag cing gsal la dri ma med/ /gzung

du med cing brjod du med/ /chos rnams de ltar shes par gyis/ /hoHyis mda' gzhu phyogs bzhir 'phangs/ /mtshan mo gnas khang dben pa ru/ /bzhin bzangs mig yangs lang tshor ldan/ /lus la dri yis byugs byas te/ /rtse dang dgod pa la sogs pas/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis phab ste/ /nor bu

byang chub sems ltung bas/ /nya phyis dung chos la sogs su/ /drir bcas slob ma'i kha ru ni/ /mthe bo srin lag dag gis sbyin/ /a ho su khas de btung ngo / /zag med bde chen lus la rgyas/ /rdo rje de yis nyon mongs 'joms/ /mtshan ldan shes rab rang bzhin te/ /lha mo 'di ni phyag rgya che/ /

mtha' yas bde ba sbyin pa mo/ /rnam pa kun du phyag rgya long / /bu yis bla med mchod par gyis/ /yol bas bar bcad snyoms 'jug gis/ /srub dang bsrub pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /mi rtog ye shes skye bar 'gyur/ /ltos shig ltos shig sems la ltos/ /sems nyid cir yang grub pa med/ /bsal

gzhag dgag sgrub gar yang med/ /'dis ni rang rig ye shes yin/ /bla ma sprul ba'i skur byas te/ /chos gos bzung la lung bstan bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /srid pa'i mtha' ni grub pa'i phyir/ /srid pa'i ngan 'gro nyid las bton/ /'di ni ngas khyod lung bstan yin/ /oM sarba

ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi sa ma ya s+t+wAM b+hur b+hu ba swAH/ /khams gsum pa yi rgyal srid che/ /rgyal ba'i bdag por brtan pa dang / /des ni bdud las rnam rgyal zhing / /grong khyer mchog tu zhugs pa yin/ /deng bdag skye ba 'bras bur bcas/ /bdag gi gson pa'ang 'bras bur bcas/ /di ring sangs rgyas

sras su skyes/ /sangs rgyas sras su nga gyur to/ /rta dang glang po ma he dang / /bu dang chung ma la sogs dbyig /phyag bya bla ma dam pa la/ /ma zhen sems kyis dbul bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor lha tshogs mchod byas te/ /tshogs kyis rnal 'byor tshim byas nas/ /lhag mas 'byung po tshim par bya/ /bkra shis

brjod cing smon lam gdab/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba dang / /rol mo'i sgra dang bcas pa yis/ /rngul tshon chu bo chen por dor/ /dri bzangs kyis ni thig phyis te/ /lhag chad bskang phyir sbyin sreg bya/ /cho ga bzang po yongs bzung 'di/ /rtsa rgyud le'u 'bum pa dang / /bshad rgyud 'od zer dra ba la/ /brten

nas grub pa'i rgyal mos mdzad/ /de yi dge ba gang yod pa/ /rigs drug sems can ma lus pa/ /tshe dpag med pa'i lam zhugs nas/ /de yi 'bras bu myur thob shog/ //bcom ldan 'das mgon po tshe dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bzang po yongs bzung zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //

rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta zla ba bzang po dang / /bod kyi lo tsA ba glan dar ma tshul khrims kyis bsgyur zhing zhus te dag par byas so//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ ha ya grI ba sA ng+ha na/ bod skad du/ rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs/ /pad+ma gsung gi lha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yid 'ong gnas su nyer 'dug nas/ /bde ba'i

stan la gnas pa dang / /byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas/ /zla kham smug nag dkyil 'khor du/ /paM las chu skyes 'dab ma brgyad/ /maM las nyi ma'i gdan stengs su/ /hrIHdmar rgyu yi sa bon las/ /ye shes bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar/ /gdug pa can rnams ma lus bsreg /me dpung 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor

du/ /hrIHlas bskyed pa'i rta mchog ni/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dmar/ /steng zhal rta mgo ljang gu ni/ /drag po rta skad rab tu bzhad/ /khams gsum ma lus dbang du sdud/ /phyag g.yas thod dbyug dkar po bsnams/ /bgegs dang 'byung po ma lus 'joms/ /g.yon pa sdigs mdzub me

ltar 'bar/ /gnod byed ma lus sreg par byed/ /g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang bdud bzhi mnan/ /spyan gsum sdang mig khro gnyer bsdus/ /ljags 'dril mche ba me stag 'phro/ /skra ser dbu rgyan thod skam can/ /khrag 'dzag brgya phyed do shal byas/ /stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can/ /klu chen

brgyad kyis nye bar brgyan/ /'jigs byed gshin rje'i gzugs 'chad ba/ /gang gis mi tshugs rdo rje'i sku/ /thugs kar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du/ /hrIHyig sngags kyis bskor ba las/ /'od 'phros ye shes dgug gzhug bya/ /sangs rgyas rnams

kyis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas sngags kyi bzlas pa ni/ /oM badzra kro d+ha ha ya grI ba hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ /'bum du bzlas nas las rnams 'grub/ /de nas gtor ma dbul ba ni/ /yaM las rlung dang raM las me/ /A las thod pa yangs pa ru/ /sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga yis gang / /

ye shes bdud rtsi gnyis su med/ /oM AH hUM/ i daM ba laM a mr-i ta kha kha khA hi khA hi/ /rtsa sngags btags la lan gsum gyis/ phul nas bstod dang gsol ba gdab/ /hrIH las bskyed pa'i rta mchog sku/ /nyi ma'i 'od mtshungs nyon mongs bsreg /bdud bzhi ma lus

'joms mdzad pa'i/ /dpa' bo rta mgrin phyag 'tshal lo/ /slob ma'i bar chad bsrung ba'i phyir/ /gtor ma byin gyis brlab pa ni/ /oM AHhUM/ sku gsung thugs rnams bstim pa'o/ /lha dang sngags kyi rjes gnang bya/ /slob mas phyag 'tshal yon dbul lo/ /dpa' bo rta mgrin sgrub pa'i thabs/ /'od dpag med

kyis lung bstan pa'i/ /mkha' 'gro grub pa'i rgyal mos brtsams/ /dge bas rta mchog sku thob shog/ //paN+Di ta zla ba bzang po dang glan chung dar ma tshul khrims kyis bsgyur cing zhus te dge'o//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ /a ba ri mi ta A yu r+dz+nyA na sA d+ha na nA ma/ bod skad du/ tshe dang ye shes dpag

tu med pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rigs drug sems can thams cad kyi/ /tshe nyams pa la gso ba'i phyir/ /bcom ldan ye shes tshe dpag med/ /sgrub thabs yang dag bshad par bya/ /dang brtson dbang thob dam tshig

ldan/ /tshe nyams pa rnams gso 'dod pas/ /dben zhing nyams dga'i gnas 'dug nas/ /bsod nams tshogs kyi sngon 'gro ni/ /bla ma dkyil 'khor lha tshogs rnams/ /nam mkhar spyan drangs phyag 'tshal nas/ /mchod cing sdig pa bshags pa dang / /tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par

bya/ /rang gi snying gar hrIHdmar las/ /ye shes me 'bar rnam smin bsregs/ /sngags kyi don la stong nyid bsgom/ /oM swa b+hA wa shud+d+haH sarba d+harmAH swa b+hA wa shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ stong pa'i ngang las sems nyid ni/ /hrIHdmar tsheg drag thig le las/ /dbang chen zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ /spyan gsum khro gnyer

ljags 'dril ba/ /steng zhal rta mgo ljang gul/ /drag pos rta skad rab tu mtsher/ /dbyug pa'i sdigs mdzub me ltar 'bar/ /thugs kar pad+ma rgyas pa yis/ /steng du zla ba nyi ma la/ /hrIHlas 'od zer 'phros pa yis/ /e las chos 'byung yangs pa ru/ /yaM las rlung dang raM las me/ /

baM las chu dang laM las sa/ /suM las ri rab lhun po dang / /de steng b+h+rUM las gzhal yas khang / /gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs brgyan/ /'dod yon pha gu dra phyed mdzes/ /khor yug chu skyes sna tshogs dang / /rdo rje me ri thogs pa med/ /pho brang chu skyes 'phang rim gnyis/ /'dab ma bzhi

dang brgyad pa la/ /mu khyud pad mas mdzes pa dang / /lha snam pan reg lnga dang ldan/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'phro ba las/ /a las chu shel dkyil 'khor dang / /raM las rta bdun dag tu gyur/ /steng du pad+ma hrIHyis mtshan/ /de las 'od 'phros don gnyis byas/ /tshur 'dus hrIHla thim pa yi/ /

li khri lta bu'i thig le las/ /bcom ldan tshe dpag med pa ni/ /'gying bcas 'od 'khrug skyil krung bzhugs/ /phyag gnyis pad+ma rA ga yi/ /bum pa 'chi med bdud rtsis gang / /'gro rnams re skong dpag bsam shing / /bum pa'i kha rgyan thugs kar 'dzin/ /yum la 'khyud cing gnyis su med/ /

baM las yum mchog gos dkar mo/ /li khri lta bur 'dzum zhing sgeg /g.yas pa pad+ma g.yon pa ni/ /bum pa yongs su 'dzin pa la/ /yab la gnyis med legs par 'khril/ /dar dang nor bu du mas brgyan/ /chu skyes brgyad dang lha snam la/ /pad+ma zla ba nyi ma'i gdan/ /mtshams bzhi'i

sgo bzhi zla ba'i gdan/ /shar du rdo rje hUM gis mtshan/ /de las mi bskyod tshe dpag med/ /lho ru rin chen tAM gis mtshan/ /rin chen rigs kyi tshe dpag med/ /nub tu 'khor lo oM gyis mtshan/ /rnam par snang mdzad tshe dpag med/ /byang du ral gri a yis mtshan/ /don yod grub pa tshe

dpag med/ /shar lhor maM las mA ma kI/ /lho nub tAM las lha mo sgrol/ /nub byang laM las sangs rgyas spyan/ /byang shar tAM las dam tshig sgrol/ /rigs bzhi mnyam gzhag phyag rgya las/ /shel dang bai DUr+ya gser dang ni/ /in+d+ra nI la'i bum pa 'dzin/ /yum lnga

g.yas pa rang rtags dang / /g.yon pa bum pa 'dzin pa'o/ /shar du rdo rje sems dpa' bzhi/ /lho ru rin chen sems dpa' bzhi/ /nub tu rnam snang sems dpa' bzhi/ /byang du las kyi sems dpa' bzhi/ /g.yas pa rang rtags 'dzin pa la/ /g.yon pas tshe yi bum pa 'dzin/ /thams

cad dar dang nor bus brgyan/ /rdo rje skyil krung bzhugs pa'o/ /mtshams bzhi la ni mchod pa yi/ /bdug spos mar me me tog ma/ /dri chab ma dang lha mo bzhi/ /sna tshogs 'od kyis bskor ba'o/ /shar sgor dzaHlas lcags kyu dkar/ /lho sgor hUM las zhags pa ser/ /nub sgor baM las

lcags sgrog dmar/ /byad sgor hoHlas dril bu ljang / /sgo ba bzhi po de dag ni/ /'khril ldem bzhengs nas bzhugs pa'o/ /de nas thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis/ /rang bzhin gnas nas ye shes pa/ /tshig 'dis spyan ni drang bar bya/ /gdod nas rang bzhin nam mkha' ltar/ /thugs rje

'ja' tshon skur ston pa'i/ /bcom ldan gsung mchog tshe dpag med/ /rang bzhin lhun grub gzhal yas nas/ /ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan dam pa 'dir/ /'gro ba'i don phyir spyan 'dren na/ /tshe zad tshe nyams gso ba'i phyir/ /'di nyid du ni gshegs su gsol/ /rdo rje rin chen

rnam snang dang / /las kyi rigs mchog tshe dpag med/ /yum bzhi mchod pa'i lha mo dang / /sems dpa' bcu drug sgo mar bcas/ /rang bzhin bde chen dkyil 'khor nas/ /ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan dam pa 'dir/ /tshe dang ye shes rgyas pa dang / /thugs mchog ye shes thob bya'i

phyir/ /'di nyid du ni spyan 'dren na/ /byin gyis rlob cing gshegs su gsol/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHsa dgug gzhug bya/ /sku gsung thugs ni byin gyis brlab/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur nas/ /rigs bdag rnams kyis dbu brgyan te/ /mnyes par gyur la mchod pa dang / /

bstod pa rgyas dang bsdus pa bya/ /de nas bying rgod rab spangs nas/ /ma yengs lha rnams gsal stong bsgom/ /de rjes bzlas pa bya ba ni/ /lha rnams thugs ka'i bum pa ru/ /hrIHhUM trAM b+h+rUM a las ni/ /rang rang sngags kyis bskor bar bsgom/ /oM hrIHb+h+rUM badzra dz+nyA na A yu She swA hA/

oM hUM b+h+rUM badzra dz+nyA na A yu She swA hA/ oM swA b+h+rUM badzra dz+nyA na A yu She swA hA/ oM oM b+h+rUM badzra dz+nyA na A yu She swA hA/ oM AHb+h+rUM badzra dz+nyA na A yu She swA hA/ de rnams yab kyi snying po'i sngags so/ /yum gyi bum par paM maM traM laM taM rnams las sngags kyis bskor/ oM b+h+rUM a pa ri mi ti A yur+dz+nyA na su bi

ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ yum mchog lnga yi snying po'o/ /phyogs bzhi sems dpa' bcu drug la/ /rang gis bon rnams la ni/ /gco bo'i sngags kyis bskor bar bsams/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHa pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni swA hA/ sgom bzhi'i snying po'i sngags so/ /de ltar bum pa'i sngags

rnams la/ /dmigs te gsang sngags bzlas pa yis/ /yig 'bru rnams la bdud rtsi'i chu/ /babs pas bum pa gang bar bsam/ /bum nang ye shes bdud rtsi'i rgyun/ /rang gi gnas gsum thim pa yis/ /lus ngag yid gsum nad gdon dang / /sdig sgrib dag nas

dbang bzhi thob/ /'chi med dngos grub thob par bsam/ /de nas rang gis sngags bzlas pas/ /dkyil 'khor lha tshogs thams cad kyi/ /rang rang gsang sngags bzlas par bsgom/ /snying ga'i sa bon 'od zer las/ /lha mo dkar mo lcags kyu thogs/ /bsam gyis mi

khyab shar du 'phros/ /nad gdon zhi ba'i las byas te/ /dri za'i lag nas tshe bkug nas/ /bdag bskyod lha dang bum par bstim/ /de bzhin lho yi zhags pa mos/ /tshe dang longs spyod rgyas byas nas/ /gshin rje'i lag nas tshe bkug ste/ /gong bzhin du ni

bstim par bya/ /nub kyi lcags sgrog dmar mo yis/ /srid gsum ma lus dbang bsdus te/ /chu lha'i lag nas tshe bkug nas/ /bstim zhing klu gdon dag par bsam/ /byang gi dril bu dgyes mdzes mas/ /nad gdon log 'dren tshar bcad nas/ /gnod

sbyin lag nas tshe bkug nas/ /gong bzhin dmigs pa gsal bas bstim/ /bum pa dag la brten nas ni/ /'chi med tshe sgrub bshad pa ni/ /rnam rgyal las bum gnyis po la/ /rdzas dang kha rgyan mgul 'chings bcas/ /phyag mtshan bris

la gdags par bya/ /maN+Dal steng du legs par gzhag /phyi ni bum pa'i rnam pa la/ /nang du gzhal yas khang du bsgom/ /gsang sngags rgyal po'i bzlas pa bya/ /gong bzhin bdud rtsis bum pa gang / /de yis rang gzhan thams cad kyi/ /nad gdon sdig

sgrib ma lus dag /'chi med dngos grub thob par bsam/ /las bum rta mgrin gong bzhin bskyed/ /thugs ka'i sa bon sngags kyis bskor/ /oM badzra kro d+ha ha ya grI ba hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ de yis rang gzhan bar chad bsrung / /'chi med bdud rtsi'i khrus bya'o/ /de

ltar rang don gzhan don la/ /ma yengs bskyed rim gsal ba yis/ /ting 'dzin gcig tu sngags bzlas na/ /rtags rdzogs zla drug zhal mthong 'gyur/ /de nas rgyun du nyams su len/ /khwa ta'i skad kyis ma non par/ /bdag nyid gzhan dang ngag ma 'dres/ /

mdun du chu skyes stong dang ldan/ /gtso bo yab yum gsal bar bsgom/ /oM A yu She sa ra ha ka ra ri sha ra ri hUM/ /gsol ba btab la mchod bstod bya/ /bum pa dag la dmigs nas ni/ /sgrub byed sngags kyi rgyal po 'di/ /oM a ma ra Ni dzI wan+tI ye swA hA/ /gsang

sngags nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas/ /de yis bdud rtsi'i rgyun byung nas/ /rang gi spyi gtsug thim pa yis/ /nad gdon sdig sgrib thams cad dag /bdud rtsis rang lus gang ba yin/ /'chi med tshe yi dngos grub thob/ /tshe dpag med par gyur par bsam/ /brtan pa'i yan

lag lnga bzlas so/ /mdun bskyed bdag la bstim pa dang / /de yi tshe tshad nyi zlar 'gyur/ /tshe nyams la sogs smos ci dgos/ /gsang nas sgrub pa rab tu bsngags/ /de nas gsang sgrub bshad par bya/ /dkyil 'khor gong dang 'dra ba la/ /lha tshogs thams

cad li khri ltar/ /sna tshogs rin chen rgyan gyis mdzes/ /bum pa thod par bcas pa 'dzin/ /rdo rje skyil krung bzhugs pa'o/ /bcu drug lon pa sku sha rgyas/ /'jam zhing nu ma 'bur ba la/ /pad+ma rdo rje rin chen dang / /'khor lo sna tshogs rdo rje ste/ /g.yas pa

rang gi phyag mtshan 'dzin/ /g.yon pa thod pa bdud rtsis gang / /yab la stobs shing gnyis su 'khril/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med/ /yab yum 'od zer tshogs 'khrugs shing / /snyoms 'jug zag med bde ba rgyas/ /mtshams bzhir bdud

rtsi'i bum pa bzhi/ /phyogs kyi lha yi snam bu la/ /shar du rdo rje khro bo dang / /lho ru rin chen khro bo dang / /nub tu pad+ma'i khro bo dang / /byang du phrin las khro bo dang / /steng 'og rnam snang khro bo gnyis/ /phyogs bzhir khro bo gnyis gnyis ni/ /rigs kyi yum

dang bcas pa la/ /g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang bzhengs pa'o/ /thams cad g.yas pa rang rtags 'dzin/ /g.yon pa tshe yi bum pa dang / /sprul dang rin chen sna tshogs brgyan/ /me ri 'bar ba'i klong na bzhugs/ /lha mo bzhi dang sgo ba bzhi/ /bzhengs pa khro bo'i tshul du gnas/ /'bru

gsum sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs/ /ye shes spyan drang gnyis med bstim/ /dbang bskur rigs kyis dbu brgyan pa/ /gtso bo lnga dang khro bo bcu'i/ /bum pa dag la dmigs nas ni/ /gsang sngags 'di ni bzlas par bya/ /oM hrIHhUM/ swA b+h+rUM AH

dzaHhUM baM hoHa pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na ma hA sid+d+hi ha sa ni ri ti swA hA/ de nas rang nyid bzlas pa bya/ /bum pa legs par bcas pa la/ /lha rnams gong bzhin bskyed pa dang / /rang dang lha rnams sngags bzlas pas/ /'chi med bdud rtsi'i bum pa gang / /rjes su

lha rnams zhu ba'i chus/ /rang gzhan thams cad khrus bya'o/ /de yis mchog dang thun mong gi /dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi gtor ma 'di/ /snying po sngags kyis 'bul bar bya/ /las bzhi'i sbyin sreg bya ba dang / /longs spyod

spel la thod pa mchod/ /de nas de kho na nyid sgrub/ /rang nyid mgon por gsal ba yi/ /gsang gnas chos 'byung gru gsum du/ /hrIHdang paM las me 'bar bas/ /lus kyi nad rnams thams cad khengs/ /spyi bo'i haM brgyad zhu ba las/ /bde chen bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun 'bab/ /rtsa gsum gang bas bde ba rgyas/ /drod

dang bde ba'i khyad par rnams/ /steng 'og rlung gis mnan zhes bya/ /rta bdun ri bo rgyas 'dra nas/ /mthar thug lhun grub rnam gsum thob/ /bcu gsum sa rnams rdzogs par 'gyur/ /tshe dpag med pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ /rtsa rgyud le'u 'bum pa dang / /bshad rgyud 'od zer dra ba la/ /brten nas grub

pa'i rgyal mos mdzad/ /'chi med tshe sgrub 'di brtsams pas/ /bdag dang rigs drug sems can rnams/ /'chi med dngos grub thob gyur nas/ /tshe dpag med pa thob par shog/ //rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta zla ba bzang po dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba glan dang ma tshul khrims kyis bsgyur ba'o//

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ a pa ri mi ta A yu ho ma bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ tshe dpag tu med pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga zhes bya ba/ /mgon po tshe dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sbyin sreg ma byas 'bras mi 'byin/ /sbyin sreg gis ni las rnams 'grub/ /las kyi mchog rab sbyin sreg go/ /zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang / /

dbang dang drag po mngon spyod do/ /zhi ba thab khud zlum po nyid/ /rgyas pa gru bzhi zla gam dbang / /mngon spyod zur gsum nyid du bya/ /khru gang khru do khru gang ba/ /sor mo nyi shu kha dog nag /dkar ser dmar ba nyid du bya/ /mchod rdzas yam shing dUr ba sogs/ /sreg rdzas g.yas g.yon rim pa bzhin/ /shar du zhi ba byang du rgyas/ /

dbang la nub dang drag po lho/ /raM las me lha kha dog dmar/ dbyu gu ril ba spyi blugs dang / /bgrang phreng g.yon dang g.yas su bsam/ /ral pa cod pan gsus khyim che/ /tshangs skud 'chang la ye shes bstim/ /rigs bdag rnams kyis dbu brgyan nas/ /mchod yon zhabs bsil la sogs dbul/ /dgong

blugs dbul la mtshan ma brtags/ /kha dog sgra dang dbyibs dang dri/ /zla ba rgyas pa du ba med/ /nad med sdig pa ma lus zad/ /dung dang rdza rnga pi wang dang / /bde ba ma lus 'phel bar byed/ /tsan+dan ga pur a ga ru/ /dge zhing tshe ring dpal gyi gnas/ /bkra shis rdzas brgyad rgyal mtshan gdugs/ /

sgrub pa po rnams dge ba'i rtags/ /ngan pa de las bzlog pa'o/ /rta mgrin rgyal pos bsrung ba bya/ de nas sreg rdzas rim gyis dbul/ /mar dang yam shing til dang zho/ /'bras so nas dang sran ma dang / /gro dang dUr ba ku sha rnams/ /oM ag+na ye swA hA/ oM bo d+hi br-ik+ShA ya swA hA/ oM sarba pA

paM da ha na badzrA ya swA hA/ oM sarba saM pa de swA hA/ oM badzra puSh+Ta ye swA hA/ oM badzra bi dza ye swA hA/ oM ma hA be+e ga ye swA hA/ oM ma hA ba la ye swA hA/ oM badzra g+hasma ri ye swA hA/ oM badzra A yu She ye swA hA/ oM a pra ti ha ta badzra ye swA hA/ me lha bstod cing gsol ba gdab/ /de nas me lha'i thugs

ka ru/ /dkyil 'khor bskyed cing ye shes bstim/ /mchod yon zhabs bsil la sogs dbul/ /khu ba la sogs zhal du mchod/ /yam shing ku sha 'od la dbul/ /zho zan 'thor 'thung phyag tu dbul/ /khyad par dUr ba brgya rtsa ni/ /tshe 'phel ched du dbul bar

bya/ /A yu puSh+TiM ku ru oM/ 'o ma sgrad rtsi ka ra dang / bdud rtsi lnga dang sbyar ba'i rdzas/ /slob dpon g.yon gyi mthe'u chung gis/ /slob ma'i g.yas kyi mthe'u chung gzung / /lan gsum bskor bas lha la dbul/ /dngos grub rdzas kyi lhag me de/ /slob ma rnams

la sbyin par bya/ /oM badzra A yu She a mr-i ta sid+d+hi hUM/ /zhi ba swA hA dang sbyar ba/ /rgyas pa oM la dbang la ho/ /drag po ma rA ya phaT sbyar/ /dkyil 'khor lha la mchod cing bstod/ /ye shes gshegs su gsol ba dang / /dam tshig bdag la bsdu bar bya/ /

dkyil 'khor lha ni mchod ster ro/ /me yis 'dod pa'i don grub byed/ /yam shing gzi brjid ster bar byed/ /mar gyis 'byor pa 'phel ba yin/ /til gyis sdig pa 'dag pa dang / /zho zan gyis ni rig pa 'phel/ /nas kyis brtson 'grus 'phel bar 'gyur/ /'bras

kyis nus pa 'phel byed pa/ /so bas 'bru 'phel las yin no/ /gro dang sran mas nad kun sel/ /dUr bas tshe ring nad med do/ /ku shas bar chad srung bar byed/ /'o ma sbrang rtsis dngos grub ster/ /dpal 'phel ba ni bud shing ngo / /sbyin bdag bkra shis thabs

yin no/ /tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa mchod pa'i rdzas/ /thabs dang shes rab gzar bu ste/ /bdud rtsi mar gyis tshim byed pa/ /mchod pa gzhan gyis ci zhig bya/ /thog mar dben pa'i gnas nyid du/ /thabs dang mchod rdzas bshams pa ni/ /zhi ba tsan+dan dkar po'o/ /rgyas pa 'bras bu

can gyi shing / /dbang la tsan+dan dmar po dang / /drag po tsher ma can la bya/ /rgya phyed dpangs dang ldan pa dang / /sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab brgyad la/ /slob dpon bdag nyid 'dug pa dang / /g.yas g.yon pad+ma 'dab brgyad la/ g.yas su sreg rdzas rim gyis gzhag /g.yon du bum pa mchod rdzas bsham/ /lha yi

rnal 'byor bskyed pa dang / /sngags kyi bzlas pas rab tu tshim/ /bum par rta mchog bskyed par bya/ /sngags bzlas bar chad bsrung bar bya/ /de bas bram ze rgyun bzhag me/ /bslangs la sbar bar bya ba dang / /dang po 'jig rten me lha mchod/ /gnyis pa dkyil 'khor dgyes par tshim/ /

gsum pa me lha gtang rag dbul/ /de nas ye shes gshegs dang dam tshig bsdu/ /me mnal thal ba chu bor dor/ /sbyin sreg las kyi 'bras 'byin 'di/ /mkha' 'gro grub pa'i rgyal mos brtsams/ /dge ba 'di yis 'gro ba kun/ /tshe dpag med pa red 'gyur shog/ //rgya gar gyi mkhan po wa

la tsan+d+ra bla ma dang / /lo tsA ba glan dar ma tshul khrims kyis bsgyur ba'o//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na sA d+ha na nA ma/ bod skad du/ tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i sgrub thabs/ mgon po tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dad brtson 'gro rnams

bsgral 'dod pa/ /bsod nams tshogs ni sngon song bas/ /tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par bya'o/ /rang gi snying ga'i hrIHdmar las/ /ye shes me 'bar rnam smin bsregs/ /de rjes rang sems thig le dang / /hrIHdmar tsheg drag gyur pa las/ /rta mchog spyan gsum zhal bgrad pa/ /

dbyug pa sdigs mdzub 'bar 'jigs bsgom/ /de yi thugs kar pad zla'i steng / /hrIHlas bcom ldan tshe dpag med/ /mdog dmar rgyan mdzes bum pa bsnams/ /thugs kar pad zla'i steng du hrIH/ /de las b+h+rUM chad 'khor lo ni/ /rtsibs brgyad yongs su gyur ba las/ /

gzhal yas gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa/ /'dab brgyad khyams dang pad ra dang / /'dod yon pha gu dra phyed dang / /rta babs mchod rten yongs mdzes pa/ /rdo rje me ri dmar smug 'khrug /dngas shid thogs pa med pa yi/ /'od zer tshogs 'khrug bsgom

par bya/ /de yang hrIHlas pho brang gi /dbus su saM cig chad pa las/ /mi 'jigs brgyad du gyur par bsgom/ /de steng paM a raM chad pas/ /pad zla rta bdun dag tu 'gyur/ /de yi steng du hrIHlas ni/ /'od 'phros don byas tshur 'dus pas/ /pad+ma dmar po 'dab lngar gyur/ /de las bcom

ldan tshe dpag med/ /mdog dmar gzhon sgeg rgyan gyis mdzes/ /'gro rnams re skong dpag bsam shing / /bum pa'i kha rgyan thugs kar 'dzin/ /'gying bcas 'od 'khrug skyil krung bzhugs/ /de yi g.yon du paM dang a/ /gyur pas zla ba'i gdan stengs su/ /a las yum mchog gos dkar mo/ /

mtshal mdog 'gying bcas 'dzum zhing sgeg /thugs kar pad+ma rA ga yi/ /bum pa yongs su 'dzin pa'o/ /shar du pad zla nyi ma yi/ /steng du hUM las rdo rjer gyur/ /de las mi bskyod tshe dpag med/ /bai DUr sngon po'i mdog 'dra ba/ /skyil krung dang bcas bum pa 'dzin/ /de yi g.yon du pad zla'i steng / /

sa las yum mchog sangs rgyas spyan/ /mdog dkar phyag gnyis bum pa bsnams/ /gzhon sgeg skyil krung bzhugs pa'o/ /lho ru pad+ma nyi zla'i stengs/ /swa las rin 'byung tshe dpag med/ /btso ma gser mdog skyil krung bzhugs/ /bum 'dzin rin chen rgyan gyis spras/ /g.yon du pad zla trAM nyid

las/ /byung ba'i yum mchog mA ma kI/ /nam mkha'i mdog can 'dzum sgeg mdzes/ /bum pa bsnams shing skyil krung bzhugs/ /nub tu pad zla nyi ma yi/ /steng du b+h+rUM las 'khor lor gyur/ /de las snang mdzad tshe dpag med/ /dkar zhing skyil krung bzhugs pa'o/ /g.yon du pad zla

maM las ni/ /dbyings phyug ma ni dung gi mdog /'gying bcas rin chen rgyan gyis spras/ /zhabs gnyis rdo rje skyil krung ngo / /byang du pad zla raM nyi yi/ /steng du a las rgya gram pa/ /de las don grub tshe dpag med/ /mdog ljang bum pa skyil krung mdzes/ /g.yon du pad+ma zla ba'i steng / /tAM las

dam tshig sgron ma ni/ /sngo ljang sna tshogs rgyan gyis mdzes/ /thugs kar bum pa 'dzin pa'o/ /shar khyams zla ba'i gdan stengs su/ /hU~M bzhi rdo rje bzhir gyur pas/ /rdo rje rigs kyi sems dpa' bzhi/ /g.yas pa rang rtags rdo rje 'dzin/ /g.yon pa tshe yi bum pa

'dzin/ /rgyan mdzes rdo rje skyil krung bzhugs/ /lho phyogs pad+ma zla ba'i steng / /swA las rin chen 'bar ba bzhi/ /rin chen rigs kyi sems dpar gyur/ /g.yas pa rin chen g.yon pa ni/ /tshe yi bum pa thugs kar 'dzin/ /bcom gser 'dra skyil krung bzhugs/ /nub tu pad zla hrIHbzhi

las/ /pad+ma 'dab lngar gyur pa las/ /pad+ma'i sems dpa' bzhi ru gyur/ /phyag g.yas rang rtags pad+ma bsnams/ /g.yon pa bum 'dzin rgyan spras shing / /rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'o/ /byang du gdan stengs a bzhi las/ /rdo rje rgya gram las byung ba'i/ /las kyi sems dpa'

bzhi ru gyur/ /sngo ljang rgya gram bum pa bsnams/ /gzhon sgeg mdzes shing skyil krung bzhugs/ /'od zer tshogs kyis bskor ba'o/ /shar sgor dzaHdang lcags kyu las/ /lcags kyu ma ni mu tig mdog /lho sgor hUM las zhags pa ser/ /nub tu baM las lcags sgrog dmar/ /byang du hoHlas

dril bu ljang / /lha mo de dag thams cad kyang / /'khril ldem gzhon sgeg rgyan spras mdzes/ /zhal ni phyir gzigs bzhengs pa'o/ /sgo bzhir rgyal chen bzhi yang bsam/ /yang na phyi rol dag tu'o/ /gru chad bzhi la mchod pa yi/ /lha mo spyi dang mthun par bsam/ /de nas thugs ka'i

'od zer gyis/ /rang bzhin gnas nas ye shes pa/ /'di brjod spyan ni drang bar bya/ /gdod nas rang bzhin mkha' ltar dag /thugs rjes 'ja' tshon skur ston pa'i/ /bcom ldan gsung mchog tshe dpag med/ /rang bzhin lhun grub gzhal yas nas/ /ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan dam pa

'dir/ /'gro ba'i don phyir spyan 'dren na/ /tshe zad tshe nyams bsal mdzad phyir/ /gnas 'di nyid du gshegs su gsol/ /rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang / /las kyi rigs mchog tshe dpag med/ /rigs kyi yum mchog lnga dang ni/ /mchod pa'i lha mo rnam bzhi dang / /sems dpa' bcu

drug sgo mar bcas/ /rang bzhin bde chen dkyil 'khor nas/ /ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan dam pa 'dir/ /tshe dang longs spyod rgyas pa dang / /thugs mchog ye shes thob bya'i phyir/ /gnas 'di nyid du spyan 'dren gyi/ /byin gyis brlab phyir gshegs su gsol/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHsa dgug gzhug

bcing / /mnyes par gyur la mchod pa dang / /bstod pa rgyas dang bsdus ba bya/ /sku gsung thugs ni byin gyis brlab/ /de nas bying rgod rab spangs nas/ /ma yengs lha rnams gsal bar bsgom/ /de rjes bzlas pa bya ba ni/ /lha rnams thugs ka'i bum pa'i nang / /hrIHhUM swA b+hUM AHla

ni/ /rang rang sngags kyis bskor bar bsgom/ /oM hrIHb+h+rUM badzra dz+nyA na A yu She swA hA/ oM hUM b+h+rUM badzra dz+nyA na A yu She swA hA/ /oM swA b+h+rUM badzra dz+nyA na A yu She swA hA/ /oM b+h+rUM b+h+rUM badzra dz+nyA na A yu She swA hA/ /oM AHb+h+rUM badzra dz+nyA na A yu She swA hA/ /de rnams yab kyi snying po'o/ /yum gyi bum par a pa ri mi ta

bsams la sngags 'dis bskor/ /oM b+h+rUM a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+ci ta te dzo rA dzA ya swA hA/ /yum mchog lnga yi snying por brjod/ /phyogs bzhi'i sems dpa' bcu drug po/ /gtso bo'i sngags rnams bskor bar bsams/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHa pa ri mi ta A yudz+nyA na su bi niHswA hA/ sgo ma bzhi yi

snying po'o/ /de ltar bum pa'i sngags rnams la/ /dmigs nas bzlas pa byas pa yis/ /yig 'bru rnams las bdud rtsi'i rgyun/ /byung bas bum pa khengs par bsam/ /bum nang ye shes bdud rtsi'i rgyun/ /rang gi gnas gsum thim pa yis/ /lus ngag yid gsum nad gdon dang / /

sdig sgrib dag nas dbang bzhi thob/ /'chi med dngos grub thob par bsam/ /de nas rang gi sngags bzlas pas/ /dkyil 'khor lha tshogs thams cad kyang / /rang rang gsang sngags zlos par bsam/ /rang snying sa bon shar sgo nas/ /lha mo dkar mo lcags kyu thogs/ /dpag med shar

du spros pa yis/ /nad gdon zhi ba'i las byas nas/ /dri za'i lag nas tshe bkug la/ /rang dang bum par bstim par bya/ /de bzhin lho yi zhags pa bsam/ /tshe dang longs spyod rgyas byas nas/ /gshin rje'i lag nas tshe bkug ste/ /gong bzhin du ni bstim par bya'o/ /nub kyi lcags

sgrog dmar mo yis/ /srid gsum ma lus dbang bsdus te/ /chu lha'i lag nas tshe bkug la/ /bstim zhing klu gdon dag par bsam/ /byang gi dril bu dgyes mdzad mas/ /nad gdon log 'dren tshar bcad nas/ /gnod sbyin lag nas tshe bkug la/ /gong bzhin dmigs pa gsal

bas bstim/ /shar phyogs rnam rgyal bum pa ni/ /rdzas dang mgul chings kha rgyan bcas/ /phyag mtshan bris nas gzhug par bya/ /phyi ni bum pa'i rnam pa la/ /nang ni gzhal yas khang du bsam/ /gong bzhin bdud rtsis bum pa dgang / /de yis rang gzhan thams cad kyi/ /nad gdon sdig sgrib sangs dag

nas/ /'chi med dngos grub thob par bsam/ /las bum rta mgrin bskyed pa yang / /bgegs kyi steng du gzhag par bya/ /de yis rang gzhan bar chad bsrung / /bdud rtsi dkar dmar khrus bya'o/ /de ltar rang don gzhan don la/ /ma yengs bskyed rim gsal po yis/ /zla ba gcig tu sngags bzlas nas/ /

rtags rdzogs zla drug zhal mthong 'gyur/ /de yang rgyun du nyams len na/ /khwa da'i skad kyis ma non par/ /mdun du gtso bo yab yum bsam/ /gsol ba btab la mchod bstod bya/ /bum pa dag la dmigs nas ni/ /oM A yu d+he sa ra ha ka ra re sha ra re hUM/ /gsang sngags nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas/ /de yis bdud

rtsi'i rgyun byung nas/ /rang gi spyi gtsug thim pa yis/ /nad gdon sdig sgrib sangs dag nas/ /bdud rtsis rang lus khengs pa yis/ /'chi med tshe yi dngos grub thob/ /tshe dpag med par gyur par bsam/ /brtan pa'i yan lag sngags bzlas so/ /oM A yu a ma ra Na dzI ban+ti ye swA hA/ /de yi tshe tshad nyi zlar

'gyur/ /tshe nyams la sogs smos ci dgos/ /gsang nas sgrub pa rab tu bsngags/ /de nas gsang sgrub bshad par bya/ /dkyil 'khor gong dang 'dra ba las/ /yab lnga sku mdog 'tsher zhing dmar/ /sna tshogs rin chen rgyan gyis spras/ /bum pa thod par bcas pa 'dzin/ /rdo rje skyil krung bzhugs

pa'o/ /yum lnga sku mdog 'dra ba dang / /gzhon sgreg rgyan mdzes sku sha rgyas/ /'dzum zhing nu ma 'bur ba yis/ /g.yas pa pad+ma rdo rje dang / /rin chen 'khor lo rgya gram ste/ /g.yas pa rang rtags phyag mtshan 'dzin/ /g.yon pa thod pa bdud rtsis bkang / /yab la stobs shing skyil krung 'khril/ /

yab kyi 'od zer dmar ba'i mdangs/ /yab yum 'od zer tshogs 'khrug cing / /snyoms 'jug zag med bde bas rgyas/ /gnyis su med pa'i sbyor mtshams nas/ /byang sems dkar dmar bdud rtsi'i rgyun/ /rang gi gnas gsum phog pa yis/ /lus ngag yid gsum sdig sgrib dag /thun mong ma yin

dbang bzhi thob/ /rang lus zag med bde bas rgyas/ /ye shes lus la mgon por bskyed/ /shar gyi khyams su rdo rje'i rigs/ /khro bo zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ /mdog dmar phyag g.yas rdo rje bsnams/ /g.yon pa rA ga'i bum pa 'dzin/ /sprul dang rin chen sna tshogs brgyan/ /me ri 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas/ /

g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang bzhengs pa'o/ /yum yang mdog dmar rdo rje dang / /bum pa 'dzin cing yab la 'khril/ /khro zhing cung zad sgeg par bsam/ /lho phyogs su ni rin chen rigs/ /yab yum g.yas pa rin po che/ /g.yon pa tshe yi bum pa'o/ /nub phyogs bud+d+ha'i khro bo ni/ /yab yum g.yas pa

'khor lo ste/ /g.yon pa tshe yi bum pa'o/ /byang phyogs phrin las khro bo ni/ /yab yum g.yas pa rgya gram bsnams/ /g.yon pa tshe bum 'dzin pa'o/ /dbus kyi steng dang 'og tu ni/ /khro bo yab yum phyag g.yas na/ /pad+ma 'dab lnga bsnams pa ste/ /g.yon pa tshe yi bum pa'o/ /phyogs bzhir

khro bo gnyis gnyis bsgom/ /rgyan dang cha lugs sku mdog rnams/ /shar phyogs bzhin du bsam par bya/ /sgo ma bzhi ni mdog dmar zhing / /zhal ni phyir gzigs khro mo'o/ /gtso bo lnga dang khrus chu yi/ /bum pa bdag la dmigs byas nas/ /gsang ba'i sngags ni

bzlas par bya/ /oM hrIHhUM swA AHb+hUM dzaHhUM baM hoHa pa ri mi ta A yudz+nyA na ma ha sid+d+hi ha sa ni ri swA hA/ /de skad ma yengs bzlas pa yis/ /bum pa'i chu rgyun spyi bor phog /sdig sgrib dag nas dbang bzhi thob/ /de nas rang nyid yab yum du/ /bsams la gsang ba'i sngags brjod do/ /shar

dang byang shar mtshams su ni/ /bum pa lha rnams gong bzhin bsam/ /rang dang lha rnams sngags bzlas pas/ /'chi med bdud rtsi'i bum pa khengs/ /rjes su chags rnams zhu ba'i chus/ /rang gzhan thams cad khrus bya'o/ /de yis mchog dang thun mong gi /dngos

grub thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de nas kho na nyid 'di bsgrub/ /rang nyid mgon por gsal ba yi/ /gsang gnas chos 'byung gru gsum du/ /hrIHdang raM las me 'bar bas/ /khog pa'i nad rnams thams cad khengs/ /spyi bo'i haM brgyad zhu ba las/ /bde chen bdud rtsi'i

chu rgyun bab/ /rtsa rnams khengs pas bde ba rgyas/ /drod dang bde ba'i khyad par kun/ /steng 'og rlung gi gnad shes bya/ /rta bdun ri bong rgyas brtan nas/ /mthar thug lhun grub rnam gsum thob/ /bcu gsum sa rnams rdzogs par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa zhes bya

ba'i sgrub thabs/ ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma grub pa'i rgyal mos mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ b+ha ga ba ti a pa ri mi ta A yudz+nyA na maN+Dal bid+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/

mgon po tshe dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dad ldan mgon la gus pa yis/ /nags 'dab chu gling dgon par ni/ /rang dang slob ma'i don gyi phyir/ /bsnyen pas cho ga ste gon dang / /dkyil 'khor chen po bsgrub par bya/ /de la dang po bsnyen pa ni/ /rab dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs dngos su

mthong ba/ 'bring rmi lam du mthong ba/ tha ma yang lung bstan thob pa'o/ /grangs kyi bsnyen pa 'bum tsho bdun/ /'bring gsum/ /tha ma khri'am bla ma'i rjes gnang thob pa'o/ /sa'i cho ga ni rgyud las/ /dkyil 'khor so ni brtag pa blang ba dang / /sbyang ba dang ni byin brlabs gzung ba'o/ /zhes gsungs pas/

sa chog rgyas par gzhan du shes par bya'o/ /sta gon la bzhi ste/ lha sta gon/ /bum pa sta gon/ sa'i lha mo sta gon/ sbyin sreg sta gon/ slob ma sta gon rnams gzhan bzhin bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga bshad par bya'o/ /dang po ni tshon sna lnga'i thi gu rigs lnga yab yum dang bcas pa/

bde stong dbyer med du byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /de nas nam mkha' la dam tshig gi thig chen brgyad btab la/ mchod bstod byas nas sta gon gyi lha dang dbyer med du bsam mo/ /de ltar ye shes kyi thig gi rjes su dam tshig gi thig gdab pa ni/ slob dpon shar du blta/ slob ma nub tu blta/ tshangs

thig dang po gdab/ /de nas lho byang dang mtshams su thig chen brgyad gdab/ /de la bcu drug tu bgos nas gsum pa man chad la 'dab brgyad phyogs tshon dbus dmar po'o/ /bzhi pa khyams la shar dkar po'am mthing ga /lho ser nub dmar byang ljang / rtsig pa lnga dang ldan pa/ 'dod yon dmar pha gu ser/

dra phyed sngo mda' yab dmar po mchod rten dang ldan pa/ rta babs cha bzhi mchod rten du yod pa'o/ /de yang rdo rje me ri rab tu 'bar ba dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o/ /de yang tshon byin gyis brlab pa ni/ yab yum bde stong dbyer med du bsam pa'o/ /tshon lnga phyogs bzhi dang dbus su bzhag la sa bon bris te rigs

lngar bskyed nas mchod bstod byas la bri'o/ /de yang shar du slob dpon gyis ban rag sor brgyad bris la gra brtag par bya'o/ /de nas sku tsa ka li'am me tog tshom bu bkod pa'am/ phyag mtshan rnams bkod pa'o/ /de ltar sku gsung thugs gang bkod pa'i rjes la/ gtso bo'i bum pa shar phyogs rdo rje

ra ba'i nang du'o/ /las bum shar me ri'i steng du bum pa rgyas par dgod na god bzhin no/ /de nas mchod pa dang gtor ma dang 'byor ba'i yo byad kyis dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' ma bskor/ mda' dang phur pa dang gri brgyad phyogs mtshams su btsugs la steng 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la phyogs dra mig tu

yod pa bya'o/ /de nas rang nyid bskyed chog ji lta ba bzhin du bsgom/ /dkyil 'khor dang bum pa'i nang du lha tshogs bskyed la sgrub thabs bzhin 'chi med ye shes bdud rtsis gang ba la rang gis dbang blang bar bya'o/ /slob ma la ji tsam bskur ba de rang gis blang bar bya'o/ /de nas slob ma rnams khrus

byas gos so ma gon nas yol ba'i phyi rol du 'khod pa la bgegs bskrad/ kr-i ya dpung bzang ltar gtor ma gtang ngo / /de nas slob ma rnams phyag byas la me tog dang bcas pas/ /gong bzhin du/ dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa pas/ /gsol ba lan gsum gdab par bya'o/ /de nas sdig

pa bshags pa dang rjes su yi rang ba la sogs pa yang gong bzhin byas la/ me tog dang bcas pas gsol ba gdab pa ni/ slob dpon bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /thub chen nyi ma ma lus pa/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis/ /slob dpon ye

shes spyan mnga' ba'i/ /sangs rgyas rol mo las byung ba'i/ /mi ldog 'khor lo'i 'byor bar ldan/ /thar pa chen po'i grong khyer mchog /gsang ba chen por 'jug par bgyi/ /gsang ba mchog tu thams cad du/ /slob dpon gyis ni bdag 'jug 'tshal/ /phyir mi ldog par

dbang bskur ba'i/ /skal pa chen po bdag la stsol/ /mtshan rnams kun gyis rgyas btab cing / /dpe byad rnams dang yang dag ldan/ /sangs rgyas sku ni yid 'ong ba/ /slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol/ /dbang bskur ba ni rmad 'byung che/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /rtag tu bdag ni slob

dpon 'gyur/ /slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol/ /zhes lan gsum gsol ba btab par bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon gyis slob ma la dri ba ni/ /bcom ldan tshe dpag med pa yi/ /gsang ba yongs su 'dzin par ni/ /bdag nyid chen po khyed 'dod dam/ /slob mas 'tshal lags zhes brjod do/ /de

nas rigs kyi sdom pa'i dam tshig bsgrags pa ni/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song / /'di de sangs rgyas rigs dag pa'i/ /sdom pa brtan por gyur pa yi/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang / /blo chen khyod kyis gzung bar bgyi/ /byang chub sems gang rdo rje de/ /

shes rab dril bu zhes bshad do/ /slob dpon nyid kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /'di ni rdo rje rigs dag pa'i/ /sdom pa dam tshig yin par gsungs/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po la/ /nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du/ /zang zing chos dang mi 'jigs byams/ /

sbyin pa rnam bzhi rab tu sbyin/ /phyi nang gsang ba theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /'di ni pad+ma'i rigs dag pa'i/ /dam tshig sdom pa yin par gsungs/ /las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /mchod

pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi/ /de las gzhan pa bcu bzhi ni/ /spang zhing dor bar mi bya ste/ phas pham par ni rab bshad de/ /rtsa ba'i ltung ba zhes bshad do/ /nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du/ /nyin re bzhin du blang bar bya/ /gang tshe nyams gyur rnal 'byor pa/ /kha na ma tho sbom por 'gyur/ /

khyod kyis srog chags gsad mi bya/ /ma byin par yang mi blang ngo / /'dod pa log par mi spyad cing / /brdzun du smra bar mi bya'o/ /phung khrol kun gyi rtsa ba ste/ /chang ni yongs su spang bar bya/ /sems can don phyir ma gtogs par/ /bya ba ma yin thams cad spang / /dam pa nye bar bsten bya zhing / /rnal

'byor pa rnams bsnyen bkur bya/ /lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang / /dag gi las ni rnam bzhi dang / /yid kyi las ni rnam gsum po/ /ci nus par ni rnam par spang / /theg pa dman la 'dod mi bya/ /sems can don la rgyab phyogs min/ /'khor ba dag kyang yongs mi spang / /rtag tu mya

ngan 'das mi chags/ /lha dang lha min gsang ba la/ /khyod ni bsnyen par mi bya zhing / /phyag rgya mtshon cha bzhon pa dang / /mtshan ma bgom par mi bya zhing / /'di dag dam tshig yin par gsungs/ /'di las rtag tu mi 'da' bar/ /khyod kyis rtag tu bsrung bar gyis/ /zhes lan gsum brjod pa'i

tshe slob mas nyan par bya'o/ /de nas slob mas sdom pa 'di ltar khas blang bar bya ste/ slob dpon deng 'dir bdag la gson/ /gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal pa/ /de ltar bdag gis bgyid par 'tshal/ /zhes lan gsum brjod do/ /de nas rigs lnga'i sdom pa khas blang ba ni/ /sangs rgyas byang

chub sems dpa' rnams/ /ci tsam dus nas bzung nas su/ /ma lus bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas su/ /nam zhig byang chub snying po la/ /yongs su gnas kyi bar dag tu/ /bdag gis byang chub mchog gi sems/ /ma lus par ni bskyed par bgyi/ /ji

ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/ /byang chub ni nges mdzad pa'i/ /byang chub sems ni bla na med/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la/ /tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang / /dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang / /sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum/ /

bdag gis brtan por gzung bar bgyi/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /deng nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi/ /nam du yang ni mi spang ngo / /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po yi/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang / /yang dag nyid du gzung

bar bgyi/ /slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la/ /nyin re bzhin du dus drug tu/ /sbyin pa rnams bzhi rab tu sbyin/ /byang chub chen po las byung ba'i/ /pad+ma'i rigs mchog chen po la/ /phyi dang gsang ba

theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos ni gzung bar bgyi/ /las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi/ /byang chub sems ni bla na med/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed bgyis nas/ /sems can kun gyi

don gyi phyir/ /bdag gis sdom pa ma lus gzung / /ma grol ba rnams dgrol bar bgyi/ /ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral bar bgyi/ /dbugs ma phyung rnams dbugs dbyung zhing / /sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod/ /ces lan gsum brjod par bya'o/ /de nas sems bskyed pa ni/ /slob

ma skad cig gis/ /tshe dpag med mgon por bskyed la/ rdo rjes dri'i thig le snying gar byas la/ /de zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du bsams nas/ o hrIHb+h+rUM A yudz+nyA na badzra yi ge tsit+ta ut+pA da yA mi zhes brjod pa ni kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems so/ /yang snying gar rdo rje bzhag la/ zla ba'i steng du rdo rje rtse lnga

pa bsgom du gzhug /de nas oM badzra su ra ta sa ma ya s+t+wAM bo d+hi tsit+ta ya thA su khaM sa ma ya ha ho/ /zhes don dam byang chub kyi sems bskyed par bya'o/ /de ltar slob ma lhar bskyed pa de'i sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab/ mchod pa rnam pa lnga dbul bar bya'o/ /de'i rjes la slob ma de rnams shar sgo dang

lho sgo nub sgo byang sgo rnams nas yid kyis 'jug par bya'o/ /de nas slob ma la spro ba bskyed pa'i sgo nas dam bsgrag pa ni/ snying gar rdo rje bzhag la/ /mi yi srid pa legs thob pas/ /dus 'dir sangs rgyas rigs su chud/ /nga yis yi shes dbang thob pas/ /tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas thob/ /

gang zhig 'di nyid ma mthong ba'i/ /mdun du smra bar ma byed cig /gal te smras na dam tshig nyams/ /des na mchog tu gsang bar bgyi/ /lan cig brjod do/ /de nas ye shes sems dpa'i sgo nas dam bsgrag pa ni/ /slob ma'i spyi bor rdo rje bzhag nas tshe dpag med tu bsams nas lus

la bstims la/ /'di ni khyod kyi dam tshig ste/ /gang la smras na klad pa 'gems/ /srog la babs kyang mi smra'o/ /gsang bas dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur/ /zhes brjod do/ /de nas dam tshig gi chu sbyin pa ni/ sbrang gi chu dang yab yum zhu ba gnyis su med par bsams nas slob ma la byin la/ 'di ni khyod

kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed/ /dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub thob/ /ye shes bdud rtsi'i chu 'di 'thung / /oM hrIHb+h+rUM dz+nyA na badzra ya ta hUM zhes brjod do/ /de nas khyad par du rdo rje slob dpon gyi dam bsgrag pa ni/ rdo rje dril bu mgor bzhag la/ /dus 'di nyid nas bu khyod kyi/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa

nga yin gyi/ /nga yis 'di skad bka' stsal pa/ /khyod kyis gus pas nyan par gyis/ /gal te nga la brnyas pa na/ /sangs rgyas thams cad brnyas pa yin/ /mos dang gus pa ma byas na/ /bdud kyis bcom nas dmyal bar 'gro/ /de bas dam tshig gnas par gyis/ /dam tshig dag las mi 'da' ba/ /

tshe 'dir sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur/ /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas gdong g.yogs oM AHhUM gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs la bcings nas lus kyi gshis ni 'di ltar bya ste/ rkang pa gnyis gshibs la langs nas thal mo spyi bor sbyar rlung bzung nas yid kyis gsol ba gdab pa ni/ bcom

ldan mgon po tshe dpag med/ /yab yum 'khor dang bcas pa yis/ /bdag la ye shes dbab tu gsol/ /dus 'dir byin gyis brlab par rigs/ /zhes lan gsum du gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon gyis slob ma'i spyi bor tshe dpag med yab yum 'od dang 'od zer gyi rang bzhin

gar byed pa la dmigs pa gtad pa dang sku las ye shes kyi bdud rtsi kha dog lnga byung nas lus la thim par bsam/ /yang yab kyi g.yas su grub pa'i rgyal mo g.yas Da ma ru g.yon thod pa bsnams pa/ sku mdog smug nag rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa gar byed pa la shes pa btang / g.yon

du brgyud pa rnams bsam/ de nas slob ma la dmigs pa de rnams bstan nas rang dang slob mas mos gus byas pa dang / spyi bo'i lha tshogs rnams gar thabs su ling ling la spyi bor sib sib thim par bsams nas/ rol mo sna tshogs sgrogs spos dkar nag dud pas bdug cing ngag tu/

oM hrIHb+h+rUM badzra A yu r+dz+nyA na A be sha ya AHzhes mang du brjod pas/ lus ngag yid gsum la phebs par 'gyur ro/ /de'i rtags ni 'phar ba dang gar byed pa dang / /saM skr-i ta'i skad dang rdo rje'i glu dang / rtog med ting 'dzin dpag med 'byung ngo / /de nas dkyil

'khor du 'jug pa ni/ las kyi slob dpon gcig gis rdo rje thogs la slob ma dkyil 'khor gyi shar du khrid nas/ yang dag pa yi dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /bdag gis slob ma 'jug par bgyi/ /lha rnams kyi ni rigs ji bzhin/ /dngos grub bsod nams de bzhin shog /ces

brjod do/ /de nas me tog thogs la/ sngon nas bsgrubs pa'i yi dam lha/ /gang yin de ring bdag bsnyen gyi/ /rigs dang mthun pa'i dngos grub dang / /lha dang ma nor mjal bar shog /ces me tog dor la me tog gang la phog pa'i rigs kyi ming bde chen 'od dpag med dang mi bskyod

tshe dpag med dang / rin chen tshe dpag med la sogs pa'i rigs mthun ming rnams gdags par bya'o/ /de nas me tog de mgo la bcings nas tshe dpag med du bsams nas/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas byin brlabs pa'i/ /me tog 'od dpag med pa 'di/ /stobs chen khyod kyis

rab bcings pa'i/ /rigs kyi bdag por dbang bskur ro/ /zhes pas spyi bor gdags so/ /de nas gser gyi thur mas mig bye la/ tshe dpag med pas deng khyod kyis/ /mig ni yang dag 'byed par mdzad/ /rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med/ /phye bas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/ /

zhes brjod la gdong g.yogs dgrol bar bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor bstan pa ni/dkyil 'khor bzang po 'di la ltos/ /mthong nas dang ba rab tu bskyed/ /khyod ni tshe dpag rigs su skyes/ /sngags dang phyag rgya'i byin rlabs kyis/ /'gro don phun sum tshogs kun dang / /

dngos grub thams cad mngon du 'gyur/ /dam tshig thams cad bsrung ba dang / /gsang sngags la yang brtson par gyis/ /zhes brjod la dkyil 'khor gyi rnam dag bstan/ de nas phung po lnga yab lnga/ tshe dpag tu med pa yab yum du ngo sprad par bya'o/ /de nas phyag rgya bya ste/ gling

bzhis brgyan pa'i maN+Dal dang / lus longs spyod gser gyi maN+Dal phul nas/ dbang bskur bar gsol ba gdab pa ni/ byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la/ /ji ltar mchod chen stsal ba ltar/ /bdag kyang rab tu bsgral ba'i phyir/ /nam mkha'i rdo rje bdag la stsol/ /gtso bo mgon po tshe dpag med/ /

yab yum 'khor dang bcas pa yi/ /'chi med bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun gyis/ /dbang bskur deng 'dir bdag la stsol/ /zhes lan gsum gsol ba gdab bo/ /de nas dbang bskur ba ni/ sangs rgyas dang dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs thams cad kyis byin gyis brlab/ /khro bo thams cad kyis bar chad rnams

bsrung / /mchod pa'i lha mo thams kyis phyi nang gsang gsum gyis mchod/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa brjod/ rigs kyi yum lngas rin po che'i bum pa nas ye shes kyi bdud rtsis dbang bskur bar bsams la/ /slob ma'i spyi gtsug tu bum pa bzhag nas/ ji

ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni/ /lha rnams kyis ni khrus gsol ltar/ /lha yi chu ni dag pa yis/ /de bzhin bdag gis sku khrus gsol/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu mAM/ phyogs dus sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /gsang gsum gnas las byung ba yi/ /khams gsum kun gyis phyag

byas pa'i/ /rdo rje dbang bskur chen po sbyin/ /zhes pa ni spyir bskur ba'o/ /de nas rigs pa'i dbang lnga bskur ba ni/ bum pa mi bskyod par bskyed la dgug gzhug bya/ rang dang slob ma gnyis ka mi bskyod par bskyed nas dbang bskur ba ni/ kun gzhi rnam shes rnam dag pa/ /me long ye shes ngo bo

nyid/ /bcom ldan mi bskyod pa yi ni/ /bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun dbang bskur ro/ /zhes brjod nas/ chu rgyun spyi bor blugs pas lus bde bas khyab cing / zhe sdang thams cad dag nas me long ye shes rgyud la skyes bar bsgom mo/ /de nas dbu rgyan stong pa'i rang las rin 'byung du bskyed/ ye shes pa

gzhug /rang dang slob ma gnyis ka yang rin 'byung du bsams/ dbu rgyan de slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag la/ thor gtsug cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rab bsngags pa/ /rin chen dag gi dbu rgyan dang / /dar dpyangs dbang bskur sbyin par bya/ oM rat+na a b+hiShiny+tsa mAM zhes brjod

pas/ /nga rgyal dag nas mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rgyud la skyes par bsam mo/ /de nas rdo rje dang rang gi slob ma snang ba mtha' yas su bskyed la rdo rje mgor bzhag nas/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i dbang / /deng 'dir khyod la bskur byar bya/ /sangs rgyas kun du rab bsgrub phyir/ /

rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long / /zhes pa lag pa g.yas su byin la/ oM pad+ma badzra na ya hrI a b+hi Shany+tsi mAM zhes brjod do/ /des 'dod chags dag nas/ so sor rtog pa'i ye shes rgyud la skyes par bsgom mo/ /de nas dril bu dang slob ma don yod grub par bskyed la/ dril bu mgor bzhag la/

sangs rgyas kun gyi dril bu'i dbang / /deng 'dir khyod la bskur bar bya/ /sangs rgyas kun du rab bsgrub phyir/ /dril bu 'di ni khyod kyis long / /oM a ti ba ta ye a b+hi Shiny+tsa mA zhes lag pa g.yon du sbyin no/ /des phrag dog dag nas bya ba grub pa'i ye shes rgyud la skyes par bsgom mo/ /de

nas rdo rje dang dril bu rnam par snang mdzad du bskyed la/ rang slob ma yang de bzhin du bsams nas/ rdo rje dang dril bu lce thog tu bzhag nas/ sangs rgyas kun gyi ming gi dbang / deng 'dir khyod la bskur bar bya/ /sangs rgyas kun du rab bsgrub phyir/ /ming gi dbang 'di khyod kyis long / /

oM badzra satwa ya twaM a b+hiShiny+tsi tu mA zhes brjod pas/ gti mug dag nas chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rgyud la skyes par bsgom mo/ /de dag gis bye brag tu rigs pa'i dbang lnga bskur ba bstan no/ /de nas khyad par du 'chi med ye shes bdud rtsi'i phyi nang gsang ba de kho na nyid kyi dbang bskur ba bshad

par bya ste/ de yang slob mas gser gyi maN+Dal phul nas/ gsol ba gdab pa ni/ bla ma mgon po tshe dpag med/ /lha tshogs 'khor dang bcas pa rnams/ /bdag la brtse bar dgongs nas kyang / /'chi med tshe yi dbang bskur stsol/ /zhes gsol ba lan gsum gdab bo/ /de nas

dbang bskur ba ni/ gong bzhin du spyir dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs dang / khyad par du bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tu med pa'i bdud rtsi'i rgyun bum pa bkang nas dbang bskur bas/ spyir lus ngag yid gsum gyi sdig pa dang sgrib pa dang / khyad par du tshe zad pa dang nyams pa dang 'gribs pa

thams cad sangs kyis dag par bsams nas/ bum pa spyi bo'i thog tu bzhag la dbang bskur ba ni/ so sor kun rtog rang bzhin gyi/ /bcom ldan tshe dpag med pa ni/ /sku mdog dmar po 'od zer 'bar/ /'chi med bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun dang / /bum pa tshe yis bkang nas kyang / /tshe dbang thams

cad bdag la stsol/ /oM hrIHb+hUM badzra dz+nyA na A yuShe swA hA/ de nas dmigs pa thams cad gong bzhin du rang dang slob ma gnyis kas bsams la/ dbang bskur ba ni/ me long ye shes rang bzhin gyi/ /mi bskyod tshe dpag med pa ni/ /sku mdog sngon po 'od zer 'bar/ /'chi med bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun

dang / /bum pa tshe yis bkang nas kyang / /tshe dbang thams cad bdag la stsol/ /oM hUM b+h+rUM badzra dz+nyA na A yu She swA hA/ mnyam nyid ye shes rang bzhin gyi/ /rin 'byung tshe dpag med pa ni/ /sku mdog ser po 'od zer 'bar/ /'chi med bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun dang / /bum pa tshe yis bkad nas kyang / /

tshe dbang thams cad bdag la stsol/ /oM swA b+h+rUM badzra dz+nyA na A yuShe swA hA/ chos dbyings ye shes rang bzhin gyi/ /rnam snang tshe dpag med pa ni/ /sku mdog dkar po 'od zer 'bar/ /'chi med bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun dang / /bum pa tshe yis bkang nas kyang / /tshe dbang thams cad bdag la stsol/ /oM

b+h+rUM b+h+rUM badzra dz+nyA na A yu She swA hA/ bya grub ye shes rang bzhin gyi/ /don grub tshe dpag med pa ni/ /sku mdog ljang gu 'od zer 'bar/ /'chi med bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun dang / /bum pa tshe yis bkang nas kyang / /tshe dbang thams cad bdag la stsol/ /oM AHb+h+rUM badzra dz+nyA na A yu She swA hA/ de dag gis phyi yab

lnga'i sgo nas dbang bskur ba bstan to/ /de nas yum gos dkar mos dbang bskur bas lus ngag yid gsum gyi sdig sgrib dang tshe nyams pa dang 'gribs pa thams cad sangs kyis dag nas lus phru ma phus btab pa bzhin du gyur to/ /de nas bdud rtsi rkang mthil nas yar skya me re re byung nas spyi bor sleb

pa dang rang gi lus ye shes kyi lus su gyur par bsams la bum pa spyi bor bzhag nas/ 'od dpag yum mchog gos dkar mo/ /phyag na rA ga'i bum pa bsnams/ /tshe dang bdud rtsis bkang nas kyang / /tshe dbang thams cad deng 'dir stsol/ /oM b+h+rUM a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA

dzA ya swA hA/ zhes yum thams cad la dmigs pa dang sngags gong bzhin no/ /mi bskyod yum mchog sangs rgyas spyan/ /phyag na shel gyi bum pa bsnams/ /tshe dang bdud rtsis bkang nas kyang / /tshe dbang thams cad deng 'dir stsol/ /rin chen yum mchog mA

mA ki/ /phyag na bai DUr bum pa bsnams/ /tshe dang bdud rtsis bkang nas kyang / /tshe dbang thams cad deng 'dir stsol/ /snang mdzad yum mchog dbyings phyug ma/ /phyag na gser gyi bum pa bsnams/ /tshe dang bdud rtsis bkang nas kyang / /tshe dbang thams cad deng 'dir stsol/ /don

grub yum mchog dam tshig sgrol/ /phyag na in+d+ra'i bum pa bsnams/ /tshe dang bdud rtsis bkang nas kyang / /tshe dbang thams cad 'dir stsol cig /de dag gis yum lnga'i dbang bstan to/ /de nas sems dpa' bcu drug gi bshad par bya ste/ shar phyogs kyi sems dpa' bzhis dbang

bskur bas 'chi med tshe'i dngos grub thob par bsams la/ bum pa spyi gtsug tu bzhag nas 'di skad brjod par bya ste/ shar phyogs mi bskyod sems dpa' bzhi/ /bai DUr sngon po'i mdog 'dra ba/ /phyag g.yas rdo rje rtse lnga bsnams/ /g.yon na tshe yi bum pa 'dzin/ /tshe dang bdud rtsis

bkang nas kyang / /tshe dbang thams cad 'dir stsol cig /sngags ni gtso bo mi bskyod pa'o/ /lho phyogs rin chen sems dpa' bzhi/ /btso ma gser gyi mdog 'dra ba/ /phyag g.yas rin chen 'bar ba bsnams/ /g.yon pas tshe yi bum pa 'dzin/ /tshe dang bdud rtsis bkang nas kyang / /

tshe dbang thams cad 'dir stsol cig /nub phyogs pad+ma'i sems dpa' bzhi/ /pad+ma rA ga'i mdog 'dra ba/ /phyag g.yas chu skyes 'dab lnga bsnams/ /g.yon pas tshe yi bum pa bsnams/ /tshe dang bdud rtsis bkang nas kyang / /tshe dbang thams cad 'dir stsol cig /byang phyogs phrin las

sems dpa' bzhi/ /in+d+ra nI la'i mdog 'dra ba/ /phyag g.yas rdo rje rgya gram 'dzin/ /g.yon pa tshe yi bum pa bsnams/ /tshe dang bdud rtsis bkang nas kyang / /tshe dbang thams cad 'dir stsol cig /de nas 'chi med tshe'i dngos grub thob pa yin snyam pa'i nges shes bskyed do/ /des ni

gsang ba sems dpa' bcu drug gi dbang bstan to/ /de nas de kho na nyid bshad par bya ste/ rang dang slob ma'i snying ga'i hrIHdang dkyil 'khor gyi shar phyogs nas lha mo lcags kyu ma dkar mo gcig las bcu/ bcu las brgya la sogs pa mang po dpag tu med pa spros nas rang gzhan thams cad kyi nad

gdon zhi ba'i las byas/ /byad par du shar dri za'i lag nas rang gi tshe nyams pa 'gribs pa zad pa rnams bkug nas slob ma la bstims bas nad gdon thams cad zhi nas tshe rgyas par bsams la spyi gtsug tu bum pa bzhag nas/ shar phyogs dkar mo zhi mdzad lha/ /dri za'i lag nas tshe khug la/ /nad dang

gdon rnams zhi mdzad pa'i/ /dbang bskur deng 'dir bdag la stsol/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHa pa ri mi ta A yudz+nyA na su bi niHswA hA/ de nas rang dkyil 'khor gyi lho nas zhags pa ma ser mo spros la tshe dang longs spyod la sogs pa rgyas pa'i las byas te/ gshin rje'i lag nas tshe bkug la bstims

nas/ lho phyogs ser mo rgyas mdzad ma/ /gshin rje'i lag nas tshe khug la/ /tshe dang longs spyod rgyas pa yi/ /dbang bskur bdag la deng 'dir stsol/ /yang sa bon dang nub nas lcags sgrog ma nub tu spros chu lha'i lag nas tshe khug la/ srid gsum dbang du byas par bsams

nas/ nub phyogs dmar mo dbang gi lha/ /chu lha'i lag nas tshe khug la/ /srid gsum dbang du sdud mdzad pa'i/ /dbang bskur deng 'dir bdag la stsol/ /yad sa bon dang byang phyogs nas dril bu ma mang po spros nas nad gdon tshar bcad nas/ gnod sbyin gyi lag nas tshe bkug la

bstims te/ byang phyogs ljang gu drag po'i lha/ /gnod sbyin lag nas tshe khug la/ /nad gdon thams cad tshar bcad pa'i/ /dbang bskur deng 'dir bdag la stsol/ /des yum bzhi pho nya mor byas nas dbang bskur ba'o/ /de ltar dbang bzhi po de rnams bskur bas nyon mongs pa dag 'chi

ba med pa'i dngos grub thob pa de'i ngang las bdag nyid gtso bo yab yum du bsam mo/ /de nas de nyid brtan par bya zhing dbang rtags su rigs lngas dbu brgyan par bya ste/ de yang bum pa spyi bor bzhag ste gtso bo yab yum du bskyed/ de las 'od zer dmar po lus la thim pas 'dod

chags dag nas so sor kun rtog rgyud la skyes nas 'od dpag med kyis dbu brgyan par bsams nas/ 'dod chags rnam par dag nas ni/ /'od dpag med pas dbu brgyan te/ /so sor kun rtog don rtogs nas/ /mdzes shing pad+ma'i lus thob shog /oM hrIHb+h+rUM pad+ma ka ma la

a b+hiShany+tsi tu mAM/ yang bum pa mi bskyod par bsams nas dpral bar bzhag 'od 'phros pas/ zhe sdang dag nas me long ye shes skyes te/ mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan par bsams nas/ /zhe sdang rnam par dag nas ni/ /bcom ldan mi bskyod dbu brgyan te/ /me long ye shes don rtogs shing / /

'gyur med rdo rje'i lus thob shog /oM hUM b+h+rUM badzra ka la sha a b+hiShany+tsi tu mAM/ yang bum pa rna ba g.yas kyi steng du bzhag nas rin 'byung du bsam/ de'i 'od kyis nga rgyal dag nas mnyam nyid ye shes rgyud la skyes te/ rin 'byung gis dbu brgyan par bsams nas/ nga rgyal rnam par dag nas ni/ /rin

chen 'byung ldan dbu brgyan pas/ /mnyam nyid ye shes don rtogs nas/ /bde chen lhun grub don rtogs shog /oM swA b+h+rUM rat+na ka la sha a b+hiShany+tsi tu mAM/ yang ltag par bum pa bzhag nas rnam par snang mdzad du bskyed/ de'i 'od kyis gti mug dag ste chos dbyings ye shes rgyud la skyes/

des dbu brgyan par bsams nas/ gti mug rnam par dag nas ni/ /sangs rgyas rigs kyi dbu brgyan te/ /chos dbyings ye shes don rtogs nas/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar shog /oM b+h+rUM bud+d+ha ka la sha a b+hiShany+tsi tu mAM/ yang rna ba g.yon par bum pa gzhag /don yod grub par bskyed/

de'i 'od kyis phrag dog dag /bya ba grub pa'i ye shes rgyud la skyes/ /des dbu brgyan par bsams nas/ /phrag dog rnam par dag nas ni/ /don grub rigs kyis dbu brgyan te/ /bya grub ye shes don rtogs nas/ /ci bsams ma lus 'grub par shog /oM A b+h+rUM ka la sha a b+hiShany+tsi tu mAM/

zhes rigs lngas dbu brgyan par bsams nas/ bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa brjod cing me tog 'thor ro/ /bdag kho na mgon po tshe dpag med yin zhing / tshe dpag med kho na bdag yin snyam pa'i nga rgyal brtan pos gnas par bya'o/ /de rnams kyis thun mong ma yin
