bzhad/ /phyag drug bdud 'dul mtshon cha 'dzin/ /rdo rje can la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /oM badzra muHzhes pas gshegs su gsol nas bsdu ba'o/ /bdag gis gzhan la phan phyir brtsams/ /dge ba de yis 'gro ba kun/ /bla med byang chub thob par shog /nam gru'i rigs las byung ba'i slob dpon dzA ba ri pas mdzad pa'i bdud bzlog pa'i cho ga rdzogs

so// //bal po'i bla ma de ba pUr+Na ma ti dang / lo tsA ba chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur pa'o//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI badzra pA Ni nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra ba liM d+hA ra Ni bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi gzungs kyi gtor ma'i cho ga zhes bya ba/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bsod nams 'dod dang 'dod la mnyes/ /

bar chod spong dang dug zhi phyir/ /thugs rje can la gus btud de/ /gtor ma'i las 'di brtsam par bya/ /dad ldan byang sems rnal 'byor pa/ /ser sna med cing gtong brtson pas/ /bza' ba bca' ba 'jib dang btung / /rin chen snod du rab tu bsham/ /hUM hrIHoM gyis byin brlab bya/ /bdud rtsi sha lnga ci 'byor pa/ /mtshan ldan pad+ma'i snod

du'o/ sngo dang dmar ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis/ /de steng a las ka pA la/ lcags kyu lnga dang sa bon lnga/ /de nas mdun gyi bar snang la/ /zla dkyil steng na yi ge hUM/ /de gyur rtse lnga de nyid can/ /sngo bskyod me 'bar rdzas rnams khol/ /'od kyis zla ba rdo rje zhu/ /thim pas dngul chu lta bur gnas/ /de yi steng du oM dkar po'i/ /'od kyis gang+gA'i klung

sogs bkug /bdud rtsi drangs te gnyis med bstim/ /'bru gsum sngags kyis byin brlab bya/ /de rjes mdun gyi mkha' stong la/ /paM las chu skyes 'dab brgyad bskyed/ /de dbus hUM las 'dod lha bskyed/ /lte 'khor dag la oM las ni/ /phyogs bzhir sangs rgyas bzhi yang bskyed/ /'dab ma mtshams bzhir khro mo ste/ /gong ras sgo ba bzhi po'o/ /

dmar ba'i sa bon 'dab brgyad dmar/ /phuHlas 'dab mar klu brgyad bskyed/ /ze 'bru bcu drug sna tshogs la/ /bdud dang gnod sbyin sna tshogs bskyed/ /rang gi snying ga'i 'od kyis ni/ /'phros pas sangs rgyas gang+gA yi/ /bye snyed dkyil 'khor lha la bstim/ /klu dang gnod sbyin bdud dang ni/ /sa 'og sa steng sa bla yi/ /thams cad de gsum dag la/

bstim/ /spyan la sogs pas dbang bskur te/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs lhar gyur/ /mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag mchod/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang mgron rnams kyi/ /rang rang lce la rdo rje ni/ /hUM las nas tshad tsam ni bskyed/ /rtse mo dag la oM bsams te/ /'od 'phros drangs pas gsol bar bsam/ /gnyis med ye shes thob 'gyur

te/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis mchod/ /gtso bo nyid la gtso bo ste/ /'khor ni so so'i sngags rim bzhin/ /a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+ha rmA NAM A d+ya nu t+pan+na twAta/ gnyis la sbyin pa gong dang 'brel/ /de nas bstod cing gsol ba gdab/ /so so yi ni sngags kyis ni/ /rang rang gnas su gshegs su gsol/ /spyod lam gyi ni dus dag tu/ /

rang nyid lha yi rnal 'byor bya/ /'di yis phan dang bsod nams ci bsags pa/ /'bras bu myur zhing longs spyod rnams ni thob/ /bgegs rnams zhi dang gdug pa zhi byed shog /bde ba mchog chen bdag gis thob par shog /dpal phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi gzungs kyi gtor ma'i cho ga zhes bya ba nam gru'i

rigs las byung ba dngos grub brnyes pa/ slob dpon chen po bram ze'i btsun pa dzA ba ri pa'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //bla ma de ba pUr+Na ma ti dang / lo tsA ba she'u badzra de bas bsgyur ba las/ slad kyi bdag dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bla ma la shin tu legs par zhus te/ phran bu tsho bcos pa lags so// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ kra ma Sha Ta nA ma/ bod skad du/ rim pa drug pa zhes bya ba/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'gro rnams rtog pa'i ngor gyur rtog gnas te/ /de la rtog cing dge dang mi dger 'dzin/ /dug dgra'i gseb thar chu srin kha ru ni/ /gru chad

bzhin du dga' dang mi dga' ste/ /rtag tu brtse bas 'dzin cing nga ros 'jigs/ /de la dngos po kun gyis 'dud cing 'dud/ /bka' drin thob dang rang nyams rtog de dran/ de 'dir 'dod lha mnyes dang nges 'byung dang / /sbyor ba gzhan gyis nges par 'byung ba yin/ /dang po gnyis yin

gnyis pa bzhi ru snang / dang po bzlas pa 'grub dang grub pa'i rtags/ /gsang sngags 'grub pa'i rtags dang mtshan ma ni/ /glegs bam du ma 'tsher mthong lag gis len/ /rnga chen dung dang cha lang dril bu dang / /mchod pa'i sgra sgrogs du ma'i gzugs mthong ba/ /maN+Dal dkyil 'khor las

byed chos 'chad nyan/ /glegs bam klog cing dkyus ltar 'dri ba smra/ /ras ris la ni bde gshegs gzugs brnyan ni/ /du ma mthong zhing rten gyi gzugs mthong ba/ /rol mo'i gzugs byed mchod rten gdugs sogs byed/ /rdo rje la sogs mtshan ma rnyed dam mthong / /me tog sna tshogs gsal

bar mthong ba dang / /nyi zla'i 'od 'bab gza' skar go mthong dang / /me gtong du langs nam mkha' yang ni 'khrigs/ /rdzing la chu 'dren khron pa las ni len/ /'bras kyi myu gu bzang dang lo ma bzang / /ce sbyang la sogs thul ba gos bzangs gyon/ /rgyan cha bzang zhing mtshon cha rno ba 'dzin/ /de rnams byung gyur

gsang sngags grub pa'i rtags/ /rnal 'byor pas gsang sngags 'grub pa'i rtags kyi rim pa ste rim pa dang po'o// //mig la sogs pa'i dbang pos srid gsum mthong / /thos dang snga phyi'i skye dran rdzas kun lud/ /ras ris bzhad cing ro sogs 'od 'byung dri/ /mun nag me tog char 'bab 'ja' tshon

snang / /tshogs na chos 'chad mun nag glegs bam dpyod/ /nam mkha' stong las sna tshogs rol mo'i sgra/ /'brug sgra glog 'gyu thog chen 'bebs pa dang / /nam mkha' stong zhing sprin sngon mthong ba dang / /de bzhin mthing nag sprin sngon nges 'gyur dang / /nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor 'od ldan sa gzhi bdal/

ras ris lugs ma la sogs bde gshegs gzugs/ /mchod cing skor ba byed dang rten la skor/ /dkyil 'khor bris nas mchod dam dbang bskur ba/ /mdzes pa'i snod du me tog sna tshogs thu/ /rin chen sna tshogs me tog bai pUr rnyed/ /shin tu skam pa'i sa las chu rdol ba/ /bdag nyid me dpung nang

'dug srog chags tshig /ting 'dzin gsal zhing yi dwags gzugs la brtson/ /dben zhing nyams dga'i gnas ni du ma mthong / /rtse gcig pa yi bsam gtan byed/ /seng ge'i khri steng gnas pa rmi/ /lha khang gnas gzhi rtsig mtshungs dang / /chu bo che dang / rgya mtsho'i steng nas 'gro/ /bar snang

'phur zhing bsdigs pa'i ltos 'gro len/ /'di 'dra'i rmi lam gsang sngags grub pa'i rtags/ /rnal 'byor pas gsang sngags grub pa'i rtags kyi rim pa ste gnyis pa'o/ /gnyis pa bzhi pa'i dang po'i mtshan nyid ni/ /sbyor ba gzhan byung rnal 'byor nyid la 'ong / /ri gzar dag

la mi thar mthar zad lhung / /ri brags 'dzul 'dod chu dong lhung ba dang / /phyugs lhas 'dam rdzab bshang gci'i nang dang ni/ /kha dog dmar dang skya ba'i chu dag la/ /rtsub dang gnag pa'i gos dang dmar ba'i gos/ /shin tu hrul po'i tshe ta'i pags pa gyon/ /shing rtsi ri las

lhung dogs rten med 'dug /gcer bur 'dug cing lcag lcig chu nang 'gro/ /gzung 'dzin yod pa'i rten sa de ru ni/ /nyin dang mtshan du rtag tu 'gro ba rmi/ /glang nag glang dmar ba nag ba dmar zhon/ /rtsub pa'i gos gyon ga ta la zhon pa/ /ma he ba lang khyus 'gro sogs rmi

ba/ /gnag dang ba lang khyus 'gro sogs mthong dang / /rta dang ga ta mig zlum khyus 'gro sogs/ /be ta tshe ta khyus 'gro sogs mthong ba/ /seng ge spyang dang khyi sogs mche can rmi/ /bse dang byi ba sder chags rmi 'gyur ba'o/ /sbyor ba gzhan gyis gnod pa 'gyur ba rnal 'byor pa la

mchan ma 'ong ba'i rim pa ste gsum pa'o// //gnyis pa'i bzhi pa gnyis kyi mtshan nyid ni/ /rnal 'byor stobs kyis mi thub mtshan nyid ni/ /bya dang byi ba sbrul gdug gnas pa'i mtsho/ /chu srin nya dang chu sogs gnas pa dang / /sdig pa sdom dang rtsangs pa rkang mangs dang / /sbrang bu mchu rings

srog chags phra mo rnams/ /de rnams rmi gyur bran rnams sbyor ba gnod/ /sbrul dang sbal pa sdom dang sdig pa dang / /bya sogs lus 'byar mchus 'debs gshog sbrug dang / /be ta la sogs rdzi med mdog rgod rmi/ /mi thub rtags te bud med smyo ba dang / mi thub kun la brdeg

'gyur mdog rgod ma/ /rgyan bzangs mdzes pa'i snod du zas sogs bkang / /rtag tu rgan mor 'ong 'gyur mi thub rtags/ /ltos 'gros lus dkris ldan zhing mi phrel dang / /sdig dang rtsangs sogs 'byar zhing mchus btsugs pa/ /sbrang bu mchu rings srog chags phra mo rnams/ /khrag 'jib lus

nang zhugs gyur mi thub rtags/ /chu srin nya sogs chu chen 'phyo zhing 'khyu/ /gnag dang dmar srog chu yis khyer ba rmi/ /de yang mi thub rtags te brtson par bzlog /dad ldan brtson pas mi 'grub gang yang med/ /sbyor ba gzhan las byung ba'i gnod pa rnal 'byor pa'i stobs kyis mi thub pa'i

rtags kyi rim pa ste bzhi pa'o// //gnyis pa bzhi pa gsum pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /rnal 'byor rtsal gyis thub cing non pa'i rtags/ /ma he gnag sogs rjud cing rid pa dang / /dud 'gro rnams ni btags sam brtod gyur pa/ /dud 'gro dgras khyer brtod dam rkun mos khyer/ /dud 'gro 'tsho dang 'bras kyi phub ma 'chag /dud 'gro

'khor dang rdzi yis skyong ba dang / /dud 'gro yor dang 'gab thegs thub pa'i rtags/ /dud 'gro gsad dang btsos nas za ba dang / /rang gzhan me byung dud 'gro tshig gyur dang / /de ni nges par dbang du 'dus pa'i rtags/ /bud med rgud cing ngo dma' shi ba dang / /ngu zhing rgyan bzang gus pas

phyag byed dang / /gnas nas gzhan 'gro thub pa'i rtags su bstan/ /sbrul la sogs pa'i srog chags du ma rnams/ /bsad dam zos sam shi'am ded gyur dang / /skem dang tshig gyur thub pa'i rtags yin no/ /bya dang byi ba sbrul gdug gnas mtsho skams/ /bud med zhum zhing du ba thub pa'i

rtags/ /sbyor ba gzhan rnal 'byor pa'i rtsal gyis non pa'i ltas kyi rim pa ste lnga pa'o// //gnyis pa bzhi pa bzhi pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /sbyor gzhan rab tu khros par gyur pa ni/ /rang nyid mi g.yog nas na gnas nas ni/ /sprul pa sna tshogs gzugs ni ston cing phyogs/ /'khor dang

bka' yi pho nya 'gyed cing 'dug /rigs mtho'i 'dra 'bag bu chung rab byung gzugs/ /'od gyur thang las skyes pa'i pho nya yin/ /de ni bzlog par bya ba'i thabs ni gzugs/ /blon po yul gyi rgan rabs 'ong 'gyur dang / /brod pa skyes pa gzhon nu bon po'i gzugs/ /sngags pa'i gzugs ni

'ong 'gyur brag skyes yin/ /de bcos bya ba'i thabs ni bstan pa yin/ /dkar dmar gnag cing shin tu mang ba yi/ /ba lang 'tsho zhing phyugs nang 'dug pa dang / /ral pa bzang po bud med smug nag dang / /g.ya' ri gangs ri las skyes pho nya yin/ /de phyir thabs ni du ma yod par gsungs/ /bud

med gzhon zhing rgyan bzangs rab byung ma/ /ma dang sru mo sring mo ni ne mo yi gzugs/ /nye du nye 'brel khrom chen bud med dang / /bu mo chung ma mtsho las skyes pa yin/ /de ni mnan pa'i thabs ni bya ba dang / /de rnams zhi 'gyur 'ga' zhig dbang du 'du/ /dbang du 'gro ba rtog pa'i nad

las thar/ /khyi la sogs pa dud 'gro phal cher ni/ /sbyor ba gzhan gyi pho nya yin pas bzlog /rang gi ngo bo gtso bo'i gzugs can te/ /dud 'gro'i gzugs ldan rgyan ldan de nyid do/ /nam mkha'i mthongs na gnas shing sprul pa yi/ /gzugs ni ma lus brjod kyis mi lang ste/ /de yang

dpag tu med pa'i mtha' mi rtogs/ /de phyir bde gshegs mthu dang mtshungs pa yin/ /sbyor ba gzhan gyis bka'i pho nya bkye ba'i rim pa ste drug pa'o// //bla ma'i bka' dang lhag lhas gnang ba byin/ /'gro la brtse bas rtog pa cung zhig sbyar/ /de yi dge ba ci bsags pa/ /

rtog la nges shing nges rtogs shog /rim pa drug pa zhes bya ba rtags gsal bar byed pa/ nam gru'i rigs las byung ba dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon dzA wa ri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta puN+ya ma ti dang lo tsA ba chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad

du/ ma rin ma ri a mr-i ta nA ma/ bod skad du/ bsad pa bdud rtsi'i gso ba zhes bya ba/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bsad pa gso bam byas na/ /gang zhig la ni sdig pa dang / /gang zhig shin tu khros 'gyur ba/ /de phyir gso ba'i cho ga dran/ /rin chen ga'u pad+ma can/ /de mtshungs ga'u steng

'gebs bya/ /phyogs bzhi pad+ma'i steng du ni/ /'bras phye'i rgyu las byung ba yi/ /tsan+dan chus bkrus sbrus pa yis/ /rigs bzhi klu yi gzugs gzhag ste/ /gdong pa mtshal gyis byug par bya/ /btsun mo bzhi dang khye'u bzhi/ /bu mo bzhi yi gzugs

kyang gzhag /de dag mdzes pa'i gzugs bya'o/ /pad+ma'i lte bar rin chen lnga/ /mtshams kyi pad+ma bzhi po la/ /dkar ser dmar ser bud med kyi/ /'o ma bzhi ni mtsho bzhi ste/ /der ni klu gzugs sna tshogs gzhag /ljang gu dar gyis steng dgab po/ /de nas

rang lha'i sa bon las/ /'od zer lcags kyu lta bu las/ /'ga' zhig rnam smin lus bor ba/ /bar do'i sems de bkug byas te/ /dri chu yis ni gnyis ka bsang / /gzugs la bstim zhing 'o mar bdar/ /sna tshogs sman gyis gtor bar bya/ /de ltar dgug pa lan

gsum bya/ /de ltar gso ba phyi nang gnyis/ /rang lha'i sa bon 'od 'phros pas/ /'ga' zhig sems kyi bag chags sbyangs/ /lce yi rdo rje lte bar a/ /a yi 'od zer phus btab pas/ /'ga' zhig sems kyi a la thim/ /bdud rtsi'i rgyun phab sems gso'o/ /sems dang shes pa

dran gsal bsam/ /'chi med bdud rtsi'o rgyun 'dis/ /klu brgyad 'khor bcas khyed rnams kun/ /sems dang shes pa gsal gyur cig /lus dang dbang po rgyas gyur cig /drin lan dam tshig dran gyis la/ /bka' dang dam las ma 'da' bar/ /shin tu khros pa zhi gyur cig /de ltar

rim pas lan gsum bar/ /de ni nang gi gso ba yin/ /de nas mngar gsum 'bras chan mar/ /gser dang khyi yi 'o ma dang / /nA ga ge sar la sogs pa'i/ /gso ba'i sman ni sna tshogs bsags/ /bdud rtsi'i 'o rgyun byin brlabs te/ /de yi nyams pa rnams sos bsam/ /gso

sman la sogs rim pa ni/ /mchod cing 'di skad brjod par bya/ /hUM nga ni thugs rje chen po yi/ /ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas/ /gso ba'i bdud rtsi rgyun phab nas/ /klu brgyad 'khor bcas khyed rnams kun/ /drag po'i sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis/ /bsreg dang btso ba'i sdug bsngal dang / /

mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /bsnun zhing gtubs pa'i sdug bsngal dang / /sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs myong / /'chi med gso ba'i sman tshogs kyis/ /bsregs shing btsos pa sos gyur cig /bsnun zhing gtubs pa sos gyur cig /lus dang dbang po rgyas gyur cig /mthu stobs ldan zhing bde gyur shog /

sdug bsngal kun las thar bar shog /byang chub sems bskyed dga' sems ldan/ /dbang po rnams kyi spyod yul du/ /mkho dgu longs spyod thams cad ni/ /'dod pa thams cad ldan gyur cig /nyams pa'i lus sogs rgyas gyur cig /yan lag thams cad bde gyur cig /klu nad thams

cad sos gyur nas/ /sdug bsngal nad las thar bar shog /ngan song gsum las thar nas ni/ /tshangs pa'i tshe dang ldan gyur te/ /chos spyod dbang po thul nas ni/ /phyag na rdo rje'i zhal mthong shog /'jigs pa kun las skyabs ldan shog /longs spyod chen po thob gyur cig /sngags

dang sman sogs byin rlabs kyis/ /nad dang nyer 'tshe kun sos pas/ /drin lan dam tshig dran par gyis/ /phyag na rdo rje'i bka' ma 'da'/ /zhe sdang gdug pa zhi gyur la/ /de ring che ge mo la ni/ /bsam ngan sbyor rtsub zhi gyur cig /klus byas bcings pa grol gyur cig /legs

bsams thams cad 'grub pa dang / /dar zhing rgyas pa'i dngos grub stsol/ /nA ga rA dza phuHshIn+taM ku ru swA hA zhes pa'i tshig /rim pas kun nas gdags par bya/ /gdengs ka'i phyag rgya bcas nas ni/ /dam tshig 'di yis bsgrag par bya/ /hU~M nga ni phyag na rdo rje ste/ /klu brgyad 'khor dang bcas

pa nyon/ /chos bshad bden pa mi nyan dang / /rig sngags rgyal po'i bka' bcag na/ /gso ba'i sman ni thams cad kun/ /mtshon cha'i char du gyur nas ni/ /lus kyi gnad la gzir bar byed/ /bsad cing bcad cing dum bur 'gyur/ /mngar gsum la sogs gtor ma yang / /

dug chen ha lar gyur nas ni/ /myos dang rmongs par gyur nas ni/ /tsha ba chen pos gzir bar byed/ /de bas dus rnams thams cad du/ /dam tshig 'di ni rtag tu srungs/ /oM nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra sa ma ya nA ga rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM phaT/ /de 'dra'i mchod pa gsum byas te/ /dkar gsum

mngar gsum gtor ma ni/ /cho ga'i rim pas gtang bar bya/ /de ni phyi yi gso ba yin/ /nyams dga' ba yi gzhal yas khang / /'dzam gling pho brang chen po ste/ /rten yod gnas su dam du sba/ /thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ba yin/ /gso ba'i de ni rim pa

ste/ /cho ga 'di ni shin tu legs/ /bdag gis man ngag rim pa 'di/ /gang zhig 'ga' la phan phyir byas/ /zla ba lta bu gang thob des/ /'gro rnams rtog pa'i nad grol shog /bsad pa gso ba'i cho ga rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ du hi a mr-i ta pU dza nA

ma/ bod skad du/ bdud rtsi 'o ma'i mchod pa zhes bya ba/ rdo rje bsnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyon mongs dug rnams 'joms mdzad pa'i/ /bdud rtsi lta bu khyod la 'dud/ /'gro ba rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /bsad pa gso ba'i thabs 'di bri/ /gser zangs la sogs snod du

bsham/ /sa bon gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs/ /rjes su gzung phyir sku bskyed nas/ /de nas de la mchod pa 'bul/ /rdo rje bsnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /hUM 'gro ba'i mgon po thugs rje can/ /gzung 'dzin dri ma'i skyon spangs nas/ /mnyes pas sku gsung thugs la dbul/ /

thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol/ /oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badzra pA Ni nI lAM bar d+ha ra ma hA kA ya A ha ra pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ zhes mchod yon dbul/ hUM me tog dam pa 'di dag dang / /de bzhin mdzes pa'i me tog rnams/ /bde gshegs thugs la dbul bar

bgyi/ /chags med thugs rjes bzhes su gsol/ /oM nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni puSh+pe pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM swA hA/ lhan cig skyes dang sbyar ba yi/ /lha rdzas bdug spos dam pa 'di/ /gtso 'khor bcas la dbul bar bgyi/ /rtog med thugs rjes bzhes su gsol/ /oM

badzra pA Ni nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra d+hU pe pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM swA hA/ /mun pa'i phyogs ni 'joms byed cing / /phyogs bcu gsal ba'i mar me 'di/ /kun mkhyen ye shes thob bya'i phyir/ /ye shes thugs mchog bzhes su gsol/ /oM badzra pA Ni nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra A lo ke pU dza me g+ha sa mu

dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM swA hA/ lhan cig skyes dang sbyar ba'i dri/ /dri mchog dam pa 'di dag ni/ /rang rang thugs la dbul bar bgyi/ /kun bzang thugs rjes bzhes su gsol/ /oM badzra pA Ni nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra gan+d+he pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM swA hA/ kha dog dri dang ldan pa'i mchog /bza' ba'i

mchog dang yang dag ldan/ /thams cad sbyar ba'i bshos 'di dag /rang rig ye shes brnyes la dbul/ /oM badzra pA Ni nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra pU lAM dza yan na pra Na pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM swA hA/ bla med theg pa mchog gi don ston pa/ /shes rab mchog gi rjes 'gro rol mo'i

sgra/ /bdud kyi 'khor lo gzhom phyir dbul bar bgyi/ /thugs kyis 'gro la mnga' brnyes 'di bzhes shog /oM badzra pA Ni nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra bud+d+ha k+She tra pra tsa li ti pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM swA hA/ nor rgyas dang ni dung skyong dang / /dga' bo dang ni 'jog po dang / /pad+ma dang ni chu lha

dang / /stobs kyi rgyu dang rigs ldan la/ /bdud rtsi 'o ma'i mchod pa 'bul/ /klu yi nad las thar gyur cig /gnod sbyin nad las thar gyur cig /bdud kyi nad las thar gyur cig /rdzas sba'o/ /dpal phyag na rdo rje'i mchod pa'i rim pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/

nA ga karma kro d+ha ma ra na nA ma/ bod skad du/ klu khro bos gsad pa'i phrin las zhes bya ba/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bsnyen bzlas pa'i rtags byung na/ /'ga' zhig dbang du bsdu dgos pas/ /de dbang bya phyir man ngag rim/ /mgon la lus btud man ngag dran/ /

dur khrod la sogs gnas dag tu/ /sngon du bsnyen pa rdzogs pa yi/ /nag po'i phyogs kyi zla ba la/ /bdun dang dgu dang lnga dus la/ /dkyil 'khor gru gsum khru gang tshad/ /mgo ni lho ru bstan par bya/ /sbrul dang sbal pa'i sha dang ni/ /ske tshe ju tshe khre dang til/ /thal ba sa dang lan tshwa

dang / /bu ram 'bras phye rnams las ni/ /sor brgyad tshad kyi smad 'khyil ba/ /dgu dang bdun dang lnga dang gsum/ /klu yi rgyal po'i gzugs byas te/ /mthing nag hUM phaT snying gar gzhug /gru gsum nang du mgo bo lhor/ /bstan te gan rkyal lta bur gzhag /de ltar rdzas rnams

bsags nas ni/ /lha yi rnal 'byor bdag ldan pas/ /lcags kyu lnga dang sa bon lnga/ /'dod pa'i lha la dbul ba ste/ /sbrul dang sbal pa'i sha khrag sogs/ /bsgrub bya de nyid la ni sbyin/ /rta sha la sogs sna tshogs sha /nang gi bka' srung rnams la sbyin/ /

'bras chan la sogs gtor ma ni/ /phyi yi bstan srung rnams la sbyin/ /bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor bya/ /sa bon las ni sna tshogs pa'i/ /khro bo mtshon cha 'dzin pa yis/ /bsgrub bya'i cho ga dang bral nas/ /drangs te sa bon la ni bstim/ /snga ma'i sa bon nyid gyur pas/ /'gugs

par byed pa'i sa bon byung / /dzaHhUM baM hoHnI lAM ba ra badzra pA Ni aM ku sha dzaHA kaR+Sha ya che ge mo hUM dzaHhUM phaT/ gsang sngags 'di ni brjod pa las/ /lcags kyu thogs pa'i lha mo ni/ /dpag tu med pa bkug par bsam/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHbe+e waM ba ra badzra pA Ni che ge mo pra be+e sha ya phaT/

gzugs brnyan kha phye bstims la gzhag /sna tshogs nad kyis gzir ba dang / /lus 'dar sems ni gdung bar bsam/ /sta re la sogs mtshon gyis gzir/ /rlung nag gis g.yengs grang bas khyab/ /gcan gzan sogs kyis lus zos bsam/ /dam tshig bsrung phyir gtor

ma sbyin/ /de nas phur bu mtshon cha thogs/ /gsad thabs gsum gyis gsad par bya/ /gnas bdun du ni phur bus gdab/ /hUM nga ni phyag na rdo rje ste/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /gdug pa 'dul phyir dbang bskur bas/ /stobs chen phyin las drag po yis/ /skad

cig tsam yang mi gnas phyir/ /lus kyi gnad du gzir bar gyis/ /oM nI lAM ba ra badzra pA Ni che ge mo kI li kI la ya hUM hUM phaT phaT/ gsang ba'i bdag por bka' srung phyir/ /gsang ba'i dam tshig bstan par bya/ /oM nI lAM bar badzra pA Ni sa ma ye hUM phaT/ phyag na rdo rje'i dam

tshig ste/ /phur pa'i lha dang che ge mo/ /dam tshig gnyan gyis 'da' bar/ /ci bsgo thams cad mnyan par gyis/ /hUM nga ro stobs chen drag po'i sgra/ /gdug pa gang zhig 'da' mi byed/ /nga yi mthu stobs drag po'i sgra/ /mgo bo tshal pa brgya ru 'gems/ /nyon cig ltos 'gro

thams cad kun/ /mthu stobs drag po'i bka' ma 'da'/ /oM nI lAM ba ra badzra pA Ni che ge mo ha ra ha ra/ pra ha ra pra ha ra/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+hin+d+ha b+hin+d+ha hUM phaT/ hUM rdo rje chen po rab 'bar tho/ /bka' las 'da' byed che ge mo/ /rdo rje chen pos snying bsregs nas/ /lus sems phra rab rdul du rlog /

rdo rje tho ba'i gtun khung du/ /rdo rje tho bas gtams byas nas/ /lha yang thal bar rlag byed 'gyur/ /lha yi che ge mo des gsod/ /oM nI lAM ba ra badzra pA Ni che ge mo ha na ha na/ ha sa ha sa d+ha ra d+ha ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ hUM phaT/ tar+ya thA hUM phaT/ rim pas gtor ma 'di sbyin no/ /

bdag med dngos pos btab cing dbul/ /nges par sod nas mnan pa bya/ /dkon mchog gsum la sdang ba'i dgra/ /man ngag rim pas gsad par bya/ /thos pa mang zhing shes rab can/ /bla ma la gus ser sna med/ /yin gyi gzhan du sbyin mi bya/ /bag med pas ni gal te byin/ /

'bras bu mi 'dod sna tshogs ni/ /tshe 'di nyid la myong bar 'gyur/ /sdang dang gdug pas zin pa'i thabs/ /zab mo'i man ngag cung zad smras/ /de yi bsod nams ci bsags pa/ /sdang dang gdug pa 'dul bar shog/ /slob dpon dzA ba ri ba'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa'i khro bos gsad

pa'i phrin las paN+Di ta de ba pUr+Na ma ti dang / lo tsA ba chos kyi bzang pos bcos pa'o//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ nA ga ku la tsa ri staM b+ha bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ klu rigs bzhi mnan pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig dbang

du 'dus gyur pas/ /bskal pa bye ba'i mtha' ru yang / /ldang bar mi nus bya ba'i phyir/ /rdo rje can la gus btud nas/ /sgrub pa po la phan gdags phyir/ /de yi mnan pa'i cho ga bstan/ /gser las byas pa'i mchod rten nam/ /yang na rin chen lnga las byas/ /khru gang tshad kyi

mchod rten brtsig /bum pa khog stong byas pa'i nang / /ku la tsa ri'i gzugs byas te/ /khong stong phyogs bzhir dgod par bya/ /de 'og phyogs bzhi'i rmang du ni/ /ku la tsa ri'i bran rnams gzhug /de nas lha yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /phreng ba'i sngags kyis bzlas pa las/ /sngags kyi 'od zer

lcags kyu yis/ /bsgrub bya bkug ste gnyis med bstim/ /yang na rang lha'i sa bon las/ /khro bo sna tshogs spros pa yis/ /bsgrub bya bkug ste snga ma bzhin/ /mngon sum lta bur khugs par bsam/ /ku la tsa ri'i spyi steng du/ /rdo rje rgya gram me ri 'bar/ /de yi lte ba'i

dkyil du ni/ /mi 'khrugs rgyal po g.yon brkyang bzhugs/ /bskal pa'i mtha' ru mnan par bsam/ /de nas bdud rtsi lngar bcas pa/ /rang gi 'dod pa'i lha la dbul/ /dam la gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ /sbrul dang sbal pa'i sha dang tshil/ /glang dmar ba dmar la sogs pa'i/ /khrag

la sogs pa rnams kyis ni/ /bsgrub bya la ni gtor ma sbyin/ /dbyar gyi khyim gsum tha ma yi/ /drug gnyis bzhi yi nyin phyed na/ /sgrub khang them rtsa'i 'og tu ni/ /shin tu dam par sba bar bya/ /phyag na rdo rje khro bo che/ /rab tu khros pa'i mthu stobs kyis/ /ri rab klad la bskor nas ni/ /

de 'og ku la tsa ri ni/ /rigs de rnams ni mnan byas kyis/ /thar ba yi ni dus med par/ /dam tshig gnyan gyis ma 'da' cig /nyes pa 'di las ma ldog cig /lus 'di rul cing myags gyur nas/ /snying ni 'gems shing zags par byed/ /tshe yi 'du byed byas nas

ni/ /mnar med par ni 'gro ba yin/ /byang chub sems bskyed byams pa'i sems/ /skyes pa'i tshe na gtang bar bya/ /phreng ba'i sngags ni brgya rtsa brgyad/ /shin tu khros pas bzlas par bya/ /mthu stobs drag po'i nga ro yis/ /stang stabs kyis kyang mnan par bya/ /ngang tshul

bzang zhing shes rab can/ /bla ma la gus gtong phod pa/ /gal te rmongs pas gzhan du sbyin/ /tsha ba chen por yun ring gnas/ /oM nI lAM ba ra badzra pA Ni sa ma ya nA ga ku la tsa ri i mAM ba liM khA hi khA hi swA hA/ gtor ma sbyin pa'i sngags so/ /klu rigs bzhi'i mnan pa nam gru'i rigs

las byung ba'i slob dpon dzA ba ri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni ho ma bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga zhes bya ba/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig med par

de mi 'byung / /des na de la 'jug pa dran/ /gang zhig 'dir rgyar khru gang ba/ /kun nas zlum po'i thab khung nang du rdo rje sor brgyad pa bkod de/ sa dkar pos byugs la tsan+dan dkar po la sogs pa'i dris kyang gtor ro/ /der rgya shug gam dgon pa'i ba lang gi lci ba btsar te/ nas dang / gro

dang / 'bras dang / sran ma dang / bdud rtsi lnga dang / me tog dkar po dang ldan pa'i mchod yon no/ /spos dang / mar me dang / dri chab dang / lha bshos te mchod pa'i rdzas te g.yon du'o/ /til dang / yam shing dang / mar dang / yungs kar dang / zho dang / 'o ma dang / zas dkar

gsum dang / mngar gsum dang / ku sha dang / dUr ba dang / nas dang / 'bras dang / gro dang / so ba dang / sran ma dang / bil ba dang / surga dang / dzA ti pha la rnams ni g.yas su gzhag par bya'o/ /rang lha'i rnal 'byor byas la mchod rdzas dang sreg rdzas rnams byin gyis brlabs te/

bgegs bskrad nas bram ze'am/ tha mal ba'am/ rgyun zhags sam/ 'o ma can gyi me blangs te/ oM badzra pA Ni dz+wA la dz+wA la hUM hUM phaT phaT ces bya bas me sbar bar bya'o/ /de nas hUM las thab khung bskyed pa ni/ raM las me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum la yi ge oM AHhUM las 'khor

lo dang pad+ma dang rdo rjer gyur pa las zhi ba'i rang bzhin gyi me lha mchod phyir thogs pa dkar po dang ldan pa ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas bdud rtsi dkar po'i rgyun 'byung ba zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ g.yas na rdo rje dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa/ g.yon dril bu dang bgrang phreng 'dzin pa can chu'i dkyil

'khor la gnas par bsgom mo/ /ye shes sems dpa' phyag rgya bzhis dgug pa la sogs pa byas te/ byin gyis brlab pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang / khrus byas nas mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod do/ /mar la sogs pa'i sreg rdzas rnams rig sngags 'dis dbul te/ oM ma

hA b+hU ta dz+wa lA ya sar+b+ba b+hasmi ku ru sar+b+ba big+h+nAM hUM phaT/ che ge mo shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ zhes pas zhi bar bsam mo/ /de'i rjes la me 'bar ba'i rgyur gyur pa'am de'i snying gar dpal phyag na rdo rje sgrub thabs las ji skad gsungs pa bzhin du bskyed la ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te/ gnyis

su med par byas la/ rang gi lha la mchod rdzas dang sreg rdzas rnams la phreng ba'i sngags la che ge mo shIn+tiM ku ru btags la dbul zhing zhi bar bsam mo/ /de nas dgang blugs phul te/ sngags 'dis gshegs su gsol lo/ /oM kr-i to ba sar+b+ba satwAr+tha/ sid+d+hi ma dat+tA ya

thA nu ga gats+tsha twAM bud+d+ha bi Sha yaM/ bu na ra ga ma na yats+tsha zhes pa'o/ /de nas yang thab bsangs la rdzas lhag ma rnams kyis me lha la phul te/ oM khyod kyis sems can don kun mdzad/ /rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang / /slar yang

'byon par mdzad du gsol/ /zhes me lha gshegs su gsol/ de nas dam tshig rang la bsdus nas 'bras chan la sogs pa'i gtor ma phyogs skyong la sogs pa la sbyin no/ /nyung bar 'dod na bla ma'i zhal nas ji skad gsungs pa bzhin 'di la 'jug par bya'o/ /dpal phyag na rdo rje'i sbyin

sreg gi cho ga nam gru'i rigs las byung ba dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon dzA ba ri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //bal po'i paN+Di ta de ba pur+Na ma ti dang / lo tsA ba chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur zhing zhus so//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni ho ma

bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga zhes bya ba/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig med par de mi 'byung / /des na de la 'jug pa brtsam/ /de la 'dir thab khung gru gsum pa mgo lhor bstan pa'i nang du/ khro bo'i rdo rje sor

brgyad pa bkod de/ thal ba dang sol bas nag por byugs la dri chu dang bong bu dang rnga mo'i rtug pas byug par bya'o/ /der mgal dum mam/ tsher ma can nam/ skam po'i shing bcer te/ khrag dang / ba'i gcin dang / bdud rtsi dang / me tog nag po ni mchod yon no/ /dri mi zhim pa dang / ro

kha ba dang / sngon po'i me tog go/ /bdud rtsi lnga sbyar ba'i spos so/ /mar chen po'i mar me/ dri chu dang til nag po sbyar ba ni dri chab/ dri chen dang mi sha bsres pa'i lha bshos te/ de rnams g.yas su gzhag par bya'o/ /dug dang / khrag dang / ske tshe dang / lan tshwa dang / nim pa dang /

da du ra dang / bdud rtsi lnga dang bsres pa'i yungs mar rnams ni dgang gzar du blugs te khrag tu byas la dbul lo/ /shing tsher ma can gyi yam shing dang / mar nag dang / khrag dang / dri chen dang / dri chu dang / mi rus dang / skra dang / sor mo dang / dug dang / ske tshe dang /

lan tshwa de rnams dang / rkang rjes dang / khyim bya'i sgo nga dang / bya rog gi sha rnams dang / bong bu dang / rnga mo'i rtug pa rnams ni sreg rdzas te/ sha dang rus par bsam mo/ /de rnams ni g.yon du'o/ /rang lha'i rnal 'byor byas la rdzas byin gyis brlabs nas bgegs

bskrad do/ /rdol pa'am/ sme sha can nam rdo las byung ba'am/ ri'i me blangs te/ bsang zhing / oM badzra pA Ni ma hA kro d+ha dz+wA la dz+wA la hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT swA hA/ zhes pas me sbar ro/ /me 'bar ba'i nang du raM las thab khung bskyed la de'i nang du hUM las nyi ma'i steng du oM AHhUM

las 'khor lo dang / pad+ma dang / rdo rjer gyur te/ de nas khro bo'i me lha shin tu khros pa/ skra kham pa gyen du brdzes pa/ 'od zer dpag tu med pa 'phro ba/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ g.yas na rdo rje dang skyabs sbyin/ g.yon na dril bu dang dbyug pa/ raM las me dang rlung gi

dkyil 'khor la bsams te/ ye shes sems dpa' dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byas nas der byin rlabs dang / dbang bskur te/ khrus gsol nas zhal gdangs pa'i nang du mchod rdzas dang sreg rdzas rnams 'dis dbul te/ oM badzra pA

Ni ma hU b+hU ta dz+wA la ya sarba b+hasmiM ku ru sarba duSh+TAM ma ma che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT ces pas gsad par bya'o/ /de nas me 'bar bas rgyur gyur pa'am/ yang na de'i snying gar dpal phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can sgrub thabs las ji skad gsungs pa bzhin nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas

par bskyed nas ye shes sems dpa' snga ma bzhin bstims la/ de bzhin du byin gyis brlabs pa dang dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de nas phreng ba'i sngags la mA ra ya dang bcas pas mchod rdzas snga ma bzhin du dbul lo/ /yang dgang blugs phul te/ ye shes sems dpa'

gshegs su gsol lo/ /de nas thab bsangs te/ rdzas lhag ma rnams me lha la phul nas/ oM bdag dang gzhan gyi don rnams ni/ /bsgrubs te sbyin sreg bzhes nas kyang / /slar yang 'byon par mdzad nas kyang / /bdag la sngags kyi dngos grub stsol/ /zhes

me lha gshegs su gsol lo/ /de'i rjes su dam tshig pa rang la bsdus te/ gtor ma sbyin par bya'o/ /nyung bar 'dod na bla ma'i zhal nas ji skad gsungs pa bzhin du 'di la 'jug par bya'o/ /phyag na rdo rje'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba nam gru'i rigs las byung ba

dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon dzA ba ri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //bal po'i paN+Di ta de ba pUr+Na ma ti dang / lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni maN+Da la bi d+hi nA

ma/ bod skad du/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'gro ba rnams ni ma rig mun pas bsgribs shing rkyen gyi ri bos non pa rnams/ /gsal ba'i ye shes nub cing 'khor ba'i 'dam du

bying / /de 'dra'i 'gro ba mang po yid kyis mngon sum mthong / /'gro ba de dag sa bon gnas dang rtsol rkyen gyis/ /sdug bsngal mang po spyod cing gdug pas zin gyur pa/ /de las thar pa'i thabs dag gzhan gyis mi nus te/ /srid 'joms sdug bsngal thal mdzad dbugs tsha

mi shigs 'dzin/ /gdug pa'i nad rnams ma lus thar mdzad snying rjes khros/ /'jigs byed khro rgyal rngam pa'i gtso la dngos po kun gyis 'dud/ /de la rtag tu mos shing dang bas mngon sum snang bar mdzad/ /ji srid mnyes byas lhag pa'i lha yis gnang ba byin/ /rang nyams myong

la gdug pa 'dul la dbang bskur gces/ /de dbang bskur phyir 'khor lo chen po'i cho ga dran/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon mdun/ /slob ma snod dang ldan pa yis/ /maN+Dal zlum po khru gang tshad/ /byi dor legs byas me tog dgram/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi gtor ma bsham/ /snod ldan

spyod lam legs byas te/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba ni/ /dus 'di nyid nas bzung nas ni/ /snying po byang chub thob kyi bar/ /bla ma dam par gsol 'debs kyis/ /bdag gi bla ma mdzad du gsol/ /sems can ma brgal bsgral ba dang / /

ma grol ba rnams dgrol ba dang / /dbugs ma phyung ba dbugs phyung dang / /mya ngan mi 'da' bzla ba dang / /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bsgrub pa dang / /bla mar zhu bar khyod spro'am/ /slob dpon gnang ba byin nas ni/ /slob mas ci 'byor bas mchod nas/ /dgos pa thams cad dri bar bya/ /lung

rnams phog la bsnyen pa bya/ /thim nas sdig pa sbyang ba'i phyir/ /zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bdun byas te/ /bar chad bsal phyir gtor ma gtang / /tshogs bsags phyir ni mchod pa bsham/ /mkha' 'gro ma la gtor ma gtang / /de nas gong ma'i maN+Dal de/ /byi dor legs byas me tog dgram/ /

spyod lam legs byas mchod pa dbul/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i lha tshogs dang / /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la/ /sgo gsum dang bas phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ /mchod pa bla na med pas

mchod/ /'khor ba thog ma med pa nas/ /mtshams med lnga dang nye ba lnga/ /mi dge bcu dang lci ba brgyad/ /kha na ma tho la sogs pa/ /'phags pa'i tshogs la so sor bshags/ /rkang gnyis gtso bo sangs rgyas dang / /'dod chags bral ba'i chos rnams dang / /tshogs

kyi gzhir gyur dge 'dun la/ /dang ba'i sems kyis skyabs su mchi/ /phyogs bcu mtha' yas zhing rnams na/ /mngon par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /ring po ma lon thams cad la/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskur/ /ji srid 'khor ba ma stongs par/ /mya

ngan mi 'da' gsol ba gdab/ /'jig rten dge bcu ji snyed pa/ /nyan thos rang rgyal dge sogs bcas/ /sangs rgyas sras bcas 'gro don mdzad/ /de dag la ni yi rang ngo / /dge bcu ji snyed spyod pa dang / /bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang ni/ /pha rol phyin pa bcu la sogs/ /

byang chub chen por bsngo bar bgyi/ /bdag gi lus 'di ji srid du/ /len pa rdo rje slob dpon dang / /'khor lo chen po'i lha tshogs dang / /sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa la/ /ngag yid dang bas dbul bar bgyi/ /byang chub mchog gi rang bzhin can/ /

sems can kun la khyab par gnas/ /ma rtogs 'khor bar 'khyams pa rnams/ /de dag don du sems bskyed do/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas sras bcas pa'i/ /bslab dang slob par gyur ba yis/ /sems can don byed tshul khrims dang / /sdom pa'i tshul khrims

ldan pa dang / /dge ba'i chos sdud tshul khrims dag /yang dag blangs te gnas bgyid do/ /dus 'di nyid nas bzung nas ni/ /'khor ba'i nyes pas ma gos par/ /mchod pa kun dang ldan par ni/ /dus kun du ni lags par nos/ /sdig sgrib sbyang phyir slob ma ni/ /mang

por slob ma zlos su gzhug /oM a mr-i te hUM/ de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ /ting nge 'dzin ni gsum bsgoms te/ /mchod pa dang ni gtor ma bsham/ /sa yi bdag po rgyas par mchod/ /snang dang mi snang sa bdag la/ /sa blang ba yi gsol ba gdab/ /byin nam

ma byin rtags kyis brtag /las dang sngags dang sbyin sreg dang / /mtshan ma med pas sbyar ba'o/ /blo dang lha yis sa gzung ngo / /lto 'phye brtags la sa brko ste/ /stegs bu byi dor legs byas la/ /rnal 'byor lus kyi khru gang tshad/ /'phang du khru gang tshad dang sbyar/ /

gser ram dngul lam 'jim pa las/ /byas pa'i bum pa bcu'am drug /btsal te legs par bkrus pa dang / /dri zhim bsgo zhing dkar por bya'o/ /de nas bum pa'i nang du ni/ /kaN+Da ka ri br-i ha ti/ /shan tA ka ni daN+Do tA la dang / /tig ta'i me tog sman lngar blugs/ /

'bras dang so ba sran ta ka /nas dang gro dang til dang ni/ /'bru sna bum pa'i nang du blugs/ /gser dang dngul dang bye ru dang / /mu tig man shel rin chen lnga/ /bum pa'i nang du blugs par bya/ /bu ram sbrang rtsi lan tshwa dang / /mar dkar til gyi mar dang lnga/ /bum pa'i

nang du blugs par bya'o/ /'o ma chu yis sbyangs pa yang / /bum pa'i nang du blugs la gzhag /de dag thams cad blugs pa la/ /gzungs kyi phreng ba bzlas par bya'o/ /kha tshar ma nyams ras yug gis/ /bum pa'i mgul ba bcings te gzhag /de nas stegs bu

gru bzhi'i steng / /maN+Dal zlum po lnga byas te/ /dbus kyi maN+Dal mthing ga la/ /shar dang lho dang nub dang byang / /dkar dang ser dang dmar dang ljang / /kha dog tshon gyis bsgyur la gzhag /gtso bo'i bum pa dbus su gzhag /'khor gyi bum pa phyogs mtshams dang / /las

kyi bum pa byang shar mtshams/ /bum pa mi dmigs stong pa las/ /thig le dkar po baM du gyur/ /de gyur bdud rtsis bkang ba yi/ /rin po che yi bum par bsam/ /de yi steng du suM las ni/ /rin chen sna bzhi'i ri rab bsam/ /steng du sprin sgra bsnol ma las/ /sna

tshogs rdo rje bsam par bya/ /de yi lte bar paM las ni/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad ge sar bcas/ /pad+ma'i lte ba'i b+h+rUM las ni/ /gzhal yas khang ni mdzes par bsam/ /de yi nang du paM las ni/ /chu skyes pad+ma ge sar bcas/ /dam tshig 'khor lo bskyed par bya/ /de nas ye

shes 'khor lo ni/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis spyan drangs nas/ /phyag rgya bzhi yis gnyis med bstim/ /sku gsung thugs kyis byin gyis brlab/ /spyan la sogs pas dbang bskur ro/ /mchod yon sngon du 'gro ba yis/ /mchod pa lnga ni phul la gzhag /phreng ba'i sngags

ni rtsa gcig bzlas/ /de nas bum pa'i snying po ni/ /'bum tsho gcig ni bsnyen pa dbul/ /dus dang grangs dang mtshan ma yis/ /thun mtshams sbyor ba re re la/ /gtso bo'i bsnyen pa brgya ru dbul/ /'khor la lnga bcu rim gyis dbul/ /tshon sna lnga yi

skud pa yis/ /gtso bo'i bum pa'i mgul nas bcing / /gzungs thag slob dpon lag tu gzung / /bum pa chos nyid ngang du bsam/ /sngags ni ye shes chu rgyun no/ /mchod pa gtor ma ci rigs bsham/ /mchod dang skyabs 'gro sems bskyed nas/ /yang

dang yang du brtan por bya/ /dkyil 'khor gtso bo bskyed pa ni/ /sbyor ba dang po'i ting nge 'dzin/ /stong pa nyid ni bsgom pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog ting nge 'dzin/ /lha bskyed gsal bar bsgom pa'o/ /las rgyal mchog gi ting

nge 'dzin/ /ye shes lha la mchod pa nas/ /dbang bskur yan chad bsgom pa'o/ /skad cig ma yi ting 'dzin gyis/ /mig tu ma dang Ta las ni/ /nyi ma zla ba bsam par bya'o/ /lha yi dkyil 'khor mkha' la gdeg /sngags ni bzlas shing gsal bar

bsgoms/ /skad cig ma yi ting 'dzin gyis/ /phyag na rdo rje phyag gnyis pa/ /mun nag chen po'i ser sprin 'dra/ /mdog ltar 'dug pa nga ro can/ /zhe sdang me ltar 'bar ba bsgom/ /rdo rje'i lta stangs bgegs bskrad do/ /hUM lus ngag sems la gnas pa'i

bgegs/ /bgegs kyi tshogs kun nga la nyon/ /nga ni dpal ldan rdo rje'i stobs/ /bka' yi 'khor lo rab sbyor bas/ /nga yi bka' las su 'da' ba/ /sku gsung las byung dgas par bya/ /gal te dam tshig las 'das na/ /zhig 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /

gdon gyi rigs su gtogs pa rnams/ /mi dang mi min 'byung po'i tshogs/ /'di ru ma gnas gzhan du dengs/ /suM b+ha ni yi sngags bzlas shing / /byang shar mtshams nas bskor bar bya/ /gom stabs brgyad pa'i gar byas te/ /lag pa bskyod dang rkang pa bskyod/ /

smin ma bskyod dang rab 'degs dang / /cung zad ngo tsha'i zur mig dang / /brla rgyas stan la 'dug pa dang / /kha yi pad+ma 'dzum dang bcas/ /cung zad dmar ba'i mche ba 'chang / /kun+da ltar dkar phreng ba dang / /skad cig ma yi ting 'dzin gyis/ /ra ba dra bar gyur

pa'o/ /skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par las/ /sa dang pha rol phyin pa la/ /lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur/ /skyob pa shAkya seng ge yis/ /ji ltar bdud sde bcom pa ltar/ /de bzhin du ni bdud kyi sde/ /pham par bya ste dkyil

'khor bri/ /lha mo sa la thim par bsam/ /bdag nyid phyag na rdo rje yi/ /nga rgyal can dang cha lugs bcas/ /dpral bar dri yis thig le bya/ /mchod rdzas bkram la byin gyis brlab/ /spro ba bskyed pa'i tshigs bcad brjod/ /lha yi nga rgyal byas pa yis/ /

lus pos phyogs bcu skor gyis bskor/ /spos dang dril bu lag tu thogs/ /ma lus phyogs na bzhugs pa yi/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ni ming 'di zhes bgyi bas/ /rdo rje can gyi dkyil 'khor 'dri/ /ding 'dir thams cad

kun gshegs shig /dngos grub 'dir ni stsal du gsol/ /stegs bu chen po'i dbus gnas te/ /yang na de na gnas par bsam/ /grub pa'i grogs mchog mkhas pa yis/ /lha mo bzhi yi ting 'dzin zhugs/ /tshul bzhin dang ni ldan pa yis/ /phyogs

bzhi nas ni gsol ba gdab/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /chos kun bdag med pa yi dngos/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /mtshan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs/ /mtshan min thams cad rnam par spangs/ /kun du bzang po sku

yi mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /zhi ba'i mchog ni chos las byung / /ye shes spyod pa rnam sbyong ba/ /kun du bzang po gsung gi mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /sems dpa' kun gyi sems chen po/ /rang bzhin

dag cing dri ma med/ /kun bzang thugs kyi 'khor los sgyur/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /de yis dri yi thig le ni/ /stegs bu'i steng du dgug bya ste/ /dbus su maN+Dal gru bzhi pa/ /phyogs mtshams rnams su zlum por bya'o/ /de yi steng

du skad cig mas/ /mkha' la bteg pa'i 'khor lo rnams/ /phab la gdan du dbul bar bya'o/ /ye shes 'khor lo spyan drangs la/ /phyag rgya bzhi yis gnyis med bstim/ /gru gsum sngags kyis byin gyis brlab/ /spyan la sogs pas dbang bskur ro/ /mchod

pa rnams kyis legs par mchod/ /bsnyen pa rdzogs pa'i bum pa la/ /byin gyis brlab la sogs pa nas/ /mchod pa yan chad rdzogs par bya'o/ /dri yi thig le re re la/ /rang rang bum pa dgod par bya/ /mchod pa'i rdzas rnams thams cad

la/ /bsang gtor byas la dngos grub kyi/ /rdzas su gsol ba btab la gzhag /sngar gyi stegs bu yol bas gcad/ /slob dpon yol ba'i nang 'dug la/ /slob ma khrus byas spyod lam mdzes/ /dga' chen khyod la bdag ston to/ /slob dpon khyod ni

dgongs su gsol/ /byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa'i/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig de ni stsal du gsol/ /byang chub sems ni bdag la gsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /skyabs gsum de ni bdag la gsol/ /thar pa chen po'i

grong mchog tu/ /mgon po bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal/ /bu tshur theg pa chen po yi/ /gsang sngags spyod lam chen po dag /khyod la yang dag bstan par bya/ /khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te/ /dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /sku

gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /rdo rje gsang sngags 'di bsgoms pas/ /dpa' bo byang chub shing drung du/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i mtshan ma brnyes/ /gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med de/ /shAkya seng ge skyob pa yis/ /bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa/ /dpung chen

de dag de yis bcom/ /'jig rten rjes 'jug par rtogs nas/ /'khor lo bskor nas mya ngan 'das/ /de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir/ /bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ /mdun du maN+Dal zlum po ni/ /legs byas me tog tshom bu

dgram/ /mchod pa rnams kyis legs par mchod/ /sngon du 'gro ba'i cho ga rnams/ /bya zhing sems ni gnas par bya'o/ /slob ma mi dmigs stong pa las/ /lha yi nga rgyal byas pa las/ /dpral ba snying ga mgrin pa ru/ /dri yi thig le gsum bya ste/ /slob

dpon thugs ka'i sa bon las/ /sku gsung thugs kyi snying po spro/ /phyag mtshan gsum du gyur pa las/ /rdo rje slob ma'i mdun logs su/ /maN+Dal zlum po re re bya/ /me tog tshom bu dgram par bya/ /bsang gtor bya zhing mchod pa dbul/ /deng nas bzung nas bu khyod

kyis/ /'khor ba'i nyes pas ma phog pas/ /mchod pa kun dang ldan par ni/ /bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig /de nas rdo rje slob mas mdun/ /maN+Dal byas te me tog dgram/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ /so shing sor ni brgyad pa las/ /phreng ba'i sngags

ni lan gsum bzlas/ /slob ma la ni sbyin par bya/ /kha ni phyir bltas so shing bca'/ /maN+Dal phyogs su so shing dor/ /ltas kyi rim pa brtag pa dang / /spro ba bskyed pa'i tshig brjod de/ /'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen rnams/ /u du m+WA ra'i me tog bzhin/ /brgya

lam na ni re 'ga' zhig /'byung 'gyur yang ni mi 'byung ngo / /gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul 'byung ba/ /de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste/ /gang zhig mnyam med sems can don/ /mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus/ /bskal pa bye ba du ma ru/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / /

'gro don mnyam med byed par nus/ /gzhan yang theg pa chen po yi/ /lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan/ /khyed rnam de ring de bas na/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'bras bu thob/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur/ /des na bu yis brtson par gyis/ /de nas rdo rje

slob dpon gyis/ /phreng ba'i sngags sam a mr-i tas/ /srung skud byas la btags la gzhag /yang na rak+Sha rak+Sha yis/ /slob ma de nyid bsrung bar bya/ /grub na bsrung ba'i 'khor lo bya/ /ku sha'i gdan bting a mr-i ta'i/ /sngags bzlas byang shar mtshams su nyal/ /

lha yi nga rgyal gsal ba las/ /skad cig ma yi ting 'dzin gyis/ ma dang a yi ting 'dzin bya/ /u tiSh+Tha yi sngags brjod cing / /lha yi 'khor lo mkha' la gdeg /'jam la phra ba'i thig skud la/ /dri bzangs rnams kyis spangs la gzhag /sa bon las ni 'od 'phro

bas/ /ye shes thig skud spyan drangs la/ /gnyis su med par bstims la gzhag /de nas 'dod lha'i nga rgyal byas/ /thig sna 'dren pa'i slob ma ni/ /mdzes pa'i lha mor bsam par bya/ /dz+dza dz+dza dz+dza/ brjod cing thig skud bsgyur/ /des kyang gsum brjod blang

bar bya/ /de nas gnam thig ci rigs gdab/ /oM AHhUM swA hA/ sngags 'di brjod cing gdab par bya/ /dang por thig chen brgyad pa la/ /cha ni bcu drug phye ste gdab/ /de nas cha chung sum cu gnyis/ /phyogs rer cha chen bcu drug pa/ /cha chen brgyad ni nang du gtang / /cha chen

brgyad ni phyi ru gtang / /phyi dang nang gi cha brgyad la/ /cha phran sum cu rtsa gnyis gdab/ /tshangs pa'i thig nas bgrangs pa yis/ /cha phran bcu drug phyogs bzhir gdab/ /phyogs re dag nas brtsis pa yis/ /dbus kyi lte ba'i cha phran gnyis/ /pad+ma'i ze 'bru'i cha phran gcig /

'dab ma brgyad la cha phran gsum/ /mu khyud nyi ma'i ze'u 'bru la/ /cha phran re re mnyam par gdab/ /bcu drug pa la cha phran bzhi/ /mu khyud cha phran gnyis su gdab/ /gru chad la ni cha phran gcig /de bas cha chen bzhir gnas te/ /sgo dang bcu gcig rdo rje la/ /cha chen gnyis

ni mnyam par gdab/ /cha chen gcig la rta babs te/ /cha phran bzhi ru gdab par bya/ /cha chen gcig la cha phran bzhi/ /cha phran phyed ni pad+ma'o/ /gnyis ni chos kyi 'khor lo la'o/ /cha phyed gdugs kyi yu ba ste/ /cha gcig mdzes pa'i gdugs su bya/ /rdo rje me ri ma gtogs

pa'o/ /tshon sna lnga ni stong par bsam/ /yi ge 'bru lnga byung bar bsam/ /oM hUM hrI khaM trAM/ thugs ka yi ni sa bon las/ /'od 'phros ye shes tshon rtsi dbab/ /thim pas tshon rtsi lnga ru bsam/ /slob ma lag pa bde ba yis/ /rngul tshon gzhal yas bri bar bya/ /dbus kyi

lte ba ser po la/ /ge sar 'od dang bcas pa'o/ /'khor lo rtsibs ni mthing ga'o/ /dbus su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la/ /gtso bo'i gdan steng phyag mtshan dgod/ /'khor lo'i lte bar de bkod nas/ /rtsibs su 'khor rnams dgod pa ni/ /thod pa gri gug nag po'o/ /mu

khyud zlum po mthing ga la/ /rtse gsum 'bar bas bskor bar bya/ /mu khyud zlum po mthing ga la/ /thod pa'i phreng bas bskor bar bya/ /sgo bzhi gru chad phyogs dang bstun/ /dkar dang ser dang dmar dang ljang / /kun gyi nang rol nag por bya/ /rgyan la sogs pa spyi dang mthun/ /

rdo rje ma ri bcas pa bri/ /phyi rol dur khrod 'jigs pas bskor/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon ni/ /tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs byas nas/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid du bsam/ /shU n+ya tA yis brtan par bya/ /de nas bdag nyid hU~M du bsam/ /gur dang ra ba me rir bcas/ /yaM dang

ba~M las rlung dang chu/ /la~M dang ra~M dang e las ni/ /'byung ba lnga'i ni gyur pa las/ /'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas/ /sgo bzhi rgyan dang ldan par bsam/ /tshangs dang brgya byin dri za dang / /chu lha ku be ra yi gdan/ /dbus su nyi ma zla ba'i steng / /hU~M dang nyi ma zla ba bsam/ /

de yi bar du sa bon las/ /gtso bo yab yum sku bskyed do/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon ni/ /rang 'dod lha yi nga rgyal bya/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis gsal ba dang / /dpral bar khrag gi thig le bya/ /sngags 'di brjod cing dkyil 'khor bskor/ /lan gsum bskor la

shar du 'jug /oM badzra d+ha rod sa ma ya swA hA/ sngags de brjod cing ting 'dzin gyis/ /gzhal yas khang ni sgo dbye'o/ /bla re rgyal mtshan ba dan gdugs/ /dar dpyangs dang ni yol bar bcas/ /lnga ldi dar dang ras kyis bklubs/ /grwa bzhir mda' bzhi me long bzhi/ /

stegs bu'i zur la dgod par bya/ /zhal bsil la sogs mchod pa'i rdzas/ /ji ltar 'byor par dgram par bya/ /phyi nang mkha' 'gro'i gtor ma dang / /tshogs kyi zhal zas phyogs bzhir dgram/ /skad cig ma yi ting 'dzin dang / /bskyed tshul rgyas pa'i rim pa

yis/ /'dod yon lnga dang bdud rtsi lnga/ /skad cig ma yis ye shes su/ /gsal bar byin gyis brlabs la gzhag /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ /las kyi phyag rgya byin brlabs la/ /mkha' gsang byin gyis brlabs byas nas/ /gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba bya/ /thugs

ka yi ni sa bon las/ /phyogs bcur 'od zer 'phros pa las/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas yab yum bcas/ /spyi bo'i gtsug tu spyan drangs la/ /tshangs pa'i bu ga'i nang nas gzhug /gsang ba'i rdo rje'i lam nas dbyung / /yum gyi pad+ma'i ge

sar la/ /sgrub pa'i thabs nas gsungs pa bzhin/ /yab yum sgo mar bcas pa bsam/ /oM s+pha ra Na hUM phaT/ sngags de brjod pas rang rang gi/ /gnas su gdan la bzhugs par bsgom/ /de nas sa bon 'od zer gyis/ /phyag rgya ye shes 'khor lo rnams/ /mdun

gyi mkha' la spyan drangs te/ /bsang gtor bya zhing mchod pa dbul/ /phyag rgya bzhi yis gnyis med bstim/ /mkha' la bteg la bstim byas nas/ /nus par ldan nas byin brlabs ni/ /'bru gsum sngags kyis byin gyis brlab/ /spyan la sogs pas dbang bskur ro/ /mi

bskyod dbul brgyan par bsam/ /skad cig ma yi ting 'dzin gyis/ /phyi nang bstan skyong spyan drang ngo / /zhal bsil gdan dang sku khrus gsol/ /de nas mchod pa rnam lnga dbul/ /bshos dang zhal zas sna tshogs dbul/ /rgyan dang na bza' sna tshogs dbul/ /gong gi mchod rdzas lhag ma yis/ /phyi yi

bstan skyong rgyas par mchod/ /de nas sgrub khang phyi rol du/ /'byung po'i gtor ma gtang bar bya'o/ /las kyi rim pa de rnams ni/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa yis bya'o/ /de nas skad cig ting 'dzin gyis/ /zhal gsum phyag drug nga rgyal byas/ /nang dang gsang ba bla med

dang / /dngos dang ting nge 'dzin gyis dbul/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i/ /kha sbyor nyi zla'i 'phro 'du las/ /bgegs rigs stong phrag 'joms mdzad pa'i/ /'khor lo'i bdag po phyag 'tshal bstod/ /thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba yi/ /kha sbyor nyi zla'i 'phro 'du las/ /

dri za'i gdug pa 'dul mdzad pa'i/ /bdud las rgyal la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba yi/ /kha sbyor nyi zla'i 'phro 'du las/ /gshin rje'i gdug pa 'dul mdzad pa'i/ /rdo rje gzi brjid phyag 'tshal bstod/ /thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba yis/ /kha sbyor nyi zla'i

'phro 'du las/ /chu lha'i gdug pa 'dul mdzad pa'i/ /rngam sgra sgrogs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba yi/ /kha sbyor nyi zla'i 'phro 'du las/ /gnod sbyin gdug pa 'dul mdzad pa'i/ /rdo rje phrin las phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'byung ba lnga yi bdag nyid che/ /

mdzes ldan 'od zer can dang ni/ /mdangs ldan sgra dbyangs rlung 'byin te/ /skyed byed las kun sgrub pa la/ /'gugs shing sgrub pa sdom zhing 'dzin/ /mtha' rtul las rnams sgrub la bstod/ /ces bstod pa rnams kyang dbul bar bya/ /mkha' 'gro'i gtor ma byin gyis

brlab/ /chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med/ /gzung du med cing brjod du med/ /rgyu dang las las kun du byung / /de bzhin nyid las nges par skyes/ /bden pa des ni dkyil 'khor du/ /gzugs brnyan gsal ba'i slob ma ni/ /kun

gyis dri ma med mthong shog /de nas rdo rje slob ma ni/ /khrus byas spyod lam mdzes pa yis/ /sgrub pa'i grogs mchog mkhas pa yis/ /sgrub khang phyi ru tshig 'di bsgrags/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ /ma mthong snod

dang mi ldan na/ /su la'ang ston par ma byed cig /de nas bdud rtsi lnga yi chu/ /blangs nas byin gyis brlab par bya/ /sku gsung thugs kyi snying po 'di/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas la sbyin/ /'di ni rdo rje dam tshig chu/ /srungs shig ma bsrungs sreg par byed/ /

bsrungs na dngos grub ster bar byed/ /bdud rtsi 'di ni myang bar gyis/ /oM pany+tsa a mr-i ta u da ka Tha Tha zhes blud/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ /slob ma lha ru byin gyis brlab/ /sgrub pa'i grogs mchog dam pa yis/ /gdong g.yogs dar ram ras kyis bcings/ /rdo rje

dril bu lag tu gtad/ /rdo rje nas bzung ha ha yis/ /sngags kyi dkyil 'khor lan gsum bskor/ /de nas yol ba'i nang khrid la/ /phyag 'tshal me tog dor bar bya/ /lha rnams gang la phog pa ste/ /slob dpon gyis ni blta bar bya/ /de nas rdzas kyi dud pa btang / /rdo rje

slob dpon thugs ka nas/ /kha dog dmar po'i a bton te/ /slob ma'i snying gar gzhug par bya/ /slob mas nyams kyi bde ba bsgom/ /'phar dang ldeg pa'i rtags byung na/ /de nyid brtan pa'i yan lag bya/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje nyid/ /slob ma'i spyi bor spyan

drangs la/ /yi ge hU~M du gyur par bsam/ /de gyur rtse lnga de nyid can/ /zhu nas tshangs pa'i bu gar zhugs/ /snying gi dkyil du lha ru gyur/ /oM nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni tsit+ta maN+Dal badzra sa ma ya lhan/ sngags 'di brjod la gsal bar bsam/ /mthu stobs phyag na rdo rje ni/ /

khyod kyi snying du yang dag zhugs/ /rtag tu yi dam lha yin gyis/ /tshul 'di smra bar ma byed cig /gal te tshul 'di smras na ni/ /de ma thag tu dral te gshegs/ /da ni phyag na rdo rje ste/ /nga yis bsgo ba'i las nyon cig /ma mos brnyas par ma byed cig /gal te khyod

kyis brnyas na ni/ /dam tshig 'dis ni sreg par byed/ /tsha ba chen po'i gnas su sreg /rang bzhin rnam dag bdag nyid lus/ /dpa' bo dbang phyug ma yi gnas/ /dri med rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ni/ /bu khyod kyis ni blta bar gyis/ /gdong nas dkrol te 'khor lo yis/ /

de bzhin nyid ni bstan par bya/ /gtso bo sgo bar bcas par bstan/ /de nas rdo rje slob ma yis/ /spyod lam legs par bsrungs pa yis/ /bsam gyis mi khyab dam chos snod/ /dbang bskur dam pa mdzad du gsol/ /de nas bum pa rnams kyi chu/ /rnam rgyal las kyi bum

par blugs/ /chu de mi dmigs stong pa las/ /mthing ga'i mdog can hUM du gyur/ /de gyur rtse lnga de nyid can/ /de las 'od 'phros 'dus pa las/ /sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa ru gyur/ /sa bon las ni 'od 'phros nas/ /ye shes mi bskyod spyan drangs te/ /phyag rgya bzhi

yi gnyis med bstim/ /de la mchod pa rnam lnga dbul/ /de nyid chu ru gyur pa yis/ /slob ma la ni dbang bskur ro/ /sku gsum dam tshig las byung ba'i/ /ye shes bdud rtsi dri ma med/ /lha yi chu ni dag pa yis/ /mi bskyod par ni dbang bskur ro/ /oM badzra a daR+sha shU n+ya tA a

b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/ slob ma mi bskyod pa ru bsam/ /de la mchod pa rnam lnga dbul/ /con pa na mi dmigs A ru gyur/ /AM gyur rin chen AM gis mtshan/ /de las 'od 'phros 'dus pa las/ /sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung ldan bsam/ /sa bon las ni 'od

'phros pas/ /ye shes rin chen 'byung ldan ni/ /mdun gyi mkha' la spyan drangs te/ /phyag rgya bzhi yis gnyis med bstim/ /'bru gsum sngags kyis byin gyis brlab/ /de nas mchod pa rnam lnga dbul/ /de nyid cod pan gyur pa yis/ /slob ma la ni dbang bskur

ro/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal srid de/ /dbu rgyan rin chen bla na med/ /dbu rgyan rin chen mchog 'gro ma/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas su dbang bskur ro/ /oM badzra sa ma ya tA dz+nyA na rat+na saM b+ha hUM a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/ slob ma rin chen 'byung ldan bsam/ /de la mchod pa rnam lngas

mchod/ /rdo rje mi dmigs dzr-IM du gyur/ /de gyur pad+ma dzr-IM gis mtshan/ /de las 'od 'phros 'dus pa las/ /sangs rgyas 'od dpag med du gyur/ /sa bon las ni 'od zer 'phros/ /ye shes sems dpa' 'od dpag med/ /mdun gyi mkha' la spyan drangs te/ /phyag rgya

bzhi yis gnyis med bstim/ /'bru gsum sngags kyis byin gyis brlab/ /de la mchod pa rnam lnga dbul/ /de nyid rdo rjer gyur pa yis/ /slob ma la ni dbang bskur ro/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i dbang / /mi phyed rdo rje gsal ba las/ /chos rnams kun gyi

sgor gyur pa/ /rdo rje chos kyi dbang bskur ro/ /oM pradz+nyA A be sha dz+nyA na a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/ slob ma 'od dpag med du bsam/ /de la mchod pa rnam lnga dbul/ /dril bu mi dmigs khaM du gyur/ /de gyur ral gri khaM gis mtshan/ /de las 'od 'phros 'dus pa las/ /sangs rgyas don yod grub

par gyur/ /sa bon las ni 'od 'phros pas/ /ye shes don yod grub pa ni/ /mdun gyi mkha' la spyan drangs te/ /phyag rgya bzhi yis gnyis med bstim/ /'bru gsum sngags kyis byin gyis brlab/ /de la mchod pa rnam lnga dbul/ /de nyid dril bur gyur pa yis/ /slob

ma la ni dbang bskur ro/ /thabs dang shes ldan ldan pa yis/ /'gro don mnyam med byed pa yis/ /mchod pa'i rdzas rnams rdzogs byed pa/ /dril bu las kyi dbang bskur ro/ /oM tiSh+Tha a nu ta na dz+nyA na pa te badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/ de nas rdo rje dril bu gnyis/ /kha

sbyar tshul du bsnol la sbyin/ /lag tu gtang la gsil du gzhug /slob ma don yod grub par bsam/ /de la mchod pa rnam lngas mchod/ /slob ma mi dmigs oM du gyur/ /de gyur 'khor lo oM gyis mtshan/ /de las 'od 'phros 'dus pa las/ /sangs rgyas

rnam par snang mdzad gyur/ /sa bon las ni 'od zer 'phros/ /ye shes rnam par snang mdzad ni/ /mdun gyi mkha' la spyan drangs te/ /phyag rgya bzhi yis gnyis med bstim/ /'bru gsum sngags kyis byin gyis brlab/ /rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur bas/ /byang chub snying

po'i bar du ni/ /cis kyang mi chod mi shigs pa'i/ /rdo rje ming du rab tu grags/ /oM tre tsakra a mo g+ha dz+nyA na badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/ slob ma rnam par snang mdzad bsam/ /de la mchod pa rnam lnga dbul/ /chu dang cod pan rdo rje dang / /dril bu dang ni ming gi dbang / /rig pa

yi ni dbang lnga'o/ /sangs rgyas lnga ni rnam dag rgyu/ /dbang lnga yis ni thob pa yin/ /ma rig pa las 'das nas kyang / /ye shes lnga ni rim gyis 'thob/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ /lag tu spos thogs dril bu gsil/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rgyas par mchod/ /

yi ge nyi shu rtsa gcig pa/ /lan gsum bar du bzlas par bya'o/ /bcom ldan bdag gis byin rlabs ni/ /'di la 'go bar mdzad du gsol/ /sngags kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol/ /brtul zhugs brtan par mdzad du gsol/ /slob ma'i lag tu me tog gtad/ /nyi

shu rtsa gcig lan gsum bzlas/ /de nas rdo rje slob ma yis/ /lha dang slob dpon bcas pa la/ /me tog phul te tshig 'di brjod/ /bcom ldan bdag gis bzung lags kyis/ /bdag la 'go bar mdzad du gsol/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ /rdo rje lag tu blang

byas te/ /ye shes rdo rjer byin brlabs nas/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /mthu stobs mnga' bdag phyag na gnas/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu gzung / /phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan/ /oM badzra sa ma ya s+t+waM b+ha ya a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/ sngags de brjod la slob ma yi/ /

lag tu rdo rje gtad par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ /rgyan dang cha lugs thams cad pa/ /slob ma la ni bskor nas gzhag /zhal gsum phyag drug sgom du gzhug /rgyan dang cha lugs 'bar ba ni/ /dpa' bo bu yis blang bar gyis/ /phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs

brtan/ /phyi rol nang na yang dag gnas/ /oM nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni he he/ sngags de brjod la brtan par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ /thub pa chen po'i cha lugs zhugs/ /slob ma la ni chos gos bskon/ /nga ni shAkya seng ge ste/ /rgyan cha phyag na rdo rje bcas/ /

'di kun nga yi sprul pa ste/ /ma 'jigs 'jigs par ma byed cig /khyod ni 'khor ba'i 'jigs las thar/ /mi bskyod sangs rgyas zhing dag tu/ /rgyal ba'i sras su skye bar 'gyur/ /oM badzra rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/ /sngags de brjod la bsrungs la gzhag /bu khyod

'khor lo'i dbang bskur gyis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin/ /phyag na rdo rje'i mthu stobs can/ /de bzhin gshegs par lung bstan no/ /khams gsum bdag po rgyal srid che/ /dpal ldan yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas/ /bdud kyi sde rnams bcom zin gyis/ /

khyod kyis grong khyer mchog tu zhugs/ /oM nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni sid+d+hi sa ma ya s+t+waM b+ha ya a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/ sngags de brjod la lung bstan no/ /slob ma spyod lam mdzes pa yis/ /mtshan ma med pa 'gro ba'i don/ /gang dag bdag gis byed nus pas/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i

dbang bskur che/ /dpa' bo chen po bdag la gsol/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo mchod par bya/ /de nas seng ge'i khri bshams la/ /slob ma gzhag ste dbang bskur ro/ /ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis kyang / /lha rnams kyis ni sku khrus gsol/ /

de bzhin lha yi bdud rtsi yis/ /sku khrus dam pa gsol bar bya/ /oM badzra a b+hi She ka a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/ dung bud rnga chen rdung du gzhug /po ti glegs bam lag tu gtad/ /chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ro/ /slob dpon thugs kar zla ba bsam/ /

de yi steng du yig 'bru bsam/ /de gyur rtse lnga de nyid can/ /de yi lte ba'i nang du ni/ /lha yi 'khor lo bsam par bya/ /rdo rje slob ma'i snying gar yang / /zla ba hUM dang rdo rje bsam/ /nga yi lte ba stong pa ru/ /slob dpon thugs las 'khor lo bton/ /slob ma'i snying

gar bstims la gzhag /ye shes 'khor lo spyan drangs la/ /phyag rgya bzhi yis gnyis med bstim/ /'bru gsum sngags kyis byin gyis brlab/ /spyan la sogs pas dbang bskur ro/ /rnal 'byor 'di ni shes pa yis/ /mi bya ba ni gang yang med/ /dpa' bo chen po

nga yi bkas/ /'dod yon lnga la spyad par gyis/ /oM su pra tiSh+Tha swA hA/ de nas rjes su gnang ba'i dbang / /slob ma la ni bskur bar bya/ /deng nas bzung nas bu khyod kyis/ /lus dang srog la mi phongs par/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / /'gro ba'i don ni

dpag med byos/ /sems can gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /rten cing 'brel pa'i chos dang ldan/ /khams gsum de ltar shes nas ni/ /sems can don ni mtshungs med byos/ /de nas slob ma'i dbang bcu ste/ /phal cher bum pa la brten pas/ /bum pa'i dbang zhes

brjod pa yin/ /phyir mi ldog dang rjes su gnang / /rdo rje slob dpon dbang yin no/ /lus ni dri ma 'khrud pa'o/ /nyon mongs pa yi sgrib pa spangs/ /sa ni dang po thob par byed/ /dbang bskur rim pa bcu gnyis so/ /de nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur te/ /dang por snod ldan

slob ma yis/ /tshogs dang dpa' bo'i ston mo bya/ /shes rab ma ni bcu gnyis sam/ /bcu drug nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i bar/ /rgyal rigs rje'u rigs bram ze'i rigs/ /mig dkyus ring zhing sha mdangs dkar/ /mnyen lcug 'khril sdem gzhon tshul can/ /lus la nu

'bur kha dri zhim/ /smra na ngag 'jam mdzes par 'gro/ /yon tan gzhan yang ldan btsal te/ /slob dpon mdun du maN+Dal ni/ /gru bzhi lham pa khru gang tshad/ /byi dor legs byas me tog dgram/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /gsang spyod thabs

dang ldan pa yi/ /shes rab chen po'i snod 'gyur phyir/ /dbang bskur chen po mdzad du gsol/ /gsang spyod thabs dang ldan pa yi/ /ye shes bdud rtsi dri ma med/ /bdud rtsi chen po'i ro myang phyir/ /dbang bskur 'di la khyod spro'am/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su

gsol/ /lha mo 'di ni khyad par can/ /yon tan mtha' yas ldan pa ste/ /gsang spyod thabs kyi sbyor ba las/ /gsang ba'i dbang bskur mdzad du gsol/ /de nas rdul tshon gzhal yas khang / /nang du gsang ba'i yum bzhag nas/ /de nas sa bon 'od zer

gyis/ /dus gsum rgyal ba rnams kyi yum/ /phang na gnas pa'i lha mo rnams/ /spyi bo'i gtsug tu spyan drangs te/ /tshangs pa'i bu ga'i lam du zhugs/ /gsang ba'i pad+ma'i ge sar la/ /mdzes pa'i lha mo lnga ru bsam/ /rgyan dang cha lugs gsal

bar bsgom/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ /spyi bo'i gtsug tu spyan drangs nas/ /tshangs pa'i bu ga'i lam zhugs nas/ /rdo rje bum pa'i 'khor lo la/ /rgyal ba sangs rgyas lnga ru gyur/ /rgyan dang cha lugs gsal bar bsgom/ /mkha'

gsang byin gyis brlab pa dang / /gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba bya/ /yab yum 'khril sbyor bsgom pa yis/ /ye shes gsal ba'i byang chub sems/ /phab nas mtshan dang ldan par blugs/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma kun gyis/ /dam tshig 'di ni ngo mtshar che/ /khams

lnga yi ni ro yis gang / /bde ba chen po myang bar gyis/ /rdzas de slob ma'i lce la gzhag /a ho su kha skal chen po/ /dngos grub dam pa stsal du gsol/ /'das pa'i rdo rje 'chang sogs kyis/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas sras dbang bskur/ /byang chub sems ni yid 'ong bas/ /

de bzhin bu khyod dbang bskur ro/ /de nas shes rab ye shes dbang / /shin tu zab pa'i tshul du bskur/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi chu la sogs/ /shes rab ma yi lus kun bkru/ /dzA ti tsan+dan ga bur dris/ /shes rab ma yi lus la byugs/ /lha mo 'di ni khyad

par che/ /bde ba mtha' yas ster byed ma/ /blangs nas rnam pa thams cad du/ /bu yis bla med mchod par gyis/ /byang chub sems ni bla na med/ /bu yis ci dgar za nus sam/ /phyag rgya lnga las byung ba yi/ /rig ma dad pas mchod nus sam/ /bshang gci khu ba rak+ta

sogs/ /'di nyid du ni za nus sam/ /nga yi gsang ba'i pad+ma 'di/ /bde ba myur du skyed pa ste/ /khyod kyis rtag tu mchod nus sam/ /ji skad bshad pa'i dam tshig rnams/ /lha mo'i pad+ma mchod par bgyi/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ /shes rab lag pa g.yon pa dang / /

slob ma'i lag pa g.yas pa gnyis/ /dar gyis mdud pa byas la gzhag /brda yi dkyil 'khor bris pa'i steng / /pi dar stan la sogs pa'am/ /dar gyi blo stan 'phar ma bting / /rdo rje khro bo rtag tu bskyod/ /me 'od 'bar ba bsgom par bya/ /steng gi pad+ma'i snying po bcu/ /

shes pa rang gsal ngang la gzhag /slob ma'i lag pa g.yas pa yis/ /shes rab mkhal ma g.yon mnan nas/ /slob ma'i lag pa g.yon pa yis/ /gsang ba'i pad+ma kha phye ste/ /pad+ma ge sar snying po btsal/ /shes rab bum pa'i mgul chings kyis/ /

slob ma'i bum pa mgul pa bcing / /bde ba kha sbyor bsgom par bya'o/ /pad+ma ze 'bru rgyas pa dang / /rdo rje lag gi khrig sgo gzhug /gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba bya/ /rlung la goms pas rlung la gtang / /sngags kyi rtsa sgo dgag pa dang / /sor mos

bsdam zhing glod pa dang / /pad+ma'i ge sar snying po de/ /rdo rje bu gar bcug la gzung / /nyams kyi stobs kyis nang du 'then/ /bde ba gsal la mi rtog pa/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes myong / /de yi nyams dang mi 'bral bar/ /cung zhig de la gnas par bya/ /de ni rdo rje chu

'thung gis/ /bsgom pa cung zhig bya ba yin/ /mi gsal ye shes ma yin na/ /rol pa'i sgra la sems gtad la/ /yang dang yang du nyams su blang / /de yis ye shes skye bar 'gyur/ /de nas gnyis ka ngal bar ldang / /pad+ma dang ni rdo rje nas/ /byang chub

sems kyi kun+da la/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin pas/ /lce yis blang zhing gzhib par bya/ /kun+da lta bu'i byang chub sems/ /rang gi sems la bstim par bya/ /gnyis med ye shes gsal bar 'gyur/ /shes rab ma yi rkang pa g.yon/ /slob ma'i spyi bor

bzhag nas ni/ /nga dang rdo rje slob dpon dang / /mched dang lcam bral thams cad la/ /khams gsum sems can ma lus pa/ /ma mos brnyas par ma byed cig /gzhan yang dam tshig bshad pa rnams/ /rtag tu khyod kyis bsrung ba gyis/ /deng nas bzung nas

bu khyod kyis/ /ji srid byang chub ma thob par/ /sems can kun gyi don rnams ni/ /rtag tu rmi lam bzhin du gyis/ /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas bzhi pa tshig gi dbang / /bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya'o/ /mjug gi las kyi cho ga ni/ /mkha' la bteg nas

bzhugs pa yi/ /'khor lo chen po'i lha tshogs la/ /mchod pa'i yo byad 'byor tshad dbul/ /de nas dkyil 'khor rgyan rnams bsdu/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i snying po yis/ /bshags pa ci tsam 'grub par bya/ /mkha' 'gro rnams la gtor mas mchod/ /tshogs

dang dpa' bo'i ston mo bya/ /oM kr-i to ba la sogs pa yis/ /ye shes 'khor lo gshegs su gsol/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHsa dam tshig bsdu/ 'gro ba 'dod pa tha dad pas/ /de la dgongs nas bde gshegs kyis/ /mos pa tha dad drang ba'i phyir/ /'gro la brtse bas

byang chub lam/ /sna tshogs tha dad gsungs pa kun/ /gang zhig 'ga' la phan phyir du/ /gsal ba'i sgron mar gsungs pa yin/ /de la brten nas yun ring mos pa yis/ /'dod lha'i zhal mthong de tshe lhag lhas gnang ba byin/ /ma smin smin byed yon

tan kun 'byung ba'i/ /shes rab bzang zhing mang thos rlom sems med/ /brtson 'grus drag cing sran thub brtan blo can/ /bla ma la gus dad ldan snying rjer ldan/ /de 'dra'i slob ma bzang po btsal nas ni/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub mchog tu dbang bskur

ro/ /'gro la brtse bas dbang bskur cho ga sbyar/ /yun rings bsgoms pas mi 'grub gang yang med/ /ngal ba'i dge rtsa ci yod bsod nams kyis/ /sgrub po dngos grub rnam gnyis thob par shog /dpal phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga nam gru'i rigs las byung ba'i

dngos grub brnyes pa slob dpon dzA ba ri pa'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //bal po'i mkhan po paN+Di ta de ba pU r+Nam ti dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ tsi

ti dz+wa la lak+Sha Na nA ma/ bod skad du/ mdze nad kyi mtshan nyid ces bya ba/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'gro rnams rdul dang mun pa snying stobs kyi/ /'dam la gnas te rkyen gyi ri bos non/ /de bsal shes phyir rang gi rtogs pas bri/ /dam pa'i drin thob mgon la

spyi btud bshad/ /de la 'dir nad kyi mtshan nyid dang / bzlas pa'i mtshan nyid dang / de bzlog pa'i thabs so/ /de la mtshan nyid la bcu gnyis su shes par bya ste/ gal te bcu gnyis kyis ma bzlog na de 'phro bcad do/ /'bad pa dang bcas pas tshogs bsag go/ /

thabs ni 'dod pa'i lha mnyes pas bzlog pa dang / rten cing 'brel pa'i nus pas bzlog pa'o/ /'dod pa'i lha mnyes pas bzlog pa ni sgrub thabs las shes par bya'o/ /rten cing 'brel ba'i nus pas bzlog pa ni bla ma'i man ngag las shes par bya'o/ /mtshan nyid rnams ni

'di lta ste/ /rus dang sha dang pags pa dang / /rtsa dang khrag dang nang grol dang / /bcud dang chu ste lus kyi stobs/ /lus kyi rtsa dang mdog dang dbyibs/ /reg pa chu ba chu ser dang / /klad pa lha ba lus kun la/ /zhugs pa rnam pa bco brgyad yin/ /rigs kyis

ma yin gcig cig min/ /'on kyang gcig sogs rim gyis brtag /rus pa la zhugs pa ni bzhi ste/ lus skem pa dang / gzer che ba dang / na thang nge ba dang / thig ler na'o/ /sha la zhugs pa ni lnga ste/ lus bem me 'dug pa dang / lus lci ba dang / mdog gnag

pa dang / drings pa snar 'ong ba dang / sha ro 'byung ba'o/ /pags pa la zhugs pa ni gnyis te/ sha 'phrig pa dang / mdog skya ba'o/ /rtsa la zhugs pa ni bcu ste/ lus sbrid ber ber ba brtag pa ni bzlog par dka'o/ /sgyid lug pa dang / sgyid lcig lcig pa dang / tsha

ba 'dzag pa snyam pa dang / tsha rab rab pa dang / tsha ker ker ba dang / tsha breng breng ba dang / lus la sogs pa tsha thang nge ba dang / tsha bir bir ba dang / yan lag phra ba'o/ /khrag la zhugs pa ni bzhi ste/ sna nas skabs skabs su yang yang 'dzag pa dang / tsha ber ber ba

dang / lus lci yor yor ba dang / gdong dmar ba la stag pa'i lo ma'i bris ma ltar 'ong ngo / /nang grol la zhugs pa ni bzhi ste/ glo snying mi bde ba dang / skyur thib thib pa dang / snying 'dar phril phril dang / snying mi dga' ba ste bzlog dka'o/ /bcud la zhugs pa ni bzhi

ste/ /khu ba mi 'byung ba dang / dbang po ldang mi nus pa dang / khu ba skyo ma'i mdog tu 'ong ba dang / khu ba dngas snyigs bye nas 'ong ba'o/ /chu la zhugs pa ni gsum ste/ sbubs kyi chu rgya skyegs kyi khu ba ltar 'ong ba dang / sna'i chu rtag tu skyo mar 'dzag pa dang / mig chu rtag

par 'dzag pa ste/ du ba dang ser bu byung ba tsam gyis myur bar 'dzag pa'o/ /lus kyi stobs la zhugs pa ni gsum ste/ lus sgyid lug pa dang / lus myal myal ba yin no/ /lus kyi rtsa la zhugs pa ni gnyis te/ swa rtsi la sogs pa

lus kyi dri ma bya'i pags pa bzhin sangs kyis 'gro'o/ /mdog la zhugs pa ni gcig ste/ lce btsod kyi mdog bzhin du song ba'o/ /dbyibs la zhugs pa ni gnyis te/ lus gnyer chung gis khebs pa dang / yan lag gi sor mo rnams byi ba'i mjug ma ltar

song ba'o/ /reg pa la zhugs pa ni bzhi ste/ sna rtse la sogs par tsha yam yam 'ong ba dang / tsha ber ber 'ong ba dang / lus brtse ba dang / g.ya' ber 'ong ba bzhin no/ /chu ba la zhugs pa ni bzhi ste/ yan lag rengs shing na ba dang / sha

'bur ba dang / grang sing sing ba dang / tshigs rnams 'khor ba bzhin no/ /chu ser la zhugs pa ni lnga ste/ lus za gol gol ba dang / lus za tsag tsag pa dang / lus za lcib lcib pa dang / lus la chu rgang 'ong ba dang / chu rgang byung na yun ring por mi thogs

par 'ong ngo / /lus la 'brum pa'i rjes sran chung lta bu byung na bzlog par yang sla'o/ /klad pa la zhugs pa ni bzhi ste/ mgo phying phying skrang ba dang / 'thom pa dang / bem me ba dang / skra nul nul 'byi ba la sogs pa'o/ /lha ba la zhugs pa la ni gsum ste/ gdong pa

la sogs pa tsha lam lam 'ong ba dang / gdong pa la sogs pa grang seng seng 'ong ba dang / de bzlog par sla'o/ /lus rid cing gdong thal skya'i mdog tu song ba ni bzlog par dka'o/ /lus kun la zhugs pa ni gsum ste/ tshor ba med par gdong pa la sogs pa'i sha

'gyur yin no/ /shin tu yang bzlog par dka'o/ /klu shin tu yang khro bo dag gis kyang rtags dang mi ldan par thugs kyis kyang 'gro'o/ /bzlog par dka'o/ /rma la sogs pa 'tshor mi 'dod pa'i rtags dang mi ldan pa ni bzlog par sla'o/ /gzhan yang yan lag

phra ba dang / sbom pa dang / thung ba dang / 'khums pa dang / rengs pa la sogs pa la klu'i mtshan nyid du shes par bya'o/ /rtags de rnams las 'ga' 'ga' ni nad kyi gzhi las kyang shes par bya'o/ /'ga' la ni klu'i gdon ma yin pa las kyang 'byung bas

mtshan nyid so sor shes par bya ste/ nad gzhi las byung ba'i sman la sogs pa dang / 'phrod pa'i zas kyis phan pa'o/ /gzhan gyi ni yun mi rtag pa 'phro 'chad do/ /'di 'dra'i mtshan nyid mngon du shes/ /shes nas myur ba'i brtson 'grus kyi/ /sna tshogs

thabs la ma rmongs pas/ /bzlog pa'i thabs la 'bad par bya/ /chu rgyun yun rings 'bab pas ni/ /rdo bdag kyang dus su 'bigs/ /gdug pa'i dbang byas zhe rings yang / /le lo dang bral rtse gcig sems/ /rgyun du bsgoms na bzlog sems kyis/ /gdug pa'i

nad las thar bar nges/ /rtsol ba can gyi som nyi bral/ /gang bsam de la mi 'grub med/ /des na 'khor ba gces pa ni/ /phung po srog ni dang ba la/ /mngon sum nyid du mthong 'gyur gyis/ /rtsol ba dor bar mi bya'o/ /'gro ba snying rje rang gis rtogs dang bka' drin gyis/ /

bdag gis nad kyi mtshan nyid 'di sbyar yon tan gyis/ /'gro bas mngon du de rtogs brtson pas de bzlog bya/ /ci yod dge bas 'gro ba 'tsho dka'i nad las grol bar shog /mdze nad kyi mtshan nyid ces bya ba/ nam gru'i rigs las byung ba/ dngos grub brnyes ba dzA ba ri bas

mdzad pa rdzogs so// //bal po'i paN+Di ta pU r+Ne dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur zhing gtan la phab pa'o//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ nI lAM bar d+ha ra badzra pA Ni ma hA yak+Sha tsakra ma hA de ba ga Na maN+Dal sto tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ gnod

sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can 'khor lo chen po'i lha tshogs la bstod pa zhes bya ba/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /hUM lcang lo can gyi gnas mchog dam pa na/ /sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i gtso bo ste/ /skye med ngang las longs spyod

rdzogs pa'i sku/ /yon tan ma lus rdzogs pa khyod la 'dud/ /sprul pa'i sku mchog gdug pa 'dul mdzad pa/ /brjid pa'i sku mda' sprul brgyad sku la brgyan/ /snang srid dbang du sdud pa'i mthu stobs can/ /srid gsum sdug bsngal mthar mdzad khyod la 'dud/ /zhabs

gnyis brkyang bskum mthing nag 'bar ba'i zhal/ /g.yas dkar g.yon dmar spyan ni gsum gsum ldan/ /phyag drug rdo rje g.yas 'chang g.yon sdigs mdzub/ /bar gnyis thal rdebs mtha' gnyis sbrul gsol 'dud/ /dpral ba'i khro gnyer smin ma g.yo zhing 'khrug /dbu

skra kham nag gyen brdzes me stag 'phro/ /ral pa'i cod pan sprul gyi gdengs kas brgyan/ /rigs kyi bdag pos dbu brgyan khyod la 'dud/ /ljags 'dril mche gtsigs nga ros 'brug sgra sgrogs/ /kha rlangs me ltar 'bar bas gdug pa bsreg /mche ba

gtsigs bas dug gsum rtsad nas gcod/ /nyon mongs 'joms par mdzad pa khyod la 'dud/ /'jig rten gsum sleb sku mchog shin tu brjid/ /sngon po 'chad pa'i na bza' sku la gsol/ /dus mtha'i me ltar 'od zer 'bar ba'i sku/ /srid gsum zil gnon khyad

'phags khyod la 'dud/ /gsus pa'i smad 'khyil stag gi sham thabs can/ /tshangs pa brgya byin nyi zla 'bar ba'i steng / /zhabs gnyis phrag bzhag yon tan rdzogs pa'i sku/ /mtha' gnyis rtag chad sel mdzad khyod la 'dud/ /rngam pa'i sku yis bdud rnams 'dul

bar mdzad/ /brang 'gro brgyad kyis sku brgyan klu dbang 'dul/ /brkyang bskum brjid pas gnod sbyin zil gyis gnon/ /phrin las mthar mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /sprul pa'i khro tshogs bye ba sku las 'phro/ /hU~M phaT sgra 'byin mtshon cha mang pos 'debs/ /mthing nag sku

yis khams gsum cho nges 'debs/ /sprul pas skrag mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /yum mchog mdzes ldan mthing nag zhal gcig ma/ /phyag g.yas gri gug gdung dmar zhal du stobs/ /rus pa'i phreng brgyan bskal pa'i 'od zer 'phro/ /sprul pa grangs med khro chung

'phro la 'dud/ /dri za'i rigs 'dul khro rgyal bdud las rgyal/ /sku yi rang bzhin zhi ba'i las mdzad pa/ /dkar gsal zhal gcig phyag bzhi rdo rje 'phyar/ /rtse gsum sdigs mdzub gti mug 'joms la 'dud/ /brkyang bskum bzhugs nas na bza' sngon po gsol/ /

brang 'gro brgyad kyis sku brgyan mthu stobs can/ /gsung gi nga ros log 'dren gdug pa 'dul/ /rngam mdzad bdud las rgyal byed khyed la 'dud/ /mnyes byed yum ni lha mo 'od zer can/ /dkar mo 'dzum can zhal gcig phyag gnyis ldan/ /spu gri gtso 'khyud

dung dmar yab la stobs/ /khro chung bye 'gyed lha mo khyod la 'dud/ /gshin rje 'dul mdzad yon tan rang bzhin sku/ /rgyas pa'i phrin las mthar phyin sku mdog ser/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhis bdud 'dul rdo rje 'phyar/ /dbyug to g.yon 'dzin sdigs mdzub 'khyud khyod

'dud/ /zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum gshin rje gnon mdzad 'gying / /brjid sku na bza' sngon po stag ris gsol/ /rigs bzhi gdug pas sku brgyan yon tan rgyas/ /sprul pa'i khro 'gyed gzi brjid 'bar khyod 'dud/ /dgyes mdzad lha mo dbyangs can gser mdog zhal/ /

zhal gcig phyag gnyis ral gri gtso la 'khyud/ /ban+d+ha khrag bkang yab kyi zhal du stobs/ /sprul pa grangs med 'gyed mdzad khyod la 'dud/ /klu dbang 'dul mdzad gsung gi rang bzhin sku/ /dbang gi phrin las mthar phyin sku mdog dmar/ /'gying bag zhabs

gnyis brkyang bskums bdag gnon/ /rngam chen me ltar 'bar ba khyod la 'dud/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhis rdo rje sbrul zhags bsnams/ /sdigs mdzub 'khyud mdzad gsung gi rngam stabs can/ /sbrul rigs bzhis brgyan gos sngon stag ris gsol/ /klu rigs dbang

sdud rngam sgra sgrogs khyod 'dud/ /mnyes mdzad lha mo dmar mo [(]mdzum [,]mdzub [)]bag can/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis te'u gtso la 'khyud/ /dung dmar stobs mdzad sprul pa'i khro tshogs sprul/ /thabs mkhas sgra can yum mchog 'khyud la 'dud/ /gnod sbyin rigs 'dul phrin las rang bzhin

sku/ /rtog pa'i phrin las mthar phyin sku mdog ljang / /zhal gcig phyag bzhi sku mchog phyag mtshan ldan/ /phrin las bzhi mdzad rdo rje be con 'dzin/ /sdigs mdzub gnyis mdzad yum la 'khyud khyod 'dud/ /brkyang bskum mdzad pa rigs bzhi'i sbrul gyes brgyan/ /stod

g.yogs sngon po stag ris na bza' gsol/ /phrin las thams cad rdzogs mdzad mthu stobs can/ /bgegs rnams 'joms mdzad bdud rtsi 'khyil khyod 'dud/ /thod gyur ljang gu zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ /thabs shes tshul ldan 'khor lo gtso la 'khyud/ /snying rje'i rang bzhin

b+han dmar yab la stobs/ /sprul lnga 'gyed mdzad rlung 'byin sku la 'dud/ /dzaHhUM baM hoH'jigs ston rgyas 'debs ma/ /bdud dang mu stegs skrag mdzad snying nas 'dren/ /lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril bu ma/ /bdud dpung 'joms mdzad sgo ma

bzhi la 'dud/ /rang gi dad pa'i stobs kyis bskul gyur nas/ /mos pa'i dbang gis bstod pa 'di byas pa'i/ /bsod nams tshogs gyur sgrib pa gnyis byang nas/ /rgyud shel ltar dag sems can don byed shog /bstod pa mos pa'i rgyud ngan tha ba btul/ /ma rig

mun sel dag pa zla zer 'dra/ /dri med gsal ba gang thob sems can rnams/ /'khor lo chen po'i lha zhal mthong bar shog /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can 'khor lo chen po'i lha tshogs la bstod pa zhes bya ba/ nam gru'i rigs las byung ba

dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon dzA ba ri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta chen po de ba pUr+Na ma ti dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong 'gar chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ pra t+ya sa mut+pa da s+ya nA ma rak+Sha/ bod

skad du/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i srung ba zhes bya ba/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bde gshegs mthu dang sems can las/ /bsam gyis mi khyab par bshad pas/ /de bzhin rten 'brel nus pa'i mthu/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin pas/ /

gnod byed rnams kyi dgrar gyur pa/ /mdor bsdus bdag gis bshad par bya/ /srung byed rnam rgyal a ru ra/ /bcangs sam lus la brten pa yis/ /mar me'i snang bas mun sel ltar/ /phyogs su gnas par mi nus so/ /don kun grub byed nor bu dang / /de bzhin tshe

bsring nor bu dang / /in+d+ra nI la sbur long dang / /rin chen nor bu sna tshogs nor/ /gang zhig lus la 'chang byed pa/ /nor bu'i mthu ni bsam mi khyab/ /nyi ma shar sar grib mi gnas/ /de bzhin gdon de mi gnas so/ /bde gshegs dgra bcom byang chub sems/ /de

bzhin rnal 'byor pa yi gdung / /mchod cing bcangs pa tsam gyis ni/ /zhe sdang zhi nas mchod byed 'gyur/ /lnga brgya stong du lon pa yi/ /rmang gi sa'am thab kyis/ /sngags btab bskus pa tsam gyis ni/ /dpag tshad bye ba brgya ru 'bros/ /dug dgra'i mkhris pa ma rul ba/ /
