rdzogs shing man ngag thob/ /rgyud don gzhan rnams shes pa dang / /pha rol phyin pa'i don la mkhas/ /bden pa rnam gnyis gtan la 'bebs/ /nyon mongs chung zhing sems rnams thul/ /lus ngag yid gsum spyod lam mkhas/ /dus dang gnas skabs dbye ba shes/ /bya

dang mi bya'i rim pa dang / /gnang dang dgag pa'i rim brtson rnams/ /shes pa de ni slob dpon nyid/ /dad ldan bla ma la ni gus/ /g.yo sgyu med pa'i bsam pa yis/ /rdzas dang lus srog 'bul byed dang / /yang nas yang du gsol 'debs pa/ /spyod lam la sogs mdzes

pa yis/ /dus rim du ni 'khor byed pa/ /maN+Dal me tog bcas pa yin/ /gus pas zhabs la phyag byed pa/ /slob mar zhugs kyi shes par bya/ /phyag rgya mchog ni don du gnyer/ /mi rnams kun gyis dben pa yi/ /yid du 'ong ba'i gnas dag tu/ /yo byad rdzas rnams

'tshogs pa yis/ /dag pa la sogs sngon 'gro bas/ /yid gnyis med pa'i brtson 'grus ldan/ /gus pas man ngag bdud rtsi 'di/ /glegs bam la ni brten pa brtsams/ /nges pa'i man ngag bdud rtsi 'di/ /rna brgyud 'ongs te thugs la gnas/ /zhal gyi sgo ru bton nas

kyang / /de bzhin sgrub pos blang bar bya/ /thabs kyi sbyor ba mkhas pa yis/ /dang po dus su rdzogs pa dang / /rim bzhin lnga yi bar du blang / /de ltar blangs pa'i don shes na/ /gang 'dod pa yi don rnams 'grub/ /rgyud sogs gzhan nas 'byung ba yi/ /de lta bu yi don

shes pas/ /sgrub po zhes ni btags pa yin/ /sgrub pa po ni de dag kyang / /shes rab snying rje che brtson ni/ /dang po bla ma bsten gyur nas/ /de nas rang nyid 'jug par 'gyur/ /yang na de tsam mi ldan yang / /yul dang dus kyis bskal gyur na/ /cha rkyen rdzogs par tshang

dgos pas/ /bla ma la ni gus pa yis/ /skyob byed mthu rnams mi 'dra bas/ /bsam gyis mi khyab mthu ldan pa/ /nges par shin tu rdzogs par bya/ /de rnams dgos pa'i bstan pa ni/ /dper na dpa' bo g.yul du zhugs na/ /go rnams rdzogs par ma gyur pas/ /mtshon

gyis phog ste slar log ltar/ /de bzhin bsgrub pa'i cha rkyen yang / /ma tshang slar la ldog nyan yod/ /yang na mthu rnams bsam mi khyab/ /sman gyi mthu rnams ji bzhin te/ /gang la gang 'phrod las dang rkyen/ /mkhas pa yis ni shes par bya/ /de yi don rnams shes bya ba/ /

bde gshegs sras po mkhas pas su/ /rgyud du bya ba brgyad ces bya/ /dngos grub rnam gnyis thob byed pa'i/ /bskyed rdzogs shes pa'i gtso bo yis/ /de yi yan lag 'khor bshad pa/ /tshogs 'khor sbyin sreg gtor chen po/ /'khrul 'khor las rnams phran tshegs

sogs/ /de rnams las rnams thams cad rdzogs/ /dam tshig nyams pa cher byung na/ /gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor bzhengs gsol phyir/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga shes par bya/ /de ma nus pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /maN+Dal me tog bcas pa la/ /brten nas sdig bshags cho

ga bya'o/ /dam tshig nyams pa chen po dang / /dang po dbang yang thob pa'i phyir/ /dbang mchog cho ga shes par bya/ /bar chod myur du byung ba na/ /stang stabs bgegs bskrad shes par bya/ /rnal 'byor 'chi ba'i rtags byung na/ /'chi bslu'i cho ga shes par bya/ /yid ches brod pa

bskyed pa'i phyir/ /mkha' 'gro'i lung bstan shes par bya/ /de kun rtsa ba'i dam tshig yin/ /bzlas brjod byas pas don rnams 'grub/ /bdud rtsi la sogs rdzas rnams ni/ /sgrub thabs sbyor thabs mkhas pas su/ /lus sogs las su rung bar bya/ /de ltar cha rkyen tshang ba

yis/ /phyag rgya'i mchog ni don du gnyer/ /dngos grub phran tshegs zhar las 'byung / /de ltar gdeng ldan rnal 'byor gyis/ /yid du 'ong ba'i gnas dag tu/ /tshes grangs bzang po shis pa la/ /chos skyong srung ma la sogs la/ /bsgo zhing bgegs rnams zhi bar byed/ /yi dam lha

dang slob dpon dang / /mkha' 'gro rnams kyi spyan snga ru/ /dam bca' byas te bsgrub par bya'o/ /yi ge brgya sogs cho ga yis/ /nyes pa kun ni sbyangs nas kyang / /sa gzhi legs pa'i gnas dag tu/ /maN+Dal me tog legs par bkram/ /phyi nang mchod pa'i rdzas

rnams kun/ /bsags te ma lus rgyan rnams dgram/ /rang nyid lhag pa'i lhar gyur pa'i/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i glegs bam de/ /rin chen na bza' mdzes byas la/ /ston pa mya ngan 'das 'og tu/ /gsung gi rtags su gzhag par bya/ /'bur ram lugs sam ris su bris/ /

shin tu mdzes pa'i sku mchog de/ /sku yi rtags su gzhag par bya/ /rdo rje dril sogs phyag mtshan rnams/ /lugs dang mthun pa'i mdzes pa de/ /thugs kyi rtags su gzhag par bya/ /de dag kun la don dam du/ /rab tu gnas pa med mod kyang / /yang dag kun rdzob nyid du ni/ /rgyal

ba lhums zhugs ji bzhin no/ /de ltar byin rlabs mthu chen pa/ /ci byas thams cad rdzogs chen 'gyur/ /de bas brtson 'grus bskyed de bya/ /gal te rnal 'byor dbul gyur na/ /thams cad mos pa'i spyod yul na/ /dbul bar ma gyur ser sna yis/ /sogs par de ni mi byed par/ /chos

dang mi mthun spyod pa yin/ /de bas gus pas brtson 'grus bya/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug rnams kyis ni/ /bskyed dang rdzogs la brten bya ste/ dang po bskyed pa'i tshul rnams ni/ /skad cig sprul dang cho ga lnga/ /gsum gyi tshul du bstan pa dang / /gnyis las 'byung byed tshul dang ni/ /

gcig la 'jug pa'i tshul gyis su/ /cho ga'i rim par shes par bya/ /rdzogs pa'i gnyis su bstan pa la/ /thabs kyi tshul gyis 'jug pa dang / /shes rab tshul gyis 'jug pa po/ /thabs kyis 'jug pa'i tshul rnams ni/ /brgyad dkyil dgu yi bdag po la/ /man ngag stobs

kyis 'jug pa dang / /bcu drug bzhi yi bdag dkyil la/ /sbyor ba'i thabs kyis 'jug pa dang / /de dang de las khyad par 'phags/ /shin tu bskor ba'i gnas dag tu/ /rim pa bzhin du 'jug pa dang / /dang po 'byung byed gnas dag tu/ /tha ma cig shos 'byung ba la/ /

mgal me'i 'khor lo bskor ba yis/ /rim sogs man ngag shes par bya/ /shin tu 'jam pa'i stan dag la/ /rnal 'byor ci bder gnas nas ni/ /snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /sa bon spros pas lha rnams gsal/ /bla ma mi bskyod gzugs 'dzin pa/ /mkha' 'gro'i

tshogs kyis bskor ba la/ /dang po lus ngag gus pa yis/ /phyag 'tshal zhabs la reg par bya/ /phyi mchod nang mchod gsang mchod rnams/ /rim pas phul nas sdig pa bshags/ /sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid shes par bya/ /sangs rgyas la sogs bde ba la/ /dga' ba bskyed de rjes yi

rang / /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul/ /'gro ba'i don du gsol ba gdab/ /dkyil 'khor lha la skyabs su mchi/ /lus kyang gus par dbul bar bya/ /sems bskyed lam la gnas par bya/ /phyag rgya mchog tu gzung bar bya/ /slar yang sdom pa brtan par gzung / /

tshad med bzhi yang bsgom par bya/ /dag par byed pa'i sngags brjod pas/ /mtha' dag stong pa nyid du bsgom/ /yod pa ma yin med pa min/ /snang ba ma yin 'gag med min/ /skye ba ma yin 'gag pa min/ /de la sogs pa'i tshig rnams kyis/ /mtshon te stong nyid gtan

la dbab/ /stong nyid dngos po'i gnas tshul ni/ /gang du'ang bsam du med mod kyang / /ma rtogs log rtogs the tshom can/ /de rnams bsal ba'i don ched du/ /skye med 'gag med la sogs brjod/ /de las stong pa'i ngang las ni/ /'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor rim brtsegs

'phros/ /de steng suM las byung ba las/ /ri rab chen po bskyed par bya/ /de steng hUM las rdo rje ni/ /rgya gram ljang gu'i dkyil du ni/ /sa bon 'od zer las 'phros pas/ /gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs bcu bskyed/ /skad cig rdzus skyes tshul du ni/ /dbus kyi gtso bos khro bcu

bskyed/ /hUM bzhi gsang sngags brjod pa yis/ /bka' bsgo bas ni sprul pa 'phros/ /gdug pa can ni ma lus bkug /rdo rje phur ba'i sngags brjod pas/ /shin tu khros pas sprul nas ni/ /brdeg pa'i sngags kyis btab nas ni/ /brdung ba'i sngags kyis brdung bar bya'o/ /

me dpung tshogs kyis thal bar bsreg /nam mkha'i mthas klas tshun chad du/ /khro bo rnams kyi nang logs su/ /rdo rje gur dang ra ba gtams/ /rdo rje gur gyi nang logs su/ /gzhal yas khang ni mdzes par bskyed/ /de steng pad+ma 'dab brgyad gdan/ /

lte bar nyi zla'i gdan ni brtsegs/ /gdan dang rgyan rnams kun ni rdzogs/ /mngon par byang chub cho ga yis/ /gtso bo'i sku ni bskyed par bya/ /dang po stong dang zla ba la/ /yig 'bru la sogs cho ga rdzogs/ /rdo rje la ni byin rlabs bsdu/ /sngags brjod pas ni sku bskyed do/ /gtso bo sku

mdog mthing nag ni/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa/ /mche ba gtsigs pa 'dod dgur bsgyur/ /sku la sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan/ /g.yon brkyang g.yas bskum 'byung po 'dul/ /phyag g.yas rdo rje khro bo bsdams/ /g.yon nas mkha' lding rgyal po spro/ /gtso bo de ltar bskyed

nas ni/ /shar gyi pad+ma'i 'dab ma la/ /rnam rgyal sku mdog dmar po ste/ /phyag g.yas dang po rdo rje 'dzin/ /g.yon pas dgra sta 'dzin pa ste/ /bar ma phyag gnyis gung mo dang / /mthe bong ngos mdung gzhan rnams brkyang / /de nyid snying gar bzung nas ni/ /de 'og zhags pa

ral gri bsnams/ /lho yi pad+mar mgon po ni/ /sku mdog nag po zhal gcig pa/ /phyag kyang de bzhin gnyis pa ste/ /g.yas g.yon tsan+dan bing chen bsnams/ /nub kyi pad+mar lus ngan po/ /sku mdog ljang gu zhal gcig pa/ /phyag gnyis mchod rten ne'u le bsnams/ /byang gi

pad+mar bdud rtsi 'khyil/ /sku mdog sngon po zhal gcig pa/ /phyag gnyis brang bsnol sdigs mdzub 'phyar/ /shar lho'i 'dab mar gnod sbyin bskyed/ /sku mdog dmar nag zhal gcig pa/ /phyag gnyis gri gug cang te'u bsnams/ /lho nub 'dab mar ro langs ma/ /sku mdog sngo

skya zhal gcig pa/ /phyag na rdo rje lcags sgrog bzung / /gung mo srin lag la sogs rnams/ /dam por bkug nas yongs su bsdams/ /mtheb mdzub bzhi rnams rab brkyang nas/ /spyi bor nges par bsnol ba rnams/ /nub byang rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /sku mdog dmar skya zhal gcig pa/ /

phyag gnyis spyi bor sbyar nas su/ /me lce phreng ba yongs su 'dzin/ /byang shar mtshams kyi 'dab ma la/ /'jigs byed kha dog sngo nag ma/ /zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs gnyis pa/ /g.yas kyi dang pos glang po bsnams/ /g.yon gyis glang chen pags pa bsnams/ /de 'og

dgra sta rdo rje bsnams/ /tha ma mi mgo lcags kyu bsnams/ /gru chad bzhi la lha mo bzhi/ /'od skyed ma ni sku mdog dkar/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis rdo rje bsnams/ /yid 'phrog ma ni sku mdog ser/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis spos phor bsnams/ /kun bzang ma sku mdog dmar mo/ /

zhal gcig phyag gnyis ro mchog bsnams/ /glu sgra can sku mdog sngon po/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis sgra snyan gar/ /shar sgro khro mo srog gcod ma/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog mthing / /phyag gnyis thod pa zhags pa bsnams/ /lho sgor dbugs rngub sku mdog ser/ /

zhal gcig phyag gnyis hom gzar zhags/ /nub sgor khrag 'thung sku mdog dmar/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis gri gug zhags/ /byang sgor sha za sku mdog sngo/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis rnon po zhags/ /de rnams bskyed pa'i tshul rnams kyang / /rnal 'byor spros dga'i sems

byang phyir/ /sa bon dag las 'od 'phros pas/ /so so'i thugs kyi mtshan ma'i rtags/ /dang po gsungs te gsum pa dgu/ /las kyi 'khor lo myur brtson pa/ bskyed pa'am skad cig glog 'gyu'i tshul/ /cung zhig gsal bar bltas nas ni/ /sngags kyi cho ga shes pas su/ /

ye shes dkyil 'khor bcas pa rnams/ /sri zhu gus pa'i tshul gyis su/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs nas/ /mdun gyi mkha' la bzhugs su gsol/ /mchod yon la sogs dbul bar bya/ /gnod sbyin drag po'i sngags kyis ni/ /bgegs rnams ma lus bzlog

par bya/ /rnam par rtog pa spang ba dang / /lus ngag nus pa mthu bskyed phyir/ /lha rnams so sor bstim par bya/ /yi ge rnam pa gsum dag ni/ /dag byed sku gsung cho gar ldan/ /dang por gsol 'debs cho ga yis/ /mchog rnams kun du bskul bas su/ /bde

gshegs thams cad mnyes nas kyang / /lha mo glu len gar byed mas/ /bdud rtsi'i bum pa thogs nas kyang / /rim bzhin dbang ni bskur bar byas/ /so so'i rigs kyi lha 'dzin 'gyur/ /mchog rnams kun du bskul bas su/ /bde gshegs thams cad

mnyes nas kyang / /slob dpon mi bskyod yab yum la/ /gnyis dang gsum gyi man ngag blang / /de nas lha la mchod pa dbul/ /phyi mchod nang mchod gsang ba'i mchod/ /mchod pa tshul bzhin dbul bar bya/ /phyi ni ji bzhin gzhan dang mthun/ /nang gi lha yi bde bskyed

pa/ /cig shos lnga ru byas pa yin/ /rtag pa ldan pa de dag ni/ /gtso bo lnga yang byas pa yin/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis/ /gnyis pa la sogs sbyar ba dang / /des ni dang po'i don kyang bya/ /rigs dang rtags ni ldan gyur pa'i/ /de nyid snying bo de las byung / /de dang

dur khrod byung ba yin/ /snang ba med pa mchog yin no/ /lnga dang bcu ru sbyar ba yi/ /yid du 'ong ba dpag med mchog /de ni nang gi don bstan to/ /gu h+ya don ni bstan bya ba/ /grol dang phyag rgya gnyis su bstan/ /grol gyis yid kyi gzugs sprul to/ /phyag rgya rtags ldan dngos su

'dug /mi ldan byin gyis brlab par bya/ /de rnams cho ga'i yan lag ni/ /rten dang brten pa'i tshul nyid kyis/ /dang por byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /rten ni as su byin gyis brlab/ /brten pa hUM gis byin gyis brlab/ /rten dang brten pa'i gtso bo dang / /yan lag rnams la lha rnams

kyis/ /byin gyis brlab pa bstim par bya/ /d+harma e yi nang shed du/ /gsum rtsam yi dkyil 'khor bsam/ /rin chen pho brang nang shed du/ /rtag pa nyid kyang bsam par bya/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi thabs shes rab/ /lnga lnga yis ni gnas su bstan/ /bskyed cing dgyed par

byed pa nyid/ /de yi grogs 'gyur gnyis dang bzhi/ /'byed par byed dang skrod par byed/ /spro bar byed dang sdud par byed/ /de nyid spro bar byed pa yi/ /bde dang shin tu bde ba ni/ /khyad par mchog tu gyur pa ni/ /gsang don mchog tu spro ba'o/ /gnyis med spro ba'i 'od zer sogs/ /

de sogs cho ga rgyas par bya'o/ /rdo rje dril bu ldan pa yis/ /rdo rje glu dang ldan pas bstod/ /hUM gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor pho brang mchog /sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog /mthun pa'i don rnams ston mdzad pa/ /rdo rje 'khor bcas phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rdo rje mi 'gyur 'jigs byed

pa/ /khams gsum rgyal bar byed pa'i mchog /dpal ldan nag po yon tan mchog /gsung gi sgra sgrogs rgyal po mchog /phrin las rang bzhin bdud rtsi 'khyil/ /'byung po 'jigs byed gnod sbyin mchog /dgra la rngams pa'i za byed ma/ /rdo rje nam mkhar 'gro ba'i mchog /'jigs

par byed pa'i sku 'chang ma/ /'od kyis gsal byed mdzes pa'i mchog /yid du 'ong ba'i yon tan ma/ /lta spyod bzang bar byed pa'i mchog /sgra dang gar gyis mnyes mdzad ma/ /rnam par rtog pa gcod pa'i mchog /'byung po zhal du rngub byed ma/ /chags pa'i mdog can khrag 'thung

ma/ /sa bdag dang ni dri za'i mchog /lha yi 'khor lo tshogs rnams la/ /bstod cing gus pas phyag kyang 'tshal/ /drag po 'jigs pa'i dkyil 'khor la/ /bstod cing gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /bstod cing mchod pa'i man ngag ni/ /nyid kyi thugs kyi dkyil 'khor las/ /sprul nas nyid la mchod par bya/ /

'khor lo gzhan rnams kyang ni mchod/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom pa ni/ /dang po gtso bo bstan byas la/ /de nas 'khor lo rim gyis bstan/ /gtso bo rim gyis bstan pa dang / /'khor lo rim gyis bstan pa dang / /rdzogs par lta ba gnyis su bya/ /dang por dbyug tshod phyed tsam la/ /de 'og

dbyug tshod gcig tsam la/ /de 'og 'pho ba gcig tu bya/ /thun tshod rnams kyang rim gyis so/ /de ltar brtan par gyur nas ni/ /che bar 'dod na che bar ro/ /chung bar 'dod na chung ba nyid/ /mang por spros nas nyung bar bsdu/ /nyung bar sdud nas mang por spro/ /kha dog ji ltar 'dod pa

bzhin/ /ldang ba yang zhing gzi brjid ldan/ /yun ring btang yang mi 'chor la/ /rlang yang ji ltar 'dod par thub/ /bdud rtsi zas kyis 'tsho bar byed/ /des su bskyed pa mthar phyin te/ /bskyed pa mthar phyin dus su mi/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi mdzad spyod ston/ /mdzad spyod bstan pa'i

dus dag tu/ /mdzad spyod bstan pa'i las rnams bstan/ /de dus gsal zhing gsal gyur nas/ /yang nas yang du brtag par bya'o/ /man ngag zab mo don ston pa/ /gus pas gsol ba gdab par bya/ /de ru bzlog pa'i don ston yang / /mi

'jigs the tshom med pas su/ /man ngag bdud rtsi blang bar bya'o/ /gal te bskyed pas skyo gyur na/ /bsgom pa ma nus las gzhan phyir/ /bzlas brjod man ngag rgyas pa rnams/ /gzhan du bstan pa mang mod kyang / /bzlas brjod man ngag bdud rtsi 'di/ /rin chen lta

bu'i gang zag la/ /rna ba brgyud de 'ong ba 'di/ /bstan par bya yis gus par nyon/ /snying ga'i 'khor lo'i man ngag la/ /sems dpa' gsum gyi man ngag rdzogs/ /'od zer dkar po 'ja' tshon tshul/ /yi ge 'phro ba'i man ngag dgod/ /'khor zhing spros pas gyen du

spros/ /lce yi rdo rje rtse mo las/ /lha yi zhal du spro bar bya/ /mchod de gnas ni gang 'dod nas/ /slar la 'khod pas sgrib pa sbyang / /sgra cher ma yin sgra chung min/ /yan lag ma nyams bzlas brjod bya/ /de ni phyi yi tshul du bstan/ /nang gi bzlas brjod bstan pa ni/ /a wa

d+hU tI'i nang shed nas/ /kha dog lnga ldan rlung byung ste/ /de nyid rta yi tshul du bstan/ /phyir 'byung rta la oM ni zhon/ /nang du zhon pa hUM yin no/ /gnas par byed pa AHnyid yin/ /de ltar spro zhing bsdu pa la/ /dang por bcu la bstan par bya/ /de nas nyi shu la bstan no/ /de

ltar gyur ba'i rim pa'i mthar/ /nang gi rim gyis bsdu bar bya'o/ /snying ga'i thig le'i gnas dag la/ /'dzin par nus so mchog yin no/ /de nyid gtan la dbab na ni/ /nyi khri chig stong drug brgya ni/ /nyin mtshan gcig la rgyu ba yin/ /de yang gnas kyi sde tshan bsdu ba ni/ /dang

por bcu drug gnyis par ni/ /sum cu ru ni shes par bya/ /bcu drug bcu gnyis brgyad du bsdu/ /bzhi dang gnyis su bsdu ba'o/ /phyir phyung sgo yis 'byed tshul ni/ /g.yas dang g.yon dang gnyis ka yang / /shin tu phra ba'i tshul du byed/ /me dang rlung dang sa dang ni/ /chu yi

rang bzhin dmar dang sngo/ /ser dang dkar ba nyid du 'dod/ /pad+ma las dang rin chen dang / /rdo rje thabs dang shes rab ni/ /de yi nus pa de ltar snang / /dang po 'byung byed gnas dang ni/ /longs spyod chos dang sprul ba dang / /rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid du 'dod/ /de yang bsdu na gnyis su snang / /

gso bar byed pa srog 'dzin yin/ /phyi dang nang gis zhes kyang bya/ /'chi byed cha rnams ma nyams par/ /rnam pa gnyis su bstan pa yin/ /de ltar spyod pa la sogs rnams/ /dngos po'i gnas lugs yin pas na/ /sngon du 'gro ba shin tu gces/ /bzlas pa'i don la mi 'jug gi/ /

yang na sngon du song ba yis/ /rdzogs pa'i don la 'jug par bya/ /dngos po'i gnas lugs bstan pa ni/ /rtsa dang rlung dang byang chub sems/ /de yi spros pas ma bstan yang / /bsdus pa'i don ni gsung du 'dus/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo gnas dag tu/ /rtsa yi 'dab ma brgyad

yin te/ /de yi dbus su d+hU tI gnas/ /de yi dkyil na 'od kyi ni/ /kha dog lnga ldan dkyil shes nas/ /thig le'i rang bzhin byang chub sems/ /bzhugs pa de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nyid la ni mu stegs kyis/ /log par rtogs pas bdud du 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug mchog gis

ni/ /de nyid nges par rtogs pas su/ /dngos grub rnam nyid de las 'byung / /de bas rnal 'byor nan tan gyis/ /bla ma mnyes par byas nas kyang / /bla ma'i zhal gyi sgo nas ni/ /de nyid man ngag shes par bya/ /kha dog lnga ldan de nyid la/ /dang po brtan par bltas nas ni/ /de nas

rtags rnams byung ba dang / /thig le nyid la brtan par bya/ /de la brtan nas spro ba dang / /bsdu ba'i sbyor ba shes par bya/ /de nyid brtan par gyur ba na/ /bde dang shin tu bde ba dang / /bde ba chen po thob par 'gyur/ /de 'og nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la/ /zhag bdun bar du gnas pa

'byung / /bdud rtsi 'dom gang lus khyab pas/ /bdud rtsi zas kyis gso bar byed/ /de 'og sgyu ma lta bu yis/ /dpe brgyad dag la bltas pas su/ /de nyid nges par thugs su chud/ /de 'og stong ba'i man ngag la/ /man ngag stobs kyis zhugs pas su/ /de nyid kho nar

nges par mthong / /de nas 'gro ba gzhan don la/ /mos pa ma yin dngos su ni/ /'jug pa'i stobs dang ldan par gyur/ /nyin mtshan phrugs re dag la yang / /bde gshegs mang pos dkyil 'khor ston/ /de yi man ngag don rnams ni/ /ma lus shes par 'gyur

ba yin/ /de ltar gzhan don mthar phyin pas/ /rang don lhun grub phyag rgya'i mchog /skad cig gcig la shes par bya/ /phyag rgya dang ni phyag rgya'i mchog /khyad par phyag rgya mchog rnams ni/ /rim pa bzhin du 'grub pa ste/ /sras po'i tshul ni rdzogs nas kyang / /yab kyi don ni

rdzogs pa yin/ /de ltar rdzogs pa'i man ngag ni/ /rnal 'byor grol lam pa la bstan/ /phyag rgya'i lam la 'jug tshul ni/ /rtags dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya ma/ rtags dang ldan par btsal bar bya/ /de la brten nas ye shes ni/ /skye ba thabs kyi man ngag kyang / /dang por byin

rlabs la sogs bya/ /de nas man ngag thun tshod dang / /gzung ba'i thabs ni shes par bya/ /de la brten par gyur nas ni/ /dngos grub kyang ni thob par 'gyur/ /de la mngon par zhen chags na/ /mchog ni 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de yi zhen pa bzlog pa'i phyir/ /nang gi phyag rgya nyid

la bslab/ /de la brtan par gyur nas ni/ /de yi zhen pa bzlog pa'i phyir/ /gsang ba'i phyag rgya gtum mo'i mchog /de nyid la ni bslab pa'i phyir/ /'khor lo la sogs rdzogs byas la/ /dang po 'byed 'dzums 'byor ba yis/ /thabs kyi rim pa bslab par bya/ /dmar po chen

po spros shes la/ /rtags rnams rim pa lnga po 'byung / /de 'og spro bsdu'i sbyor ba yis/ /dgug dang mnan pa'i rim pa yang / /dang po bslabs nas 'di la bstan/ /de la ldog par ma gyur na/ /'di ru bzlog pa'i man ngag bstan/ /de 'og lhan cig skyes ma yi/ /man ngag

stobs la zhugs pa yis/ /nam mkha'i bdud rtsi 'khor lo ni/ /rim pa bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de nas rten med rnal 'byor ma/ /de nyid la ni 'jug par bya/ /yod dang med pa'i mtha' sogs kyi/ /rtog pa thams cad 'jig pa'i mchog /kun du bzang po'i don rtogs

'gyur/ /de ltar rtog pa'i man ngag ni/ /shes rab snying rje ldan pa dang / /bla ma la gus brtson 'grus ldan/ /g.yo sgyu med pa'i bsam pa yis/ /yid du 'ong ba'i rdzas kyi mchog /'bul bar byed pa bstan par bya/ /'di ni rin chen gang zag yin/ /dang po man ngag thob bya'i

phyir/ /g.yo sgyu'i bsam pa ldan pas su/ /shin tu gus pas tshul du byed/ /man ngag thob par gyur nas ni/ /bla ma la ni rgyab kyis phyogs/ /dmyal ba yi ni rgyu sogs pa/ /de ni rgyun du spong ba yin/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa bstan nas ni/ /skabs 'dir srung ba'i 'khor

lo ni/ /srung ba'i 'khor lor bstan pa yin/ /dur khrod kyi ni ras dag la/ /'khor lo'i rim pa brtsam pa yin/ /de med gyur na gro ga'am/ /shing shun dag las bya ba yin/ /'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bris nas ni/ /dbus su snying po'i don bstan la/ /phyogs su

bzhi po don ni bstan/ /mtshams ni 'grub par byed pa yin/ /'khor lo rtsibs kyi mtshams su ni/ /gang yin pa yi ming rnams ni/ /phyi rol mu khyud bzang po la/ /thabs dang shes rab yi ge dgod/ /de ltar 'khor lo brtsams nas ni/ /maN+Dal mchod pa la sogs

bshams/ /bdag nyid rnal 'byor rdzogs byas la/ /de yang lha yis 'khor lo bskyed/ /ye shes lha la mchod byas la/ /gsol ba btab ste gnyis su bsre/ /de nas bsrung ba'i sngags bzlas bya/ /so so'i rtsa ba'i sngags 'di la/ /bar du ming rnams bcug nas ni/ /

de nas bsrung ba'i sngags gdags bya/ /sngags rnams kyang ni bstan bya ste/ /oM na mo nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye hUM hUM phaT/ oM trai lokya bi dza ya hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kA la ro Sha Na hUM phaT/ oM bai shra ba Na ye hUM phaT/ oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li ha na ha na hUM phaT/ oM badzra

yak+Sha hUM phaT/ oM badzra bai ta li hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA kI ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra b+hai ra ya hUM phaT/ oM bid ta ya hUM phaT/ oM ma mo ha ra ya hUM phaT/ oM sa man+ta b+ha dri ya hUM phaT/ oM shap+ta gI ti ya hUM phaT/ oM pra ti sa ta mi ya hUM phaT/ oM sho sa ga pa ye hUM phaT/ oM rag ta pri ta

ya hUM phaT/ oM ma sa b+hak+Shi ni hUM phaT/ oM nI lAM bar d+ha ra badzra pA Ni hUM phaT/ ces pa ni drag po'i sngags bsdus pa'o/ /swA hA zhes pa ni zhi ba'i 'o/ /oM zhes pa ni rgyas pa'i 'o/ /ho zhes pa ni dbang gi'o/ /rak+Sha rak+Sha zhes pa ni bsrung ba'i 'o/ /bsrung ba'i sngags

ni 'di dag la/ /bar du ming ni gzhug par bya/ /srung ba'i 'khor lo de dag kyang / /bzhi tshan bzhi yis bsrung ba dang / /gtso bo nyid dang bcas te bsrung / /yang na sde tshan so sor bsrung / /gtso bo gcig pus bsrung ba yin/ /yang na so sor re res kyang / /bsrung ba'i cho ga

shes par bya/ /thams cad kun gyis bsrung ba yi/ /'khor lo bca' ba'i thabs bstan pa/ /dang po 'khor lo brgyad pa la/ /rim pa gnyis pa bcu gnyis dang / /de 'og rim pa bcu drug pa'o/ /mtha' ma mu khyud gnyis dang ldan/ /dang po gtso bo'i rim pas dgod/ /de 'og sde tshan

gnyis pa dgod/ /tha ma sde tshan gnyis su bstan/ /mu khyud zlum po gnyis la ni/ /shes rab thabs kyi yi ge 'god/ /'khor lo rim pa mi 'dra'i gzhung / /rnam pa gsum du shes par bya/ /zhi bar bya dang dbang du bsdu/ /rgyas dang drag sogs gzhan dag kyang / /man ngag gis

ni sbyor zhes bya'o/ /las bzhi yi ni 'khor lo la/ /bzlas pa khri tsho gcig gis 'grub/ /de yang bsnyen pa rdzogs pa yis/ /bsrung ba la sogs gzhan dag la/ /de ltar bzlas na mchog tu bstan/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig tsam bzlas kyang / /sngags kyi nus pa mthu rnams kyis/ /bsrung

dang bskyab pa 'grub par gsungs/ /lha yi 'khor lo 'di nyid la/ /brten na cho ga gzhan dag ni/ /thams cad kun la 'grub par gsungs/ /de ltar 'khor lo'i man ngag sogs/ /gab pa'i don dang sbas pa'i don/ /dgongs pa'i don dang dgra bzlog don/ /rnam brgyud 'ongs pa la

brten nas/ /man ngag can gyis shes par bya'o/ /rnal 'byor bsdus pa'i don ched du/ /rang gi lhag pa'i lhar gyur ram/ /las rnams gzhan la 'jug 'dod pas/ /bcu bdun lha yi dkyil 'khor las/ /bcu gsum dag tu bsdu ba dang / /de la dgu ru bsdu ba dang / /lnga ru yang ni

bsdu bar bya/ /gnyis su bsdu ba bcu drug tshogs/ /yang na rgyan cig rnal 'byor gyis/ /bcu bdun du yang shes par bya/ /de ltar bsnyen pa sngon song bas/ /phan gdags pa dang tshar bcad pa'o/ /las dang sgrub pa thams cad la/ /nges par 'jug par shes par bya'o/ /sbyor

ba'i che rkyen gzhan dag kyang / /dus skabs sbyar te shes par bya/ /de ltar the tshom med gyur na/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi rtags ston pas/ /de la sogs pa'i las rnams ni/ /bsgrims te shes par ma byas na/ /rnal 'byor pa ni brlag par 'gyur/ /de bas mkhas pas nan tan du/ /

sngags kyi lta ba spyod pa ni/ /bla ma mkhas la mnyan par gyis/ /mi mkhas tshul 'chos g.yon can gyis/ /gnyi ga brlag ste dmyal bar lhung / /mkhas pa rna brgyud thos pa ni/ /'di dang pha rol gnyis su yang / /bdag dang gzhan ni gnyi ga yang / /'bras bu bzang po nges par

'byin/ /de bas bla ma mkhas pa ni/ /dang po nyid du btsal bar bya/ /man ngag can ni rnyed nas kyang / /tshul 'chos g.yon can phyir 'breng na/ /ngal ba don med 'bras bu med/ /las ngan dus kyi tha ma la/ /gang zag 'dod pa'i dbang gis ni/ /lta spyod sna tshogs ston pa

'byung / /gsang sngags dngos grub ma thob par/ /sgra dang mtshan ma la brten nas/ /nga rgyal 'dod pa'i dbang gyur nas/ /gsang sngags 'khor lo rtsom pa 'byung / /de nas yang dag don mi rnyed/ /la la mu stegs dag dang bsre/ /des ni dmyal ba'i gnas su khrid/ /gsang

sngags 'khor lo 'di dag la/ /de lta'i spyod pa ma byung yang / /mthu rnams je chung je chung 'byung / /nad dang mu ge la sogs pa/ /sna tshogs dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /las ngan dus kyi tha ma la/ /slob dpon sku la bdo ba dang / /bstan pa 'jig sogs 'byung 'gyur

bas/ /de la bzod pa mi bsgom ste/ /gsang sngags 'khrul 'khor bskor bar bya/ /de las gzhan du byas gyur na/ /dam tshig nyams te dmyal bar 'gro/ /dpal ldan rdo rje mthu stobs can/ /dus gsum bde gshegs thams cad kyis/ /rig sngags gsang

sngags bdag po ru/ /dbang bskur mnga' gsol mdzad nas ni/ /gsang sngags 'khor lo mtha' dag ni/ /khyod kyis bsdus la khyod kyis bskor/ /bde gshegs rnams kyi bka' yang bsgo/ /'khor lo rgyas par bskor nas kyang / /de 'og rang gi 'khor

lo ni/ /rtsod pa rgyas pa'i dus dag tu/ /bskor na las rnams 'grub pa dang / /de las gus pa mang 'gyur bas/ /de yi dus su bstan par bya/ /rgyal ba nyid kyis de skad gsung / /de bzhin bdag ni rjes mthun pas/ /'di la mos pa'i rnal 'byor ni/ /phyogs rnams kun gyis

gsol gdab dang / /bdag rang bsod nams bsags pa'i phyir/ /'di bstan pa yi sems pa skyes/ /brtson 'grus dag pa'i sgo nas ni/ /lha rnams sgrub cing gsol gdab pas/ /gsang sngags don dang mthun pa yis/ /sems pa skye ba de nyid srung / /dper na nyi ma'i

'od zer ni/ /bye ba brgya phrag mang po las/ /gzi brjid khang pa'i nang du shar/ /de bzhin 'od zer phra mo gcig /bdag blo yi ni mun par snang / /snang ba de yang bdag gis ni/ /gzhan rnams kun la bstan par bya/ /man ngag 'di bkod cho ga yis/ /bdag dang

sems can thams cad kun/ /bsod nams 'di la brten nas ni/ /thams cad byang chub thob par shog /slob dpon b+ha bas mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs chen po rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ ma hA ya k+Sha se na pa ti nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni sA

d+ha naM/ /bod skad du/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sgrub thabs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud dag la/ /brten nas nang gi sgrub thabs 'di/ /bdag gis dran phyir bshad par bya/ /lha yi rnal 'byor yud tsam

bsam/ /rang gi snying gar zla dkyil bsam/ /de yi steng du hUM yig bsam/ /hUM las 'od zer 'phros pa las/ /phyi nang gsal nas 'od zer 'phros/ /bla ma dang ni gos sngon can/ /dkon mchog la sogs spyan drangs nas/ /phyag 'tshal mchod cing bshags pa dang / /rjes su

yi rang bskul zhing gsol ba gdab/ /skyabs gsol lus dbul dge rtsa bsngo/ /tshad med bzhi yang bsgom par bya/ /de nas stong pa'i ting 'dzin bsgoms/ /de la 'od phung tshul du bdag rang nyid/ /de yi nang na hUM gnas la/ /de las tsaM 'phros 'khor lor gyur/ /lte bar nyid

bsams hUM de nyid/ /de las gnod mdzes rgyal por gyur/ /de yi hUM gi 'phro 'du yis/ /khro bo chen po bcu ru gyur/ /hUM bzhi'i gsang sngags brjod pa yis/ /khro bcu'i sprul pas gdug pa bkug /sku gsung thugs kyi phur bus gdab/ /btul zhing sbyangs nas nam mkhar gyur/ /de nas

hUM gi 'phro 'du yis/ /rdo rje gur dang ra ba dang / /dra ba nyid du gyur pa'o/ /hUM gi 'phro 'dus slar la zhu/ /stong pa nyid las 'od spung byung / /de las nyi zla kha sbyar gyur/ /A li kA lis nyi zla brgyan/ /dbus su a dang hUM sbyar te/ /kha dog dkar dmar nyid du blta/ /'od zer dkar dmar 'phro 'du

las/ /zhu bas rdo rje pad+mar gyur/ /pad steng rdo rje rkang nub tsam/ /lte ba gnyis la snying pos bskor/ /de gnyis las ni thugs dang gsung / /gnyi gas sku bsdus byin gyis brlab/ /de nyid 'od du zhu ba las/ /rdo rje las ni khro bor gyur/ /pad+ma las ni khro mor gyur/ /khro bo rdo rje gos sngon can/ /

sku mdog mthing nag zhal gcig pa/ /phyag gnyis rdo rje dril bu bsnams/ /mche ba gtsigs pas 'dod dgur gyur/ /zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum 'khril ba'i tshul/ /g.yon du rdo rje khro mo ni/ /sku mdog ljang dmar zhal gcig ma/ /phyag g.yas rdo rje gri gug gtso la 'khyud/ /g.yon pa

b+ha na dmar gtso la stob/ /gnyis med 'khril pa'i tshul bsgoms nas/ /ye shes sems dpa'i spyan drangs te/ /phyi nang bdud rtsi mchod nas bstim/ /'od zer 'phro 'du byin gyis brlab/ /de bzhin khro chung lus byin brlab/ /dbang bskur bas ni mi bskyod 'gyur/ /de ltar bsgoms nas

bzlas pa bya/ /de steng ye shes sems dpa' yi/ /mtshan ma la sogs bsgoms nas su/ /thugs kar 'khor ram yul 'khor ba/ /'od zer la ni yig 'bru bskyon/ /ma gsal bar du bsgom par bya/ /de ltar rab 'bring tha ma yis/ /'bum mam nyis 'bum sum 'bum

'grub/ /the tshom med na dngos grub 'grub/ /dam tshig nyams sam sdig che bas/ /sbyin sreg la sogs mang du bya/ /mtshan ma gsum mam nus pa brtag /de ltar byung na sgrub pa brtsam/ /ston du bsnyen pa'i cho ga'o/ /sgrub pa'i rim pa bstan pa ni/ /mkha'

'gro 'du ba'i gnas phyin la/ /dkyil 'khor gru gsum nag por bya/ /rdo rje gri gug nang du ste/ /bar du me ri gtang bar bya/ /gzhu dang dgra sta mdung dang gsum/ /me ri'i zur nas gtang bar bya/ /tshub ma dur khrod sol ba dang / /bdud rtsi bag zan gzugs brnyan bya/ /snying gar

gru gsum gzugs brnyan gzhug /kha bcad seng ldeng phur la btod/ /mtshan ldan ka pA la ru ni/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lngas dgang / /de ni gos sngon nyid la mchod/ /lcags kyi gru gsum nang du ni/ /bdud rtsi sha lnga khrag gsum dgang / /de ni nag po'i gtor gta'o/ /

rnel gre'i snod du dug gtor bsags/ /phye ma gsum dang yungs kar gdab/ /slob dpon slob ma gnyis ka yang / /gos sngon gos nag rgyan cha bgo/ /rak+Sha rus pa'i phreng ba bgrang / /nub dang lho ru kha bltas te/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa tshul bzhin bsgom/ /thun mong sngags dang khyad

par sngags/ /dgra'am 'byung po klu rnams la/ /bzlas pas gsang ba'i rim pa brtsam/ /snying ga'i mtshan ma la sogs gsal/ /lce ni hUM gi rdo rjer bsgyur/ /'od zer dkar dmar 'phros pa las/ /de la khro tshogs byung bas dgug /yang na mgon po bskul bas bsam/ /khri yi

bar du bzlas nas ni/ /thun bar du ni phye ma gsum/ /mgon pos las kyi gtor mar gdab/ /yungs kar gos sngon can gyis so/ /phye ma dug nag 'od zer dgang / /yungs kar khro chung nyid du spro/ /rtags byung nas ni gzugs brnyan gzhug /de nas sgrub khang them rtsa ru/ /

gru gsum nag po'i brub khung du/ /de nyid bcug la kha bcad ri rab bri/ /de steng mnan zhing stang stabs bya/ /de ni mnan pa'i sbyor ba'o/ /phur bus gdab cing gri gug gtub/ /de nas gru gsum gtor mar dbul/ /nag po chen po nyid la bstabs/ /drag sngags bzlas pa'i gtor

ma yi/ /gsang ba'i man ngag shes par bya'o/ /yang na sbyin sreg nyid kyis bya/ /de rnams gsad pa'i sbyor ba'o/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad bskyed pa yi/ /lte bar gtso bo bskyed nas ni/ /klu chen brgyad po 'dab mar bskyed/ /rin chen snod du gtor ma bsham/ /chu gtsang sman la sogs

pa dang / /khyad par klu sman sna tshogs dang / /dkar gsum mngar gsum rnams kyis bya/ /sbyang zhing byin gyis brlab sogs bya/ /klu la byin pas zhe sdang zhi/ /lhag ma 'khor lo byin pa yis/ /gnod pa rnams ni zhi bar 'gyur/ /sngags bzlas 'od zer phog pa yis/ /

gtso bo'i dam tshig rjes dran pas/ /'khor rnams zhe sdang zhi bar 'gyur/ /yang na zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya/ /bskrad dang bcing dang dgug pa yis/ /de la sogs pa'i sbyor ba ni/ /sbyor ka chen por shes par bya/ /'khor lo ser po'i lte bar gtso/ /mdun du rgyal po bskyed par bya/ /

de yi g.yas su nor lha ni/ /sku mdog dkar po 'dzum bag can/ /nor bu'i sgrom ni g.yas g.yon bsnams/ /mchod cing bstod pa gsang sngags bzlas/ /gzugs brnyan 'di la rin chen brten/ /kha dog lnga dang gser gyis mtshon/ /kha dog ser po'i bzlas thems

nas/ /ci 'dod pa yi nor rnams ster/ /de ni thun mong dngos grub bo/ /bdud rtsi rtsa ba lnga btsal la/ /bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor bya/ /dkar gsum mngar gsum nyid la ni/ /sngags bzlas ri lu byas te bza'/ /zas dang sman ni srang la brje/ /brjes zin zhig

gsum 'bras bu 'byung / /de gsum skye ba bdun pa dang / /yul gyi cha bsres sman rnams sbyar/ /de sgrub 'od zer btul zhing sbyang / /rtags byung nas ni bza' zhing byug /de yis thun mong dngos grub 'grub/ /mchog gi yang ni grogs su 'gyur/ /mchog gi dngos grub

bsgrub pa yang / /thugs ka yi ni dkyil 'khor du/ /rtsa rgyud 'dab ma brgyad du bsam/ /de dkyil rtsa ni rta rnga'i tshad/ /de yi nang du dbugs kyi lha/ /kha dog lnga dang ldan pa'o/ /de dkyil thig le byang chub sems/ /de la lta zhing bsgom pa ni/ /rtags lnga'i mthar ni stong nyid

'gyur/ /de nyid spro zhing bsdu ba dang / /dgug cing bskyil ba'i rim pa'am/ /mnan cing bzlog pa'i man ngag gis/ /rim gyis ye shes skye bar 'gyur/ /de nas phyag rgya'i dngos grub 'thob/ /nang sgrub rim pa 'di yis ni/ /bdag dang mtha' yas sems

can dang / /'di la brten pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /bla med byang chub thob par shog /gnod sbyin gyi de dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sgrub thabs/ slob dpon b+ha bas mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye

nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni maN+Dal bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdud rnams thams cad tshar gcod pa'i/ /mthu stobs can la phyag 'tshal

nas/ /chags la mos par gyur pa yi/ /rnal 'byor lam pa'i don ched du/ /rgyud rnams kun dang mi 'gal ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga bshad par bya/ /slob dpon mtshan nyid ldan pa yis/ /sngon du bsnyen pa rdzogs byas te/ /de nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /yid du 'ong ba'i

gnas dag tu/ /dri bzang tsan+dan spos kyis byugs/ /dri zhim me tog mchod bkram nas/ /lho ru kha bltas rol pa'i 'dug stangs bya/ /yang na bsnyen pa zhi ba'i tshul yin pas/ /shar du kha bltas sems dpa'i skyel krung bca'/ /'khor ba'i 'dam du bying ba yi/ /'gro la

phan dang skyob pa'i phyir/ /snying rje chen pos dmigs par bya/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa'i tshul bsgom bya/ /de nas bzlas brjod tshul bzhin bya/ /dkyil 'khor gtso bo'i 'bum du bzlas/ /de las gzhan pa khri ru bzlas/ /mtshan ma rnam gsum thob pa yis/ /yang na bsnyen sbyor

goms pas ni/ /rdul tshon dkyil 'khor brtsam par bya'o/ /slob ma snod dang ldan pa yis/ /dang por gsol gsum btab nas ni/ /bsnyen rdzogs gting la gdab par bya/ /dang por sa ni brtag par bya/ /phyogs gcad dbyibs ldan skyon bral ba'i/ /mkhas pas ci

nus brtag par bya/ /maN+Dal lags byas me tog dgram/ /lha yi gnas dang gdan du bsam/ /lha bskyed la sogs byas nas ni/ /mchod dang bstod pa tshul bzhin bya/ /dgongs shig dus gsum mgon po rnams/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa dang / /slob ma rnams

la sman slad du/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis/ /dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa 'dri bar 'tshal/ /rgyal ba sras dang bcas rnams kyis/ /bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ /zhes lan gsum du brjod de gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /de nas chos

skyong ba'i srung ma rnams la/ mchod dang gtor ma byin nas ni/ /bstod cing gsol ba gdab par bya/ /de nas las thams cad pa'i thab khung du sbyin sreg gis sbyar bar bya'o/ /sbyin sreg grub par ma gyur na/ /las thams cad pa'i gsang sngags chus/ /bgegs ni nye bar zhi

bar bya'o/ /de nas ji ltar brtags pa'i dbus su/ byin rlabs rdo rjes khru gang brko/ /skyon rnams spangs nas sa rim bcal/ /'thas par bcags la byug par bya/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas byin rlabs pa'i/ /ri rab gzhal yas bskyed nas ni/ /lha bskyed la sogs

rdzogs byas la/ /de nas skad cig myur du khros/ /'khor rnams kyis ni gsol ba gdab/ /khro bo'i mig dang rkang sogs byin gyis brlab/ /rdo rje dril bu gnyis bzung nas/ /stang stabs sbyor ba la sogs kyis/ /bgegs rnams ma lus tshar gcad do/ /de nas sa yi lha mo la/ /

mchod bstod gsol ba btab pa yis/ /dbang po phyir ni sta gon gnas/ /bdud rtsi thig le la sogs bya/ /lha rnams cho ga la sogs rdzogs/ /de nas gsol ba gdab par bya/ /bdug spos lag thogs pus btsugs la/ /bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa mchog /rig sngags

rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid can rnams kyis/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni bri bar bya/ /slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang / /khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir/ /bcom ldan bdag ni gus pa la/ /de ni gnang ba mdzad par rigs/ /sangs rgyas 'gro don bya don

gsol/ /byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags lha/ /'jig rten skyong dang mthu chen dang / /gang yang rdo rje'i spyan mnga' ba'i/ /sems can bstan la dga' ba rnams/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgye ba yis/ /rdo rje 'dzin kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /yo byad ci

yod pas 'dri na/ /deng bdag slob mar bcas pa la/ /thugs brtse bar ni dgongs su gsol/ /tshogs pa thams cad dkyil 'khor du/ /byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol/ /de ltar lan gsum gsol btab nas/ /ra ba dra bas mtshams bya'o/ /gser la sogs

pa'i bum pa yi/ /lto ba che ba mgrin ring ba/ /skyon spangs nyes pa bral ba dang / /yon tan la sogs lha grangs bstun/ /rdzas dang kha rgyan mgul chings ldan/ /mtshan ma rdzogs nas byin gyis brlab/ /rnam rgyal las kyi bum pa la/ /khyad par cho ga la sogs bya/ /

de nas slob ma blo ldan la/ /slob dpon gyis ni cho ga bya/ /slob ma sgo yi drung gnas te/ /dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig de ni stsal du

gsol/ /byang chub sems ni bdag la stsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /dkon mchog gsum ni bdag la stsol/ /thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon po bdag nyid 'jug par 'tshal/ /de ltar lan gsum gsol btab nas/ /slob dpon gtso bo'i

ting 'dzin zhugs/ /tshigs bcad 'di ni gsang sngags sbyin/ /bu tshur theg pa chen po yis/ /gsang sngags tshul spyod cho ga 'di/ /khyod la yang dag bstan par bya/ /khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te/ /dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /sku gsung

thugs kyi rdo rje dang / /rdo rje gsang sngags rab bsgom pa'i/ /dpa' bo byang chub shing drung du/ /thams cad mkhyen pa mtshan med brnyes/ /gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med de/ /shAkya seng ge skyob pa yis/ /bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa'i/ /dpung chen dag kyang de yis

bcom/ /'jig rten rjes 'jug par rtogs nas/ /'khor lo bskor nas mya ngan 'das/ /de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir/ /bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig /ces smras so/ /de nas/ skyabs 'gro sdig bshags la sogs kun/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor nyid du shes par bya/ /

srog chags rnams ni gsad mi bya/ /ma byin par yang mi blang ngo / /'dod pa dag kyang spyad mi bya/ /brdzun du smra bar mi bya'o/ /nyes pa kun gyi rtsa ba yi/ /chang ni myos par btung ma yin/ /sems can gdul bya ma gtogs pa/ /bya ba ma yin thams cad spang / /dam pa nye bar bsten

bya zhing / /rnal 'byor can du bsnyen bkur bya/ /lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang / /ngag gi las ni rnam pa bzhi/ /yid kyi las ni rnam gsum dang / /ci nus pa ru rjes su bsrung / /sems can don la rgyab mi phyogs/ /theg pa dman la 'dod mi bya/ /'khor ba dag kyang spang mi

bya/ /rtag tu mya ngan 'da' mi bya/ /lha dang lha min gsang ba pa/ /de la brnyas par mi bya zhing / /phyag rgya bzhon pa mtshon cha dang / /mtshan ma 'gom par mi bya'o/ /de ltar dam tshig phog pa dag /blo ldan khyod kyis rtag tu bsrung / /mdor na rtsa ba yan lag gi/ /dam tshig nyin

mtshan bgrang zhing bsrung / /de nas bla mas gsungs pa yi/ /sdom pa legs par gzung bar bya/ /tshul khrims zhes bya sogs pa ni/ /dus 'di nas ni bzung nas ni/ /ji srid byang chub snying po'i bar/ /bdag ni rab tu ldog par bgyi/ /de ltar sdom pa dang ldan pa'i slob ma la/ snying

ga dang mgrin pa dang dpral ba gsum du rdo rje khu tshur gyis dri'i thig le gsum du bya ste/ nyi ma dang zla ba dang pad+ma gsum la yi ge gsum so sor bkod la/ sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlab cing las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis bsrung bar bya'o/ /de nas mchod pa bya ste/

spyi bor me tog dang spos so/ /mar me dang dri ni snying gar ro/ /lha bshos mdun du'o/ /de nas tshig ni 'dis su sbyin/ /dus 'di nas ni bzung nas su/ /'khor ba'i nyes pas ma gos par/ /mchod pa dag dang ldan par ni/ /dus kun du ni bde bar mnos/ /de nas tshems shing la

sogs sbyin par bya/ /'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen rnams/ /u dum+WA ra'i me tog bzhin/ /brgya lam zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i chos bshad par bya'o/ /de nas thig byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa shes par bya'o/ /de nas thig skud gdab pa ni/ /dkyil

'khor spyi dang mthun pas na/ /tshon rnams byin gyis brlabs nas ni/ /tshon rnams bkye ba'i las bya'o/ /pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad dkyil du/ /zla ba nyi ma'i gdan stengs su/ /gtso bo bri bar bya ba yin/ /'dab ma brgyad la lha brgyad bri/ /gru chad bzhi la lha mo bzhi/ /sgo bzhir sgo

ba bzhi bri'o/ /de nas rgyan sogs bri bar bya/ /de 'og lhag chad bskang bya'o/ /nam mkha' 'degs par 'dod pa dang / /yang bskyed yang sdud byed pa gnyis/ /gong ltar mos pa 'jug pa yis/ /gtso bo sngon du 'gro ba rdzogs pa yin/ /'khor rnams sprul pa'am cho gas bskyed/ /

dbus su gtso bo sku mdog sngon po ste/ /zhal gcig phyag g.yas rdo rje bsnams/ /g.yon ni gdul bya'i skabs dang sbyar/ /shar gyi pad+mar rnam par rgyal/ /sku mdog dmar po dbu gsum pa/ /phyag g.yas rdo rje rtse lnga 'dzin/ /g.yon pas dgra sta bar ma gnyis/ /gung

mo mthe bo ngos mdud nas/ /gzhan rnams yongs su dpyang ba yin/ /de nyid snying gar bzung nas ni/ /de 'og zhags pa ral gri bsnams/ /lho yi pad+mar mgon po ni/ /sku mdog nag po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ /g.yas g.yon tsan+dan bing chen zhags pa bsnams/ /

nub kyi 'dab mar lus ngan po/ /sku mdog ljang gu zhal gcig pa/ /phyag gnyis mchod rten ne le bsnams/ /byang gi 'dab mar bdud rtsi 'khyel/ /sku mdog sngon po zhal gcig pa/ /phyag gnyis brang bsnol sdigs mdzub 'phyar/ /shar lho'i 'dab mar gnod sbyin

bskyed/ /sku mdog dmar nag zhal gcig pa/ /phyag gnyis gri gug cang te'u bsnams/ /lho nub pad+mar ro langs ma/ /sku mdog sngo skya zhal gcig ma/ /phyag gnyis rdo rje lcags sgrog bzung nas su/ /gung mo srin lag la sogs gsum po rnams/ /dam por bkug

nas yongs su bsdam/ /mtheb mdzub bzhi rnams rab brkyang ste/ /spyi bor nges par bsnol ba bsnams/ /nub byang 'dab mar rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /sku mdog dmar skya zhal gcig ma/ /phyag gnyis spyi bor sbyar nas su/ /me lce phreng ba yongs su 'dzin/ /byang shar

mtshams kyi 'dab ma la/ /'jigs byed kha dog sngo nag la/ /zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs gnyis pa/ /g.yas kyi dang pos glang po bsnams/ /g.yon pas glang chen pags pa bsnams/ /de 'og dgra sta rdo rje bsnams/ /tha mas mi mgo lcags kyu bsnams/ /gru

chad bzhi la lha mo bzhi/ /'od bskyed sku mdog dkar mo la/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis me tog bsnams/ /yid 'phrog ma sku mdog ser mo/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis dri'i spos phor bsnams/ /kun bzang ma sku mdog dkar mo/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis ro mchog

bsnams/ /gru sgra ma sku mdog sngon mo/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis sgra snyan gar/ /shar gyi sgo ru srog gcod ma/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog mthing / /phyag gnyis tho ba zhags pa bsnams/ /lho sgor dbugs rngub ma ser mo/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis hom

gzar zhags/ /nub sgor khrag 'thung ma sku mdog dmar mo/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis gri gug zhags/ /byang sgor sha za ma sku mdog sngon mo/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis non po zhags/ /de ltar gsal bar bskyed nas su/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs

nas/ /nam mkhar bzhugs pa de nyid la/ /mchod bstod byas nas dam tshig gi/ /dkyil 'khor dag la bstim par bya/ /de nas bdag nyid shar sgo ru/ /dang po nyid nas mes po'i tshul/ /shar sgo ru ni gnas pa 'am/ /yang na phyi nas sras kyi tshul/ /de nas byin rlabs dbang

bskur bya/ /mchod dang bstod pa rdzogs byas la/ /sgrub pa'i bzlas brjod thim pa dang / /slob ma dkyil 'khor gzhug par bya/ /de nas yol bas bcad bar du/ /las kyi chu bo gtor ba dang / /gdong g.yogs bcing ba dang / yon phul nas ni mthong ba dri/ /chu blud

bka' bsgo byas nas me tog dor/ /mig dbye lha ngo de ni rim bzhin bstan/ /de nas dbang bskur rim bzhin bya/ /yab yum snyoms zhugs 'od zer las/ /bde gshegs 'od bskul bum par thim/ /ma 'dres pas ni 'od zhu nas/ /spyi bor chu yi dbang

bskur ro/ /tshigs bcad 'dis ni sbyin par bya/ /sku gsung dam tshig las byung ba'i/ /ye shes bdud rtsi dri ma med/ /lha yi chu ni dag pa yis/ /mi bskyod pa yi dbang bskur ro/ /oM badzra A daR+sha dz+nyA na a b+he Shiny+tsa zhes pas so/ /dbu rgyan man ngag shes byas la/ /'di skad

do/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal srid de/ /dbu rgyan rin chen dam pa ste/ /dbu rgyan rin chen mchog 'gro bas/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM sa man+ta dz+nyA na rat+na nA ma hUM tiSh+Tha a b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes pas so/ /rdo rje'i man ngag shes byas la/ /sangs rgyas

kun gyi rdo rje'i dbang / /mi phyed rdo rje 'od gsal ba/ /dam chos 'byung ba'i sgor gyur pa/ /rdo rje chos kyi dbang bsgur ro/ /oM pra ta a b+hi She ka dz+nyA na badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ dril bu'i man ngag shes byas la/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis/ /'gro don mnyam med byed pa dang / /

mchod pa'i las rnams rdzogs byed pas/ /rdo rje las kyi dbang bskur ro/ /oM kri ta a nut+ta dz+nyA na badzra a nyi Shiny+tsa/ ming gi man ngag shes byas la/ /rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas/ /byang chub snying po'i bar du ni/ /cis kyang mi shigs mi g.yo bas/ /rdo rje'i ming du rab tu grags/ /

oM pra ti sho d+ha d+harma d+hA tu dz+nyA na nA ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ de nas dam tshig gsum gyi dbang bskur bya ste/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rgyud cho ga bzhin/ /tshigs bcad rnams kyang bsgrag par bya/ /oM AHhUM/ de gsum man ngag 'od zer ni/ /bla ma las ni shes par bya/ de nas me long

dbang bskur bya/ /gong ma bzhin du man ngag gtso/ /de nas khyad par dbang bskur ni/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor ji bzhin no/ /gos sngon sgrub pa'i dbang bskur ba rdzogs so// //rdo rje slob dpon 'dod pa yis/ /yon gyis bla ma mnyes byas la/ /phyag 'tshal nas ni

gsol ba gdab/ /byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la/ /ji ltar mchod cing stsol mdzad pa/ /bdag la srung ba'i don gyi phyir/ /nam mkha'i rdo rje bdag la stsol/ /zhes gsol ba gdab po/ /de nas shar phyogs su dkyil 'khor chen po dang / bar du 'dom gyis chod par ni

dbang gi dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin bris la de'i steng du dbang stegs kyi khri byas la ras la gdan pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa seng ges mtshan pa bzhag ste/ de la gdugs la sogs pa thams cad kyis bklubs la/ rnam par rgyal ba dang / lha thams cad kyi bum pa dang las thams cad

kyi bum pas man ngag ji lta ba bzhin dbang bskur ro/ /de nas rdo rje brtul zhugs dang / lung bstan pa dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa bye dbugs dbyung ba dang / dung dang 'khor lo la sogs pa'i dbang byin la/ de nas dkyil 'khor de nyid bstan/ /de nas yon phul la/ de nas gsang ba'i dbang

bskur bar gsol ba gdab po/ /gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba yang 'od dang grib ma'i tshul du g.yon du bsams la/ man ngag bzhin du byang sems dbab/ /phab pas sbyin par bya ba dang / /yang na bdud rtsi rnam lnga ni/ /mtshan dang ldan pa'i snod bzhag nas/ /sa bon lnga la

rigs lnga ni/ /snyoms zhugs bdud rtsir zhu bar bsam/ /yang na dbab pa'i tshul du bya/ /yang na dngos su dbab pa dang / /yang na gnyis kas bya ba yin/ /cu gang gis ni 'de gu sbyar/ /cha gnyis bsres pas gong bzhin no/ /tshigs bcad 'dis ni gsol ba gdab/ /

rdo rje sems dpa' khyod kyi mthus/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni bde ba 'grub/ /rnam dag byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /rgya cher sras su bcas pa rnams/ /yun ring stong nyid sgom gdung la/ /dga' bas yid 'ong bde chen gyis ni dgyes par mdzod/ /kye 'dod chags dri med kun

du bzang po'i spyod pa ste/ /dga' ba'i 'dod chags rdo rje'i dam tshig la ni phye mdzad nas/ /dga' ba rnam pa drug po spyod pas shin tu gdung ba ni/ /rab tu dgyes dbang 'dod pa'i bde ba nyid kyis 'jug par 'tshal/ /byang chub sems ni rin chen 'bar 'byung ba'i/ /ma lus rgyal

ba rnams ni lus skams la/ /rnam dag rdo rje las byung ye shes chu/ /dri med rin chen sbyin dbab dbang bskur ro/ /mnyam dang mi mnyam 'dod chags tshul dag pas/ /pad+ma'i gnas su rdo rje gtong mdzad pa/ /sna tshogs sems dpa' sems can brlag gyur pa/ /

sbyor ba gzhan pa yin pa ma thogs bshad par gsol/ /rdo rje sems khyod dbang mchog bde bar byed pa yi/ /rdo rje pad+ma dbye ba'i tshul gyis sbyor mdzad de/ /rgyal ba kun gyi gzugs sku rab ston nas/ /thams cad bde grub nyid kyis bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /de nas tshogs kyis

mchod byas la/ /mtshan ldan snod nas blangs nas ni/ /rdo rje srin mtheb byin rlabs la/ /oM a mr-i ta gu h+ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes pas mgrin par gsung la dbul bar bya'o/ /slob mas kyang bdud rtsi chen por bsams la a ho su kha zhes pas btung bar bya'o/ /de nas gsang

ba'i dbang bskur ba'i bstod pa yang bya'o/ /da ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur bar bya ste/ phyag rgya la brten mi 'jug la/ /man ngag 'di ni bstan pa yin/ /yid kyi lha mo gzugs mdzes la/ /bdud rtsi chen po man ngag sbyar bar bya/ /yang na rdo rje lce thung gi/ /spyor

ba'i man ngag bsten pa dang / /yang na rtsa ni gnyis po la/ /phyag rgya'i sbyor ba bstan pa dang / /yang na rdzas rnams mthu chen kyis/ /byugs pas dga' ba skye 'gyur ro/ /slob mas yon dbul gsol ba gdab/ /mchod cing bstod pas mnyes byas la/ /'di skad tshig kyang

brjod par bya/ /khams gsum las ni rnam grol zhing / /nam mkha' dang ni mnyam gyur pa/ /'dod pa rnams kyis ma gos pa/ /dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phung po rnams dang khams rnams dang / /skye mched rnams la mi brten cing / /phyin ci log pas rnam

grol zhing / /nam mkha' dang ni mnyam 'gyur zhing / /'dod pa dag gis ma gos pa/ /dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam rtog med cing kun rtog med/ /thugs ni rab tu mi gnas pa/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa yi thugs/ /dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

ji ltar nam mkha' gnas med cing / /spros med gos pa med pa ltar/ /mkha' dang mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' ba'i/ /dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo /thams cad stong pa'i rang bzhin can/ /mngon par byang chub blta bar 'tshal/ /dga' mchog sgo nas bstod mdzad

pa/ /lhan cig ye shes khyod phyag 'tshal/ /de nas sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ /oM pradz+nyA dz+nyA na a b+hi Shiny+dzAmi/ zhes pa lan bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/ /de nas dbang bzhi bstan pa ni/ /gzhung lugs mi 'dra mang mod kyang / /dang po'i tshig rten man ngag ni/ /

rna ba dag tu brgyud pa yin/ /tha ma lhan cig dga' ba yin/ /dang po bum pa'i dbang gis ni/ /man ngag rnams ni bstan pa yin/ /de nas gsang ba yi bstan la/ /khyad par sngags kyi don rnams bstan/ /sngags rnams don dang bcas rnams ni/ /rna ba brgyud par bya ba ni/ /

oM nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni hUM hUM phaT/ oM pradz+nyA ti sa ta ni ya hUM phaT/ oM sha swa gA pa ya hUM phaT/ oM ga ti pr-i ya ni hUM phaT/ oM maM sa b+hak+Sha ni hUM phaT/ oM trai lokya bi dza ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra yak+Sha hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kA la ro Sha Na hUM phaT/ oM badzra be+e tA lbi hUM phaT/ oM bai shra ba Na ye hUM

phaT/ oM badzra DA ki ye hUM phaT/ oM a mri ta kuN+Da li ha na ha na hUM phaT/ oM badzra b+ha ra ya hUM phaT/ oM pra bid pa na ya hUM phaT/ oM ma na ma ha ra nA ya hUM phaT/ oM sa man+ta b+ha dra ya hUM phaT/ oM shap+ta gI ti ya hUM phaT/ oM nAM lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni ma hA yak+Sha se na pa ta ye hUM hUM phaT/

sngags kyi don rnams ma shes na/ /ngag gi sgrib pa mi 'dag phyir/ /des na slob dpon rna brgyud kyi/ /man ngag de la nan tan bya/ /de nas shes rab ye shes kyi/ /man ngag de ni bstan par bya/ /dga' ba bum pa'i don bstan la/ /mchog dga' gsang ba'i don bstan no/ /khyad

par shes rab ye shes bstan/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba ni/ /bzhi pa kho na bstan pa yin/ /yang na bum pa'i dbang bskur nas/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa bstan pa yin/ /de nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur na/ /rdo rje bzlas pa bstan par bya/ /shes rab ye shes dbang bskur

nas/ /sems dben par ni bstan par bya/ /de nas sgyu ma la gnas pas/ /bzhi pa'i man ngag bstan par bya/ /de nas 'od gsal la brten nas/ /zung 'jug ting 'dzin bsgom par bya/ /zung 'jug ting 'dzin mthar phyin pa/ /chos kyi sku zhes de la bya/ /

de ltar bzhi pa'i rna brgyud bstan/ /dbang bskur rdzogs nas tshogs 'khor bya/ /gtor ma btang nas mkha' 'gro bskang / /sbyin sreg gis ni lhag chad bskang / /yi ge brgya pa zlos byed cing / /dkyil 'khor bskor zhing sgra rnams brdung / /ye shes gshegs nas nying 'dzin bsdu/ /

rdul tshon phyags la chu la dor/ /maN+Dal zhal bsil dga' ston bya/ /rnal 'byor lam pa'i don ched du/ /rgyud rnams kun dang mi 'gal ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga 'di byas pas/ /'di byas dge ba'i rtsa ba yis/ /bdag dang mtha' yas sems can rnams/ /thams cad

byang chub thob par shog /dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga slob dpon b+ha bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //lo tsA ba dge slong gzhon nu tshul khrims kyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa//[ ]@/ /lung bstan sbyor ba'i man ngag bzhugs// @##/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /lung bstan sbyor ba'i man ngag 'di/ /rgyud rnams kun las mi gsal ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro ma yis rgyas btab la/ /rnal 'byor blo dman don du ni/ /yang nas yang du gsol btab nas/ /yid ches brod pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ /man ngag rim pa bstan pa

la/ /bla ma las ni mnyan par gyis/ /gsang sngags sgo ni dpag med nas/ /thabs kyi rim pa mang gsungs pa/ /sems can las ni sna tshogs pas/ /so so mos pa mi mthun phyir/ /dper na sman rnams nus pa yis/ /nad rnams so sor sel ba bzhin/ /man ngag thabs

rnams so sos kyang / /dug gi nad rnams 'joms par byed/ /dper na sman nus gcig gis kyang / /phrad pa tsam gyis nad 'joms pa'o/ /yang na gnyis 'joms gsum 'joms dang / /bzhi 'joms lnga 'joms la sogs dang / /mang po 'dus nas 'joms pa dang / /de dag

kun gyis ma choms pa/ /sbyor ba gzhan log 'joms pa dang / /gnyan pa kho nas 'joms pa dang / /sman dang sbyor ba de dag kyang / /mkhas pa yis ni 'joms par 'gyur/ /mi mkhas pas ni gnod par 'gyur/ /sman pa mkhas par gyur kyang ni/ /brtson 'grus nan tan ma

byas na/ /nad rnams 'joms par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin mthun pa'i dpe rnams kyang / /mkha' 'gro ma yis lung bstan na/ /zhib pas 'di ru ma phye'o/ /bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis nyon mongs 'joms/ /bsgoms pa las byung dngos grub kyis/ /mchog gi dngos grub thob

par 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin thob par ma gyur pas/ /tshogs 'khor tshogs mchod dngos grub po/ /de ma byung na sbyin sreg gis/ /dngos grub sgrub par gsungs pa yin/ /de ma byung ba bzlas brjod do/ /de ni ma byung gtor ma bya/ /de rnams kun las ma byung na/ /las ni phran tshegs

gzhan yang bstan/ /yang na de dag thams cad kyang / /gcig 'dus gnyis 'dus gsum 'dus dang / /bzhi 'dus lnga 'dus la sogs pas/ /'byung bar 'gyur ba gsungs pa yin/ /yang na mchog 'dod pa la ni/ /thams cad rdzogs par dgos par gsungs/ /thun mong

dngos grub sgrub pa la/ /che chung gis na rim pas gsungs/ /sbyor ba re res kyang ni 'grub/ /gsang sngags la la'i bzhed kyis ni/ /dper na sbrul ni gshu bur zhugs/ /rtsa bar 'gro dang co tor 'gro/ /de bzhin rnal 'byor sngags pa yang / /rig 'dzin sa dang rdo rje dmyal/ /la la dag

gi gzhung gis ni/ /bar ma do nas 'gro ba'o/ /la la skye ba phyi ma la/ /la la dag gis bzhed kyis ni/ /gnyis dang gsum pa dag la'o/ /bzhi pa'am lnga par 'dod pa'ang yod/ /la la skye ba bdun pa la/ /phyag rgya'i dngos grub thob par 'dod/ /de ltar gzhung lugs mi

'dra ba/ /mang du gsungs pa de dag kyang / /'gal ba med de kun kyang bden/ /gsang sngags kyi ni gzhung gis kyang / /skye ba bdun las mi dma' bas/ /skye ba bdun gyi tha ma la/ /ma bsgoms kyang ni sangs rgyas sa/ /zhes su rgyud las bstan pa yin/ /skye ba bdun zhes bya

ba yang / /sngags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yin/ /sngags dang sman la sogs pa yi/ /stobs kyis lus sems las rung bas/ /sha dang thod pa la sogs pa/ /bsten cing zos pas dngos grub thob/ /de bas sngags mthu'i yon tan no/ /sa dang pha

rol phyin pa la/ /skye ba bdun pa 'ong srid kyang / /de ltar 'ong ba shin tu dkon/ /skye ba bdun pa zhes bya'i gnas/ /phal cher dur khrod chen po yi/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi gnas su skye/ /rig 'dzin sa zhes bya ba yang / /gcig ni de la'ang bya ba yin/ /rig 'dzin sa la'ang

gsum yod de/ /dur khrod rin chen sa dang ni/ /bar snang lha gnas lha rtan sa/ /mkha' spyod 'og min stug po'i sa/ /gnas ni de gsum yin par gsungs/ /skye ba bdun pa'i gang zag ni/ lus dang gnas ni khyad par can/ /sngags spyod pa yi yul dag tu/ /'ga' tsam

byung ba dag kyang yod/ /skye ba gcig sogs gzhan pa ni/ /de rnams gnas kyang de bzhin no/ /skye ba bdun pa'i gang zag ni/ /dad dang snying rje la sogs ldan/ /pha rol phyin bcu'i chos la spyod/ /mthun 'jug spyod pa kun la mkhas/ /bzo dang rig pa gnas la mkhas/ /lta ba

ma nor gdeng du gyur/ /spyod pa la dor thabs la mkhas/ /man ngag mthong ba tsam gyis ni/ /the tshom med par 'jug par byed/ /man ngag bsgoms ma thag tu ni/ /ting 'dzin skye 'gyur rang gi ni/ /khams dang dus kyi bye brag shes/ /rgyud lus mtshan gyi man ngag la/ /thos pa

tsam gyis dbu zhabs kyi/ /man ngag rnams ni khong du chud/ /bshad pa'i rgyud dang 'grel pa dang / /mngon rtogs pa yi rim pa rnams/ /ma thos pa ru shes par 'gyur/ /dper na shing 'dzer stsal pa tsam/ /rgyud lus man ngag mdo mdo yi/ /mkhas pa la ni brten pa

su/ /thams cad don rnams khong chud nas/ /skabs phyed spyi don shin tu rgyas/ /dka' 'grel mngon rtogs rim pa ni/ /rtsom nus don la shin tu mkhas/ /mig ni yun ring mi 'dzum zhing / /yi dam lha bsgom dus su ni/ /skye ba bdun pa'i grib ma snang / /skye ba

gnyis sogs gzhan po la/ /grib ma'i rtags kyang de bzhin no/ /bsgoms pa'i stobs kyi khyad par gyis/ /zhag bdun zla gcig zla bdun du/ /mkha' 'gro mas ni lung ston zhing / /chos bshad rtags rnams ston par mdzad/ /chos pa yi ni mdzad spyod kyang / /dngos

su sprul nas ston pa dang / /yang sprul sum sprul la sogs su/ /sprul nas ston dang yang na ni/ /sku ni mi snang sgra yis su/ /nam mkha' las su ston pa dang / /yang na phyag mtshan la sogs la/ /sgra byung nas ni ston pa dang / /yang na rmi lam mtshan mas su/ /dus bzhi

dus gsum dus gcig tu/ /yang nas yang du ston pa'o/ /ma thos pa yi man ngag rnams/ /ston mor byed na skye bdun sogs/ /sngags kyi dngos grub thob pa yi/ /rnal 'byor rig 'dzin byang chub sems/ /yang na dang po skyes nas ni/ /theg chen chos la mos nas kyang / /man

ngag bsgoms la shin tu dga'/ /slob dpon la ni man ngag gi/ /rna brgyud gcig tsam thos pas su/ /bsgoms pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /de nas gong bzhin byung nas su/ /gzhan la yang ni ston par nus/ /yang na skye bdun gang zag ste/ /skyes ma thag tu yi dam

lhas/ /rmi lam na ni chos bstan nas/ /man ngag de bsgoms dngos grub ni/ /phra mo dag ni thob nas kyang / /gzhan la chos ni ston par nus/ /de nas rim gyis gzhan yang 'byung / /yang na skye bdun gang zag de/ /rkyen ni gnyis po 'dzom pa las/ /bsgom pa la ni dga' bar 'gyur/ /

son gyi bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis ni/ /'bad rtsol drag po ma byas par/ /thun gcig la ni sgom pa rnyed/ /de nas rim gyis bsgoms pas su/ /zhag bdun nas ni lung ston 'byung / /de nas rim gsum gong ma bzhin/ /de nas mngon shes drug ldan nas/ /phyag rgya'i dngos

grub thob par 'gyur/ /sngags pa'i dngos grub thams cad kun/ /skye ba 'di la phyag rgya thob/ /de ltar ma gyur rnal 'byor pa/ /gong ma bzhin du skye bdun du/ /len pa'i rtags ni gong bzhin 'byung / /skye ba 'di thob tshul rnams kyang / /theg chen snod du rung ba la/ /dbang bskur

man ngag thob pa yis/ /dam tshig ma nyams bshags la brtson/ /bskyed rim brtan par gyur pas ni/ /lus kyi rnam rtog bzlog nas kyang / /rdo rje bzlas la brten nas kyang / /ngag gi rnam rtog bzlog nas ni/ /sems dben pa la brten par bya/ /sems kyi 'khrul

rtog bzlog nas kyang / /sgyu ma'i ting 'dzin la gnas nas/ /'od gsal la ni 'jug par bya/ /de nas spros med man ngag la/ /lhun gyis grub 'gyur phyag rgya'i mchog /yang na bskyed rim la brten nas/ /tshe la dbang ba'i rig 'dzin sgrub/ /tshe la dbang sgrub rig 'dzin gyi/ /rdzogs

pa'i man ngag bsgom par bya/ /des su phyag rgya'i dngos grub 'thob/ /yang na bskyed rim brtan pa yis/ /rdzogs pa'i man ngag gang bsgoms kyang / /zla ba drug gis phyag rgya 'thob/ /rdzogs rim bskyed pa la brten nas/ /de nas rdzogs pa'i rdzogs pas ni/ /phyag rgya'i dngos grub

thob par gsungs/ /de ni slob dpon chen po'i gzhung / /sbyor na lta ba gdeng 'gyur gtso/ /lhan cig ldog bya'i tshul du ni/ /byas nas the tshom mi skye zhing / /ldog par mi 'gyur 'byung pos kyang / /tshugs par mi 'gyur 'bras bu myur/ /de ltar ma gyur rnal 'byor pas/ /man ngag

nyams su lon par bya/ /man ngag bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma yis lung ston pas/ /lung bstan pa yi dus su ni/ /lta ba man ngag zab mo ni/ /bstan pa bsgoms pas phyag rgya 'thob/ /mang na rnal 'byor rim pas ni/ /blo yi rab 'bring khyad par ni/ /bag chags

rkyen la sogs pa yis/ /rab 'bring dgu dang gsum dang ni/ /dbye bar bya ba'i don shes bya/ /rgyu rkyen 'dzom pa'i gang zag ni/ /skye ba 'di la lung ston pas/ /phyag rgya'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /rkyen ni rab tu mang gyur pa'i/ /rab kyi 'bring sogs ldan pa can/ /bar ma

do la lung bstan no/ /rab kyi tha ma ldan pa ni/ /skye ba phyi ma lung ston no/ /'bring gi gsum po'i rigs ldan yang / /gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi ru sbyar/ /tha ma'i rigs ldan gsum po yang / /lnga dang drug dang bdun du sbyar/ /yang na rkyen sogs ldan gyur kyang / /rgyu la sogs

pa'i nus pa rnams/ /drag zhan gyi ni rim pa yis/ /rkyen gyi tshul bzhin sbyor shes bya'o/ /rgyu rkyen gnyi ga 'bring sogs kyi/ /rim pa dang ni ldan pa rnams/ /gong ma gnyis dang mi mthun pas/ /gsum dang bdun du sbyar shes bya/ /gnyis ka zhan par gyur pa na/ /gsang sngags

snod du mi rung bas/ /dbang bskur mi bya 'jug pa tsam/ /dge ba'i sa bon chung gyur kyang / /smon lam btab pa'i dad ldan de/ /gsang sngags la ni mos gyur nas/ /yang nas yang du gsol 'debs la/ /phyi ma'i dbang bskur tsam byas la/ /mi zab dbyibs kyi man ngag bstan/ /

de las bstan pa'i gang zag la/ /lhag ma rnams ni rim gyis bstan/ /yang na rnal 'byor rim pa ni/ /yi dam lha tshogs so so ru/ /so so bag chags gzhag pa dang / /mos pa la sogs rim pa yis/ /the tshom la sogs med mod kyang / /dngos grub 'grub par ma gyur

na/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i 'du shes kyi/ /tha mi dad par bsgoms nas kyang / /man ngag yang yang spros kyang ni/ /'gal ba med de dngos grub 'grub/ /de ltar byas kyang ma byung na/ /sgrib pa shin tu che gsungs pas/ /sbyin sreg tshogs 'khor bzlas brjod dang / /gtor ma la sogs

cho ga yis/ /bdun nas stong gi bar du ni/ /mkhas pas ci nus rgyud brtags la/ /sna tshogs sdig pa sbyang ba gsung / /lus kun la ni gnod pa yi/ /tsher ma'i phung pos lam rnams 'gags/ /me yi sbyor ba mkhas pa yis/ /bsregs pas thams cad med par byed/ /

de nas lam ni rnyed nas ni/ /gang du phyin par 'gro bar byed/ /de bzhin sngags sogs mthun rnams kyis/ /sgrib pa la sogs bcom nas kyang / /ting nge 'dzin gyi lam rnyed nas/ /dngos grub kyang ni thob par 'gyur/ /dngos grub khyad par ma thob kyang / /phra mo la sogs thob

par 'gyur/ /mtshan ma'i lung ston phra mo 'byung / /gal te de ltar ma gyur par/ /tshe dbang ma thob rnal 'byor pas/ /sgrib pa rnams ni byang gyur nas/ /skye ba phyi ma la sogs su/ /dngos grub kyang ni thob par 'gyur/ /yang na sngags kyi mthu rnams kyis/ /sdig sgrib rtsad

nas mchod kyang / /che long rags pa mgo bcom nas/ /gzhan dag mi skye mgo gnon zhing / /dam tshig ma nyams bshags la brtson/ /smon lam dge rtsa bsngo legs pas/ /skye ba 'di rjes gzhan dag tu/ /dus dang gnas dang slob dpon dang / /grogs dang

phyag rgya man ngag sogs/ /skyes ma thag tu rnyed par 'gyur/ /de ru dam tshig ldan sogs pas/ /rim gyis skye bdun brgyud nas su/ /'bad rtsol drag po ma byas par/ /sangs rgyas sa la 'gro bar gsungs/ /de sogs lung bstan sbyor ba rnams/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi lung

ston du/ /rnal 'byor mkhas pas shes par bya/ /'di ni blo dman don ched du/ /cung zad bsdus te bstan pa yin/ /mkha' 'gro ma yis lung ston kyang / /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa/ /'jig rten 'das pa gnyis yod de/ /sa nas rig 'dzin mkha' 'gro dang / /bde

gshegs byin rlabs mkha' 'gro'o/ /mkha' 'gro de dag gnyi ga yang / /mdzes pa'i gzugs dang mi mdzes pa'i/ /gzugs ni sna tshogs sprul nas ston/ /de la 'jigs dang mi 'jigs dang / /re dang dogs pa'i sems spangs te/ /phyag rgya brda la sogs pa yis/ /ston

pa'i dus su las rnams ni/ /ston par shes par ma gyur na/ /dngos grub med de nyams par 'gyur/ /de bas nan tan cher bskyed la/ /man ngag thos pa che ba gces/ /thos pa che bar ma gyur yang / /gang sgrub rgyud skor la sogs la/ /slob dpon la ni yang nas yang / /the

tshom chod par mnyan par bya/ /rgyud rnams thos par mi nus pas/ /sgrub pa'i cha rkyen bcu bdun po/ /shes par de ni ma byas na/ /dngos grub 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /slob dpon la ni brten pa yis/ /ma tshang yang ni 'grub par gsungs/ /'jig rten pa la gnyis yod do/ /

rgyal bas bka' la btags pa yis/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba dang / /bdud ni nag po la sogs pa/ /dam la ma thogs bar chod mkhan/ /de ltar gnyis su ma shes na/ /dngos grub thob kyang slar la 'tshor/ /de gnyis gzugs dang rtags sogs pa/ /gong ma

bzhin du ston pas na/ /de yi rim pa gong bzhin bya/ /de dag brtags pa'i cho ga yang / /zhag gsum zhag bdun rtsa gcig tu/ /re dogs la sogs thams cad kun/ /spangs nas rnal 'byor ting 'dzin la/ /nan tan du ni brtson 'grus bya/ /tshogs 'khor la sogs yang dang yang

byed pa'i dus su rdo rje glu/ /len cing phyag rgya sogs bstan pas/ /ting 'dzin phyag rgya gsal ba dang / /mtshan ma la sogs gsal 'bar zhing / /gzugs dang sgra dang dri la sogs/ /thams cad brtan zhing mi 'gyur na/ /lha yi mtshan mar shes par bya/ /de las bzlog pa

thams cad kun/ /bdud kyi rtags su shes par bya/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /mkha' 'gro'i lung du bstan pas na/ /'dir ni sgrub po'i don du bsdus/ /sgrub pa'i cha rkyen man ngag rnams/ /sgrub po nyams su len pa la/ /bstan zhing spel na bsod nams

'phel/ /nyams su mi len ser sna can/ /rdzas dang lus srog la sogs pa/ /bla ma la ni 'bul mi nus/ /de la man ngag bstan mi bya/ /de la man ngag bstan pa na/ /dngos grub nyams te sdig pa 'phel/ /dam tshig nyams nas mkha' 'gros gsod/ /cha rkyen la sogs

bcu bdun po/ /ston pa phyag na rdo rje yis/ /sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la/ /rna ba brgyud pa'i gdams ngag de/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la bstan/ /des ni ro langs ma la bstan/ /gnod sbyin phyag na rdo rje dang / /slob dpon phyag na rdo rje yis/ /brgyud pa'i gdams ngag rim pa

rnams/ /nan tan gyis ni btsal bar bya/ /de la btsal ba ma shes na/ /dper na yid bzhin nor bu ni/ /klu rgyal gtsug nas rnyed nas ni/ /'dam rdzab nang du stor ba bzhin/ /de bzhin man ngag rin chen 'di/ /lus ngag yid gsum dka' ba yi/ /sgo nas slob dpon la btsal

nas/ /dam med rmongs pa'i lag shor na/ /dngos grub mi thob nyams par 'gyur/ /de bas nan tan bskyed de btsal/ /lung bstan pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ka'o/ /slob dpon chen po b+ha bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //lo tsA ba tshul khrims gzhon nus bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ badzra karma saM g+ha kra mong+g+ha Ta pi d+hiH/ bod skad du/ rdo rje las kyi tshogs rim par phye ba'i cho ga /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bsnams pa la dad cing gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can la ni phan pa'i phyir/ /las kyi tshogs ni bdud rtsi mtshungs/ /

rgyud rnams kun las btus nas ni/ /bdag gis sgrub pa'i don du bshad/ /las rnams thams cad ci byed kyang / /gtor ma'i las 'di grogs su 'gyur/ /de bas gtor ma sngon la bshad/ /gtor ma'i las rnams kun la yang / /ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag rgya dang / /tshigs

bcad rdzas kyi nus pa'i mthus/ /de lnga tshogs na las rnams 'grub/ /de yang ting 'dzin rgyal po'i rgyal/ /bram ze sngags kyi nus mthu can/ /rje'u rigs phyag rgya nyid dang mthun/ /tshigs bcad tha mal spyod pa 'dra/ /rdzas ni kun gyi gzhi rten 'gyur/ /de yang spyi dang khyad par

ro/ /spyi ni kun gyi nus mthu can/ /nus pa drag po 'byin pa yin/ /khyad par so so kun la yang / /nus pa che chung rim pa 'byung / /de yi rnal 'byor rim pa yang / /las dang po ni mos pa 'jog /dngos grub phra mo phrin las dbang / /ye shes phra mos phrin las rdzogs/ /ye

shes can ni de nyid 'thob/ /yang dag pas ni bya ba rdzogs/ /rnal 'byor de lnga'i rim pas kyang / /gtor ma la sogs las rnams la/ /ting 'dzin la sogs 'jug thabs lnga/ /man ngag can gyis shes par bya/ /de bzhin las rnams kun la yang / /man ngag can gyis sbyar

bar bya'o/ /gtor ma dbul ba'i rim pa yang / /mgron gyi lha ni gnyis su bya/ /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa/ /'jig rten 'das la gnyis yod de/ /bde gshegs sprul dang sa la gnas/ /de dag gnyis la'ang spyi dang ni/ /so so'i khyad par shes par bya/ /'jig

rten pa la gnyis yod de/ /spyi dang so so'i khyad par ro/ /spyi ni khams gsum sems can kun/ /khyad par chos skyong srung ma rnams/ /de la khyad par so so la/ /dpag tu med pa yod mod kyang / /dgos pa bsdus pa bstan par bya/ /gtor ma'i rdzas rnams bstan pa ni/ /thun

mong rdzas dang khyad par rdzas/ /thun mong drug cur sbyar zhes bya/ /khyad par bdud rtsi rnam lnga dang / /dkar gsum mngar gsum la sogs dang / /sha sna khrag la sogs pa dang / /mgrin gyi skabs dang sbyar bar bya/ /ting 'dzin bstan pa'i rim pa yang / /bdag nyid lhag pa'i lhar bskyed

la/ /mtshan dang ldan pa'i snod mchog tu/ /nyi zla'i gdan bsam bdud rtsi bsam/ /sa bon las bskyed des su mtshan/ /de 'og me dang rlung ni bsam/ /de yi steng du rdo rje bsam/ /de yi steng du ri bong can/ /yi ge oM gyis mtshan pa yin/ /hUM bskyed pas ni rlung byung bas/ /me 'bar

bdud rtsi dros par 'gyur/ /oM gyis ye shes bdud rtsi phab/ /rdo rjes dkrug cing 'bru gsum bzlas/ /dri med dag pa'i bdud rtsir gyur/ /de ni thun mong ting 'dzin yin/ /khyad par so so'i skabs su bstan/ /thun mong gi ni sngags bstan pa/ /oM bud+d+ha DA ki nI sarba bi laM ta kha kha khA hi/

oM badzra DA ki nI sarba ba liM ta kha kha khA hi/ oM rat+na DA ki nI sarba ba liM ta kha kha khA hi/ oM pad+ma DA ki nI sarba ba liM ta kha kha khA hi/ oM bi shwa DA ki nI sarba ba liM ta kha kha khA hi/ oM sarba DA ki nI sarba ba liM ta kha kha khA hi/ khyad par gyi sngags bstan pa ni/ oM badzra DA ki bya ba khyer tsi/ rU pa kA kA s+ya tsi la

kA la rU pa/ i maM ba liM gr-ih+naM tu sa ma yaM ra k+Sha n+tu ya thai Sh+Ta sarba sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tshan+tu/ hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ tshigs bcad kyi ni rim pa yang / /spyi dang khyad par gnyis su bstan/ /spyi yi tshigs bcad bstan pa ni/ /mkha' dbyings rnam dag klong dkyil nas/ /smon lam thugs rje'i dbang gis

na/ /mkha' 'gro mi bzad sku sprul nas/ /'jigs byed 'jigs pa'i sku 'chang ma/ /sku la bsgribs pa mi mnga' yang / /'gro ba sems can don slad du/ /bdud rtsi la sogs gsol mdzad ma/ /dgyes pa'i tshul gyis 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes/ /bud+d+hA mkha' 'gro dpal

'bar ba/ /smug nag 'bar ba'i ral pa can/ /stobs ldan drag shul sku 'chang ma/ /sku yi stobs ldan mthu chen las/ /sku yi lha mo'i sprul pa 'gyed/ /bud+d+hA mkha' 'gro 'khor bcas rnams/ /yang sprul smug mo 'bum gyis bskor/ /dgyes pa'i tshul gyis 'dir gshegs

mchod pa bzhes/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro dpal 'bar ma/ /mthing nag 'bar ba'i ral ba can/ /thugs mchog 'bar ba'i rigs ldan ma/ /mi 'gyur thugs kyi dpal be'u nas/ /thugs kyi lha mo sprul pa 'gyed/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro 'khor bcas rnams/ /'khor

du nag mo 'bum gyis bskor/ /dgyes pa'i tshul gyis 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes/ /rin chen mkha' 'gro dpal 'bar ma/ /ser nag 'bar ba'i ral pa can/ /yon tan rgyas pa'i rigs ldan ma/ /rin chen 'bar ba'i mdzod spu nas/ /rin chen rigs kyi sprul pa 'gyed/ /rin chen

mkha' 'gro 'khor bcas rnams/ /'khor du ser mo 'bum gyis bskor/ /dgyes pa'i tshul gyis 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes/ /pad+ma mkha' 'gro dpal 'bar ma/ /dmar nag 'bar ba'i ral pa can/ /gsung mchog 'bar ba'i rigs ldan ma/ /dri med gsung gi bum pa

nas/ /gsung gi lha mo'i sprul pa 'gyed/ /sgra rnams sgrogs pa'i mkha' 'gro ma/ /'khor du dmar mo 'bum gyis bskor/ /dgyes pa'i tshul gyis 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes/ /las kyi mkha' 'gro dpal 'bar ma/ /ljang nag 'bar ba'i ral pa can/ /las rnams mdzad

pa'i rigs ldan ma/ /phyag zhabs pad+ma'i 'khor lo las/ /las kyi lha mo'i sprul pa 'gyed/ /drag shul las kyi mkha' 'gro ma/ /'khor du ljang nag 'bum gyis bskor/ /dgyes pa'i tshul gyis 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes/ /mkha' la 'gro ba'i mkha' 'gro ma/ /rdo rje nam

mkhar 'gro ma rnams/ /sa la 'gro ba'i mkha' 'gro ma/ /rdo rje sa 'og 'gro ma dang / /bar snang 'gro ba'i mkha' 'gro ma/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang shugs 'gro ma/ /ma mo'i tshogs dang sring mo'i tshogs/ /nag mo dbang phyug tshogs rnams kun/ /dgyes pa'i tshul gyis 'dir gshegs

mchod pa bzhes/ /gnod sbyin tshogs rnams ma lus dang / /zhes bya ba la sogs pa klog phreng nas 'byung ba'i rgyud bzhin du gtong ngo / /khyad par so so'i tshigs bcad ni/ /mkha' la spyod pa'i mkha' 'gro ma/ /bya rog gzugs can 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /pad+ma la

gnas khwa gdong ma/ /thod pa kha T+wAM ga yis brgyan/ /gri gug gcod mdzad thod khrag 'thung / /phyag bzhi de bzhin rol pa mdzad/ /zhal gyi nga ros bdud rnams brgyal/ /spyan gsum smin ma'i dkyus ldan ma/ /spyan gsum 'od kyis khams gsum gsal/ /rol pa'i 'dug stangs

gar dang ldan/ /sgeg pa la sogs ro ldan pa/ /gar gyi spyod ldan mkha' 'gro ma/ /khro bo'i rgyal po stongs chen rnams/ /sbyor ldan tshul gyi 'khor gyis bskor/ /'khor bcas ma lus thams cad kyang / /dgyes pa'i tshul gyis 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes/ /mkha'

'gro chen mo sa spyod ma/ /khyi yi gdong can 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /spyan mig glog 'gyu stong mdzad ma/ /zhal gdangs bas ni khams gsum rngub/ /phyag gi gar gyis dgyes par mdzad/ /sku yi sgeg pas rol par ldan/ /zhabs kyis 'byung po zil gyis gnon/ /drag po

'khor dang bcas pa rnams/ /dgyes pa'i tshul gyis 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes/ /sa 'og gnas pa'i mkha' 'gro ma/ /gau rI nag mo chen mo ni/ /nya yi gdong can 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /spyan gsum 'od zer 'bar ba yis/ /khams gsum ma lus skrag

par byed/ /zhal gyis sa 'og sems can gsol/ /phyag gi gri yis nyams rnams gtubs/ /zhabs rnams rol pas sa 'og gnon/ /gar gyi 'gying tshul la brtson pa/ /ha ha hi hi sgra sgrogs ma/ /drag po'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams/ /dgyes pa'i tshul gyis 'dir

gshegs mchod pa bzhes/ /phyogs skyong gnas pa'i mkha' 'gro ma/ /thod pa 'bar ba'i gzhal yas nas/ /rdo rje hUM bdag gtso bdag mdzad/ /sdigs mdzub rdo rje 'gying bag can/ /shin tu mi bzad 'jigs mdzad ma/ /spyan ni sngon po'i mdog dang ldan/ /'bar ba

sngon por rab tu khyab/ /zhabs bskum tshul gnas ma mo gnon/ /de 'khor phyogs skyong mkha' 'gro ma/ /shar gyi phyogs kyi tshangs pa mo/ /zhal gcig spyan gsum gar la brtson/ /rngub dang skrag dang 'dzin pa'i las/ /phreng ba spyi blugs bsnams pa'i mkha' 'gro ma/ /

dgyes pa'i tshul gyis 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes/ /lho na gnas pa'i khyab 'jug ma/ /zhal gcig spyan gsum gar la brtson/ /rngub dang skrag dang 'dzin pa'i las/ /'khor lo pad+ma bsnams pa'i mkha' 'gro ma/ /dgyes pa'i tshul gyis

'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes/ /nub na gnas pa'i gzhon nu ma/ /zhal gcig spyan gsum gar la brtson/ /rngub dang skrag dang 'dzin pa'i las/ /rtse gsum phreng ba bsnams pa'i mkha' 'gro ma/ /dgyes pa'i tshul gyis 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes/ /byang na gnas

pa'i gshin rje ma/ /zhal gcig spyan gsum gar la brtson/ /rngub dang skrag dang 'dzin pa'i las/ /dbyug pa mi mgo bsnams pa'i mkha' 'gro ma/ /dgyes pa'i tshul gyis 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes/ /me yi phyogs na gnas pa'i tsa mu N+DI/ /zhal gcig spyan gsum

gar la brtson/ /rngub dang skrag dang 'dzin pa'i las/ /'khor lo seng ge bsnams pa'i mkha' 'gro ma/ /dgyes pa'i tshul gyis 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes/ /srin po'i phyogs na gnas pa'i tsa muN+DI/ /zhal gcig spyan gsum gar la brtson/ /rngub dang skrag dang 'dzin

pa'i las/ /ral gri rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'i mkha' 'gro ma/ /dgyes pa'i tshul gyis 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes/ /dbang ldan mtshams na gnas pa'i dbang ldan ma/ /zhal gcig spyan gsum gar la brtson/ /rngub dang skrag dang 'dzin pa'i las/ /mdung thung thod pa

bsnams pa'i mkha' 'gro ma/ /dgyes pa'i tshul gyis 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes/ /rlung gi phyogs na gnas pa'i rlung lha mo/ /zhal gcig spyan gsum gar la brtson/ /rngub dang skrag dang 'dzin pa'i las/ /gos dang thod pa bsnams pa'i mkha' 'gro ma/ /ma mo

mkha' 'gro 'khor bcas rnams/ /dgyes pa'i tshul gyis 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes/ /mkha' 'gro chen mo thang spyod ma/ /khyu mchog rdo rje 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /de yis thugs las sprul pa mo/ /mkha' 'gro drag mo mthu mo che/ /ro langs ma ni za la dga'/ /

gtum mo 'jigs pa'i cha lugs can/ /seng ge chen mo mchod byed ma/ /stag mo chen mo 'khyug byed ma/ /'ug gdong chen mo mun pa 'joms/ /ce sbyang ma ni khrag tu za/ /mkha' 'gro chen mo 'khor bcas kyang / /dgyes pa'i tshul gyis 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes/ /

mkha' 'gro chen mo gzhon nu ma/ /sku mdog ser mo 'od zer 'bar/ /'od zer phreng ba stong phrag 'phro/ /mdzes pa'i rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan/ /rnam snang mdzad kyi dbu rgyan can/ /mya ngan med pa'i me tog phreng / /dbu la mdzes pa'i rgyan du byas/ /zhal gsum phyag

drug mthu mo che/ /sgeg cing rol dang bcas pa mo/ /gzhon nu chen mo 'khor bcas kyang / /dgyes pa'i tshul gyis 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes/ /mkha' 'gro chen mo lhag sdud ma/ /dur khrod brgyad kyi dbus gnas pa/ /bcom ldan 'khor ba sgrol ba'i mchog /dar bab

lo yi na tshod gnas/ /ljang bu'i mdog can 'gying bag can/ /gru gsum nang gi phyogs dag na/ /ye shes can dang mkha' 'gro ma/ /skyon ma gos pa'i gos dkar mo/ /nyon mongs 'khru byed mA ma kI/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab cing drag /mkha' 'gro chen mo khyed bzhi yang / /

lhag sdud rnams kyi gtso mor grags/ /mkha' 'gro chen mo lhag sdud rnams/ /dur khrod brgyad kyi phyogs dag na/ /kha T+wAM ga dang mgo la sogs/ /thod pa rnams kyis yongs su brgyan/ /shing gcig dang ni ldan pa nyid/ /khra dang khyi dang spyang ki dang / /seng ge stag dang byi la

dang / /bya rgod la sogs 'khor gyis bskong / /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma tshogs kyis/ /mnyes par spras pa'i gzugs 'dzin ma/ /mkha' 'gro chen mo keng rus ma/ /drag po gri gug snod thogs pa/ /gri gug gcod pa'i las mdzod cig /thod pa'i khrag ni 'thung bar byed/ /

skra bshig pa la spyan gsum pa/ /yi dwags zhal du rngub par byed/ /drag po mi bzad gsus pa 'phyang / /thod pa 'bar ba'i rgyan dang ldan/ /rgyu ma'i phreng bas nges par brgyan/ /stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can/ /mi yi rus pa'i phreng ldan pa'i/ /ska rags khrag gi

thig le can/ /yi dwags klad pa tshil dang zhag /lus la byug pa la dgyes pa/ /lag 'gro chen mo'i rna cha can/ /brang 'gro'i rkang gdub 'jigs rung ba/ /kha dog dkar po 'bar ba'i tshogs/ /gzi brjid thub pa dag pa yis/ /shin tu mi bzad khros

bas ni/ /gnod sbyin la sogs sdigs par byed/ /ha ha chen po'i sgra sgrogs pa/ /mkha' 'gro chen mo dud sol gdong / /de 'dra'i mkha' 'gro dpag med dang / /sha za la sogs 'khor gyis bskor/ /'khor bcas ma lus thams cad kyis/ /'dir gshegs lhag

ma'i gtor ma bzhes/ /lhag ma'i gtor ma 'di bzhes la/ /las rnams ma lus myur du mdzod/ /khyed kyis las rnams mdzad tshul ni/ /rgyal ba shAka thub bstan pa la/ /gnas pa'i rnal 'byor bsrung ba dang / /bstan pa gnyen po bsrung ba dang / /nad rnams ma lus bzlog

pa dang / /de la sogs pa'i las rnams kun/ /myur du mdzad cing srung du gsol/ /gzhan yang bcol ba'i las rnams ni/ /rdo rje slob dpon smod pa dang / /sangs rgyas bstan pa bshig pa dang / /rgyal khams yongs su smod pa dang / /dge 'dun 'du ba'i sgo 'phrog dang / /

gsang sngags theg chen smod pa dang / /rnal 'byor spyi yi dgar gyur rnams/ /mkha' 'gro khyed kyis myur du sgrol/ /sha za mo ni 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /dur khrod gnas pa'i shing gcig la/ /rtse mor gnas bcas kun du blta/ /gcer bu skra bshig sha za ma/ /rtag tu sha ni za

bar byed/ /sha za 'khor dang bcas pa rnams/ /'dir gshegs mchod pa dam pa bzhes/ /mkha' lding rgyal po gser mig can/ /gdong gcig pa la lag bzhi pa/ /kha dog dkar po'i 'od chen ldan/ /gser gyi gshog pa'i dbu rgyan can/ /nor bu bai DUr+ya yi mchu/ /

rkang gzer byi ru las byung ba/ /shel ltar dkar ba'i mdog dang ldan/ /skye ba'i gnas su bdud rtsis bkang / /phyag gis bum 'dzin phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'od zer dmar po'i tshogs kyis ni/ /mkha' lding dbang phyug 'khor bcas spros/ /gshog zur brgyab pas rgya

mtsho skems/ /klu rnams ma lus zas su za/ /mkha' lding rgyal po 'khor bcas rnams/ /'dir gshegs mchod pa dam pa bzhes/ /klu yi rgyal po gzi brjid can/ /klu chen brgyad du skus sprul pa/ /klu chen rgyal po nor rgyas bu/ /sku mdog dkar po skyon mgos/ /

shar phyogs klu rnams 'dul mdzad pa/ /sbrul mgo can la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /klu yi rgyal po 'jog po ni/ /sku mdog ser po sbrul mgo can/ /byang phyogs klu rnams 'dul mdzad pa/ /sbrul zhags bsnams la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /klu chen rgyal po stobs kyi rgyu/ /sku

mdog dmar po sbrul mgo can/ /nub phyogs klu rnams 'dul mdzad pa/ /mthu chen khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /klu chen rgyal po pad+ma'i rgyal/ /sku mdog sngon po sbrul mgo can/ /lho phyogs klu rnams 'dul mdzad pa/ /yon tan rgyal la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /klu chen rgyal
